column11: reviews

column3: Wooden, 570m-long boardwalk along a jagged coastline with rock formations & steps leading to caves.
column8: Estr. do Algar Sêco, 8400-512 Carvoeiro, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Conor","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105307352693578738123/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZmzU9KEi3hGUEO0VfG9cEpanVaF7wGJyfQe4su=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"Beautiful walk for all ages young and small, 650 metres in total. Be sure to take the side gates for loads of hidden coves and some beautiful fossils and caves. The walk down this secluded area can be quiet tough and there are signs advising the danger of it.","time":1649597688,"translated":false},{"author_name":"ziv mor","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102960282463391304855/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QPgHT9Qi6G__qHDQ_G_Z4kwnHiYvTAdpMmfjuu_1g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Beautiful and unique ocean views with access to the caves and cliffs. Brave ones will find cool spots to jump into the water.\nThere is a restaurant in between the cliffs which is not cheap but highly recommended.","time":1663060352,"translated":false},{"author_name":"hoang mai Nguyen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108721783672151167269/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYz-kZfMFRewcFlW7EyaduKRx8zYVqs8tm1XC-v=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"This Boardwalk was definitely worth the trip. The Carvoeiro Boardwalk is a walk with scenic cliffs and nice trails to go on. You will always stay in one path, with small walks off the wooden steps. There were picturesque views in along the trail, and many, many places to take lovely pictures! Overall, a pleasant experience.","time":1671660615,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Airė Vizbaraitė","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117016048686744328864/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RRXDW3yX39zMB8nM_9AnisZoA-M_u39oIwYFJIiA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Absolutely amazing. I was expecting walk by the beach. However, on a way it was some nice surprises. Steps throughout the cliffs, restourant, some spots for cliff jumps. Easily can spend 2-3h.","time":1655058398,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gerrit van Schalkwyk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110350115546670097004/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T0oIL7NemGTq9N_1yGe9NE1Ypv5LneJxyc1YGNBw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very nice boardwalk to get to Algar Seco from Carvoeiro. Easy accessible for all ages, beautiful views of cliffs and passing ships & boats. Nice stops along the way, be sure to go down to the caves","time":1661249298,"translated":false}]

column3: Sophisticated rooms in a luxe property with 4 pools, a spa & 2 restaurants, plus free breakfast.
column8: Rua da Serra D'Água, nº1, 9370-087 Arco da Calheta, Madeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"A Dan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114539587909687520810/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SXOQ8Rn-rIM3vKLKmvy5Uj6V4waGgbMiYu2U5a=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Brilliant designed hotel with lots to do. Breakfast is great and full of variety. Staff all the way are attentive and friendly. The rooms are lovely however there is no door for the shower 😅. Well for level 3 anyway. So if you're not a couple. It's very awkward. Please note this non couples!

Great pool and facilities. Very relaxing break.","time":1669680946,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Niko K (NikosK2904)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100827942217896801576/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TJCP0pDKHHGpW7kUUcX_9yHdbZ0dFqB7L0l1qDWQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"I can only give my highest recommendations to stay at this hotel. Everything was outstanding: the location is excellent, the room was beautiful, the sea view amazing, breakfast was really good, especially if taken on the outside terrace, and the amenities were excellent. The price-quality ratio was marvelous when we were there. Only massages were quite expensive, but the good thing is that you get free access to the spa even if you’re only booked a 25 minute massage, which, then again makes it a good deal. The best thing is the service, every single person we spoke to was extremely friendly and helpful, room was made up twice a day, and most of all, after I left my business phone, they not only found and stored it, but also made an effort to send it back to my home country. We will be back!","time":1671440043,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Serge Flammang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103387441016185143226/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SxWRlkkfYm0LOg4WmnVDfFjLAdIWP4apSyudOGDg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Beautifully designed hotel in a calm location. Several restaurants and bars inside, one with live music every evening and one beach bar. They serve tasty and well priced food. (considering it’s a hotel)
The breakfast buffet offers lots of different  international options and an amazing sea view to enjoy the morning.
The service is impeccable.

The reason for the 4 stars are the beds, which we did not feel comfortable sleeping in.","time":1661986124,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Claudia Rubina S Franco","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106825683083303883480/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb_90OCsTkDOnT6hIFxB-46gTlpxalNmLDY6glg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Came here in January for a Spa day. The spa area is really nice and has everything you would expect from a good spa. Also, the view from the spa area is to the garden and that is really nice. The massage that I had was amazing and you also have restaurants where you can go for a meal or light bite. we were also allowed to use the external swimming pool which has an amazing view. The staff were really nice and the facilities are very good. Also, parking is available.","time":1676887848,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katia Vega","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100743203680597168049/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYIA2LARpX3Fapady5N56zcwEivYUMcEN2DmFsj=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Saccharum hotel has been one of the best hotel I ever stay on. My family and I visit Madeira for the first time to spend Christmas and New Year, it was a fantastic experience. A quiet and elegant hotel, staff very helpful, specially the housekeeping team you can feel the love they put in their job, they clean the room in a way I never saw before. A nice outdoor and indoor pool & Spa. Various of bar and restaurants inside the hotel and an area in front of the hotel , at the beach for hotel customer with a nice bar that serves delicious food . You will have in this hotel all what you need. Thank you and we will certainly come back.","time":1672858127,"translated":false}]

column8: R. da Madalena n214, 1100-325 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Emmanuel GRATUZE","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106885153014854834160/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QJm1Mh7iMbKDpjhTbm1BGew7z_yQJSvd7-v-z1Xh0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"I stayed in SameSame 2 months this year and it has been an amazing experience. The accommodation was very good, clean and always designed tastefully. I was honestly feeling at home during my whole stay!

Samesame has a nice coworking where you can work well and a bar which is the perfect place to meet people, enjoy music and delicious food. But the thing which makes SameSame very special is the wonderful people you meet there, both the colivers and the team who runs the place. You will always find good vibes! :)

If you want to share a local experience, keep working on your projects and be a Lisbon's resident for some time, this is the right place to go!","time":1665153116,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Edmée Vaudremer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115558859024152418727/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYsHABlXxOPGp_VucN9qLbJjI4GHGxZsnsdHBRe=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"I stayed 2 months from March to May 2022 in this wonderful coliving / coworking space in the heart of Lisbon. I rented a private room that was clean and tastefully decorated. Sheets and towels were changed weekly. There is a good amount of room for storage. The cleaning team also vacuumed my room weekly. Note that the locks on the doors do not work. The whole accommodation has high quality features (beautiful stone sinks, room balconies, a patio) and you have access to the coworking space and the socials at Insitu. I met very cool people who were open and adventurous. I especially enjoyed weekly coliver dinners where one person cooks for everyone. The hosting team were friendly and relaxed. The coworking space has comfortable chairs, good wifi. The room to take conference calls is not so well insulated for noise and make sure to book it well in advance. In general, a fabulous place that set the bar very high for coliving experiences.","time":1678033353,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sonia Lourenço","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118263672996927835345/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QTs01iMk3X3_8bYkoo8_0kXC913lQ5EOW-NU_u0A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I stayed almost 3 weeks in Samesame in April 2021 and I had a great experience there. My room was perfect and I really enjoyed the events/activities organized for the colivers. I couldn't have a better "soft-landing" in Lisbon. I recommend it if you are new in town or if you want to discover the city in another way!","time":1620921502,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andrei Dinu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110438706995234756650/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QeY3pb_3EIB3yIop81Bt9AetTDsugrJH9xciGYqA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Lose yourself in music, love and all the wonderful vibes SameSame has to offer. I am grateful to have met you all and to become such close friends! If you want to start your adventure, there’s really no better place to get you going.","time":1646942268,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Willem van den Eijkel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103901604120802291658/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q1gt6QlYo3GP2wZUaSPnGdNuQDRDx3ajNakQCxpA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"I stayed in Same Same for 2/3 months and I absolutely loved it. The friendly staff, the beautiful room and perfect location make it an incredible place. Moreover, I liked the international and creative vibe in the co-living. I have also used the co-working and it was the ideal place to work. I would recommend digital nomads and other people that work remotely to explore Lisbon and stay at Same Same.","time":1590328288,"translated":false}]

column3: Trendy vegetarian restaurant with a terrace presenting carefully sourced, innovative dishes.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Jade Freely","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117186919464856107031/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5To3AxKMUkZlV4zD06vOvrXxqtrM5bv2PoOVzrBkA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"I've been meaning to post this for AGES but better late than never! My partner and I visited here for lunch over the summer and this was probably the best meal either of us have ever had. We opted for the full vegan tasting menu with the wine pairing and oh my god, everything was just supreme. We've recently started making it a point to visit Michelin restaurants in the places we travel to and this was the beginning of that. I'm quite the picky person and so I was nervous for some of the dishes like the cherry soup (pictured) but it was absolutely delightful. The restaurant is so beautiful with the earth tone decor and luscious plants, the food was delicious and gorgeously plated (and perfectly timed), the wine was fantastic, and the service was impeccable! Every single server was genuinely friendly. One of them took a perfect film photo of us from outside looking in (we had the window seat, best in the house!) and it was a favorite from the trip. Another waitress was really funny and friendly and helping us get just the right video shots for all of the food. Another was incredibly knowledgable on all of the local wines of the region. Everything was just perfect. 10/10, would recommend and would visit again and again!","time":1668049067,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maria Araújo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102873795424573597048/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SOYYU1brz37esakis8sB2C3_0agQkPADsIJNEMPN8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"I can't describe with words the amazing experience we had. First of all, everything is vegan or vegetarian. The waiters are incredible nice, well presented and amicable.
We chose the 5 course + wine harmonization. It's really worth it. The autumn menu is amazing. I wish I could eat here everyday.","time":1664571588,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicole","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102327013892915338328/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QamqwprEJupJhBoCFx_4TF5MHw2aT9WE8kYDKplr8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"It's great that there is a vegetarian fine dining restaurant that is not crazy expensive.  We got a bottle of Lisbon white wine (I forgot the name of it) and it was fantastic!  I am still dreaming of the wine a week later.  We ordered the 5 course menu and the courses ranged from amazing to blah.  For a starter we had a ravioli with egg yolk inside and shaved truffle on top and that was great. It was a special dish so normally not on the menu which is unfortunate because if we didn't have that ravioli then the meal would have mostly been blah.  They should definitely take the pumpkin main off the menu because it was as dry as cardboard.  The desserts were disappointing as well.  All in all, we were glad to have had the opportunity to do vegetarian fine dining, even if they do not let you keep your bottle of wine at the table and come pour you a centimeter of wine at a time (we would have bought a second bottle of wine if we could have self-poured!).  The ambience was nice but the lights were quite bright for a restaurant.","time":1644436735,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ève S.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112344849252387972470/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5ReXRbB0bXQwdkGhSHX_V1radFWepRzycDTWU1bow=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"A really enjoyable very fancy experience of vegan food. Everyone is so attentive and takes really good care of you.

They love their food and they show it. I was very impressed by the desert that blew me away: The Coco pepper ice cream was a revelation.

I wasn’t clear on the matter when I went but it is an expensive place where you have to get a whole menu and not just 1 item.","time":1668260822,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jeremy Farbota","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112670269506039597399/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T9l4XVuOfSVsGBQsTQTRI4naAO5JTNpzGP6LyE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"We loved the entire experience.

The staff was lovely and attentive.
The space was very cool with interesting decor and great plant life.
The food was unique and interesting. We especially loved the starters and the desserts. We did the wine pairing which included lots of great wines from Portugal, France, and Germany.
Highly recommend.","time":1659535714,"translated":false}]

column3: Elevated & creative ice creams, sorbets & dessert cakes served in a popular, snug venue.
column8: R. Nova da Piedade 64A, 1200-299 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Gonçalo Peres","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114030410828683073524/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S3VUMz5pluRxsvDw6sCbjLzALRr7PDSUFHJDtdv7U=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"If you're in the mood for some delicious ice cream, Nannarella is a place to go. The caramel flavor is my personal favorite (it has some pieces of caramel), but there's something for everyone here. And if you want your ice cream topped with chantilly, they'll do it for you free of charge.

There's a park nearby where you can enjoy the ice cream, but as the ice cream was not firm enough, it was already melting by the time I got there.

They should consider giving proper napkins, as the thin paper sheets they provide don't do a very good job of cleaning up.

Despite the queues, the service is fast, so don't be put off.","time":1664487782,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rachel Ford","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108248992211476205466/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QrPhIdV5CDX0MjakG9l452eK4mzuF34Bkvs1TeHQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"PSA: gluten-free cones! 🤗 Amazing flavors, and they will add fresh cream on top if you like (for free). The staff will help you choose GF flavors, which was very appreciated. We’ll be back!","time":1658503894,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicole Zhang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103872997776680932355/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QcsPijx_S6MnFKM10cA0mvtJyGYWtMdN3sYitLdQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Went here because of Somebody Feed Phil and I’m sure glad I did!! There were so many yummy flavors to choose from, and luckily I didn’t have to just choose one! They say you can choose as many flavors as you want, so I got the pumpkin walnut ricotta (seasonal) and the chestnut. The ice cream was delicious - great texture, nice flavor, and not toooo sweet (which I love)! Make sure you get the chantilly on top.. always!","time":1668977426,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eran Yariv","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107696263167565066625/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TPEKRBShArfTCIDFJmoRKRaRxKvUAXEtDZbIahNg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Great variety of flavors and large and hospitable portions of ice cream. We loved the lime sorbet flavor. Don’t miss out on adding the Nata cream","time":1665737154,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ece Erben","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107392795044892418699/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYm2pal9zJTGW7BVYi21jvrgJch4n96NGqN9Cny=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Best icecream place in town (trust me, I’ve tried almost all of them)! Reasonable prices and all the flavors are so tasty ❤️

My personal favorites: salted caramel, chocolate and hazelnut 💯","time":1669889575,"translated":false}]

column3: Chic rooms & suites in an elegant property offering a bar/restaurant & a courtyard.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Marlene C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116958656456792972661/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tc9vnGkNLacekqq1_masG-4RaxrdKGyES71oLDvNA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"I would give it 10 stars if I could. This place is breathtaking! Besides the calming aroma, the staff is super friendly, caring,  & accommodating. My brother's girlfriend unfortunately broke her ankle and weren't supposed to stay here with me and my bf, but thankfully this wonderful place got a room for them last minute.  They even provided crutches for her which the hospital did not. I highly recommend this hotel, from the staff to the food to the beauty of this hotel, it is absolutely amazing!!!!!🥰 Thank you Cristelle & staff for everything, Ian & I will be back❤️","time":1663727719,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Romain G","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106937009013533386531/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RT0BXwhLQYI46kYLthObbDMPYgnjSgceBzx8c0Ai8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Everything was nice except for the bathroom that was really bad.
The toilet smelt bad the whole time, takes 2 min to get hot water in the shower, and the water pressure is close to nothing.

Not good
But on top of that, I signaled it probably 5 times to the hotel concierge and reception and nothing has ever been done

For this kind of prices - its terrible the basics aren’t covered like a proper bathroom.

Very good breakfast but doesn’t make up for it
Won’t go back","time":1667732246,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yihang Zuo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117368925666647810051/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5STN-Wtad1jm_Mlcik8VuihgKcTaU-xDI-ujmsuPA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Relais Châteaux will never upset you! I prefer to stay in a hotel of Relais Châteaux when I’m traveling and I have to say all of them I’ve tried are perfect. Whenever I enter the gate of the hotel during my stay, I could always feel the mission of them to advocate local culture and history. Moreover, the decoration here is quite elegant, and the staffs are polite and welcoming🥰.","time":1669673136,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Susie Fernandez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110865880945420066207/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SqsPwRj9oyOAEZ3wuYYE4S3pVJO4R_JGUqySIA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"On one of the most beautiful avenues in Lisbon and centrally located to fine dining, shopping and leisure activities, Hotel Valverde is a true gem. The staff is friendly, professional, kind and accommodating. We arrived tired and ready to sleep, they did everything to get our room ready and even found us a better room than what we had booked, so we could rest without any noise or interruption. Breakfast is plentiful in a beautiful garden and the restaurant, though we only had food service, had wonderful choices. Crystal at the reception was amazing as was the entire staff. When in Lisbon, do yourself a favor and stay at Hotel Valverde.","time":1665558389,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sarah Wiley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103028309501699992373/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYLoBhmGLHOgg5t5jdtYlzT3yc_tFXgzNMbEag8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"We spent 5 days at the hotel for our honeymoon and wow! I cannot say enough about how lovely everything was. The space is beautiful with details that make it feel luxurious. The pool is the perfect place to relax after exploring the city and the food and drinks were all delicious. What really made our trip special though was the staff. Everyone was so kind and helpful and seemed to really care about our experience! We are so grateful for the staff team! Thank you!","time":1655540297,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Vijay","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111847620325318711609/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rhz5l-vDw4Ma3iG62rgmIOrG3-6Pba7l-CC214uCo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"We had eaten elsewhere but popped in here for an after dinner cocktail and were so impressed we booked for lunch the following day.

On both visits everything was excellent and the staff couldn’t have been friendlier or more accommodating. Chef Isaac Kumi has created a truly wonderful establishment which I have no doubt will soon be boasting of a Michelin star.","time":1667724089,"translated":false},{"author_name":"James Gonzales","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105005589590988843979/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TCrk8_i1c8RvPQNrG4kzDDPo33E-h_GlN4zCSPXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Everything is done right.  Service is impeccable, food is on point, lighting and decor is classy. Quite an enjoyable dinner.","time":1661979414,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Colin Gledhill","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107794842828732805097/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QqeOpPzPzP1Sb69iJpAOwokbNV3fYX3x-UZAHlbKY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Excellent meal here with friends recently. Food was very good, the steak was amazing. The service was as good as you would expect. The only negative was that the tables in the centre of the room were very close to each other so we were almost touching.

Definitely one of the better Italian restaurants in Lisbon and well worth a try if you have a chance to visit","time":1679735766,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Karen Eddlemon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110344179068717828980/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_f1F4ss-C82sb1njx-S9NGWAeSq-WCt242KGQsg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Took Uber driver three times to find because there is no sign on the building. Be forewarned that the awnings outside say “Sublime”.
Beautiful location but the wait staff does not act like they want to be there, although they were attentive most of the time. One waiter disappeared during the meal.
The food was good enough but I would not return. Because we had a large table I understand that our service was fairly slow and dishes were delivered at different times.
Be forewarned that the staff speaks very little English and understands very little as well. We were mostly able to make ourselves understood.","time":1667212249,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marcel N. Mossige","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103016459639922487633/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R1VXOdhK9nDFgWAfGsKw0L0b-TWtn9YYgybAKhzA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Fantastic experience.

The food was excellent, loved every dish..

The staff was excellent - they were friendly, attentive, and always on hand to offer recommendations or answer any questions we had.

Overall, I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a quality dining experience.","time":1676850843,"translated":false}]

column8: Praça Cidade de Odivelas 6, 2675-670 Odivelas, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Matevž Skok","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115674526968428085152/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RRYRt29p7NkAIgIiqPTF2HLD5X3VDlUIPJUNXegQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Best Sushi restaurant with very kind workers, top sushi for good price, recommended","time":1645741009,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bruno Cunha","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116962937467216904329/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TWYa-lq0bCN70KQ9GXPnjiJzmyHP7ZicIgGb_WzA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Quality service. The sushi had to much fruit sauce and the sashimi was too thick.","time":1658782157,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Margaret Fielder","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108281814856495288745/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxawdv-GZM-WLpKDhENPzqYsRUm5UA5GIQlFv0UH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Lovely place. Very, very helpful waitress who explained the menu and didn't rush us. She made great recommendations for different palates. Food very good.","time":1666873655,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Danny Milano","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115988373802549849449/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYafsqUQASnxbCB4x82p-0UYpxtgJysaYCrgAcF1Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Great service, very good sushi. You guys should really give it a try.","time":1659898483,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ana Sophiiia Sousa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118287549921790477863/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SRnX0I328Lb9ci2uPC3sWPFO6LBXtd5DCXjrYXFw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"Awesome place!\nSushi was really good, all fresh and tasty.\nChefs choice is not so expensive (20€ without drinks) and it's well served.","time":1601177149,"translated":false}]

column2: Monumento Natural da Pedra da Mua
column11: [{"author_name":"Malte K.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112222202886457833496/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TrrXZrw-X7L8LfJV01F14uPPlarOZI1bZzRbNjUow=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Really great view, easy to walk, parking at the parking lot possible. Walked for over 2h in the area and had so many great view points. Highly recommended.\nWent on a Monday and only met a few other people that day.","time":1652734906,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hannah Wood","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113276355567472174527/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RR9CbKqQiY_EHH4oWtToHBx_EoX2E7NiCOnXHqSWo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"super awesome views the dino prints are soo cool. we did the walk from Praia da Foz to Espichel, really cool hike if youre into walking, mixed terrain, around 4 hours there and back. lots of great views along the way and literally no other walkers (late sept). can only see the dino prints from taking this walk  🦖","time":1632940354,"translated":false},{"author_name":"ari santos","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117272154060437605579/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYexslBnxofI8SVLfwTbd7ghbOnZQjbs65-AuBP=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"It's quite a walk to get there but we can actually see the prints. Both on the other side and the same side!","time":1629920939,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Paul Rasteiro","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103466775746298686019/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaVQQ0tOr8OoyhugaY1jQA_T1HFbPktSoPvVRrR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Great place for a walk, just be mindful of the strong winds and steep cliffs(mostly without gaurd rails).","time":1667024854,"translated":false},{"author_name":"steve veach","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108689238943096757989/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbFo7Lns49ApzkVOvZYuG5aC2WtrC42V3QCQycv=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The scenery here is breathtaking!  It's about a kilometre walk to the dinosaur tracks from the small parking area.  Apparently it's possible to drive about half that distance if you dare.  We passed a parked car on the trail.  The actual dinosaur tracks are across the inlet tracking up and down the sloped face of the rocks.  Binoculars would be good to bring for a closer look at them.  There is an unofficial, rough trail that leads down to the beach if you're adventurous.","time":1623615656,"translated":false}]

column3: Home to Portugal's highest mountain with dry, hot climate, lava soil, vineyards & a whaling history.
column11: [{"author_name":"Suzana M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111962648929393064405/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbHm_Uvv9t0aLFYFQrWOE1rKPLG9gkIwv9ucbyw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Beautiful place for a nice summer vacation.","time":1664761291,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Oliver Frischknecht","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116788934730545233079/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sje0Md7T72rpMbAnh27Jm5PlN_lU7Xys_nDbCiVIk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Completely volcanic rock island. Stunning. Beautiful. Excellent for hiking. Friendly people.","time":1672681616,"translated":false},{"author_name":"ChangHoe Png","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103247838682635636848/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S-vt96GRa5z3mGEhLChbQVH1XnyW1A86gNMpu-Cs4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Nature at it's best! Came here during winter but we were blessed with good weather! too bad we couldn't see Pico Volcano but we manage to experience Nature like what we've always wanted. Very natural landscape. Hopefully it will stay this way for years to come.","time":1577092818,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tim Hertzog","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115532495197389338127/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QGQFs6NBvOg6Ycxr1dXuJSSv0lo47F6nlH2x6c=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Loved our time learning about the whaling history of this island.","time":1654034932,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michael Kulchycki","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112462638968520058992/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZsh_iVCAB-v-OnyxF1gPziEYRgAVHNdWmRtGci=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Incredible experience, this small yet mighty island is a hidden Portuguese treasure. Pico mountain is only a small part, whale watching/museum, swimming, terrific scenery, people, roads, lava tubes (Gruta das Torres) exploration, hotel options, real estate deals, the food is incredible, fresh ingredients from the vine, protected Unesco wine region and Wine museum, will visit again and again. I personally recommend visiting Lajes, Sao Roque and Madalena in that order. Take the boat to Faial or vice versa and you won't regret it. Make your reservations early, this has become a top tourist destination in the Acores/Azores.","time":1631315763,"translated":false}]

column3: Crater lakes surrounded by lush hills known for its green/blue waters & sweeping area views.
column11: [{"author_name":"Katarzyna Waszczuk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111093320876080945247/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SOkFXDqjG502BYquW5b5XofuGOkC92Wn_EJLwP=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"A charming place situated by two lakes.  A small cozy town.  It is worth taking a walk through the streets and having a meal in one of the local bars.  In the town you can also visit a very modest church.  A very pleasant walk.","time":1675553461,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hugo Cruz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113233818990352879824/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S2hTGYyS_bxR0mxkoh9Hb_-X3EsFysX53vV_o1RQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Breathtaking place! My photos were taken in November, that's why so much fog...but in the summer the view must be clear and even more wonderful. This was a volcano that collapsed and gave place to a blue and green lagoon, a unique place in the world, and probably the most important touristic reference in Azores, Sao Miguel. Never miss the chance to visit it!","time":1635250813,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pat Ling","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118080823293483929060/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rb5MehTir4g094opT2VeahTZiwK7NIVRP7XHvu=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Wonderful views at various vista points of this volcanic crater lake","time":1654474079,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ruth Lewis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104653087386794107888/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RqXLqWnEITijHJtBh1mbNW6L_OEcCHuZHCXxV4lA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Beautiful and scenic lakes. Really nice place to eat lunch and look at the amazing view. This is a must see if you are on the island of São Miguel, in Açores. You will not regret it. On the way up, there is also an abandoned hotel which is fascinating to see. Visit here immediately, it will blow you away.","time":1635271779,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jesse Le Sommer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105245612882994159289/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SV9CYYTESSstuuVZZxL3T2xkdadygh0-wV2NEhLw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Absolutely magestic and wonderful !!","time":1656506028,"translated":false}]

column3: A road reaches this 1,818-meter high peak, with a cafe & gift shop, that often looks down on clouds.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Kristóf Göbölös","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114466568051490591628/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SG66JdpgyvKnHJgoX_sAjWm3_V1rzlJWKZn2zf=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"It’s easily accesible by car, you go through very nice different areas as you are driving up. If you are lucky you can see the clouds from above, they say it happens more often in the mornings.","time":1675500691,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Li Chen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116758190445475379436/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qb06_UrCV06BYKP5bzvQrKMGMz46IgFl-dIfAYZw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"At seaside the temperature is summer, but the mountain peak temperature is winter. Need warm clothes to enjoy the view. If you see clouds cover the peak, it doesn’t mean that peak is actually cloudy. Peak may be over the clouds.","time":1671925307,"translated":false},{"author_name":"M C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111930406001653677951/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5ThZV36Iwr7XtUCLKEk-mnPdCmc1-0dD6pbOgGJRQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This hike is moderate-challenging for those who don't hike/active. You will finish it but make sure you have no plans the next day because you'll be sore especially if you do the entire 11km hike.

You can also do the 2.5km (5km total) which is easier). There's a Bathroom at the cafe near the peak but for a fee.

Highly recommended though! It's so beautiful and worth it!","time":1669491489,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yelizaveta Smalonskaya","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110742092641975230254/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q6yCWfMpJLTKXsixDqEi9QGCyinJgVCU12bo2pXQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great place for sunset, although quite windy. Perfect views to part of the island.
Accesible by car.","time":1670422492,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mohammed Al-Dawoud","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107020118723393191484/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TYgt_-W5TyD58y49-ogknci0bEthPjpnmkj6obgA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Amazing views, but a very challenging hike! Toke me 4 hours to get to the summit, but the views were breathtaking!","time":1668631981,"translated":false}]

column3: Paths offering panoramic views encircle this cliff-top Moorish castle, built in the 10th century.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Ryan-Alexander Noakes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111205293325175872601/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXMjCl9fqpdMvom7YTn85GfDChzHza_ZKv0K0tqA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Breathtaking views. Unbelievable views. You can even see Pena Palace in the distance. It's 400 km from the entrance to the Castle itself which provides lovely green walks. The Castle Walls themselves have a lot of steps but it's worth it for the views. We went when the weather was gorgeous and so sunny and warm which made it even better.","time":1680176470,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tiffany Giese","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109856179460554334249/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RRc6eCbs5atImm7wQfPLUhHeR8VP6Q_LmFm2QLQeE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"We loved spending a couple of hours climbing the walls of the old castle. It is a workout but the views are spectacular. It was very windy the day we were there, late June, so you may want to take a jacket and something to contain long hair. The entrance was 8€ each for us. There were pretty nice views of Pena Palace from one of the watchtowers.","time":1656863130,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ivan Filipov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113497198816842661247/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RJvzCS1ZfssPFNHlqWfT75eFtdcD6eET3vZhKoiQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Breathtaking view, worth the admission ticket. Can be really windy! The hiking trail can be tricky as there are parts with mud, but really a rewarding experience - the surrounding greenery is like a heaven on earth.","time":1652211937,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Todd B","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106854611588756218642/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYJRb2KxbgEtWWlfd1NFz4849zq0LhHc6DF7YDM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Definitely worth doing, but there isn't an actual castle there. It's a long wall with a few towers. The path gets narrow in places and it is a heck of a climb to the top. The views are amazing.","time":1653392194,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ana Cristina Correia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105855703202387371568/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tv9IXE7HrSg2qE_T9HtpQ8eIGzuZymL4ENE-wpa-4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Nice walk in the park both solo and with friends and family.
Nice views of Sintra village. Interesting they have the different flags throughout the years of conquest. Can be windy, so brace yourselves.

Looking from the town centre looked like a visit around sunset would be great.","time":1674643997,"translated":false}]

column2: Park and National Palace of Pena
column3: 19th-century, Romanticist palace on a high rock & former monastery site, surrounded by parkland.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Navneet Sidhu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112561481553530374123/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TXAZPLY1p60-rAuUhu79d7RhkrWBidq7qJbu4M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Very nice historical palace to visit. There is lot of walk so wear comfortable shoes, lots of uphill walk. Very colourful and well maintained palace to visit. It has nice restaurant inside for quick snacks.  I really enjoyed its colours. Also beautiful view of city and ocean from top of palace. Beautiful gardens and trees in the way to palace to enjoy scenic view. They give you 2 hours time slot to see palace so not much crowd.  I spent wonderful day there.","time":1672015586,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jonathan Paré","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110492940147565918351/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5To0gCEZ358CGT86z75bUKs4zErRlON1qAnQVRIiGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"A very nice palace to visit. The park around it is amazing. A must to see when you go to Lisbon. The inside of the palace is kind of small and the visit is very straightforward. A lot of tourist on site but the line is going fast. The ticket are sold with a time slot so no need to rush.","time":1663427717,"translated":false},{"author_name":"David Umansky","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109878614837944981048/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S7iqxFB8RcdKmaEYq9IdFIyUn7l_PZSVLYi22wiP0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Beautiful nature and views. We bought tickets in advance online and still had to wait in line in and around the palace. The palace itself wasn’t much to see, but the other things around the palace are great. The Moorish castle is amazing and the small hikes through the woods especially with the lakes are breathtaking .","time":1655092659,"translated":false},{"author_name":"James Truax","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112476417997682170245/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T0fV_po_3C5Y6ldlmlkIkTEGsXB3DqpQO6mU2UOg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"They have buses & ramps & cars for less able bodies people. But beautiful park & palace & scenery & clouds. Everything about is was worth the walk& even the trip to Portugal...m this is a must see if you come here. I visited with a private tour which was the best for my wife& i. Highly recommend","time":1649978374,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michela Storm Frederiksen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104152579260214513207/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TESZrMRnEpjHqn9RC4cKZR9qZsj-8inVf5mtSf=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"We arrived at the Park/garden at 9:20AM on Sunday (the gardens open at 9AM) There was already a line of people buying tickets and a line of people entering the park. Although the line to get into the park was very quick, since security just needed to scan our tickets.

📍Do yourself a favor buy your tickets online, you don't need to choose a date when you are just visiting the park and outer terraces.
📍No need to buy a shuttle bus ticket, the line is longer than the walk up itself. It's a pretty easy up hill walk, that takes about 10-15 minutes.
📍It's a bit tricky to buy tickets for the garden & outer terraces online. But It is worth your money and there is no wait to walk around the outer terraces!
📍I would highly recommend coming to the gardens when they open at 9AM before the line of people starts. When we were leaving the castle terraces, the line was super long around 10:15AM

After visiting the castle terraces, we walked around the garden. There are some nice viewpoints like Elizabeth's hights. We went to the farm area, but we didn't see any animals which was disappointing.

If you follow these tips you will also have a nice trip like we did.","time":1658740314,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua de S. Paulo 200, 1200-429 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Jessica Zhou","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100423398473578523442/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYwhDpwbexkS3CWgh4v54QXI4Lo9xury_HObQaN=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"Went for dinner on my last night in Lisbon. Very international crowd but loved the food! Everything I tried was seasoned perfectly and the prices were very reasonable. Especially recommend the cauliflower. Not pictured, but also ordered the seasonal spinach hummus which was delicious.","time":1649708682,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jenna Peterson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114310084718630946498/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RirVBJ4iuU6fJnr7ZPcVZIAm5yWYCUnnfYv2I9zOA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Delicious!!!  Little hidden surprise. Great vibe. Comfy environment. Friendly service. Sea,our waitress is extremely friendly, attentive, & energetic. Good food. Good drinks. What’s not to like?!

We indulged in artichoke hummus, lamb, whole cauliflower, roasted sweet potatoes & a few glasses of dao red wine.

Yum. Yum. Yum

Waitress brought me soapy water to clean the red wine I spilled on myself. Shout out to the fabulous floor!

Do yourself a favor. Go.

We’ve been 3x now and will be back. Friends we brought are now fans.

Have opinions; Will share","time":1644161198,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Karen Schneider","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115390653479050328697/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R9rQISvotYtPRox_8pdJA0vylFbrrPGWY8BznI2w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"I had a great evening there with my friends sharing mezze. The whole roasted cauliflower was the favourite of all of us. I would order again the cauliflower dip and hummus with grilled artichokes. The smoked eggplant was nice, but a bit off in comparison with the rest of the dishes we had. For vegans there is a great variety of dishes, however I was missing some vegan protein options.","time":1679436691,"translated":false},{"author_name":"shubhra bhatt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101457713928486431427/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R01xq7xCJtTDa0Vv7PuV-_xaRjRXq-Ae1_svQueg8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The food was so great that we ended up trying almost everything on the menu. Good vegetarian and vegan options. And friendly, helpful hosts. I fell in love with their Espressos Cardamom martini. 💕","time":1640816587,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rogon Zarhole","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112636639653404208759/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SNPkEJQwVis4FPjIArZfHrns6YYQux_5gJDrig=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The host was very friendly and the service was quick. My mule was very refreshing and not too sweet. The falafel tasted a bit different than the usual falafel, but nonetheless was very good. I do enjoy halloumi generally and was not disappointed in the least by the fried halloumi sticks. The braised lamb was the cherry on top to the lunch as the lamb was extremely flavorful and surrounded by a great hummus. The pita was warm and soft and the pickled vegetables rounded out the entree. All together the meal was amazing and the setting was very nice. A small place with wonderful music and a very friendly staff. I do recommend if you are in the area.","time":1657893096,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Cais das Naus Lote 2.21.01, 1990-173 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Ruchira Ray","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104759009306651545229/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SJDRnaycd-kohA2-UEgaQxIkq6xYG5wUTrnlxA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"My husband & I had an incredible time at Fifty Seconds. The restaurant is named after the time it takes the elevator to reach the top floor of the building where the restaurant is located. The views are incredible and really add to the experience.

We did the full tasting menu with the wine pairing and loved every part of the experience. Our server and the sommelier were both delightful and highly informative.

Each of the courses were interesting and delicious. This restaurant deserves more than one Michelin star!","time":1652606666,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Steph Ev","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103875507107523646312/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbgvxg-L6z9eW5Ustp5fbQXTINXhkiEDBDmldCF=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Very, very fine dining. Service was incredible however atmosphere was quite dull. I understand there won't be loud music or things going on but it really was sat in the dark and quite boring. Food was lovely, a few dishes not nice, but tasting menu + wine pairing was pretty much €800! I've been to other Michelin star restaurants that were better food and no where near that cost Im afraid...","time":1677869887,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexander","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111318787507202551870/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZMkskRK-JZN_cdVo4YPyxfWFNAZdKZDf-_3FNX=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"It is with great pleasure that I can recommend this restaurant as an accompaniment to a significant event, as well as just an opportunity to touch the excellent service, haute cuisine, amazing dishes and really high-quality accompaniment in everything.  The word limit for a review is not enough for me to describe how high the level of visitation to the restaurant was, from parking to compliments at the exit.  I will definitely come back here again with my family members.  Many thanks to the whole team and in particular to the manager Thiago, who accompanied our table.","time":1649887406,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cláudio Cardoso","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116931879505560098152/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKvOoqdYnbULh_OCn_uxX59Rb2HR3yk801v_hxmQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"Outstanding meal, for a restaurant that’s open for a month has great consistency and a great produce. Martin Berasategui’s restaurant in Lisbon has the same immaculate service as it has in all his other restaurants.
The food is spot on and the restaurant is stylish and luxurious.
The lift ride is pretty cool! Will definitely be back!
Very very good!","time":1545503093,"translated":false},{"author_name":"jörg studer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101234116948255753789/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SkXzr5QA_eebr89zAyNQ9fb8iCs8g7NTjSZeD5wQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Outstanding haut cuisine, amazing food, great somelier and very attentive service.... This is an experience that lasts forever. Thank you very mich for an inspireing evening and meeting head chef. Breathtaking architecture wonderful location.","time":1646555121,"translated":false}]

column3: Portuguese dishes, with lots of fish & seafood, in simple setting of dark wood & white tablecloths.
column8: R. das Portas de Santo Antão 23, 1150-264 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Ammar Al-Aradi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111358207161123893294/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWvlvPaUKqk3wBFrXsuW5M4f-81Tf07-FQa4tDjQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Love the vibe here, sit at the bar and watch as your food is prepared, more fun than sitting at the tables imo, it's a full show. The toasted rye at the beginning was amazing and everything we tried (shrimps, scallops etc) was crazy good. Staff are veterans (30+ years) and super friendly","time":1651954821,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Zhanna Zhanna","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107018861721002871023/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qo_S9iDg2lNuX4wTmvAfEHDW1oXp-VS8mBiVnQJPw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"The best fish sole I’ve ever had! Excellent service! Beautiful authentic atmosphere. Recommend this place for date, business meal or just enjoying life.","time":1662111343,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Peter Zonnenberg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107206176083856143051/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QM-m-sY7o_PQuNzTS81s8Thu0W0fSBwz3IpW2g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"The food is really good and service is very. Still its a bit on the pricy side. But if money is not an issue this place for sure is worth to check out","time":1660222810,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Peter Kardas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115405151899824195968/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZxizb3Dz7sdfOhc6Isivd6dBxvLO2RVTkTcv9M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Just steps from our apartment. Amazing food, must try. However the alley it’s located in just makes this experience 5 stars!","time":1669951723,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jeff Kugler","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101753087184700276723/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYu7Luj853aLzz3oIHmShFgXrzqzb0-eiQkda4W=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"My wife and I went there tonight.
Nice place, and we were seated at our reserved time.
The service started very good.
I ordered a shrimp dish and when they brought it out there were 5 shrimp on the dish.
They only served me 4 and when I asked, the waiter said they bring it out later.
I did not understand this at all…..then he brought it over.
I noticed they had coffee siphons which I love and I asked the server for a coffee.
It never came.
I asked for the check and on the way out I asked why we were not served.
He thought this was funny for some reason.
Don’t waste your money here.
There are plenty of good restaurants that will appreciate your business.","time":1669933933,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Kevin Aziba","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114848588354125416149/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QIuHanamxfiLoRnbii_Zvg8fpjaa0tLPX3XKsKHg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Pool was a definite hit for the kids.
Aliyu was a very helpful staff.
Entire facility needs an upgrade.
Shower wasn't working in one of the rooms.","time":1671951301,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Fabs Hub","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102674514000096558071/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TzfzOJHvLCdg-oHbLxFy6KnS0I67bfWI70Rt4MnQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Very quite place and lovely
Great atmosphere , roomy temperature, great security and very affordable","time":1664257518,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christopher Egugbo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115967897163446711817/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ry5BP2mdkYfeqynSHcL2kfTGlrDzQlBwvvuWwM-Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I will forever remember this experience having had to wait for over two years for this visit. The personnel on ground were welcoming and I felt being at home. The aesthetics here were overwhelming with the occasional drifts of activities at the beachfront. It hit home to see an artwork with an inscription...Don't forget to go back home 🤩😍🥰","time":1644125187,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adetayo Adesokan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107089846245678741749/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Svb5mhF5YZ7q9rOVuvs-Bbzuw-0mANCA4JRB7T50w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Pop is a really cool place. I love the serenity, at first it seems like the pool is the only interesting thing but I think its the ambience that cuts it. Will be enjoyable when there are other people at the place as well, the pool isn't too deep so non swimmers can also wiggle through successfully. The cabanas ate rented and also provide extra relaxation.","time":1556220284,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ibrahim Hero Faleye","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111576278334583451880/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QMj66iDr5nYE3Vpwf5FQi77560PrDsamV3ql4WRWA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Pop Beach Club Tarwka Bay is a private beach club in the heart of Tarkwa Bay community along the Lagos Atlantic Ocean coast line.
It is an environmental protection friendly beach club, with a club house with many Cubana.
There's a swimming pool and shade.
There's constant light and a table tennis.
It's a great place for relaxation","time":1639911980,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Manuel Agro Ferreira 28, 2825-344 Costa da Caparica, Portugal
column11: undefined

column3: Photogenic footpath featuring trails & stunning views of a massive crater lake at Sete Cidades.
column11: [{"author_name":"Jose Oliveira","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104575503519759285654/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q-kuJeJln-zn5iZZQTszmeZu8SIgX61L2qlxZpNBI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"A truly breathtaking magnificent view!! Well worth the hike, even though it was a short 15min easy hike. From here you can see the beautiful lakes that sit on the craters of previous vulcanos from the island. Just be mindful that the weather in Azores changes very quickly and frequently, so you might be unlucky to find fog when you visit. If that was you're unfortunate case, then please do visit in another hour or day, it will be well worth it!\nThere's plenty parking spaces just by the entrance of the trail leading to the viewpoint.","time":1656006275,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Krn JE","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117669339813982090272/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S7RPvnkjNXuWXwFvPaJRDEdOFWaSu8EQNG7DcV7UY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Amazing trail, with absolutely stunning views, the crater or the ocean. Your pick, this is an extremely scenic hike that’s not too demanding either. Very accessible by car, we did the complete loop and it took us 4 hours to complete it. We enjoyed the serenity and beauty of it, definitely will come back!","time":1675827371,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joerg Kirschner","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114875877876519047806/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QGfKr956fxsu0s1B5EVxO2i7u9TtyRx1MhGL7kc2E=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"The views are amazing. Unfortunately a lot of tourists go over the boundaries to take even better photos and ruin the nature an experience for others. Quite crowded. Limited parking.","time":1667339496,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Filip","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110750586040698590954/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TuPg6mRHbFbprLHJOY0R46cw5ujbFtwjctw89SqA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Beautiful wide view on big amount of lakes, which were made by a vulcanic processes. Better weather you get, better view you have, but a foggy times here are magical and if you will wait here for like half an hour, fog may go away. Another must visit on Açores!","time":1658224452,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sjoerd van Willigenburg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111303147540852541599/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S10NBiyrvfBjjIyrrDDLHSc-Wy0XkIPjUSuuACJU4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Definitely a spectacular view! We did the rond walking up the easy route and going down the challenging route. Beautiful walking area","time":1651182320,"translated":false}]

column8: Av. Infante de Sagres 61A, 8125-156 Quarteira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Roman P","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106602642531195868477/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZH8C54MbdzPPAVzPZvBTJvqFm7lSe4C5K9See4fYs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Very nice breakfast place with portuguese pastry, fresh orange juice and good coffee. Usually very busy so you have to wait a bit.","time":1659786593,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alina Akhbanbetova","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104631361555422921312/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SoB2oRXhWO2F2pAjTZxr6Fo1Hxt9GzOcxMKA5ewB8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"If staying in Quarteira, you must go to this place and try their fresh pastries and coffee. We stayed just round the corner and went there every morning to try different pastries. My husband's favourite was the warm custard tarts with cinnamon on top (remember to ask for the cinnamon) and my favourites were everything with almonds. They also do a lush small chicken pie and freshly squeezed orange juice. Don't forget to take a ticket to join the que. Wish we were there right now again.","time":1532167933,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dimi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112660958294588673736/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RxxcUYy7WUyzrfpl3Da8UyCAwwlSMa4-n9u3lqYw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Not my favorite pastelaria on the beach, but it's a solid option","time":1680106785,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vera Katarina B","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108982245382668885247/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbPqP3bTTAlKlZgM5PgYt836yf6Q2LfCD0Sp9mq=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Nice pastries and staff and would definitely recommend for it!!! BUT it is very difficult to get a place to sit outside.","time":1674468868,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joanna Fliszewska","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111498705049589644206/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxabTgnqWt8iivH5lPVgwv2q5pPVSXr-0mZ4NggI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Best pastelaria ever! Great choice of delicious and fresh cakes. Very friendly stuff.","time":1653548109,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Markus Pandorf","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110061246431981441425/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rf9nZEkQn5qaZoXXeVheIff-tIy1xlyk8CzhmzLws=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Man, I can only recommend. Very nice and cosy place. A lot of surfers and thst' also the vibe in this place. Tasty Tapas to share. Had a good time here and will come back for sure!!!","time":1638003028,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michelle Nüssli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105601998342978291062/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY6XX0k1r8y7Gc_6yfkgs0HfkfAPsXpCMc6Nfo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"very nice place with a mix of locals and tourists! the food isn’t incredible special, but the vibe there is great and the drinks are also pretty good!","time":1677178744,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jerry Hu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103719780358433580026/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZV8Rg3vzb-ldVaFY7LzpGnN_HLRB8Bi7KLdRtJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"During my trip to Ericeira, I came here almost every day. The staff is very friendly and the drinks are good. Even the cocktails are pretty decent and well priced.","time":1664777276,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Brian Shields","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116503417219541398561/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDyQ_pnxuyNW318yJty_VkgEj5uOruhBWKfpHSTA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Cozy yet welcoming.
Friendly knowledgeable staff.
Craft beers on offer with loads of good food options.
Plenty of cross-breeze with entrances on either side.
Definitely recommend.","time":1662577550,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andreia Moniz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111033906833903018749/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TZTJLxxjyBFEW30twMe2FeaMpDb45EAyRptoaPFg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Cozy place with a nice mix of locals and turists. I had a natural juice freshly made and it was delicious. My companions had cocktails and they were also good. Toilets need more attention, the place wasn't that crowded at the time of our visit but the toilets were a mess.","time":1661791003,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Alexander","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111318787507202551870/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZMkskRK-JZN_cdVo4YPyxfWFNAZdKZDf-_3FNX=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 weeks ago","text":"This is a great restaurant in a very good location with views, close to the center of the surf resort town of Erisseira. Cuisine with a bias towards the Middle East, Israeli classics. Very high quality, elaborate and tasty menu with original serving. Very friendly and open staff with quick and unobtrusive service. Very good coffee, which is especially appreciated since good coffee is something to look for.
Great place to spend lunch or dinner here overlooking the ocean, or stop in for a cup of coffee while walking along the waterfront in sunny weather.
I'm really glad this place opened up here. When I was in this place a year ago, I thought it was a great place for a restaurant and was surprised that it wasn't there. I'm glad someone pulled off this wonderful and quality project. Highly recommend","time":1678389016,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Johanna Valge","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115747929090315997523/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYIqcUBiD_xauihBUcy7CL-XBmBWl6XJUPJtcRm=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"The staff is always so friendly and helpful (& they love your furry friends as well, always bringing them water!). But the food is just exceptional- I have loved everything I have tried from their menu. And to top of with amazing views and aesthetically pleasing interior- this is a go to place when in Ericeira! 🤍","time":1674479634,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Roya","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104947394431064960666/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T92yepSh91jiZRsY8eaNdD-3mpuLNVvGrOI2yEAA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Stunning location and great food. One of my fave places to go to. Service can vary depending on the staff, not always gd.
