Feedback: get the delicious pan con tomate on the menu, add specials for variety as we tried everything multiple times :) Too loud music in the cafe area during the day.","time":1668357147,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Levi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101786525312310279885/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZeC3Gqhe0wc1eMkIdm_rtDxPcfVLEA7Gq4NDs-=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Exceptional vegan food. The char grilled red cabbage was next level. The baked sweet potato was soft and spreadable on the bread that came with the mixed mezze platter. Also made a very nice passion fruit caiprioska.","time":1679769952,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicole Heidegger","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105242419522783880263/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_AOsOQ4TTkJUzKEYs2oLAStvEVBruDISzwhk6eWU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"the Balagan Ericeira is very important to me. I moved here few months ago and I was super confused with finding my „hometown base“ for drinking a coffee.

with the Balagan I found my cozy place to be, where I always can walk by, drink the best coffee and also take it home with me. if you don’t line coffee they also serve great fresh juices and infusion teas. the food is amazing and they have a big variety. 🥐

great interior and cozy feeling guaranteed ☕️","time":1667290819,"translated":false}]

column2: Quinta da Comporta Wellness Boutique Resort
column3: Refined quarters in an upmarket boutique resort offering free breakfast, plus a restaurant & a spa.
column8: R. de Alto de Pina 2, 7570-779, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"John Grasso","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108889556200314983150/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S4jGJogvau1Qpnt3mLdaH3Fsm_OkFf-PmoKK5FcQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Very nice location.  Our room was spacious and clean and very comfortable.  Sadly, the balcony isn’t useful unless you stand up to look over.  Otherwise, the balcony is unpleasant.  Food was fantastic but pricey.  Service friendly but didn’t seem very familiar with the surrounding area.  We didn’t realize that it was such a family resort.  Lots of children.  The staff was accommodating in every way.","time":1667476980,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Isabella Händel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110282822363807555716/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SAiqlIbtH_VyN_PKuYG08Vo5QsBj8hJRqWYsi8_Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"I recently stayed at Quinta da Comporta (17/02/2023)  and I have to say that I was extremely disappointed with my experience. One of the main selling points of the hotel was the spa with a heated pool, however, upon arrival, we were disappointed to find that the pool was in fact cold and the wet sauna was also broken. This was a major letdown and did not live up to the expectations that were set by the hotel's marketing.

On top of this, the prices at the hotel were exorbitant, with the restaurant being particularly expensive. For example, we were charged 15€ for a dessert and the food was nothing special.Even the bread served as a covert was not good, which was surprising for a hotel that markets itself as luxurious.

To align with this atrocious experience, the “ acclaimed “ spa has zero control on children so there was constant screaming and crying ( ironically due to the cold water)

To make matters worse, when we complained to the hotel manager ( mariana ) about our experience, they only offered a massage as an apology( that was already booked and only offered after some persistence from our side). We had already decided to leave at this point, but even then, the hotel did not offer any sort of discount or compensation for our disappointing stay. The manager even had the audacity to suggest that we should be happy that we did not spend an extra night at the hotel.
Overall, I would not recommend staying at Quinta da Comporta. The spa was not good, the prices were outrageous, and the hotel management did not seem to care about our experience or offer any sort of adequate compensation for our disappointment.

In conclusion prepare yourself for a journey with a 100€ meal ( no drinks ) with average food and dry bread, broken infrastructure, an ice cold interior spa pool and the most arrogant manager in the Alentejo area. All this for a kind amount of 4 digits","time":1676737420,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Flavio Dos Santos","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101277567681972702216/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T0POI4Hs_F4LwuitEeOrXk1lAPj2NCKfmcslagvg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Yes, it was more than excellent, had exceeded all my widest expectations,
The buildings design, the colours scheme, the place concept, the rooms where we stayed and I believe all others rooms were the same, spacious with high ceilings, large wet room and a huge bath,.
Staff were professional warm and very friendly, the land surrounding the property is vast and beautiful, if you love nature this is a perfect place to have a cosy holiday with  the love one or your family very children friendly,
Amazing infinity pool with open view of the rice fields, , can't find enough adjectives to describe the beauty of the architecture achievement  at the Quinta, beach access by foot, bicycle or car, great atmosphere and feeling all around.
Would definitely come back and have recommended to all my friends.

Keep the god work going

Flavio and Sónia","time":1669125164,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jay Patrick","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117431960419561552435/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbkc-QjV7p1XK-iZrZEJboNqpee2rE5no6C0VM9=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I would give this hotel a best 2 stars. Number 1 they bill your card in advance SO CHECK THE ROOM 1st! There's black MOLD in most of the rooms, my wife had an allergy attack and we had to leave. The staff was no very concerned about it. We had to leave.","time":1667597224,"translated":false},{"author_name":"B H","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110501531013095367525/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxarSxZlhE6ifNYnGa3szx6JTNQCOyKHt_92GSFN=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"It is a beautiful place but unfortunately the food is really awful. We stayed for ten days and tried to avoid the restaurant whenever we could. The burger with sweet potato fries (around €30) was the worst. I have rarely eaten something that bad.","time":1642062861,"translated":false}]
undefined

column3: Unpretentious hostel on a cliff overlooking the ocean, offering a communal kitchen.
column8: R. Dr. Eduardo Burnay 5, 2655-368 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"C.D DD","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115055990432652069141/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYBMvE1abrCjRwmQ592O-kPqstXQk1t6It4azgb=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Very familiar, very beautiful furnished “living room” With fireplace, remarkable view and terrace over the central ericeira surf beach, and enough relaxing/working areas. The 6 dorm was simple but fine and cleaned up every day. Breakfast was good with bread vegetables fruits and cereals.
I was travelling alone but due to the familiar atmosphere I didn’t feel alone for one second. I really can understand the people I met there visiting the Hostel Every year.","time":1670959458,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marie Seen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116448170711800224666/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QbBP9nSZw1B9aXlWwtOzi8ATfgUYZkVJbjUmHmSw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"First thing I want to say: this is not a hostel. I'd say is more like an AirBnB, where you are staying in a house with a bunch of people and you need to learn how to navigate the place by yourself. Nobody is explaining how the house works, neither you will find signs or a board with news.
The house itself is beautiful, nicely decorated, beautiful terrace and the view is breath taking. Besides that, it has been a terrible experience for me. I arrived and literally no one was there expecting new guests. No check-in, no questions asked (anybody enters this house? yes).
Got someone to show me where the room was and just took a bed. The room smelled to humidity and even had some mold in the corners. I found later that this was also happening in the bathrooms. Little to no storage space. Lockers? Nope. 6-bed dorm should be 4-bed due to size.
The kitchen was a complete mess all the time, which was extended to other common areas of the house. Blame it on the other guests, but also there was no one there to prevent this from happening since there was only a lady during the morning. Getting someone on the phone? Impossible. They don't pick up in any of the provided numbers.
Due to the bad organization, the lack of information and the bad behaviour of other guests, ALL my food was thrown away from the fridge, even when it was correctly labeled with name and check out date. Then some of it appeared in a secondary fridge (staff one) and got an apology, but at this point I had already decided to leave the place. I paid the nights I stayed (minus the food) and went to a proper hostel.
If you don't mind all of the described things above, this might be your place. If you do, like me, then better find other accomodation.","time":1664301852,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tina Kateb","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103655540563342651821/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RJbWUYbvjCHdVqHsEOBgOyrjnYH3DankGbkDlCbDI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Extraordinary surf house in Ericeira with breathtaking ocean views, where you will totally disconnect, meet great people and surf. The owners are very welcoming and friendly, as are the people that stay there. The rooms are nice and clean. Multiple surf lessons are organized on daily basis, with transport to and from the beach. Boards and wetsuits are included. The surf instructors have a very professional and fun way of teaching. After a few lessons you will actually see progress in your surfing. Laneez Ericeira Surf House is situated a few minutes from the city centre, where you will find very cosy café’s, bars and restaurants. My friend and I had an absolutely unforgettable surf holiday and we will definitely go back there!","time":1663703397,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mallory HopeS","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111524763341515580819/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R2gjIaALkcrDiszeZRZxqvJBeJNmbXhYpytCJk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The reviews were shining. Space was pretty unique. We stayed in the villas. No A/C and limited air circulation made sleeping a little uncomfortable. But the town is super close and easy to walk to. Great customer care and service. Best suited for younger travelers. Or in need of less amenities. Great for groups of friends.","time":1658577857,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Belline Adriaensens","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113839060979494316872/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TgWVAicNf2UzhahPLkoDnrlwWFlOWNM1O6zVpfrn8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"I had the baddest experience with them.
They arranged a tranfer from Lisbon airport to the hostel for me because my flight was pretty late. Everything was fine till I got to the hostel. I rang the door to check in, nobody anwered. Rang a few times, called them a few times.. without respons. Luckely my taxi driver knew how to open the gate and let me in (if my taxi driver didn’t help me, I ended up sleeping on the street.) In the hostel there was nobody, it was 11:30pm and I was really tired. NOBODY PICKED UP THE PHONE WHEN I CALLED THEM 10 TIMES ON 3 DIFFERENT NUMBERS, NOBODY WAS THERE. I waited for 40min inside still no response.
I was very angry, sad and tired so I just went into a room and slept (it was late and I booked one so). I couldn’t sleep well because of the situation and called the number again at 06:30 am. They told me they were sorry, and that I could relax in the room I slept in. Somebody would come at 07:30, to give me my room. At 07:30am I went downstairs, the lady (WHO WAS VERY FRIENDLY!) said that I could sit down, eat breakfast and relax but all I wanted was my own bed where I could put my stuff.
At 09:00 am they still didn’t gave me a room, so I left and let them cancell my stay. I needed to look for another place because of them.
At the end they cancelled it, and didn’t charge me. (It was their fault so it was fair of them to not charge me)

That’s it.","time":1674573751,"translated":false}]
undefined

column8: Largo dos Condes da Ericeira 8A, 2655-324 Ericeira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Julien van der waal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107487597948542703573/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXCVIyxogqRCqZQb4Hj_0nLZEgJfRyHR68xXubEQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Really good quality (home-made) croissants with many different topics. The quality/price ratio is insane. They also have an espresso served in an eatable chocolate cup. Can highly recommend this place for breakfast or some quick lunch!","time":1657707025,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dulce M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117732166933364622892/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R4IqvmgVZcFBX1_cTBjtPcFNhbO0vp6jnJBQ9xJw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"New croissant shop concept. I think they are elicious and well made. I tried the egg custard and almond which was still warm and amazing. There are multiple options including non sweet ones. Recommend.","time":1661079516,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vu Tran","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110797752683053031401/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S-vT5be2C7cQJhIq2JejhvksjuVH3P3WT2nzu2tQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Delicious croissants.  I got the ham & cheese “misto” and it was delicious.  The outside of the croissant is flaky with a hint of sweetness.  The inside is moist and the ham and cheese give it just enough salty flavor to balance it out.  The service is fast and friendly.  Definitely recommend!","time":1677873295,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cole Jamieson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115163978207731010805/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TK972yP2LMdgj51Ln5sb9unBhLiP_o-z_jKc_QPw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Some of the best croissants I’ve ever had. Nutella croissant is a must. Ate here 4 days in a row for breakfast it was that good.","time":1664874258,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Walter Basile","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107020118964635383785/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SWIZ1wImdPpqUF3XbwpI1_scDKG3tEEagsE9nLHA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"One of the best  croissant I ever had.\nAttracted by the delicious and warm smell while walking in the streets, I went back the following morning. Delicious croissant just out of the oven.\nTou can have them with sweet  fillings  as well as salty. I would not recommend any other and the other thi gs did not look up to the standards. The coffe was ok but definitely recommended for the croissants. Enjoy 😉","time":1662067925,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Stephanie Hernandez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118409656203168585329/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaco1da5mQYIj6bjqjCLGnmn3lLVm6NcQ6wq4xS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Delicious upscale restaurant in Porto. It is a bit on the outskirts of the main streets but definitely not far. We had a great server who recommended us the best choices (both food and drinks!) We didn't have reservations and was lucky enough to get bar seating. I highly recommend booking a table in advance as they were booked for the whole night (we came as soon as they opened). It was all delicious. We orderer the sea bass fillet and the grilled tenderloin steak.","time":1673822040,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Selina Zhang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103284772407476373470/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QzvTQw8cN_MC-iLfJxTuY0cN7HuAheLZ98dhaREg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"One of our favourite meals while in Porto. It’s a bit further from the main tourist area, but it was lovely to get away from the crowds to somewhere more relaxing and refined. I’m glad we picked this for our last dinner in the city.\nI really enjoyed the prawn ceviche, and we both had steaks which were cooked very well! There is lots of choice on the menu (maybe a little too much!)","time":1661457087,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101237890440450239005/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYwoqNzsdQWx2GstkHu7FMJIVe2E_iwGWP5HR1M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Absolutely delicious. The restaurant itself is just beautiful with relaxing atmosphere. Generous portion, wish I could order more dishes!! Definitely going back to try some other dishes.","time":1663680791,"translated":false},{"author_name":"lena .x","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112682767791340278449/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T71niRtxT2a2ss4v4-3w8RpP1heLBvbUzfvZyf=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"The place was recommended to me by my Portuguese friend and it was best choice❤️ Food is delicious, beautiful interior, staff extremely nice and professional. Must to go if you are in Porto. Better book from advance. We were luckily to get spot spontaneously :D","time":1670631597,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Flors Admella","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108758947113412166363/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ttrqi6MXa3OJMRldu66G5ttIW4lTW4XWcN6xteyg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Such a beautiful spot, amazing service with Maria ✨ and dope food! Fell in love with the risotto and the white fish ceviche! The cocktails were also made with the perfect balance of flavors so definitely zero complain, we might be back if we come to Oporto 🥰","time":1658083387,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Julien van der waal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107487597948542703573/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXCVIyxogqRCqZQb4Hj_0nLZEgJfRyHR68xXubEQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Amazing steak sandwiches and burgers. Came here for a second time, we tried the off the menu burrito with pulled pork and quac. If you have the possibility you have to try this, one of the if not the best burrito I have ever had. They else sell sangria for only 2 euros a glass which is very nice!","time":1657909678,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sarah Kerr","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101925156214738678989/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T72nfU3nZ3RVZ8E9loIzW3SdLtCseJToZj7DMRfw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Great lunch spot for sandwiches washed down with beer/wine. [{"author_name":"Lucy Reid","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101929861970434941219/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q6Vejt3e3hjJu7T3bsRCa6lvv3eaH8Shnln4UYoA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Had supper here by myself and had a gorgeous meal at the bar. Staff were friendly and informative, giving me plenty of attention without being invasive. One of the owners even gave me some great tips about other places to eat in the area during my stay. Whilst I imagine they change the menu often, if you can try the tuna tartar starter - do! Great selection of wine also. Final note - as it's an intimate setting just off Pink Street I would recommend booking in advance. Thanks for a great experience, guys.","time":1658866469,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ledia Luli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104491933494092372097/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SemUCX49pfwyqd9HQclsGp9-7aDaVmx05fOSolsw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"I’ve been to my fair share of restaurants in Lisbon and this has to be hands down the best food I’ve eaten. The menu is creative and extensive with combinations you’d never expect but that work excellently together. The service was incredible, so helpful, friendly and chatty. Great selection of wines and cocktails with knowledge recommendations. Great vibes, it’s a must visit if you’re in town. ☁️❤️‍🔥","time":1651007868,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Richie George","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107375100909137623792/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTdwnyMvsXSy0fZSGEPcFTNvXigE5q6KPPtVqo_AY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"If you're looking for a great restaurant to try in Lisbon, I highly recommend Dalia. The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, and the food is truly outstanding. The menu features a mix of classic Portuguese dishes and innovative international cuisine, all expertly prepared and presented beautifully. The service is top-notch as well, making for a memorable dining experience. With a great selection of wines to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect pairing for your meal. Don't miss the opportunity to visit this fantastic restaurant!","time":1676579935,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maria Almeida","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107158998501609655339/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R8SXSo1XsLCnimtpO9LOC_pqOhaIuyc_VvJAuJryE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"I’ve eaten here multiple times and highly recommend it. We tried the new autumn menu and it was flawless. Everything was beautifully plated, the ingredients are fresh and of high quality, and the flavours were well balanced and intense. Great service as usual and the wine suggestion was spot on.","time":1669592669,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ciara Cronin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111899685039076476271/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYjLcm6Xi8fGIQW-JpoWsAqITtImK5FXDAgrUBJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Lisbon food highlight for us. Warm fresh sourdough. Delicious generous sharing plates and Portuguese wine. Absolute must visit. Fantastic warm staff. But book, it’s small.","time":1679768132,"translated":false}]

column8: R. dos Ferreiros nº6, 2655-280 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Sofia Barradas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116432902619008919457/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RlITfrYeOa6XRPX0SJgwPNeXNyRemcyhXfv-JG=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Simply put: this is the best restaurant in Ericeira. Why? Imagine a place with friendly, attentive and personalised service, as well as marvellous carefully thought out dishes prepared with excellent products that manage to both stay true to and elevate Portuguese cuisine - this is Avó Restaurante.

From the moment you walk in, you are met with smiley staff that is ready to guide you through the experience. And what an experience it is! For two people, I would recommend getting two to three starters (it’s hard to pick less than that and you will not regret it) and one or two main dishes (depending on how hungry you are, as the portions for mains are generous). The menu changes from season to season but never disappoints, as the products used are always fresh and the techniques flawless. The sandwich of “bochecha” is a show stopper and you can ask for a vegetarian option made with mushrooms (also mouth watering). The duck rice is a classic example of how this restaurant manages - time and time again - to elevate traditional Portuguese dishes. The same goes for any dish with octopus or cod. Truth be told, this is one of those places where you can order anything and be amazed. And what a pleasure that is!

I lived in this region for most of my life and it is always a delight to return home and visit Avó Restaurante. If you visit Ericeira (or if you are in Lisbon and want a great restaurant), definitely book here. I can say with absolute certainty that you won’t regret it! Enjoy ☺️","time":1672911661,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marta M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115731320326563746515/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TdtPqrK5AUnxFeQjdFreZwrMUX1bjGjRMtaZpi=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Simply the best! The food was a culinary masterpiece; it had authentic Portuguese home-cooked flavors with modern finesse. The service was wonderful as well. Possibly the best restaurant experience I’ve had in Portugal in the many times I have traveled to the country.","time":1659558157,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Momo Watanabe","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117056079424650020823/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SWHiS1wec2LSvgGsRvA4mf4D0hO0s5abY12oi9oA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"10/10. Wonderful staff there recommend a fantastic bottle of Beyra red wine to go with the pork cheek and octopus, which were both incredible. I’d recommend this place to anyone, especially foodies that want to taste the local delights made with passion. We had such a lovely time there, felt very special to have had such spectacular local cuisines.","time":1631979222,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Francesca Hurdley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117454079725323069229/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbmVownko6ZsOl16SOk301GWk2hZ1YkmtOsgqIN=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"High level meal, would very much recommend. The dishes were all interesting and seriously tasty. Service was friendly and good recommendations on the wine to pair with what I ordered.","time":1622923238,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alfred B Portugal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114887731666978271594/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RO8oFjGwYQNisaHniZj_jJdlhM9Ryi1BTn6WbBrA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Very nice food and very friendly, helpful waiter from Argentina.
The food was absolutely good and had no complain. The only thing was it was cold in side. For the rest TOP!!","time":1670088419,"translated":false}]

To all of the good people along the way, obrigado!","time":1676316056,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rebecca Perrin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100767279447421828760/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qdhc-2JM6i0Znd3KkBlYu_tUZsea5mhOoqgx5Waw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"This destination is a must add to your travel list of places to go! The island can be described as: If Hawaii and Ireland had a baby, Sao Miguel would be the baby. The food is great, the people are friendly, the scenery is breathtaking! I recommend getting an Air B&B in the city of Ponta Delgada and to travel about the island with a guide. I used Pure Azores Tours which was reasonably priced and fun!","time":1662194002,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Photis Wizard","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117250510851878597588/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q0kCty19aWUAg56LW_Y6TUn-LSHC_8X4uTo2TDaw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Probably one of my best holidays ever. The hiking trails are just from another planet.... highly recommend, to relax or to explore !!!","time":1656768560,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Tiago Peres","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108805069028621949312/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sh3kFSwTSqRoz475gjSS1uz3jsvaylOya4gkbmadE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Calm restaurant near where the boats are parked, nice ambiance, great food from the starters to the desserts.

The sea food rice was comfortably enough for two people and we even took some home.

I was impressed by the European lobsters in the aquarium... they were huge and very likely over 20 years old!

Will definitely come back.","time":1653927631,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ash Winter","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115156536256697778747/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ry4CksDrEG63HtHNxH9AawgaUatfLwF9pLGJyAPHk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Enjoyed a fancy dinner at Ribas but the best dish was probably the house bread and prawn starter. The caramel brownie was a good finisher even if we were so full!","time":1652465103,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Timothy King","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111381450809947186802/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXdcAtfR8q1m7g1fG4dAVOBFK9Z9-A6wF6OG3dBig=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Simply spectacular. Service was excellent, meals were fresh and magical. I’m not sure why crab costs half what it does in Canada, but I’m glad it does! With that in mind, the value was also stellar-highly recommended. Did I mention the live music? What a lovely evening.","time":1671271972,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Leni Pepelisheva","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108922194286624602717/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RWrY-Dui2JllddwGGMItp7h4jDWAhNkALv-pASMg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Beautiful experience over dinner! The food was delicious! They also have amazing coffee! The service is wonderful, the place was fully booked but I asked for a table once someone pays and the guys gave us a call 20 min later! Would love to visit again!","time":1663454090,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rodrigo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103145871879974695552/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S56Aj1q4_is91nrIORqE636JpFFWlm_pfCEe2pXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The absolute best restaurant in Ericeira - and one of the best (if not THE) in Portugal.
