column8: 16 E 4th St, New York, NY 10012, USA
column11:
[{"author_name":"Andrew Luy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116552661631440190288/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZyw48QwulwjXmC06cSkHjW2WvxxauKt5WQV9Fx=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"I only rarely leave reviews for businesses, but my experience cancelling my membership with Blink was such a nightmare, I needed to post this warning to others. After I stopped going to Blink due to the pandemic, I cancelled my membership, or so I thought. Allegedly my membership had only been put on hold, and the fine print allowed Blink to reinstate my membership unbeknownst to me. Long story short, they continued to charge me for months and months. I messaged them and attempted to cancel via their website, but my membership wasn’t cancelled due to a technical glitch. I was told I needed to visit a physical service desk, but I no longer live anywhere close to a Blink location. As of now, I’m STILL not convinced I won’t be charged next month. I would not recommend Blink under any circumstance. DO NOT JOIN THIS GYM.","time":1670164211,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Daryl Jervis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115558302999677232554/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R3Efhce4fIRM5kd2z3-41Cw4PHwH-DN2LeotmjV64=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"My trainer and I were in the weights section of the establishment when the lights suddenly cut off. One of the staff members had intentionally switched them off, even though we still in the middle of a session. A male voice yelled out “Yo! We’re closed!” which took us aback as we were unaware of the shortened weekend hours. My trainer and I had to put away the weights onto the rack and navigate half of the gym in near complete darkness. We were concerned as we did not want to misplace the weights and have it fall on us, or trip on anything and injure ourselves.

As we approached the front desk on our way to the locker room, another young lady (who I assumed was a manager, Hispanic/Latinx, mid 20s to early 30s, plenty of tattoos) said “Listen, you gotta go. We’re closed.” We said that we understood, but did not appreciate the tone in her voice as she was very aggressive. As we were getting dressed, the same young man who yelled earlier (black man, early to mid 20s, wearing glasses) walked in and started checking all of the lockers making sure that they were clear, and slammed every locker door that he checked. It felt like he was trying to intimidate us and make us uncomfortable. When we left the locker room and we were walking toward the door, we asked what the operating hours were and the woman said “We close at seven, at seven the building is supposed to be empty”. We asked for her name and she refused to give it, so we left.

I understand that as a business, you have set business hours. I also understand that your employees work very hard, and their quality of life is important to them. I myself am a store manager at a major sportswear retailer. My team and I like to close our business as quickly and efficiently as possible, but NEVER at the expense of safety or providing quality customer service. I feel that there was a better way to clear your establishment without putting your patrons in harm’s way or disrespecting them. In the meantime, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS LOCATION.","time":1677988431,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexandra Meli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112623242689642274620/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SLmb0wlNWd_wF___F6hSYelsq9fKToa4iiP6YdeQ0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"This place never fails to ruin my mood. Working out is normally the highlight of my day, however it’s kind of hard to enjoy any workout in this hell hole. You can always expect to wait at least 20 minutes for a bench or squat rack. Staff treats you with complacent anonymity. Other members are rude and inconsiderate. You will not have an efficient or enjoyable workout here. Amenities are nonexistent, and equipment is less than bare minimum. Can’t wait until I can afford literally anywhere else.","time":1678126873,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Daniel Dessauges","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103329731213687955514/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYVqW_MF-EgJ5N3LtWG8e4bGfQ67vaXgevMg8Ol=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Their cancelation notice and hidden fees make this gym a nightmare to get out from! I went 1x and cancelled right after but ended up with a bill of USD160 because their cancelation system only works if you settle the auto renewed month as well. Unfriendly support team when I reached out just to be told to settle the bill. Old school, sneaky tricks to get money.","time":1671006755,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Griffin Lichtenson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114320343543775528762/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S3qq3S5gXm7VMIknjCvMzxgLAKeoQ5YvijpO9Ieg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"You get what you pay for. However, the fact there are only in 2 bench presses in the entire gym and is often crowded is a major hinderance. Perhaps add more benches as you increased peoples” membership prices and have empty cardio machines in excess spaces.","time":1678909625,"translated":false}]

column3: Wide, roomy beach offering a pavilion as well as a variety of nearby bars & restaurants.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Rosy Mortimer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113937362592663166336/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTtcB6ehqa5Nwon4-IYiGsJNM_VJn9eQatyeRR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Loved it. We saw waves up to 8 metres high which was still so impressive to just sit on the cliff and watch the surfers. AMAZING!","time":1672147205,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Patrick Lightsprite","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113938556974633679935/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T2SJki_eKRdm1FqRG8Q9gGaBrCSnp9AMV1NI_F=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Beautiful place! Soft sand, right in the town, glorious waves, freezing water😂","time":1661101383,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andre Gregorio","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101715265709690828168/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SmCmDfmGGLPUvUyzPEuv17Rk15_pLlrCpIOvPsg3E=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Stunning view from the ocean right ate the arrival and an even more glorious beach when you get there. Traffic may be a little chaotic on summer but definitely worth it.","time":1662817842,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Beeah Robinson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101086454738037034787/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TRYWykE80NrwEBTyXN0VI3M2faSnIp4Dup5TRT4AY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"I may be bais because I live there, literally steps from the beach. Always something going on...even in the winter...in the summer it's hectic.","time":1653022175,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cynthia Moumdjian","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104200332949332507254/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qo7sMW8TwgGkeHfbUiV1ylm2Hp1eQLLv60WW7B=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Gorgeous and very clean beach. Waves are huuuuge and the water is cold but I would definitely recommend you stop by this town or even spend a couple of nights.

There’s little restaurants, boutiques, coffee shops & ice cream places along the boardwalk that are affordable to eat or to buy beach stuff.

They also have a section where they dry fish which smells very bad but it doesn’t go further than that section. It’s pretty cool to see the process.","time":1660054673,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Matthew Bull","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102760571593030120802/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ro-rrDz1bZxWsXS14JA6n1ReUkapADKSbto-CBGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Great food, pleasant vibe, very friendly service.

We (family of four with two small kids) went just after midday when many restaurants in Ericeira are closed. This place was not only open, but welcomed us in. The waitress was extremely helpful and kind.

I had the octopus rice dish-of-the-day which came with a very nice glass of white wine. Gorgeous. The diced octopus was tender, and the sauce it was in was amazing.

Two dishes of the day, two burger and chips, salad, wine, bread, coffees etc all came to only €40 which seemed excellent value.

Definitely worth a visit for its friendly , welcoming service and great food.","time":1649941498,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Richard Mizon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101233336199249613865/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxajBEKfQP2H93inOOUAnYsNAgR-YRiMqfPZwxb9=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"WOW!!! Absolutely amazing food and experience, we stopped in as we were passing as it looked like a nice little place, the staff were exceptional very friendly, offered up suggestions for food which was impeccable,  deffinatly go for the garlic prawns, the hamburger was perfectly cooked and seasoned, the fillet mignon was fantastic, the passion fruit mousse was divine, definatly worth a visit.","time":1662919902,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Matt Zuchowski","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115818164485702775265/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RTbZnBgLkfqtg58X-0LnUs-LK3lRpXtwJjTSJ8I_E=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"We ordered mussels in garlic n olive oil, mussels in tomato sauce with onions, french fries, and a small bottle of regional white wine. Delicious!","time":1649629652,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Milena Galindo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112165777706077782965/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S9mI-lJ9B5bSfet0ygOqdLJ1hxImyko4p5EoiKpw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"It's a small cosy place and the service is Very good. The menu has some options, from seafood to hamburgers. And they have their own craft beer. They also have kids menu. We ate ameijoas (delicious) and octopus (good).","time":1659046843,"translated":false},{"author_name":"George Mitrovski","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117137162278390426416/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RJVtCIHmtZfVDnKNJXr-jSf_zKWbNc8Q6oDMUvHQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"One of the best dinners in Ericeira, Portugal! Mussels are a must have!!   Order extra bread to finish up the divine tomato sauce.","time":1663359246,"translated":false}]

column3: Part of a historic estate, this ceremonial well features a spiral staircase into a tunnel system.
column8: Quinta da Regaleira, R. Barbosa du Bocage 9, 2710-567 Sintra, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Graeme Burns","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100366197941467246375/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TtiqNam0ensMVbyIxJ4PFrIyxHZNNlZpeMr0Unns0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Went to the palace and initiation well with air BNB tour. The tour was called \"This is Sintra, a day to remember\" and it was amazing. Marta was an amazing host and had tons of information to share with the small group. Highly recommend using this tour if you are thinking of spending a day in Sintra.\n\nThe well was amazing, an inverted tower with beautiful craftsmanship dating to the turn of the 1900s. The tunnels at the bottom are lit with led that provide a nice atmosphere and an almost magical vibe.","time":1663619211,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Blake Anderson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113375532905003829676/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZkD4t6KMEDGPDi0H7L4rhmAWSYkF0JYbotGRJE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Leave yourself a few hours to explore this site. It is more then just the two wells. There are several courtyards, towers, statues, and secret passage ways to check out. Enjoyed the caves and all the hidden wonders. Worth the 10€ highly recommend.","time":1642495374,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sam A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117102770550986207101/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZA7gL5HUpHfQlJ9ihDZ-nvsBKAgCoVJyBO3o4b9g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing historical place to visit!! You’ll spend hours walking through the gardens and all the hidden trails. The architecture is incredible and the cafe onsite is so lovely to take a break at. Highly recommend dedicating a good portion of the day here!","time":1648503429,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hey There Len","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107174907554018603878/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ss8wUB_b5xIGmuycLITl_eN047WxbJnt84X0PzDw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This five story staircase into the ground is perhaps my favourite architecture in Portugal.  We went in late November and off season, but there was still a crowd on the train from Lisbon. Luckily, the crowd got on the bus to the Pena Palace/Moorish Castle and we walked to the uncrowded gardens surrounding the Initiation Well.  We went down the stairs and exited through a series of caves at the bottom. It was more than awesome. I am so glad we went.","time":1669124867,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tegan Tigani","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111824211399035268993/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDvAst7byA3Fmk0xax-6ojtq1j9BBNoz0Dy5I3hCU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"This was one of my favorite places in Sintra! The grounds are spectacular and the well and caves are eerie and magical. I wish we'd been allowed in more of the house (I bet there are all kinds of secret passages) but just the well was worth price of admission.","time":1649678722,"translated":false}]

column3: Early 20th century-built palace & gardens with underground passages, a chapel & museum, plus events.
column8: R. Barbosa du Bocage 5, 2710-567 Sintra, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Steve Ryan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115129991691860953248/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SQeX71QNZ32awMBxwjB4gYUrSZLwC0bCwjvsUQQQI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Lovely estate in the hills outside Sintra. Fascinating that it is more recently constructed than I assumed or than it looks (late 1800s). There are small out-buildings scattered about, giving interest to the complex of paths and scenic points.
The Initiation Well was amazing but hard to enjoy due to the crowds. And it's not even high season yet!
There's a very nice outdoor cafe there with good food, too!","time":1652463146,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Shraddha R","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109604135916108237697/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYRwh7W13Uh4QDdxGjq6r3Gezsu2QGsSpDWzfNR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Our favourite place in Sintra (we also went to the Moorish Castle and Pena palace). Easy to get to and can spend hours there, such a beautiful space to explore, with a spooky (in a fun way) history. Felt a bit magical / fairytale-like with all the winding towers and hidden wells and caves. There is also a cafe and toilets (these weren't the nicest but did the job).","time":1655631176,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hedi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101996654058079844373/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RYmC6WVmwOoJVn9EJ6KneCLObBPaX1a-YQeQmnfdM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"What a magical place. Center of gracious architecture, full of symbolism about the free masons and the glory of roman Christians.
Beautiful building from outside and inside it is a must see.
You can easily get lost in its gardens.
We highly recommend.","time":1667856993,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eduard Verbaarschot","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109171036543561228003/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Td71nttrZO3R45GW59MXFeMqLZUXbzEbsnxh0RPwY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very beautiful park where you can walk. I walked here from the historic centre of Sintra. It was a beautiful walk and once I arrived at Quinta da Regaleira I was amazed. The garden is beautiful and large. There are many walking paths (with height differences), and it is very green.

The palace is like a fairy tale. Unfortunately, I did not see the inside of the palace because it was too crowded. There was a long time in the middle of the sun, so I only saw the park. Next time I would definitely visit Quinta da Regaleira again, if only to see the palace from the inside.","time":1661160430,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adrian M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103835090223588760426/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKqAY2v3nfokdCk3QqzQKjdf0HQ5XRb0069btdz2I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba8","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"This isn't like your regular palace visit in Sintra but rather it's a bit more like a wonderland of structures and gardens that blend together to form something more like a magical playground that's quite pleasant to visit for its uniqueness and how it blends with nature.  It certainly comes with recommendations from locals as a must visit in Sintra.

There's plenty of open spaces to walk around and between each attraction.  The initiation well is probably the busiest attraction and you will need to line up to enter and then walk down this quite spectacular fantasy-like structure.  Other than that, you can visit and ascend small towers, go inside the various buildings and structures, and even just sit and enjoy the surrounds.","time":1666190984,"translated":false}]

column3: Laid-back restaurant offering tapas & sandwiches, plus wine, beer & terrace seating.
column8: Escadinhas da Fonte da Pipa 2, 2710-609 Sintra, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Gwyneth Elizabeth","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117381063712377380587/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TwBy4KMUMVPwJkQIKHVigSy1q2cBeN9TpUiO7v4w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Best octopus I’ve had so far! Seasoning for the pork cheeks, beef cubes and octopus were amazing! Definitely recommend the three.

The cod fish dumplings were delicious but might not be for everyone. Mushrooms is like a portobello vegetable burger and felt like the mushrooms could be better seasoned and was too watery. Portuguese egg and sausage + chicken wings were tasty but not their star dish.","time":1676199615,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eric Lin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103103101366888355748/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_xHzR5Y1lnPhnPJDcJpE4ayx9LY7zeX8gGI5DOQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Delicious food, beautiful views, friendly staff, nice drinks! We came here promptly at 12:15 when it opened after a morning at Pena Palace and had an amazing time. They had plenty of seating at the time and lots of different types of tapas and sandwiches. Be careful coming later as seats will fill up.","time":1663885179,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anna Chouprinova","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103114300638071706666/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFokWxJmZMmPhJiSLJbwnsM-qEg8t3sNfkTJa4dQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"One of the best restaurants I’ve ever tried.. And I’m a major foodie! You have to visit this restaurant in Sintra. The small portions allow you to pick many and share with your family and friends. Don’t forget about the wine or sangria! 😋","time":1665907615,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michael Wang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108299370546604460936/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R1MfnVUpyzPHtedUzWFjmR_hZg-Yz-yD0m7pDA_bo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"Let's do this proper.

This is the stop to schedule for after a day of visiting the sights in Sintra. The staff is warm, the food (and presentation) is on point, and the atmosphere is comfortable. You arrive and it feels like you're at your extended family cabin enjoying a meal with lived ones.

Sadly we had a larger meal planned for the evening so only stopped by for a quick snack but it was well worth it and well deserved after a long day visiting the palaces nearby.

The highlight was the mushroom, smoked ham, arugula, and cheese (cant remember what kind it was! @Tascantiga help me out here 😄) dish. Seriously amazing dish. You get the creaminess of the cheese, a meaty mushroom, salt from the smoked ham, and the arugula gives a nice peppery flavor. Order one for everyone at your table. Trust.

Regardless, make this a stop. Happy to keep recommending this place cause it was a treat.","time":1649465580,"translated":false},{"author_name":"tony villa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110902964646173408743/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QcZGhf8B7c6nO-jHIik5ZhZrstahUyMgPmVL9Lx44=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"When in Sintra this is the restaurant to go to. Beautiful little outside patio with a view and inside plenty of tables. The service was excellent. Very fast they were all very helpful and the food came out quickly. Smiling faces all around the food was delicious prepared perfectly and wasn’t even that expensive. I highly recommend this place for lunch or afternoon cocktail","time":1666722904,"translated":false}]

column8: R. da Fonte do Cabo 54, 2655-344 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Tara Zafar","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105428906283087969535/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbqLzu2YyZHzzzL0jzQH-7jngPOkb06hwIDfZQ_=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I came here as I was visiting my friends who recently moved to Ericeira - they told me this was a must go.

This was an amazing dining experience - I HIGHLY recommend going here for dinner during your stay in Ericeira! The restaurant itself is small with indoor and outdoor seating. You can also see the chefs cooking your meal if you choose to sit at the bar. The decorations were very well curated and I have to mention the cleanliness - kitchen and bathroom were spotless. All of the food was out of this world - for 3 people we got the steak tartar (our favorite), crab, tuna steak, cabbage rolls, miso caramel brownie, and yogurt ice cream. They were all delicious and looked beautiful. They also have a great wine selection, including natural wine!

A special shout out to Kristina who was so kind and knowledgeable.

You can tell the chefs and owner of Capsule put a lot of thought into everything from the menu selection to even the quality of their takeaway bags.

10/10!","time":1661016716,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eugene Vyborov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106881728431431300627/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qx6jk5H6ETX1xZef8tgXd-L34TX0sBbRicY-3Wo7E=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This is a true finding in the wonderful city at the coast of Portugal.
This place is stylish, executed with wonderful attention to details in the interior, and at the same time it provides the most unusual and delicious experiences you can find there.

The service is friendly, casual and yet attentive to your needs and likes.

But the most exclusive part of the whole experience is the food itself. Guys managed to prepare quite an unusual offerings in the menu, like the tuna covered in black garlic sauce (seems like a savory chocolate) with blueberries. Or a daily surprise of the Seasonal Option - I really don’t know how often they change it, but it was sooo delicious.

This is a must-go spot. Considering there’s only a few tables, I think soon it will be the kind of place where you will have to book a table a few days in advance.

This is also one of a couple places where you can get a filter coffee or matcha latte.","time":1659463971,"translated":false},{"author_name":"A K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108935542806446711522/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY-rzwAf0r2_JQ9SJ2siXWR8Bf4OYozjeY5r655=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Incredible place where our friend took us to. It’s a hidden gem in ericeira and would fit in perfectly well in any other European city. I wish there was one in the city I live in. First of all, the food experience comes together with great friendly and professional service. The Ukrainian chef is talented and innovative and the presentation of every dish is just splendid. The taste of the hummus and cabbage rolls is refreshing and the beetroot gazpacho is a must-try. Our child had asked for a second portion of the truffled macaroni, which was kindly adapted into a delicious vegan option by the chef.  The restaurant itself has an eye for details and the open kitchen is definitely to the highest standards. We were lucky to have been visiting on a rather calm day. Good luck to the team and hope to be back for more savoury experience.","time":1666584213,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aaron Vit","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118395808682121591434/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SGUEiTZN-uYUYD3TPQlFcUlTnsr4iDysjIzLU2IQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Sweet! Bright little spot with good local natural wine, unique & delicious food that looks high art but tastes like home. Friendly staff with style & tattoos. Feels like it could be in Portland or the Bay. Nice coffee program with lots of attention to detail. I chose this spot as it had octopus hot dogs on the menu but despite the menu change I got bbq tuna which was delicious and pretty. The potatoes were very well thought out with nice flour garnishes. This would be a nice date spot or your new everyday spot.","time":1680178883,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anthony Gagnon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108763730149658491438/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SArN7wxWqkeNX8VKDaY6o-jbUTNZKH-QRtXuCaAA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Great coffee with medium-light roast. Awesome selection of Portuguese natural wines, and just a stunning place, decor and design-wise.","time":1663064107,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Dr. Eduardo Burnay 34 A, 2655-370 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Magnus Iversen Stokke","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106013867184335909617/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZxX5WDFCAnV-Z5agdQZfQmK8O2kkCxc2yhxc1l=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"This is a gem that people forget about. The food and the service is amazing, definitely worth a big gathering of friends and family if you want to eat something else than the Portuguese cuisine everyday!","time":1671311673,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chris Beddow","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103299762279458411942/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SQMYC-uLXOeFhhV_CYWo4ADx068ld1pbr-ITAxHQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Had a great takeaway from here! Friendly, helpful staff offered us beer while we waited. We accepted and chose the chicken special and the mushroom curry accompanied with a garlic naan. After a couple of beers I walked home, 20mins, the food was still hot but more importantly really tasty! I will return and would certainly recommend Red Chilli.","time":1560272034,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Martijn Thé","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107239057731974260625/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZgvQT25Q0KU7SquafpIXXsaMlMLe_zMhR_uzfo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"I’ve been to this place twice in 3 days. I came back because I liked the food, it’s pretty good and great value for the price! The place looks a bit unassuming and the decor is kitsch, but the food was flavorful and fresh. Service was reasonably quick both times.
The first time I had a garlic naan and the tarka dal. The naan was ok. Is wasn’t leavened, more like a flatbread but tasty nonetheless. The tarka dall was very good.
The second time I had a lentil soup, chef’s rice and the mater paneer. Again, very tasty (though I liked the tarka dal better).
Would recommend!","time":1664735952,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jan Hranička","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117820553574466360204/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY1Ne9zU_jrSp-r7m138j-esodvvTVIlTmwZkP5=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Good Madras sauce. But a smallish portion with 7 smallish prawns. Soup boiling hot when brought to the table. Minus one star for the overpriced food and drinks and another for the small unsatisfying portion.","time":1653594628,"translated":false},{"author_name":"R. A.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106112370976140955801/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFIho8COYMMYs-bYOBGCElab4WmBGhIWE_-iH5lg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very delicious and tasty Indian food! So many options (meat, fish, vegan and vegetarian) and the waiter was super friendly and helpful with explaining the dishes (and informing about any allergies).

Chef Special Rice, Panner Tikka Masala, Chicken Jalfrezi and Cheese Naan very very good! And the Papadam is gluten free ;)

Definitely recommending: loved the fresh food, good price and big portions!","time":1662118939,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Lu Tretjakova","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103068228750051708795/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFjSs0-yfbHHkl_S0x9ldhaZQQTHGFoYdKbjf7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Amazing food, great team who found a table for us in less than 2 min without the reservation on Easter Sunday. Food was 6stars really great value for what you get. Relaxed atmosphere with good music . Will come again for sure","time":1650226164,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Johanna","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112855878704764992174/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TMPL9xj6flJ7PQEaI0azT8sW_dyyRdHBOpMtTAYA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"delicious octopus rice & fish fillets! Nice wine, olives, bred… friendly  & quick service. No dogs allowed, but they have outdoor tables so your furry friend can join you. :)","time":1667595452,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Václav Pavlík","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114156056406130022326/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SwBwm_AiiaAc4U1wRUUFoy3LkgCUFdpMtUa333HkU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"I read many reviews and they stated one of the best Portuguese food in the town and I have to agree! Very friendly staff, english speaking and even super busy time you get the attention. Menu is quite simple to ensure you have fresh and local ingredients. Fish, prawns and see food on the menu should be your choice. I had Arroz de Tamboril com Gambaz (=monkfish rice) and it was absolutely delicious! The rice was cooked in sea food broth and the result was plenty of sauce with sea food taste. Great choice of wines, go for Vinho Verde (you get this wine only in Portugal) and it is well paired with fish. I had Quinta de Avelda and it was great, taste like white dry wine.
Just be aware the kitchen is open daily from 12-3pm and 7-9pm, even though the opening hours are 12-10pm. This opening time is very common for most of the restaurant in Ericeira, make sure you plan your visit in advance. Could be very busy so reservation is useful.
I would highly recommend this restaurant!
Enjoy","time":1654116064,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Daniel Hardy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105192241898949881419/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q1IZj0dvhbflSmqUpPnlDM6LJMIDawqMbLi8d7pw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"This place was horrible. I went last week and sat outside and our server wouldn’t even give us 10 seconds of his time and when he did, he was short and rude to us for no reason.

I ordered the fillet steak medium rare and it came well done with a super gross salty cream sauce all over the plate, the saltiest potato’s I’ve ever tasted, and overcooked steamed vegetables that were very unappetizing. I couldn’t even eat anything on my plate and had to go elsewhere for dinner.

Not sure why this place gets a good rating.","time":1666053387,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hielke van Oostrum","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102712004487894439819/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QrEt1GU6_rkW3a4kTIBhTIYb2K2Mf2g6cRD1dS8A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Food is nice. Great fish and plenty of vegetables. Friendly staff making us feel very welcome. We went back for 2nd time in our holidays. Obrigado!","time":1677851460,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Sebi K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109707499583528050969/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SLX2nOeU8kD5TPhWT5zIX_8jSfbipJ2MAt_8bV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Best Tapas Bar I've ever been in! Good prices, friendly stuff and delicious meals. Can recommend 2L Sangria for 14€.","time":1656015926,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Julien van der waal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107487597948542703573/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXCVIyxogqRCqZQb4Hj_0nLZEgJfRyHR68xXubEQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Best tapas bar in ericeira. You will need a reservation in most occasions so get one. The staff was very friendly and the service was good. Can highly recommend the fried cuttlefish sticks, mushrooms, angus beef, ibérico ham,  baked potatoes, french pastry & caramel cheesecake. The (champagne) sangria is also delicious. Will come back to this place!","time":1658231043,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joan k","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109702759886333196299/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZnDqWxnQWkmQ-2ooC-baQQ4TtTtPzR6HfysYEL=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Black beans and Portuguese squids are really nice! Soup is so affordable too.\nSteak champignon sauce was not my thing though…","time":1658355520,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Arista Kwek","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109483262854042637888/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QUZSVuV7XGEkbvpUYMoxN1hnKKAOkSj3VnP1YSaw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"Really friendly waiters and amazing, value-for-money food. Came here as a single diner; a great way to get to try many different dishes! Appreciate the staff's quick and helpful service - 5 thumbs up if I could!","time":1679437061,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Катерина Лемищенко","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101725971009292144255/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qjzmp_bihuAhv62YUOkQvmAbvcpJS-zgf5WHcQdg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Very friendly stuff with good sence of humor, tasty food with big variety. I recommend to order different tapas to share. And yeah, you will go for second round for sure. Also I really appreciate we could try a wine before ordering it (they opened bottles in front of us until we liked the wine).\nBook a table in advance for dinner on weekend!","time":1665880125,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Lucy A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114794623728273155760/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RlzcPBTEXmIjKQavv1doZ7MtVw-LteGmRsdTC8J3Y=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Friendly family run Nepalese restaurant. They have a small menu but what they do, they do very well. We had the vegetable pakoras, the dumplings and prawn curry with rice. All very flavoursome and well made. I loved their chilli sauce and the waitress gave me some to take home. Looking forward to trying the other items on the menu :) Best to go early or book a table to not be disappointed!","time":1662315018,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Carina Herb","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115310708040238420233/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZUPx66UvsMeui9lyKsoxN0DpOGf79_sYLq2G9k=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"What amazing and authentic dishes! Absolutely loved the experience here. Fresh homemade and cheap food and the service was warm and welcoming. 5+ stars :)","time":1644574172,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hey Its GIEL","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110350103722613909754/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TVRHbU3f7hYxxvLEciRa4lv_zqER53IxwNXmuZm7w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"So, I found a really quaint but local favorite here in Lisbon! It was PACKED!  I didn’t know you needed a reservation, but a smile and a greeting will go a long way! (Come on favor!😆🙌🏽)

🔥I had veggie gyozas (dumplings) with a fiyah 🥵 but amazing Scotch Bonnet dipping sauce

🔥Veggie Chow Mein Nepalese-style 🍜

A special thank you to Mya at RD’s Restaurant in Graça for making space for me (without a reservation) Your kindness and amazing food made my dinner extra special 🥰💫

Takeaways:
Make a reservation if you can (but you may just get a spot if you ask)

Loved:
😍large portions

😍Friendly Service

😍Authentic + Local-Friendly

😍Tasty Food

😍Affordable Prices

Not so Great:
🤨 It’s a bit small, but they do have outdoor seating which is great for groups of 5+

🤨Whether you’re inside out out, you can’t escape the smokers. Then again, smoking is very common here so…🤷🏽‍♀️

That’s It! Everything else was great.","time":1656006696,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vincent Nagel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117273692443029268552/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SBHUl_SUcAKDg9lD2yCMDNbAlvaDNa7FhOmGvlow=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Got takeout. Veggie Momo's, green tofu curry, and rice noodles. The tofu curry was amazing! One of my favorite meals in Lisbon.

Variety of vegan options. Staff is knowledgeable about it as well.","time":1671676334,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Julia Stolinska","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109152068259442080166/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Trz9V2N8jL-VK0xO3cPGnvsuwDmUJ4y6HVnUqbiEY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Great food, the nicest staff plus it is the most affordable Asian food in Lisboa!!!
I recommend it with all my heart.
Yummy Yummy Oh Yeah :)","time":1656196023,"translated":false}]

column2: O Bom O Mau e O Vilão
column11: [{"author_name":"Denis Ribic","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116393662122294947960/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYVm2XpQawiJRbzUjwHCaa4sEu9RYB4wYCC3NqD=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Cool location very close to pink street and time out market.\nSuper kind and professional staff, high level cocktails, do yourself a favour and give a shot to the \"Monkey Truble\" you won't regret it","time":1652918399,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Fred BC","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100841853058978616210/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RM4giZdHKkkq66Y1tbsUtJ-qAaiavk_fBH8ZSHvSU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"I've been a fan of this place for a long time. The rooms are really cool and the staff is very nice. But the music is usually extremely good.","time":1657740797,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gokhan Insel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114496391854489571358/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TW-Lj1R8Dpg-VqlQ7lt_V0HkhT5F4OVGK6Q4wJCA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Barmaid was very mean. Took us 15 min to order. Not even a smile to the clients. Besides all, general ambiance was great, live music performance was awesome!","time":1665853296,"translated":false},{"author_name":"John Brooks","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114721631360902274394/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWWyd5HXmZ0QAVi1smXEjZaZTWtWIir7K-2CIxWQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Cool spot just of the beaten tourist path. Good mix of locals and visitors. Great story for meetups. Some days there is a Dj, others live jazz or blues. English and Portuguese is spoken by staff.","time":1670175756,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Roeland Salij","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115665737417002575168/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaQnfF5Q2NB3HHp3DJa0C2x7duii55FesQKpd6Z=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Had a great night! ❤️ For the dj! awesome set. Way better place compared to the venues I’ve been at pink street.","time":1667620324,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Vieira da Silva 50, 1350-187 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Tzlil Sagiv","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104373615003966347627/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TwyrFCkKqniMoEl0hJYt81ibQAs0hWD4K_ZEHyj8k=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"This place is very unique with wonderful atmosphere, it's better to make a reservation in advance because it may be fully booked.
The cuisine is very locally, fish, beef, sea food ect. The deserts are delicious.
The owners are very friendly and the hospitality is great!
Highly recommended!","time":1662802954,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Julia Hill","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110889142003892236495/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R6JUdJrDnhzEOvQ9ZE6kM5iWqExXDKxCo5PxT8Xw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"This was an amazing restaurant with such a nice couple running it. João & his wife made us feel right at home. They have their meals on a cork board that they bring table side and João will recommend wine to go with your choices. If you are a seafood lover-please get the clams & the roasted octopus…you will not be disappointed! We had such a lovely time here. The ambience is wonderful. Until next time!!","time":1677320924,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Summer W","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100875159399402913755/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TOr_bBW7A7wT18PpeI_LXjXWkTuP_j1Qwaa28X2eo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"One of the best dinners I have in Lisbon, the mussels are fresh, a bit spicy and it taste so good🤤 João is friendly and I really had a great time there, will definitely go back again next time!","time":1661234545,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Liliia Bird","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103978438116909704401/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T6_iEd0QZLGogaYunYasM8cdjGo3SeQ1aa9lcT=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Wow, was so delicious that i can't even find the words to describe it. Best gambas I've ever tried. Everything was super tasty. Family restaurant with very friendly staff , you feel yourself at home there. Highly recommend !","time":1660169473,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jeff Rhino Bannister","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106303636565608969657/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TJH95zwEvVL0-65dkwYMHvs22UnlGNO2Sb0Hpq=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Really enjoyed our whole lunch.  Food was great and good wine was inexpensive.  The owner was very nice but I liked his wife even more.","time":1657811804,"translated":false}]
undefined

column3: Bright, understated venue with a terrace offering an Italian menu & homemade pasta.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Chris Hands","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106157305766306607121/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFl_q2VwVE9RVG-4fhgHG5xEZFcOIkTdHGQ9No=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"You have many choices for Italian restaurants in Lisbon and this was recommended.
The vibe is lively and colourful: you could imagine yourself in Italy though the street and part of town is quiet, so one feels launched in to a new world! There is parking at a multi-story just a few steps down the street.
We chose a white sangria to share made with Prosecco so you will pay a little more for this ( €27) and it’s well appointed with fruits.
The main dishes vary in price and if you want one of their specialties it’s the pasta with Parmesan cheese. It’s rich to be sure: add some black truffle and it’s even richer (extra supplement €3: total €19.50). One guest had prawn risotto.  Another a lasagna. They were all tasty and well prepared. We sat in a booth that was  comfortable. We then ‘went to town’ with the desserts as sampler of 4: a little pricey (21.50) and too sweet so do not recommend  the desserts.
We paid 104 for 4 so not inexpensive (deduct the sangria and desserts and you’re at around 15 each that is reasonable in my mind. Thanks :)","time":1669131226,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chanpen Tee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108365194098136549861/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QsofOFf1hqalDkvhUS1ZlgrZFVSDPuwBXeSsG2-WY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The desert is delicious. I ordered the pasta dishes as take away and it's good. The food came out fast. The restaurant is nice and clean. The staff is nice.","time":1659730282,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nitai Nada","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117254808281816824912/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S4oWJoAWJ6y9c0QNc6iiyrdW0XmLfwAAyKyfp59w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"We went here two nights in a row as we liked it so much (plus it's one of the only restaurant's that is open all the time). Drinks, food, and everything else is great here. You can't go wrong. They also have some special menus, like Fig pizza (picture), Fig pasta, and other specials.","time":1669732718,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Poke Zod","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108583145627930543158/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYJ-vndwDaMrEVfksrdUGWFqfhQmLlYmmJuIkfr=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"A very good Italian restaurant. Was very busy when we came but we were lucky to have a place without reserving one. The place is big and it was busy at noon so the only reason could be it greatness. We were 2 and ordered the 4 Bruschettas, Pesto Ravioli and Spinach Egg Pizza. The food was awesome and fulfilling at a reasonable price. The staff were very nice and always were there for us even though the place was very busy. Overall the place looks good and feels very good to eat and one of the Pasta makers even made the Pasta in front of us which was really cool. Very recommended!","time":1671484954,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jamez Ali","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117846689960901083816/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TNpirOyXaS_ru7tOS_ltc4O8UuU4fOD8-auS00KQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Great Italian food! Very friendly service with lovely atmosphere. Busy place I did email ahead for reservation. All the food we got was great with the seafood tasting fresh! Great value for money considering the quality of the food. We had three mains, two desserts with soft drinks bill was only €57.00!!
Recommend the tiramisu for dessert at the end was great.","time":1677363376,"translated":false}]

column8: R. São João 18, 2640-027 Santo Isidoro, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Serge","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114477154548440084235/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbiPO0rQtUq1coiICUhKLNWiqkXqykxPUMXNPdR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"We were so happy to stumble upon this hidden gem of a bar/resto while exploring Santo Isidoro. Months later we are STILL talking about the cocktails we had here (maracuya everything! So delicious) and the FRIES!! We had a wonderful meal and sat in the rear patio which is like a secret garden. If you are in the area, be sure to visit for amazing food, excellent drinks, great service - and live music! Can't wait to go back!","time":1675006653,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Brian Shields","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116503417219541398561/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDyQ_pnxuyNW318yJty_VkgEj5uOruhBWKfpHSTA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Please don’t come here - this place is perfect as it is.\nFriendly, courteous and attentive staff; amazing and cheap food; craft beer options; delicious cocktails; indoor and outdoor space; inviting atmosphere.","time":1662669138,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maggie McCluskey","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115809997732195737301/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TU-uZ2u587w5sMDkSAGWg_0_hPxTXNLBLSBAOB=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"If you are in the area this is one of the 3 places I think you must visit! (The others are Pescador and PizzaMobile). We were in Ribamar for 4 weeks and once we found this place we came back several times for food and drinks. The bar snacks menu is more like really good, fresh prepared tapas. The burgers are such value. Fab music and evening entertainment too. Also, I have to mention the staff as they are so friendly. We had such a good time here.","time":1660216376,"translated":false},{"author_name":"André Correia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111531574980960811245/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TzeD4EBteAxrW8THIoyZyQxRZqcFczhWublJDWaQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Excellent atmosphere, with a great chill jazzy atmosphere with some occasional concerts that so far have always been great. The veggie lasagna is great as well as the burgers. Great value for drinks","time":1641509648,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Peter Forcey","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116272566625048646341/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxa2UeJzZbsuNvKcnEtdy34lcPCWQ-Dx98ZQezfV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Loved the Bagatelles last night. Alfonso and Antonio musical renditions added to a great night. Itsthe best place for live music in Ericeira. A must to visit.","time":1655026559,"translated":false}]

column8: Praia dos Coxos, R. dos Coxos 19, 2640-027 Santo Isidoro, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Julien van der waal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107487597948542703573/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXCVIyxogqRCqZQb4Hj_0nLZEgJfRyHR68xXubEQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Absolutely beautiful and secluded beach! The water is crystal clear and the surroundings absolutely stunning. It is like you are in paradise.","time":1658054890,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Murray Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106312710134200104659/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SPKERLg5QNbDPAPtwqoLgAh-sDJLZLEP_qrVKZuA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Lovely secluded little beach - the surf can be good here, but the direction of waves is pretty critical.  You can access the beach from North or South and there is a short walk in.  Not terribly accessible for access.","time":1560430045,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Davide Danti","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107422949794614056159/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TV-Cm7WsJvvioJTmq8R3b_KNX0feh4Z4sOBHVuOQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"A paradise for who love surfing!! Perfect big waves when is on!! Amazing view from the cliff with unique sunsets and landscape!!","time":1547473166,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Astrid Horn-Durand","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109400962447536171651/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tp0kvuAiWZwAvwt1KmI-pg2oprQozlei0-B0jt5A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Breathtaking view, good spot for waves","time":1573477180,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luisja","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114031912646631099690/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QhfqEnNd-jJE8GA10De15kQUNl2J4oBEPVQNg1YL8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"Nice little and quiet beach","time":1530649243,"translated":false}]

column2: Lento - monja café and sourdough bakery
column11: [{"author_name":"Dana","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115201141870565741822/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5ShxevRoVyryUHih-8TSrGPYVVft_dOrAqDVQwL=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Amazing bread and service! The cashew cheese is definitely worth the try. We will definitely come back for some more when visiting Ericeira 💚","time":1664035073,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alex Kelimm","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107721259036685594890/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RBJHmzsNcIJq3648r9FOMP1DyMfY23ooTBuIKo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"The tastiest pastries and bread in Ericeira!! This is hidden gem!! Super friendly owners who’s passion is reflected on the product they’re delivering. Come early because they usually sell out everything by midday. They also make filtered coffee which has coffee shop quality. 12/10 highly recommend.","time":1666742393,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kristie Yung Thresher","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110597360195181591894/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sl2KpdnBIsZNdDXwqyzH_A10Hr39d1jxvUbih63w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"The bread, pastries, coffee and cashew cheese are all beautiful, and delicious. The cherry on top are the couple that run it. They’re warm, lovely people whose movement really helps you slow down and enjoy the moment.","time":1669751814,"translated":false},{"author_name":"M T","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115791159592173140615/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QUKiDl92JexCaUmtg_sU8uol-vFZVZAMsU8tYA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Lovely people, Amazing food and drink.\nWe were lucky enough for the cafe to open whilst we stayed in an apartment in the same building whilst there on holiday. Everything we tried was delicious, we really loved the bread and cakes. I've selected a favourite item from each of us to rave about with you: The Coffee!, The Brownies!!, The Hibiscus Tea!!! and one from all of us: The Cheese bread!!!!","time":1661871127,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Victoria Ljunghäger (Vicci)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108615633072961042668/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S8ETeLIU3gBAI2ZSjUG5Hv7ysq6slnFlCMIs0WJA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Amazing brownies and cinnamon buns. You can really taste that they put love into the baking! :) Friendly atmosphere.","time":1670068607,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Salty Travels","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116348354821460107245/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_DmAmnFzff36YrzGs8QPojarvW9IXgEz-G1ThwQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Best pizza in the neighbourhood! Authentic Neapolitan experience with sour dough and top quality ingredients. Definitely something you have to try :) we will come back for sure!","time":1637573270,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helena Ruffato","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112417496935600321301/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QLg_XEdfcD7RjYYWPcjyTyJ5_oa_yZejqurjG0CQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Best pizza in Ericeira. You can taste the love and dedication they put into it. The place is also very cool and modern! You order the pizza, wait for a few minutes and get to enjoy it inside or at the beach nearby. 100% recommend! The Diavola is my favorite, but for vegeterians the Zucchini is also delicious!","time":1668508974,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emily W","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105824961264681870777/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYbkuX6FQOzCqoooLQeDhA1j8wOzLZG8qgz9xAo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Best pizza in Ericeira! Have tried the mushrooms (with a heavenly lemon base), the diavola, the lusa, and secret margherita, and all are amazing. They have the perfect location to get your pizza to go and take to the beach, but also a great modern and trendy space to dine in. They also have delicious Italian beer!! You must try!","time":1657717562,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Addie W","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114606549776535071028/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R95wzvqRnUTocI5HABn2b6ZEUlHNPf-YezfWEpVA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"They have the best pizza in Ericeria and anywhere nearby. If you can’t make it to town it’s available on Uber eats.","time":1674922627,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mika Häring","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115718660823718867227/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbm7DlTxCQoI1IeEOl3aUpEcloySTwWK8OGK3IZ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I normally don‘t do reviews but this one was so bad i had to do one. I ordered 2 pizzas, one sweet dessert pizza, some garlic bread and a coke bottle per uber eats. It said it would take 20-40 minutes to deliver. But it came after more than 90 (!) minutes. All the pizzas were absolutely cold. The boxes of the pizzas were completely dirty and even the coke bottle was so dirty that we didn‘t want to drink out of it. (There was even long hair sticking on it.) So i feel bad for leaving such a bad rating, because it seems like normally this doesn‘t happen but i had to say it.\n\nEdit: i changed the rating to 3 stars, because of the answer to my rating","time":1662401976,"translated":false}]

column8: Quinta dos Lobos, Estr. da Tapada no 1360, 2665-418 Mafra, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Serenity Life Coaching & Akademie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117020800556855132232/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SaMW0u-nycYS6dA4H9sgFhuo3ZOGOO80mpEU0GSA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"I was fortunate to experience a Sisterhood Day Retreat at the wonderful Shanti Space. Everything was so well taken care of, the grounds, the house, the organization of the day. As a facilitator myself I know how much work it is, to host those special experiences for others. Thank you for hosting those magical retreats in this truly one of a kind place in the middle of nature. I will definitely come back and recommend this place from my heart. ","time":1664884192,"translated":false},{"author_name":"nam dhyan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105422400903560161733/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYwdTxoqJ6klzOitgACjBNpzHEAO7E6Qejk7Mh0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Very secluded location, beautiful house. In winter, staying warm can be a bit of a problem. Especially the Yoga Shala's wood fueled floor heating is a little underwhelming hen it is cold and clammy. A typical Portuguese problem, though. The yoga deck is a top spot to hang out in dryer conditions.","time":1674510445,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Florian Ott","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104670392338718303597/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T6oj203L8gIZjBX2UyVs1QLkgkgEqx0GtaoKrwwQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"I had fantastic days at the Shanti Space.\nIt's a perfect place to quiet your mind and reconnect with yourself.\nCan highly recommend to visit and participate in the events and treatments.","time":1606666572,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lucille Fauque","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108098498443664633991/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5ShYLeIbKGQ23CrEiKzXRaHK5fMlgOsWzxuGU-L_Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"We stayed in The Shanti Space few nights in the Glamping tent, we absolutely loved it, everything ! The house is amazing, the tent is super confortable and cute, the gardens, nature around is beautiful and strong. Jessica and Jack are fabulous hosts, you feel like home and food is delicious. It's the perfect place for retreat, healing, just enjoying life and meeting people. A huge thanks to Jess & Jack and their team.","time":1597159657,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jan Lawson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109878151937194857129/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TFjhokJhvZoj78ApKe7gU45GXAd7whiMe-5_wB0nM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Great space, lovely owners, amazing garden, so peaceful - what's not to love. The Shanti Space is a beautiful spot in the woodland, so magical and close to nature, a must stay/visit for sure if you are in the area.","time":1623407401,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"G","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108082296007378543588/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbMD32Damq8rVTHU1smB9xucQ-4yCsR3eN-mQmA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"a lot of good sushi for a really fair price. Also the service was really fast and kind.
Definitely a place to try","time":1661977329,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Raquel Bramao","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108228782720043557219/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SUZftf8lfEJTNG9U8DNlZ8d5XVooQlsegBCIi0XHk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Nice food, excellent price/quality balance. Sushi is mediocre. Affordable. Staff is friendly for the most part.","time":1662500364,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexander Bock","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105010306073107334181/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tw1f0plSsJi-Kwt_kI4eFZ-iJ3lIZFLi_OyPpKHqA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Nice place, good sushi 🍣 with fresh fish and seafood, nice variations - try the the flamed salmon and the crispy onion 🧅 sushi - and: price and quality are very strong. All you can eat for 14,99 Euro Formdinner and 10,99 for lunch is hard to beat. Especially with the freshness of the food!

Give it a go!","time":1631384431,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Grace","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106817210854209859408/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RfzPvrF2Y-jXqkAvi_nuHkAAigc2rHECebA6v1-g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I paid almost $30 for a small box of lettuce with a sprinkle of tuna, avocado and peanuts, miso soup (which is a generous serving) and the soggiest, most overcooked mushrooms I’ve ever had (I thought I had ordered sautéed veggies and it 98% mushrooms). Not a great experience but I give it 2 stars because they delivered very late and I appreciated at least having food. Would not recommend if you have higher standards for Japanese food.","time":1639183170,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua do Passadiço, bar 05, do Lizandro, Portugal, 2655-130 Carvoeira, Portugal

column8: Praça dos Navegantes loja 16, 2655-320 Ericeira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Iriaxi Torres","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112295658300791308550/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sn26-FI22dZ4KinYhmrc9W3dkpBc88W45kTy5VzvU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Good bakery with a couple of excelent vegan options","time":1664614978,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Milenka Thomas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107078618964378709352/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaGgXbI2jkj7JbUgGNjrOw5TnXLMK3kOJVcb3ZM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Simply the best selfmade sourdough bread bread and pastries, we’re such big fans! And the owners are super nice as well :) happy 1st anniversary again!","time":1654865628,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maria Joao Quintao Braga","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114905806483797510762/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QB9raFzxsi9j3tMsnhYCrmhm7q0ibegMX6Ppgomw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Simply wonderful sourdough bread. You must also try the focaccia. Chocolate cookies are just too good to be true. Super friendly staff.","time":1643283502,"translated":false},{"author_name":"K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115589149021471403192/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Su4DpjldKRByuUHLnHm8CJaPESc6w3_-OweNbiLg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The best bread in the town for me. It's the case when you bring bread home and eat it as it is without any topping, because it's just perfect, and you don't want to \"spoil\" it. 💚","time":1640778918,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maximiliano Martín","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110092433186708790332/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZAvxkALGtW7SUQxVMCcnCMIp2lguZmqfd6Zzk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Melhor Pao y cinnamon roll","time":1676838585,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Julia Edgar","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113789908002140064755/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RGMGW-ypH0uhep6tuIGxOHLa20C-i-LGi0eB4DtQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Want to feel like you’re in Greece in the middle of Lisbon? Go here! What an amazing menu and top class food to match. Our only downside was not being able to try everything on the menu with it only being 2 of us! Staff are super friendly and we had a great time. Would definitely recommend to come here if you’re dining in Lisbon.","time":1657522944,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicole Zhang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103872997776680932355/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QcsPijx_S6MnFKM10cA0mvtJyGYWtMdN3sYitLdQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"One of the nicest Sunday afternoons I’ve had in a while! I came here with a couple of friends and we ordered a few dishes to share (I’d recommend mixing the small dishes and entrees). Every dish was beautiful and carefully curated - even the olives were infused in olive oil and lemon zest (yum!). Definitely the Greek Meatballs was our favourite dish, but we loved everything we ordered. The restaurant itself is so cozy, beautiful, well lit and is busy but not too loud! The waiters are kind, helpful, and welcoming. We will be back to try more dishes!","time":1669628616,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Natalie Franke","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107951028252156110400/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QS3g74Xiyv4dIOWlEdrntdPcN82u5tG008SbC04w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"The best meal we had in Lisbon… and we ate our way through the city. I highly recommend the octopus and baked feta. Everything was delicious.","time":1655831820,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adrienne Dale","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112534312945384758707/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaPN3rGyO4g9a4_C0l-ovVes-rXztzpCzXJhkZ0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Had an absolutely amazing lunch at Kefi today. Would recommend booking as they are very busy. Great selection of both food and drinks. The chicken pitta with avocado was unreal - so much flavour and cooked perfectly. We took the lovely staff member’s recommendation of the Greek doughnuts for dessert and we were not disappointed. With the cinnamon and honey they were so delicious.
