Don’t miss out on this gem if you’re in Lisbon","time":1664744692,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jessica Ribeiro","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104371977963559115764/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S-dGF2i1ozZspmXnsA7dFaOxdfg3wdPtJ3mqPA3Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Absolutely love the food here and try to go back every time I’m in Lisbon. Their products are fresh and so tasty. They have so many options that remind me of eating in Greece. so much, that they have local products as well. The wine selection is also great\nImmaculate atmosphere, decor and food presentation if you appreciate these things.","time":1676908707,"translated":false}]

column8: Largo do Conde Barão 25, 1200-163 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Katharina Sophie Tietz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109569721310175135285/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T_xz0ZG9nSLqLujLCLDdFooDkyCpCJuqnnjnk2ng=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Varied breakfast and brunch cafe in the beautiful Barrio Alto. The dishes are fancy and appealing to the eye. The sourdough bread is a bit too toasted. The coffee is strong in roast, unfortunately, the coffee was too quickly cold and out the back it was slightly acidic-pappy. The staff is very helpful, but the drinks were sometimes served after the food. Would give 3.5 stars - since no half stars are possible there are only three. Worth a visit, but not a 4.7 location.","time":1651935993,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Güliz Coşan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117973501284044322272/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYlcKekJoM-XdA4u8cC-sV8mFDwWo54G-aG83rs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"I think this became my favorite breakfast spot in Lisbon. The breakfast burrito was super delicious and their coffee was great! I loved the atmosphere as well. There are not many tables inside but they have outdoor sitting in the street.\nThe prices are good, considering the big portions.\nOverall a very nice cafe to enjoy the good weather with great breakfast and coffee!","time":1672753310,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kristjana Nikolls","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105959778565272748138/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S2zZeetE8GyUrjCVrlwRTs-0QcXMi62Xp5eulyoiw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"We had granola bowl and the fruit cake with yoghurt. The cake was amazing!! We loved both options and they are a great size so super good value for money. The coffee is some of the best I’ve had in Lisbon - honestly would recommend. The outdoor space is really nice in the sunshine and there is also seating inside. The staff are really cool and give great service. I’ll be coming back.","time":1665339618,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lindsey Haines","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102113265036376588567/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_7S6zmrGAXnDlffgMKGDbdX34rAeTy2GhiDlD=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Favorite breakfast spot in Lisbon! The food was incredible, especially the homemade pumpkin bread and breakfast burrito. The avocado toast was great too! The servers were friendly and food came pretty fast. Definitely wish we were able to go here more than one time. We sat inside with our toddler (18 months) and she did fine sitting on the bench. Highly recommend!","time":1663732924,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dana Krengel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100255426460878539904/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RXRnLUVjl5-sx_UHUmZocHiN5q5f5CTR5bWXGa5g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Ate with my family for breakfast. The tropical vegan smoothie was sooooo good. We really like our V breakfast burritos and coffee. Recommend for people needing V options on the go. The staff were super friendly. Beautiful location!","time":1655638510,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua do Passadiço, bar 2, do Lizandro, 2655-010 Carvoeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Claire Sergent","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107218837586551927040/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwooIWTP108ZhFgU9r0zHAlV8Of-Xrrp0-i90ETA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Delicious & healthy food : you have to try the banana cake 🍌, waffles, pancakes and smoothies and friendly staff. Great place to chill. For me the best spot of the Praia da Foz do Lizandro  🌊","time":1657457945,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bregt Coussement","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107663328813241896909/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R1YEsqkZV0plSXZW8llGgr14PwmuU8xA7-sIinOw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Cosy bar with a nice atmosphere and a decent view of the beach. The food is amazing and there's a good variety of healthy and vegetarian options. It's pretty good for working but doesn't have a lot of charging stations.","time":1649845339,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Martin Richtár","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100710525744308029978/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q-f9tea2RuIcVT4_BWY4UwYpboAMeidVA31iWY5Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Perfect spot .. nice view of the ocean, kind people, chill atmosfere and good prices. They have some vegetarian food..  which i didn't try..  but I can recommend you clasic burgers with meat! Had "Barbatana" one and it was delicious. Just lovely place :)","time":1668335353,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gabriel De","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100753475054787836277/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbboIcPbLLkwhvo0SQpMf27LbbL41nrJvOOj4w2=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"Amazing experience.
Great food, very tasty, very well made, and  excellent price for what you get.
The bartenders there are also very nice which is definitely a plus.
It was our favorite spot with my friend during our trip, we came back there 4 times !","time":1603628483,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Diana Carvalho","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118118319338185104257/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QezlMs-LJQ-AZkSOBy60Zc1OIR8p28Fh7Wzw285HY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great Food
Great Service
Great Beach View

Perfect for Lunch, an afternoon with friends or to work during the day.

Dog Friendly
Vegan Friendly
Good Vibes Friendly 👌🏿","time":1669648872,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Amber Donald","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114048262649755096586/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ5rj09JGnmxoP87ORafSBlkCupADCEgI86FPwk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"What an amazing place!! A one stop shop for vegan groceries and delicious, nourishing food. The plate of the day is always 10/10.","time":1669149520,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aaron Gutman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116738560906407964274/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SJjQkJ3ZG2nIXvFOIEXkRot0MUzJfvJDp4JKeyVA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Nice selection of organic/vegan/veggie items. Unfortunately we couldn't try the cafeteria as they had already finished serving for the day. Will have to visit again.","time":1661184416,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Danielle Dannenberg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110883782388551741446/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RHKsscy01MrAJG4ibiPrSinvxNEl-Rpmv9WcwKUQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Amazing organic grocery!! Great selection of perishable and non-perishable items and cute cafe with the best vegan lemon poppyseed bread. Even offers no-waste home supplies like dish and laundry detergent!","time":1656502783,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lydia C.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109227293237431170535/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QuV3zVmt1ccAVaSnizXK1aAXG1R3SK1JsOoYPGbg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Wow, fantastic variety of products, probably the best we found in Portugal. Fresh veg and fruit and great selection of gluten-free bread, and countless awesome dried goods. They also have a cafe and we found two gluten and dairy free cakes. Great organic supermarket!","time":1660989035,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bernhard","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111464941736092619984/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5THik-0tgVM8u2DZSQhRP6vnlgJbgPxUSxpcBkIdg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Best organic cuisine and Bakery I ever had in Europe. I can highly recommend! Friendly and polite staff. 5/5","time":1664285736,"translated":false}]

column3: Picturesque inlet with a sandy shoreline & rock formations, plus parking, a restaurant & showers.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Caroline Riche","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116045363665066065805/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S8T2pIwbvksw5TAqq9SRw7voB-ek6ePxhrzuAxaQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Such a nice beach, my photos don’t do it justice. Not too crowded, even in August. Waves a bit bigger, but there were lifeguards. Lots of surfers. Topless, doesn’t allow animals, has a public restroom, has parking and one restaurant option nearby. We Ubered to the beach entrance from Sintra Estacao. Uber there was easy to get, Uber back was hard, but we got one!","time":1660671829,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hein Bester","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107512060295726621305/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TX4WQbVDweIRT4o6Gj7Z7llkeYCnWRJr0AeMq7F5Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"A beautiful, picturesque beach nestles into the rocks. We visited it at the end of March during a beautiful sunny day and although the water was fairly cold, our kids had a great time playing and exploring. There is a small parking space at the beach, that I assume can get quite packed during the hot summer months. I therefore suggest making sure you arrive very early. There is also another beach adjacent to this one that is very secluded, but can be easily reached by foot. There is also a very highly rated restaurant by the edge of the beach, called Restaurante da Adraga. Even in the off season it was packed and buzzing.","time":1650279935,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adam E.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108810980381142448025/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RkMEGjy1keQ4c2K53clW9x35GGYij3asUR2GMx=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Beautiful beach, if you go early to see the sunrise you'll likely be completely alone to enjoy the view. Don't miss the hiking trail up the mountain too, bit of a climb but the views are worth it.","time":1654720139,"translated":false},{"author_name":"lAGAwTHA","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113723324976827093809/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TBfpSolRXjOQcn01tNfdUsKeFeqOiBnMyOMNZ3QLs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"We came during winter and we just love being alone in this beautiful beach surrounded with dark huge rocks listening and watching the strong waves!","time":1670112444,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Erika Reyes Aguilar","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107275223725480218269/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZd5PZCdpgEnvb70xXBgHh-n32UUculcKGqg_nY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Great beach nestles into the rocks, couldn’t imagine what are you about to find after an 1 hour ride in the middle of the forest!!
We visited it at the begging of July during a beautiful windy sunny afternoon and the water was fairly cold. The sunset was amazing!!
There is a parking space at the beach and also a very highly rated restaurant called Restaurante da Adraga.
There is also another beach adjacent to this one that is very secluded, but can be easily reached.","time":1659779032,"translated":false}]

column3: Secluded beach accessed by a steep trail, offering golden shores & an outcropping of large rocks.
column11: [{"author_name":"Alessandro Martorelli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111376351680272995424/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TuBVAdU5ahknlOGvbgt2BCnx6GtiTtNYNl9ETdcA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Beach immersed in a completely wild environment, difficult to reach except through a rather demanding walking-path.  There is a small strip of sand which is eaten up by the ocean at high tide and leaves no connection with the mainland.  The spectacle of the waves breaking on the coast is evocative and hypnotic.","time":1670518397,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Diogo Santo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100564532892225511498/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S1RCtPHg6ZiLg0eAbkKeV5uZka1hrXsTi6P_dCoA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"What a stunning place! This is one of the top views in Portugal, a stunning beach with a very unique landscape! It's in the west area, so be mindful of weather, might not be always amazing! But its totally worth the detour and is just next to cabo da roca. You can do the small hike and go down to the beach. Its really really nice! Totally worth it.","time":1662805003,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Liang Chen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115472082702284091720/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RRDYBxi6Kx_mWL2syxwOjzHDlXVe147f6dj11RsA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"What a lovely place! Yes, from the parking lot, you have to go downhill for about 20 minutes and at some places it’s slippery and you have to use your hands to balance. But on the way, you also have some nice spots to view the Cabo da Roca, the beach itself and its surrounding cliffs. We did the trail with our 5 years old daughter without any problems. But if you have baby buggy with you, better skip it. The beach itself isn’t very small and thanks to the 20 minute walk, it’s also not very crowded. We also saw visitors with surf board and big sunshades there, hats off! Beside the beach, you can also walk a little to explore the hidden bay or climb the cliff. Near the cliff there is also shade in place. Going uphill is of course stressful, but somehow easier that going downhill. We stayed at the beach for about 3 to 4 hours and enjoyed every moment. The last advice, treat yourself well and don’t wear slippers to get there!","time":1655999084,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ian Witte","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115391820742676690251/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S7A49GAY2ahjOJiaGuYNcOE1rPmiwiKdPwhTVU5w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"I highly recommend walking a part of the trail to see this stunning beach and cliffs, as it is only a short distance from Cabo da Roca. If you are up for the challenge and have the time, it is worthwhile to climb down to the beach, but this may be difficult and wearing appropriate shoes is a must. One of my friends broke her arm when she slipped along the path and fell down a few meters, but she was wearing flip flops...","time":1672089198,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ariane Blenkinsop","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117371479277694267464/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb3lFSuSUwnRWn4ptrJQqkBJNsghgS39C25wTyz=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This beach is worth the hike! Take time, water and food with you because it is quite a treck to the beach. As there are quite a few people coming and going, it made me feel safe to know that I wasn’t just hiking randomly. We saw a few kids as well but I wouldn’t recommend it for young kids as the hike is quite strenuous but also the waves are quite strong. It is definitely an experience I wouldn’t want to miss out on.","time":1659862828,"translated":false}]

column2: You and the sea - Ericeira Hotel and Apartments
column3: Modern units with ocean views in a trendy apartment hotel offering an indoor pool, dining & a spa.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Amy Miller","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104677095631727675539/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TpS1Z4lA5RIJ_FjKWUHLuXdPaRCgU4OLBojbL12g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"We loved You and the Sea - could not recommend more for a family staying in the area! We stayed with 4 adults and 2 babies and it was the perfect setup. The apartments are very spacious, the staff are extremely friendly and accommodating and the common spaces such as the indoor pool, kids playroom and restaurant are all very nice. Also loved the access to the front desk staff via a Whatsapp number - so convenient for all of our questions/requests.","time":1669721553,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Margaux Miller","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116667192226312401666/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QoACjFGluMw1l_sbpfwubXvaceV7C_wo48EihLS9c=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Fabulous place to stay. Highly recommend. Huge balconies and beautiful spacious rooms. Their online pictures don't even do it justice. They have a huge garden space, wifi everywhere, meeting rooms if you need, a spa, sauna, steam room and pool, as well as a gym. Great service at the front desk. A nice restaurant on site. Location is near a good beach and just 12 minutes walk into the main town with restaurants and shops. This is the only reason I rated location a 4/5 but really it is a 5/5 if you don't mind a short walk as there are good beaches in both directions and they have a big awesome property. Honestly though the big clean beautiful rooms would be the best part and very hard to beat.","time":1664705987,"translated":false},{"author_name":"André Ribeiro","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107719559117984723082/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sh0wrYPZhW53efAopDDq2nlHOS9vkMeGKra_Z_7us=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Nice and comfy stay. Hotel pool is very nice and one of the main reasons for the good ratings. Breakfast is nice but somewhat limited. Staff ia mostly very friendly with just one or two exceptions. Location isn't central to Ericeira but it's possible to walk to the center in under 10min.","time":1677827558,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Addie W","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114606549776535071028/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R95wzvqRnUTocI5HABn2b6ZEUlHNPf-YezfWEpVA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"I stayed here in the middle of winter on a super last minute trip to Ericeria for a few days of surfing so given that it was the extreme low low season, my review might be totally different during high season-
The rooms were nice sized apartments and felt like they were brand new. Super quiet with a nice partial view of the ocean. Unlike when I’ve stayed in the old town part of Ericeria the hotel didn’t feel like it was on top of everything else around it. It had a huge under ground parking area and the walk to the center was 10-15m along the coastline. .
The sauna and steam rooms were small but I never met anyone else when I went to use them. They were clean and well maintained. The breakfast was buffet style and had a good selection with good hours. The pool was clean and heated. I never used the gym but it was well designed and looked like everything was clean and working.
Whenever I needed anything from a surf board to sourcing something else in town the front desk staff was accessible by WhatsApp immediately which I really appreciated.
The downsides: I got a hot stone massage at the spa after seeing all the recommendations online of how good the spa was. The massage was terrible, the room was cold, the stones were cold and during the period I was laying there at the end the therapist started to clean the room and make a lot of noise going in and out. At some point I debating asking if we could just end the massage because I had requested firm and between the stones and her light petting, I was looking forward to it being over.
The sauna I used often but closes at 6pm which I found odd as most people use the sauna between 6-10pm. The front desk would leave it open longer but you had to request it daily and sometimes I did. They didn’t hesitate to adjust and did so happily.
The food I found at the restaurant to be very subpar for the price. I ordered a pizza and when I got it, they forgot the sauce and the dough was undercooked. Which for 16$ I’d expect they would of both cooked it correctly and not forgotten the sauce.
It’s possible that both the spa and restaurant are top notch during high season and they just have to figure it out during the off season but in that case for the price point of the hotel, they might consider closing for 1-3 months instead.
The hotel itself was nice, I’d very much consider returning. The spa and restaurant for the quality felt overpriced and under delivered unfortunately.","time":1674922376,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Max Sale","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100096259901734247627/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaUf7MvfpurJIJT40ddFPEsiP5VGFznJiinKIuxXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Super loud techno party going til 11pm on a Monday night. Loud drunks outside your door at midnight. Blasting techno again at breakfast. Tried to eat at the (then empty) restaurant one afternoon and was told it was open, but not for hotel guests, just for a private party. Not able to use the pool area due to the private party. The room is quite lovely. But I would have stayed elsewhere if they had given an FYI about the parties.","time":1663090694,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Cap. João Lopes 24A, 2655-295 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Szonja Balogh","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104193550550607664469/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TCxYeBCmBJ3RQzRLRBT6Lk745uwK7jGZhcZa4nlmQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"One of my best food experiences. Waiters are very kind and selects /offers wine perfectly based on your personal preference.
Tha food is very balanced. We had 4 courses and all.of them were perfect and fresh. Sunset is the most beautiful. Lovely balance between a fancy restaurant and a funk outdoor bar.","time":1663875577,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jennifer Nagy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107774454521127144957/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rdn32_6cW3OQ3d7uLmEYoCMUcWN6Fhau4zHeVswg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Incredibly popular restaurant especially at sunset. They have beautiful views. I was seated outside at the “bar” tables and had access to the bar menu.
Good drinks and nice bar menu.
If you want to dine at the restaurant a reservation is needed a few days (or week) in advance.","time":1659863847,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ash Winter","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115156536256697778747/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ry4CksDrEG63HtHNxH9AawgaUatfLwF9pLGJyAPHk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Was really lucky to have a table for 5 so late so really appreciative for the staff for being accommodating. Tried a bunch of starters but the portions were smaller than expected. Had the muscles with fish and the stingray came as fried pieces which we didn't expect. Lovely ceviche and spring rolls.","time":1652465403,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joanna Szymańska","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102528021164547213785/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbNkJh4oLxgxXYXee-kfbQtNoFcCfP1AgWhmFnR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Excellent food, service and vibe! Had a lovely view for the sunset. Also REALLY reasonably priced! Best meal we've had in the area.","time":1663706989,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anna T","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107206135664005753551/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ7L2Weau_VUAfuUVUgd8E8UseuImB4LSFZAwIe=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We enjoyed our evening! The staff is really friendly and helpful and the food was good. One thing: the fried egg with the risotto and churros tasted a bit fishy … I guess everything is fried in the same oil.","time":1644270921,"translated":false}]

column3: Informal guesthouse offering basic dorms & rooms, plus an outdoor pool & a restaurant/bar.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Elena Macrí","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103699766864756998142/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbk0X_uaVPr9LduEiLZd0OCEWRmdapeAvfvauzi=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"For the price I would have expected a bit more.
The place is very noisy all day long, the restaurant has constantly loud music on, so it makes it impossible to have a quiet place if you need to work or concentrate.
Staff was ok. Regarding customer service I was not particularly impressed, neither for the reception or the restaurant.
The kitchen is incredibly small, I don’t understand how they can think that’s enough for the whole hostel. It was a constant wait to cook as there are only two stoves.

The rooftop is a nice place to hang out, if the weather is good.
I really enjoyed the yoga lessons.
The beds look like coffins, but I must say I had the best sleep of my life there, I should consider it for my bed at home.
I was lucky to have a bathroom in my 6bed dorm, which I think is the only one that has a private bathroom for the room.

Overall for the price and what they offer I don’t think I would come back.","time":1666265974,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jonathan Van Putten","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117463563416855119848/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYqo7jNTEc9KmzF3Y_eSKOiWmgL4eabhCG_Byj2=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I’ve never found a more better hostel. There was waves like you wouldn’t imagine 2-3meters. The women at the front desk, Anouk was literally the best human I’ve ever met in my life. There’s paintings everywhere and a Mexican restaurant downstairs that has some insane nachos and quesadillas. The passion fruit spicy margarita is to die for, but if you want some real 🔥🔥🔥stuff order a original margarita shook with spicy stuff. Thank you for a great stay, can’t wait to come back. Thanks for the smiles. The mold in the bathrooms is a little rough but I believe they are going to clean it as they had a lot of visitors. Great community","time":1667445027,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andrei Catalin Goie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117790415335615282957/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbOG2Z_nZK2o3WGDL_-RnSe46820o3EidfYJpMT=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"The room was very cozy and the terrace was very nice with an amazing view. One thing I would change from that room is the bed, it makes too much noise. Location is unbelievable and you can easily find a parking spot. The staff was very sweet and nice. Absolutely would recommend!","time":1677080356,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bart v. Dongen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102774569202378522648/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TibK_q3MmWK182GuSlTxCqqOkWkKhot5uX_GcCww=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I had a great time with their surf school / surf teacher. Also relaxed at their pool, had a drink. Very nice atmosphere.","time":1667390004,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bree Panuco","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102653079096339218065/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QYaEhSr8sMnLsUG5_LIAGbguZc0YQrsaDW7ks85Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"The Selina in Ericeira is absolutely gorgeous! The staff members make the place homey and are so welcoming! The manager, Karen, even took home my sweater and washed it for me, when I spilled red wine all over it. The other team members, such as Meridith, Annouk, Marlena, and others created a nice vibe. The only negative about this place is there is no cowork, so if you have a lot of work calls, I don’t recommend it. Other than that, I am sure you will enjoy your stay here. :)","time":1656692379,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"mamaD","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107827223271441293243/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R3EnFhp1s91B3PRtUyB2OW6ujEEa6hOtZPkhIxYQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Want a traditional Portuguese experience? Come to Páteo Alfacinha. We had a great time here enjoyed a traditional Portuguese party with delicious Portuguese cooking.","time":1670173396,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vergílio Tonelo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103326221898158959428/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TVDwjTSjCXZ9jVxFN2O32Xj-VFPRTHnggam03X7w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Surprising view and unexpected location. Some food is amazing,  like the risoto, some other very normal like the \"espetadas\". The size of the portions are a little small.","time":1663018375,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bruno Cunha","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116962937467216904329/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TWYa-lq0bCN70KQ9GXPnjiJzmyHP7ZicIgGb_WzA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very good food for a fair price, combined with an amazing view.\nI will definitely come back.","time":1661008499,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Travel Ralu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111911250234453048916/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFBs03uPoGqWM-o-t9cqMNeHSM3Ihd9iFb3pp3JDk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A miniature Portuguese village where you can have dinner under the vine and eat amazing grilled food. The views over the Tejo and the sunset are amazing.","time":1662146716,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Caroline Sobral Cabana","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110150642110213789912/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TW9K1PVoSlR4aeoPn5CFEf2bvD9afnkxeO56QoAg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very pleasant evening and delightful dinner in an enchanting setting with a stunning panorama of Lisbon and a menu that reflects the portuguese tradition. The service was very thoughtful, we were well advised on the wine and the dishes, which were well portioned for sharing. Special highlight were the grilled meat and the roasted pimentos.","time":1661444012,"translated":false}]

column8: Largo dos Condes da Ericeira 5, 2655-272 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Рома R Victuk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116254516826753371547/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ32nnUQLhgbk4HEmCajySMqZFqUsJiTnxkkYRd=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"It’s a nice restaurant. Not bad service! Tasty food! 👍🏻😀","time":1668732115,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andy B","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109796915969608055047/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbT4ddVg3tj_bSfhOzoQ8qms0cqdPCA_OZQRPh1=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Ericeira is lucky to have three really great sushi restaurants and this is one of them. I ordered way too much and did my best to finish it all because it was so good. They have a really great selection of different rolls - some really creative and different. The staff were all really nice and helpful. Definitely worth a visit!","time":1569708905,"translated":false},{"author_name":"דור מור","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114727505984767691120/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QtSvgI3zKTHLg4Vaf85LjljbqDxJ1Us_5azKWpXQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Fabulous sushi! Fresh fish and amazing service. We had a wonderful time in here! Definitely worth visit! (:
Enjoy!","time":1516140544,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Henry Turner","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103256277443115334518/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZbYFIgC4yjc1OBdQxApZNsRY9hTpSo1WxSz6GH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"We had to wait around 40 extra min but it was worth it. I recommend to book in advance because the place is small. We ordered 2 sashimi (maguro and sake) very good. Also de Chef Mix (50 pc) very tasty. The desserts are quite cheap and really good as well specially lime cake. Definitely a place worth to visit if you like fresh fish. Btw they accepted our international credit card, another good point.","time":1595676529,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kolin Schunck","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109673668170856271925/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q7t4JuumSQl0hjhGG8r7Zyj944L8s5cfyManRZ0Rs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I would actually like to give minus -⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐. At first we had a positive impression. The service was okay-ish but super artificial and you could really feel that they don't mean what they say. But this wasn't the worst thing that happened.

Now to the worse part: after eating there we had extreme stomach issues incl. diarrhea, and vomiting 🤮 which lasted for about 24 hours. One hour after we had dinner we felt as our stomach would explode. Another one or two hours later we found ourselves on the toilet for the rest of the night. The following day was also terrible and we had strong stomach pain.

Conclusion: never, ever go there! You might be lucky, but you also might get bad food, resulting in real health issues. 🛑","time":1667472486,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Amori Nel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106568102865209788241/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q1BqKF14pDstgoJpriPtc9dwM5a43jC9h968t-5k8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Very nice traditional dessert from Ericeira.  Lovely cafe with a relaxed ambiance. Would definitely recommend having a quick bite at this cafe with a view of the see. Service is friendly and fast and the espresso was good although it was cold it was still enjoyable.","time":1669479999,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Savannah Wishart","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118183619983557199246/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SdniPJBxfkIFW7x3o0XM3Gb9IYq4VxGRsAAFmQyQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"It tastes like a cloud!

Really, it doesn’t look so special but as soon as you bite into the ouriços, you feel the soft texture immediately melt into your mouth - and see the beautiful golden waves inside the less interesting exterior.

Don’t judge a pastry by it’s cover. ;)
Also, supplemented with the friendliest girl helping me with my order.

Obrigada, I found my morning routine!","time":1656762076,"translated":false},{"author_name":"XIAOHANG LIU","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107937282259015557495/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TF9CTjBMm5l193AY7EIAMn8n4VV3U4E324LL5DvQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Lovely staff with great seaside view. The "ouriço" traditional pastry from Ericeira
Looks like muffins but the texture is different. Tasty and good for price, nice to have a try","time":1633196730,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Leilani W","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111813601348407158793/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RjYclaEMymygo4IbruJlaviRIN50CSPxBxP3NQ2g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Traditional pastry love spot to people and sea watch","time":1677540332,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Isabel Guerra","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104153780315422626594/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QSdpmaVZJEWCAX0TJtsLERt2yvyZimOK5XPWwP=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"I had never tried Ouriços cakes. I was curious because I saw many people walking with bags with Ouriços from Casa da Fernanda. We went there and tried one. After a nice lunch it was a very good surprise to find also the perfect dessert! We bought2 dozens because we had a party, everybody was impressed by the wonderful taste! If you haven't tried them yet, don't wait! Even me, who rarely eat sweets, couldn't resiste.","time":1678658886,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Aldonio Ferreira","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107861697118410147115/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SfjPc1RODSpDchtiiqeZzzul4HT-P2z_fj47WwxqE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Known as the Pearl of the Atlantic, Madeira does justice to its title. It offers so many beautiful attractions that will keep you craving for the clock to stop ticking. Enjoy!","time":1659615818,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Thomas Bühler","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114041065449422641483/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZcpY5LdbwgkwtH0z0J0xDZ878-VLPj7ICtO0qj=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Amazing. Great destination to spend your vacations. From hiking to drinking madeira vine there is a lot to do!","time":1661242274,"translated":false},{"author_name":"carolyn s","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111064962491248673072/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TG-WkZhMg-CrH8Evgc1MaChyDxtD2j4LSlJgDuRQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"What a beautiful place. The cable car to the top of the island is  a highlight.","time":1669414410,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lina Grakauskaitė","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117222985364402386966/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwYeg4vcRDmxqjWi0nMSE1tQvwWlXw3S4aRsxRyw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Beautiful island. Very exotic compared to the rest of the Europe. Exotic fruits, flowers and various plants. The place for an active holidays as there are not to many beaches or places to get lazy. Hikers paradise where you can hike for weeks. Friendly people and very good food. I would say you need more than a week here, to taste all the exotic fruits and to visit all the amazing places.","time":1634759180,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Peter Tierney","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111705149077558822846/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RZ0aPiG5XpS0-zqmEoTLxM4oAk7oA9MfWYNyV9_1A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"The weather was a bit changeable, but we still enjoyed the wide variety of environments. Some of the views were amazing.","time":1672425726,"translated":false}]
undefined

column8: Largo dos Condes da Ericeira 9 12, 2655-319 Ericeira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Julien van der waal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107487597948542703573/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXCVIyxogqRCqZQb4Hj_0nLZEgJfRyHR68xXubEQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Really nice chicken place. Service is quick and food is delicious and cheap. Will definitely come back!","time":1657827010,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Woojoo Na","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102275776577318054003/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RpYnx3MOmUUAXHGpnub-P5pLsBXzqRr7hYZpElsEE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Amazing meal for a good price!","time":1672946953,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marco Garcês","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114956326859169554896/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rst2mSpmdoNp0MSpZ9veqnY1NQZXNZegZL7X5WoXs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"friendly staff, best grilled chicken in town. Take away only","time":1679255961,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cy Kia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103968651521621573631/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZgcEsomsWF1DxhzV32NGIvHBkQwfXnEPEVW-Pqpg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Delicious and very reasonably priced hole in the wall, found myself coming back here multiple times","time":1655382152,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anders Bandt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110754394332606320266/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5ScaScd6Uwv2DYIQ1LniTRVBqoBY_1BvEmTC00STQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Yeah… if you’re looking for a cheap, quick, filling meal that is high quality then this is the place. I was always full after my meal! Came back multiple times.","time":1657896503,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de Santo António 12A, 2655-360 Ericeira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Julien van der waal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107487597948542703573/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXCVIyxogqRCqZQb4Hj_0nLZEgJfRyHR68xXubEQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Really nice breakfast/lunch place! The coffee here was superb, probably the best in ericeira. They offer delicious bagels, granola (yoghurt) bowls and sweets. You need to try their delicious brownies! Place itself also looks very nice and the staff is very welcoming! Would recommend.","time":1658056354,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Roland Trimmel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115363041849670300228/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RM4pRY0XGV5GrAHf9MoXKSoOdIiSmfkGzlqipYnw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great. It’s one of the handful of places in town serving vegan food — and they’re great at that. The cakes were lovely, each of them tasty and not too sugary; had no one told me it’s vegan, I’d have never been able to tell from any of the great cake places. The tea selection is nice, too. And being able to sit outside on the patio (or street) is an extra bonus that will make you smile.","time":1668283960,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dora Rizhko","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117435827602731889978/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S5UjlFEhopeQmony0su2Wsl-KKGrXrtji6faQtQw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"it’s really cool to know in Portugal you can find nice place with healthy, vegan food (not fat potatoes and overtakes meat). awesome interior, cool waitress. bowl with granola was nice, and banana bread too, but banana smoothie a little bit disappointing: we found ice and freeze piece of banana (or another fruit). i guess this kind of drink should be more fresh.","time":1665864811,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jahmarley Grant","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109807440429227111408/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S5Xnm_nw6Y-xo39OHkwzLJLZy2PN_p2ou9gfvqEw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Great beans choice and really nice father/son duo running the shop. In general the water quality was low and it made for a poor speciality coffee experience. If you’re looking V60 or other alternative brewing methods I wouldn’t recommend purely based on the water quality and to high brewing temperatures.","time":1647268409,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ellie Davis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109335947651972573454/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTn8zdBDMuBCYD1NxOCk9Xncd-Wk-nDXC_obUWKg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Delcious specialty coffee crafted by coffee artists! Complex flavours and a good balance of sweet, bitter and acidic. In a word: perfection! The price is of course twice what you pay in an average local cafe but it is so worth it for a really special cup of coffee! The staff were friendly, the decor and atmosphere is cosy. Coffee sizes were generous and there is a very good selection of cakes to compliment the coffee, we tried the vegan cinnamon roll and it was served warm and was so delicious! I never would have guessed it was vegan!\nA must visit in Ericeira 👌","time":1662821600,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Mafalda M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100216333745680241428/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTDs0TjE3ayR-vykmDoI9qXKeCNrye7-A8CrTOUps=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Amazing food, amazing service. Freshly made smoothies, really good burgers (and a lot of vegetarian options). And it’s impossible to choose the best desert. Always a go to.","time":1664730947,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Philippe Freyche","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108145603471654515002/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYF0AmM8IdvnduvrvVPSc2eqkNtbXKw-28bvkhH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"TLDR : Great place: good food for a low price, good quantity, great service.

In more details :

This place might not look fancy but it certainly has style.

You can eat for a perfectly respectable price and yet the quality/price ratio is really good.

We ordered a few pieces from the starters as well as a few mains.
A big highlight was definitely the "sweet salt and pepper prawns", perfectly cooked prawns finished in olive oil with spices. We liked it so much we almost took them once again at the end of our meal.

The main courses were well served and well done.

The service was really good, we seldom had to wait for our dishes and the lady who served us was really nice.

There were no customers by 19h00, when we arrived there, so there seems to be few clients at night.

Overall we had a great time and highly recommend the place","time":1672177399,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Merícia Camacho","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106291393848992399420/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S-WSfTcec-6YoSa4vz-YwaX6NE6paH-NZniyst=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"As a vegetarian girl, with a vegan boyfriend and with friends that eat everything is a excellent choice! Very tasty, quick and with a lot of choices!! Well done guys!","time":1675075278,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michelle Nüssli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105601998342978291062/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY6XX0k1r8y7Gc_6yfkgs0HfkfAPsXpCMc6Nfo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"worst tofu burgers that we ever had 🫠 but I guess the other food looked good, just not very much for vegans","time":1677178317,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Brid O Donnell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116096634651138385146/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SB82QZfP82S0fFfOZpmeh8I-oqTk7HoFPqiUdB9g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Beautiful clean and healthy restaurant,  good food cooked with love, we came here May 2022 from Ireland, lovely trendy family run restaurant near the beach","time":1653661927,"translated":false}]

column8: Praia dos Pescadores, Largo das Ribas 5-7, 2655-290 Ericeira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"ioana iacob","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104775730977967008503/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5St9hRZ1mAZOD3Ov_qcwcWqJUmFEe3wGQ5BZrMiXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Its actually very nice with the umbrellas on the beach. There is a pretty nice bar as well.","time":1677231643,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rajat Basavaraj","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106515351456265131073/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY9REnSufc1VD9IQXEIPl1w82CJXz8sHxK3nL8P=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Breath taking views of the sun, sand, sea and the shoreline. Lovely weather. Clean blue water and sand beach surrounded by cafes, bars and seafood restaurants. Great ambience and laid back atmosphere adds to the overall experience. Soak in the sun and enjoy the views sipping on some beer with friends is a good way to spend your day here! Neat and clean surroundings.😎👌","time":1520703188,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ted Eckman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110312244119305396297/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TPO3B4h20wh1p-nFOSZ-jsRhDfWq8KyiCDsp8Pwks=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba8","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"The day we were here it was sunny, but it was just before the start of the prime summer season, so there were not a lot of people.  The water was cold too, although it may warm up towards the middle to end of summer.  The beach is a small cove at the bottom of a steep walkway.  The sand was nice and I would imagine on a hot summer day with warmer water, this would be a nice place to visit.  The town where the beach is located is also nice to walk around.","time":1501977165,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Murray Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106312710134200104659/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SPKERLg5QNbDPAPtwqoLgAh-sDJLZLEP_qrVKZuA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Lovely beach right in the centre of the town - when you are on the beach, you are not aware of the fishermen’s boats nearby, so you can just enjoy being at the water.\n\nThe harbour protects the beach from the big waves that are typical here, allowing kids to be a bit safer near the water, and it is calm enough to do a bit of snorkelling too.","time":1560617633,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jair Cardoso","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103097654169852185044/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SN7pZDno6hubo-hEamniw-6jqm49j8AwaX0pZh=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Great place to visit, enjoy lunch, dinner or ice cream. Friendly people around there. Great tourist place to visit","time":1559760971,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Lorenzo Rossi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116000822592676073436/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tb_IYkIMc0BzvMC7u1F1H5Qeoc5_QpKYdg_Y3jHQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A great (and different) pizza experience in a peculiar venue in the hills near Ericeira. The pizza is delicious, with a light and easy to digest dough. The ingredients make the difference. We tried different pizza types and all of them were excellent. They have different types of beer, all of them very good, all of them coming from a nearby brewery.","time":1661679585,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tiffany Giese","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109856179460554334249/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RRc6eCbs5atImm7wQfPLUhHeR8VP6Q_LmFm2QLQeE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"We went on a night when they were not serving pizza. However, they were serving a wrap type sandwich and lasagnas. The wraps were delicious. We loved the setting. It was a great place to sit back and unwind. They serve Hopsin beer which is delicious.","time":1660158387,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Francisco Lopes Henriques","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112606983961906968482/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZZ7FwCWmqr94ElYrMM3kwocYuHd2cAxadNIu8U=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"The pizza was like an orgasm, my gf told me to stop moaning because at how good it was 💦 Best pizza, best spot, cool staff and we met some really cool and chilled people.\n10/10 would do it again. Pesto heaven is the best one!","time":1661288298,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nikki","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112451790725962614663/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QHX9KYOJ8frXS1unXEdbphwANzO3-EG2noHIBXYyI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This place is sooooo cute!!! It's set up on this little hill with an amazing view. You get to hand cut the pizza with scissors. The drinks are strong and delicious. They cook out of a modified truck and a real Woodfire oven. Highly recommend if you are in ericiera","time":1657843210,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ash Winter","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115156536256697778747/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ry4CksDrEG63HtHNxH9AawgaUatfLwF9pLGJyAPHk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"A cute little spot away from the crazy roads. Everyone was really nice and pizza was amazing, just what I needed. Had the white pizza with gorgonzola, walnuts and pear - a great pairing!","time":1652464732,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Christina","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113535423291179766284/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZYW_7IK4-SVMvm_wttdM0Sbjr3sSYvbDiZw1iX=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Cute taberna run by a lovely Spanish couple. Their hospitality was heartwarming and the food was delicious. Small menu with fine food. Can highly recommend.","time":1653857137,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Laura Headley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107261860650536644809/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbhpDl59D0HLt2tTs8dz-zlbrvV8qtBwaiZht7S=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Taberna La Popular is the place to go in Ericeira for octopus “a la gallega” and other Spanish tapas.

A cozy restaurant in this sea village, tucked in a typical jagoza tavern just off the main drag. Varied menu, well balanced flavours, affordable pricing and fun front of house staff who make it feel like home. The perfect place for friends to meet and chat over food.

Go for the octopus, fried potatoes with black garlic and pray the kitchen has almond cake from Santiago de Compostela. It’s spectacular. The local wine are very delicious too! Obrigada :-)","time":1661284553,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kang Zi Jing","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107991870406422666023/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QodElLQajc9v6HCwBn8vlQL7ShpMQCNRveMXfr=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"The name of the restaurant is real. It is really very popular. Luckily I came with locals whom have made a reservation, otherwise I think we would have needed to wait an hour for dinner.

I recommend the patatas negras (?) and croquettas. It’s a tapas place by a lady who migrated from Spain (might be zaragoza? Cannot remember).

Anyways the food was really, really good. One of my most memorable meals in Portugal, and in fact, I was 2 weeks in Spain before coming here — and the food here was even better than some I have had there!","time":1677772895,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andrew Armour","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110981597077504712918/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QQrGZqIc0KumGjMc7a54K8c7PeoA45tepuxZlwRg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Awesome little bar. Lovely people, great customers, nice wine and port. Happily spend every night there!","time":1672356249,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luna Diaz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109383563425714737936/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYpjST_AK2PCjl7cIR5e4iiv4HEsV43Gi12S0ca=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Beautifully decorated and super cosy. All the details make this small restaurant really special. A small and delicious menu. Impeccable service. I look forward to going back. Gracias!","time":1679734620,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de Santo António 18A, 2655-360 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Itay Kahan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103224487390933083506/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RNwz7qkj-RfR03BHPH7Qc2nd61JjblykGAY8Mi4pM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"We had 3 lessons and a perfect experience. Eduardo- the best coach for sure, let us feel comfortable and happy even it was cold and rainy. He is a super professional, does everything for the students.
highly recommended to ask for him to be your coach!
Also the stuff of the Soul guesthouse was so kind and friendly, just wanted to help as much as they can.
Thank you!!","time":1661985772,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Felix D.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117787622200493311584/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZVtQXK5DgdCgaFhk0SZrof65Sd4vpz6ZWJT5qx=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"Great surf school that made our first surfing experience really unique. Joao was our surf coach and we were very happy to have the lessons with him - he did an awesome job and we had fun from the first lesson onwards. Highly recommended for everyone that likes to go surfing in Ericiera!","time":1605174494,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sebastian","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105847231873048290366/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaSTwFR_NLzW-1C9vMon2WfUHCrbYQVx920R3Zb=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"GREAT surf school and nice shop! I took some surf lessons there in October. They have small classes (4-6 people), so they can really focus on you. When I was there, Luiz was our coach. He was fantastic! He gave me a lot of valuable advice how to improve my technique. I doubt you get that kind of individual feedback, if you choose one of the bigger schools in town. (Their classes are much bigger!)

You can rent boards and wetsuits in the shop, too. The staff is very friendly and will give you great advice where to go, what time, how to find good surf and so on. If you're looking for a more personal experience, you should definitely check out this school!!","time":1570688006,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Florian Reinefeld","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111571493837969136881/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYqeTBEwB5YMat4M6m7wj3_u0E2v0EIsgcoBtN7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Perfect surf school! We can definitely recommend to take your lessons here. Well organized and always with a small group, meaning you can really improve fast thanks to the great teachers!","time":1632389243,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andrea W.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115064723255336635891/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZqPe6jmnC7VtmhLhPYtSoDVtrs1hBSnstLcTjN=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I originally wanted to take surf classes with SurfRiders, but am so glad that I booked with Waterbound! Joaõ is a super nice guy and the group size was definitely smaller. Sometimes, he has an additional coach join (Eduardo), so that the teacher/student ration stays around 1:3/4 🏄‍♀️ Recommended!","time":1630137672,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Sarah Böing","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100941445704364029028/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaV5jaNBimvNWI4JM84NJ3t2d-BQGC9XqAiQdsnsw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"This is the perfect choice for both surf lessons and rentals in Ericeira!
We joined for beginner and intermediate sessions and definitely learned a lot. The surf coaches are highly motivated and give feedback on almost every wave, whilst always creating a chilled and positive vibe in and out of the water. The equipment is also in really good condition and the organization of the rental was flawless.
100% recommended, we'll be back :)","time":1650368094,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Angela Mooney","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104555743503016701708/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RHC9W3-jNZ95A6Hf-D421NWPmJolAtzSDsZu2g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Outstanding surf lessons

After a number of instructors and surf lessons in different places, I was recommended Ericeira Surf Camp by a friend. The instruction is outstanding. I had a number of blocks that were stopping me from progressing further. Nuno and his team helped me to overcome these obstacles and as a result I’ll be returning for more lessons and recommending to others.  The surf camp hostel is friendly, homely and Isabelle, the manager, goes the extra mile to help with anything you need during your stay. The most enjoyable surf experience to date.","time":1652975489,"translated":false},{"author_name":"B Rybicki","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112670398761211484615/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwssGSmV05UfJo0r9AXIc_RHDfxiXZ2b5yzSvLWg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"The surf school is super great. The whole crew is very friendly and attentive. We booked the 5-day package, which I can highly recommend. The surfboards and wetsuits are inclusive and also in a good condition. Our surf instructors were Catarina and Luis. Both are totally empowering and respond individually to their students.","time":1655985642,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tricia Ismail","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105773553599145797442/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T4Hgx2WXmJP5-82xZuIJZxzm_WPcbAFIRYSsjUww=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"The best decision you could make for your surfing is to take a class at the West Coast Surf School. Our coach João was amazingly supportive, constructive, and constantly empowering us on the waves. His coaching improved every aspect of our surfing and because of him we are more confident and capable in the ocean—and of course, having way more fun. The entire surf school was incredibly welcoming and friendly, giving us advice on the different surf spots in the area and even helped us with board repairs and wet suit recommendations. 12/10 would recommend.","time":1649671542,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tanja S","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110445523479334453876/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ9CINECf3oj-t4L5EAviwtXTqvkuembUEgv_Ys=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"I can really agree to all the good reviews below. We had our first surf lesson ever last week and it was perfect! The Instructors told us exactly what to do and gave a lot of improvement hints during the lesson. We learned a lot and had even more fun!","time":1650972461,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Milena Galindo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112165777706077782965/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S9mI-lJ9B5bSfet0ygOqdLJ1hxImyko4p5EoiKpw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Beautiful landscape, sea and cliffs. Very famous surf spot, but there are also some trekking options on the cliffs. There is a big parking space, a restaurant/bar, bathrooms, showers and space for skate and other sports. Nice for enjoying the day at the beach","time":1659045888,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Danielle Dannenberg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110883782388551741446/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RHKsscy01MrAJG4ibiPrSinvxNEl-Rpmv9WcwKUQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Fantastic beach. Gorgeous. Great trail to see the surfers from above. You can walk all 4km to the end of the world surf reserve over the cliffs (dirt trail).","time":1656501969,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Érika Aparecida da Silva","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101506138595638240034/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RBVQF-iUxyqPqjJP8B1r3_UJKzWar69pvM4Y81Og=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I love this place! Here is the World Surfing Reserve. This place have a so special energy. Beautiful and happy people live and visit this city every day. Every day is a good time for visit Ericeira ❤️ In my concern, Ericeira is one of the best places in the world!!!","time":1634508927,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joey Keasberry","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100782043253894448354/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QV6shPKRNw_TzE5ziiyh1byHYqd9B0o2-6Xp0Mow=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Absolutely splendid beach. Great for young families, because during low tide a little lake is a reminder of the preceding high tide. The waves are great. Lots of space on the beach. Dogs allowed.","time":1661636269,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Szymon Skowronek","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105652755667419960826/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaCnDbJa4iWbQktIzT1TewVm1WD_YDT-c8HWMp2=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"Racist and nationalism at it's finest. Sad to see those \"surf instructors\" throwing meat at everybody. This place exists just because of tourist's money. After you come and pay, you're not welcomed. Just like disposable garbage. Please stop supporting this awful behaviour.","time":1678655507,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Flo Rochlitz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113009943443659199721/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYZROhli7CTABRTid4td-xWM9TTF5-kntVlMDOa=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Huge Beach, nice view from the clips or the little valley of Lizandro river that gets into the ocean there.
Good infrastructure regarding space for car parking, surf school and stuff, drinks and foods.

My Oppinion: the most beautiful place in Ericeira because it is not that busy as the other beaches are","time":1663706327,"translated":false},{"author_name":"shubhra bhatt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101457713928486431427/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R01xq7xCJtTDa0Vv7PuV-_xaRjRXq-Ae1_svQueg8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"I think it’s kind of silly to review a public beach. I just want to put up the information to let anyone interested to visit this place that most of the Bars and restaurants around here are closed on the Tuesdays and Wednesdays. So one can still come here and enjoy the beach. But one has to come prepared. Else, the sea and the beach gets 5 stars. Be aware the water can be cold but none the less refreshing. 3 stars are for the infrastructure or the services around it.","time":1652795942,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Björn Alenvik","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113915813019945629299/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TiYpvJBOAhTbKFdCjvYXLU4eEr4C4BVsxUBS1YJQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Clean public beach with amenities and surf shops.

In case you are looking to surf, this is an great beach, especially if you are an beginner.

Parking spots available.

The restaurants are overall good.","time":1660491356,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Niva Grunzwieg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103203941020916249319/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TrJtpT-ITkYgESI37OtSlfjM49yJifwPCzgaQHwuM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very nice beach and the Laguna/river near by makes it a very nice experience for kids.
The restaurants near the beach was nice and good.","time":1660502164,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Glenn Ross","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109960999439865284043/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SGYz8Fh1RyxmRmv9MevM2EJogX-LMM5kEKjYEIVw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very surprised with the lack of resources available to the lifeguards at this beach.  I witnessed 2 kite boarders get into trouble today and had to alert the lifeguards as they didnt even see it unfold.  2 people jumped and swam after them then all of a sudden all 4 go missing around the headland.
