There were strong currents and signs saying dont enter the water but that didnt stop them.  This beach needs 1-2 jetskis and 1-2 rubber duckies (inflatable boats) to safely patrol that beach.  Instead they have thise stupid red plastic cans from Baywatch and a couple of paddle boards, none of which were used.

I didnt hang around to see what eventuated but by my count 4 people were missing.  Hope they are ok. And, i hope someone looks at the resources available to the lifeguards at that beach.","time":1661014545,"translated":false}]

column8: Praia do Matadouro, N247, 2655-467 Ericeira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"MARCUS WHITEHEAD","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115602520112425100724/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SWpoZ8eNGtGFjhzPIZpH-1oBMVZdKgFjzQAd4S3Aw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Stunning beach with great boardwalk or walk along the beach","time":1675248502,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mariana Bianchi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110058365556944174452/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TXCHRxTYCm7GWw5Dt5XVqQx_t2dWmjQl_oxMfA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Great place to learn surf but on high season can be quite crowded, not recomendable to go just to lay down on the beach as it's full of surf schools","time":1502406470,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Johannes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112631349824188644154/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T6rMamAU2d8edb_bG2HpP4ICyk9hfZMZLV42j4IYQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Beach with lots of dangerous stones. Don’t go surfing here in bad conditions unless you’re an expert!","time":1663239477,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Konstantin KO Ostrovskiy (KO)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109135780499021438748/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb6yuyZl0MZD4axp0IyWF_QoU0qRMNqAprDqJd6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"Nice beach, parking near by surfing spot.\nUse some rubber shoes, bottom is rocky.","time":1528383430,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hana Janoušková","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107960115065094808971/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaGX2i88dtrx5w2swKmBmTTh1qVvVQSXWSts-az=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Beautyfull natural beach, we'll like look back at funny surf lessons!","time":1563729764,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Mendes Leal n.22, 2655-319 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Carlos Peralta","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106497181603320399615/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qzza2zoiOl_XzjX9syJYRc8hfNmgrxnEiMwkDcKiw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Great pizza, I’d definitely come back . Busy place, book it if possible. Diavola is great, top notch. Well priced. Lemonade is not lemonade, it’s more of a lime infused water… a bit of a joke but it was only 2 euros, but hey - cold beer goes well with pizza anyway.","time":1660846676,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexander Fontana","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109537911466067255952/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYBoS8azvdIf6UnUf2XgqMKtxFvDjcDwcym08JD=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Loved the food here so much we went there twice during our 4 night stay in Ericeira. We also enjoyed some san gria with our meal.

The quality, quantity and pricing was great.

I would highly recommend Pepe Verde to anyone visiting Ericeira.","time":1658735410,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Laurence Verheijen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102776630763473584104/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QIJeyyMiObENdxfS1g5pOnzF5VhsKafQDR7s589Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"It can be very busy, but it's worth the wait. The pizza is delicious! Starters are very good as well. Friendly staff.","time":1668348594,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Shani","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108295727028312709505/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY1RSop--Ajn_7zTCHLalWgk7jZgaBjql38JzBb=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Really good gluten free pizza!
I recommend to book in advance. it gets pretty busy and the waiting can be long","time":1662720150,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Carlos Valera","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101422046544814907919/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SzPHrD1d_hEHgSSsD10z3PZiscwLSFz3Q-mzLmE3I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Best pizza place in Ericeira!!! I am not exaggerating, this people know their pizza, I ordered the Diavola (spicy) good amount of sauce and topping great taste, a drink with and the mushroom's carpaccio for entree.

They have several types of pizzas and a good combinations, a place to repeat for sure","time":1661274971,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Beatriz Speich","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106302035995995290402/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TJB8NHww4z6Dc5nbBnaPc-hL0kude-tE1JwQ7Ypw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"My favorite açaí place in ericeira!  I was there for 2 weeks and went almost every day. The quality of açaí is amazing, and the staff is super friendly!","time":1656194353,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Claire Houston","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115771641686955459213/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbUzeyjCaBZOgG0VtFGY6V00J-_c1B4bY62BPKd=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I definitely ate my weight in Acai bowls from Purple Ice in the last week and I have absolutely no regrets about it at all. This is the best spot in town - runny peanut butter, crunchy granola and super friendly service. Really cool vibes.","time":1634212218,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ricardo Pina","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100130285344388922240/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDlUCaxeR6TEWS_vtq1F_K93EewRW4X45bcoAyew=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Could be 5 if the owner was a nice guy! Acai is amazing the owner is the opposite","time":1664641916,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Thomas Carr","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104420317414577238260/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T402_AI0611ZfemRNrgeJzB29fOQg1H4JVbe26=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"First rate açai bowls - the best in Ericeria","time":1663167412,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rob Walker","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110778038818982502036/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QdNUr6rIlX7gAthRDETe03HGd1eY4dCxcCHMG6ow=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Probably the best açaí I've ever had. And that includes the hundreds I've had in Brazil.","time":1659444519,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Carla Paszkowski","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110487281093624767886/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbc7Z3W3SLe4E9KC1oL9YND2sBBeE6EgTSDAWA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"High quality food and excellent coffee. It’s so nice to find a hipster cafe serving healthy food with plenty of vegan options. Highly recommend!","time":1653381784,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Roland Trimmel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115363041849670300228/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RM4pRY0XGV5GrAHf9MoXKSoOdIiSmfkGzlqipYnw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Excellent. And that’s not understating it — they really make amazing food, all they serve is well balanced and creates some delicious flavours. I haven’t had tapioca in a long while, but the combination with salmon, sautéed spinach and poached eggs was a real delight. The omelette was pretty much along the same trail — you’d never think it’s vegan food that is served to you, it’s that good. The turmeric latte was fresh boiled, beautifully reach in the flavours they added to the milk and nicely hot. Service was great, and sitting outside in the sun just made my day.","time":1668338597,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vu Tran","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110797752683053031401/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S-vT5be2C7cQJhIq2JejhvksjuVH3P3WT2nzu2tQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"The food is delicious and service is good.  Cute breakfast place with a fun vibe.  You will see mostly foreigners eating here.  Best to make reservations as it gets very busy.","time":1674167638,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107844784410947142723/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RHWsuwTq3kCmlpbh9QDoG_FKX28D_QeeD23SAbkak=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Best food in Ericeria 🙏 we went almost every day of our week long holiday and were never disappointed. Endless incredible vegan options and all delicious 🤤 The vegan platter was so good that we want to travel back just for it! And the staff were so sweet ❤️","time":1656873535,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nikki","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112451790725962614663/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QHX9KYOJ8frXS1unXEdbphwANzO3-EG2noHIBXYyI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Food is excellent here. Lots of healthy options and vegan options as well. Thier iced latte is big!! Friendly service. Good prices","time":1657885775,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua da Capelinha, Rooftop Mercado Municipal, Av. dos Descobrimentos 1, 8600-734 Lagos, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Nick Mortimer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109061854449151903361/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY4AT5KW3s2mMTDB40pubAJqxw-Qrtryazv3G95=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"This place is a must if you're visiting Lagos. It sits above a large indoor market that sells freshly caught seafood and freshly butchered meat. There's also a wide variety of other foods too.

The restaurant itself has the best view in town. You overlook the main road, the river, the marina, and the ocean. Perfect for a coffee and a spot of lunch. The food is brilliant, everything is prepared so fresh. The staff are very friendly and efficient. I came back the next day, I wish I could start every day with a coffee and that view.","time":1647782137,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yauh Ask","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100082924025372926003/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbE6lIReOZdkKEZgbAmeoJX8e1x1outiVd5w_Yj=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"1 point for view, 1 point for hot water. We had a long discussion with the waiter on why tap water serving isn’t possible which ended up into them saying “I have rules I have to obey”. Then they brought the food which was worst taste ever, in fact I had to ask for a hot water to add to the soup to make it bearable to eat which still wasn’t bearable. Hamburger is just… well any bistro-snack in Brussels will make it faster, more tasteful and cheaper. Not recommended.","time":1677847257,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sarah Moore","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114035009256333598799/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RaNTc1eAkD0-UA4PdPuqK3YIWXkmB8inesi63kgQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"This rooftop bar was a great surprise! You'd never notice it from the street without the staff promoting it down there.. The views are amazing, lovely atmosphere, gorgeous cocktails and friendly staff! ❤️❤️ We didn't eat there, but noticed other people's plates looked gorgeous, and massive portions!","time":1634292428,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Simon Jackson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110288478308787558538/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYHU96I1wR9g3nn3JugApGiDK4TgDzqz-bh6TOH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Great restaurant on a terrace above the local markets, allowing for a cool breeze away from the heat of the street.

Our table of six was served promptly, and the food was amazing! Beautifully presented and very tasty. I had the grilled goats cheese with two purées/jams (fig and pumpkin) which complimented the cheese perfectly, along with a small salad and garlic-buttered toast.

Definitely worth a visit if you're in the area.","time":1657202961,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ewa M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100644257969099632592/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TgEZHuDWPoYED_TN_KYep6p7n5ADKLupq_M2lO=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Nice stuff, beautiful view and fresh, tasty food. We highly reccommend the offer with an open bar (you buy once and eat as much as you want). Also, amount of wine in a glass and drinks are twice as big as anywhere else.","time":1663666386,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Natalie C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117362340659627982949/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYdnzpj-iSnM8uznfsLR6cvYkTqj6pX42ULCKxz=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"We loved our stay at Sandhi house! The place is super calm, great location with an amazing view from the rooftop terrace, where we spend a lot of time reading.\nThe rooms are nice and clean, the staff super welcoming. We really enjoyed the yoga classes as well, especially with Francesca. And lastly: the breakfast is very diverse and delicious! 10/10, would recommend!","time":1657292026,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sinéad Cochrane","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105588723514423541170/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qk_uROjM4bbwXypkrbGEAKpbf9QlTgAVCYJvhOFg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"This is a review for the yoga and massage.\nEverytime I visit the town I come to Sandhi House for both yoga classes and massage. Both are consistently good. I have been doing Yoga for many years, and adore this place. The atmosphere is so relaxed and the staff so friendly, and helpful.","time":1663928994,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Serenity Life Coaching & Akademie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117020800556855132232/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SaMW0u-nycYS6dA4H9sgFhuo3ZOGOO80mpEU0GSA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I booked a massage and yoga classes at Sandhi house and am happy, that I found this amazing place. All the people are very accommodating, kind and professional. I can highly recommend the Massage with Kairit and am looking forward for my next appointments. Thank you for your services!","time":1665422808,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Zsombor Markus","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116491308282878430976/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SDRduu3DENu-GvQWpjZlw8N3uVGGRdOvb5Iqd1rQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"I've been to Sandhi House for massage therapy and physiotherapy sessions. The place is very calming and beautiful with views to the ocean. The staff is very friendly. It's like the main self-care center of Ericeira.","time":1676972566,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eugena C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104024508063669428789/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Se9S65K1u61xTS6KEOMUX629l6lFYfdjfhINhSbnc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"I had one of the best massages with Kairit Kobin in Sandhi house, she’s absolutely amazing, super nice, professional, and knows exactly how to tackle the pain areas while makes you feel extremely relaxed. Thanks Kairit! :)","time":1668444890,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Max W","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105478920770912364408/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxafaM2byk8g2_k3-Qzecx5tQjFjUwXDU2jEoGOd=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Very good service and best prices for rental in town. Tried to find my size and went there couple of times. The owner is giving nice recommendations and simply has a good vibe. Good for rental, new or used boards.
I can highly recommend this place!","time":1677958883,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Janette B","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106655648558778274814/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TzuRrpuSGyQwV-DGKj_J0MMOmsHLbsGkM664fF374=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Absolutely amazing customer service. 🙏 I rented a board for a day and I definitely feel like I got more than what I paid for. I had some timing issues and they were super flexible since I talked about everything before hand. Also good tips on which beaches to head to. Great location next to the Beach Bus stop. And also, great prices. 10/10. ⭐","time":1659035639,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chris Harper","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102751627164354779593/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxai_LplMQxuMubEyaJ1BmJI2RKDUR0ZdmthET0c=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Best surf rental shop in town! They let me change out boards whenever I wanted. Likely the best rates in town and included a surfboard board rack in the rental. Would rent from here next time I’m in town!","time":1665736047,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alberto Nicoli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110098162736726248379/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T7hU4YdPdduAEbzqbnJvVA76sdy7_Yd4PpzKZjXg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"I really enjoyed the place and the vibe! Alex is great, he knows a lot about surfing and Portugal (even though he's a smiling buy from Bahia, Brasil). You'll find in the shop new and second hand items or you can rent something for just a few hours of fun! don't miss it!!","time":1673079310,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Leon Cappel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108163269923876353384/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SYnIhk_Fn0gDv1cFDxmzbGItACwxTSIcGXVjDvGw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Rental experience was great :) Unlike a surf shop in the city center, they fix you up with a roof-rack for free, can tell you what the conditions are and what boards to pick, and can explain it quickly and clearly 🙌 For about half the price.

Don't know if they have the best boards to rent, but value for money is fantastic. Thanks for the great advice and smooth service!","time":1654525385,"translated":false}]

column8: Escadinhas J. Ramos Baeta 14, 2705-101 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Phoenix Angelfire","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117134007976872066682/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYiKaD_kJrvGL746Qhw1_ihNoXtNe10P_faiiMovQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Absolutely breathtaking and spectacular views. This should definitely figure on your bucket list. We did not have time to linger and the weather was iffy unfortunately. Be careful if using a supplied GPS, ours tried to guide us up a mountain goat trail while visiting the fishing port below! Stick to the main roads, use Google maps, and a paper map is quite a useful supplement as well.","time":1652187070,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ana Antanaityte","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112065754545775224718/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SOfMsTgF8L0mEhas2GymYjDh3rGVLiZ17SZBkAqQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"5 stars because of the view. For sunbathing and swimming we chose another place as there were too many people and not long beach.

There is also like a natural pool if you want to swim without waves it could be a solution.

There are toilets in the cafe and restaurant.","time":1660323648,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Angus Nelson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117970297301927779054/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RiVA-QN3-Q9TqOFumidGTv4vTGmXcuPnHmcYXE5Ds=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"This is a magical place. We visited to watch the sun go down and it was spectacular. The tide was high, waves crashing up on the rocks with theatrical splashes. And as the night approached, as the tide went out, calm beauty greeted our cocktails and relaxed vibe.

The drinks are alright - caparhinas were syrupy, gin and tonics were great. Food is limited, but serviceable (toasted sandwiches and wraps). Up above is a far nicer seafood restaurant for the good stuff.

Once the sun went down, a DJ and djembe player set a party backdrop for people dancing and chatting the night away.","time":1662883712,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Diwas Karki","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112871371672489384139/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RK50TFusLXmnO2AeXBKXNi77rclncfcy9x18DOVN0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Such an amazing place near lisboa to hang out with friends or go on date.
Highly recommended.
I am fan of this place.
Only 1 hour drive from Lisboa","time":1664466341,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sandis Ve","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117122111573457407342/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxatH1vhMadsFCSTJfAu7E_w-vu3gSapxyY7xOCq=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"After visiting Cabo da Roca, we stopped here for a quick walk and it was just magical. It helped that it was the golden hour, which offered excellent views of the sea, the village on top of the cliff and the sea water pool below. Easy to reach and there are good steps and trails to get to both sides of the opening. Highly recommend for a peaceful walk!","time":1655802487,"translated":false}]

column8: Largo São Sebastião 36 A, 2655-319 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Murray Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106312710134200104659/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SPKERLg5QNbDPAPtwqoLgAh-sDJLZLEP_qrVKZuA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Our boys were looking forward to dropping in on this place, and it didn’t disappoint-incredible variety of options for whole family, from wonderful food to skate and surf experience and even beers on tap, brilliant.

Location is easy to find, and Ericeira is definitely a hidden gem, the surfers seem to know about it though!

Prices very reasonable too, thank you.","time":1560073047,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maxime FRYSOU","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100373083362418343173/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QsFrh21OIOk_AwzSguX2LeDEpjcBJKRaNYDoVLVg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"The best Quicksilver shop I have ever see : boards are flying all around the place, you can watch surf movies at the bar and there's a skate park with a terrace ...","time":1530685336,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yary Lopez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111654706093252616101/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sr8wIKAiXmSiTvY8RcrEmMWB8k2fc4Vwo9mtxGkQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"My son had the best time. We rented skateboards for 5€ an hour. They have a cafe inside.","time":1541314459,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Clare Shepherd","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117004926713584705302/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxatDOaEpe2ljSTYTlLSBTIR_gCywBkMt0QUAPGY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Really fun place to go get a coffee and watch some very talented people skate. Limited indoor seating when the heavens open and there's a downpour.","time":1666543691,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andreas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108735451569307037160/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tp9l1i9fbLCGSC4kmZ4-WTN00YD9MM14ufzhl7dBI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"One of the best things i have discovered in Portugal!
Great showroom with lots of brands/boards etc.
The cafe inside is really nice and cheap but the BEST THING is the Skatbowl outside!
You could watch the locals skating and it‘s soooo nice!
Stayed here at least for half a day with my macbook and wifi on the terrace👍🏻
So if you near come and have a look and if you are not near you should take your time and drive there😅
Highly recommend would give 6stars","time":1569522692,"translated":false}]

column3: Tall cliffs shelter this stretch of sand known for its strong Atlantic swell & sunset views.
column8: Praia de São Julião, Estr. de São Julião 257, 2705 São João das Lampas, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"G Roberts","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101249137387024726052/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QQRjmunJ03Mb779iIXmNw16r_Q6Bjxz5BvtiDDZw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Great Praia area for typical beach time and quality waves (on this day, a little over head high with both side breaks).   There were some quality surfers present at the second breaks as the lower skilled learners should stay closer to the shore breaks.  Also, it was low tide during our visit and the beach was free of rocks and fairly level for very good skim boarding, especially where the river empties to the sea.

There is hiking either the lower side to the north (Search - Estacionamento Capela de São Julião) or you can park in the unpaved lot on the south side against the mountain. The best hike on the south side is from the middle of the parking lot there is a fairly slow increase in path elevation to the top, nothing too steep. The top then levels out and you can hike for a while south, with amazing views in both directions along the coast from an almost airplane height.

There are also a restaurant on the northern side for those interested.","time":1667369862,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Timothy King","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111381450809947186802/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QXdcAtfR8q1m7g1fG4dAVOBFK9Z9-A6wF6OG3dBig=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Glorious spot and not crowded. Beach cafe and sweets on the cliff too. Sandy shore excellent for paddling or playing in the surf.","time":1671272934,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Haner havshush","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103474309015259802476/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TSaC4O4qonPb1nPTqwdr0QCPTq1Ecs07sxFeeAag=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"if you’re looking for a place to enter the water and with easy access via vehicle I wouldn’t recommend going there

this one is better for 4 x 4
there is no place to throw away garbage so make sure to bring garbage bags with you

there is a nice trail along the cliff

no toilet nearby sadly a lot of people leave toilet paper all around the parking lot","time":1663689614,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maria A.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110450451959362429155/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZL5Fe5JBbHEhUsGXa21o15gVKpx2ceOjOYQ7a7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"A beautiful small beach located between Sintra and Ericeira is very popular with surfers. There is a small coffee shop next to the parking lot.","time":1592063940,"translated":false},{"author_name":"CAPATINA ROXANA","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106662791154264437392/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5ScGcS98_pZBKehjMp99NXwEgbD6Owp0ISyP0VIc4o=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Just has a special beauty.","time":1663174288,"translated":false}]

column8: Av. São Sebastião nº 36 A, 2655-319 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Marie Earnshaw","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103348269111118429210/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sfa7846aThu_eFMvfZ2Qi4qe_icYn0eu8yqgir=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Delicious, fresh ingredients and a variety of options : good food for the soul, lovely staff too!","time":1662833303,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexander Balasky","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104240869129436476586/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tx33qDk5o_8IeXaDG992g6aSqHb7DVou2Q9iAg0qA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Super beautiful location with an amazing ocean view patio. Food is delicious and looks great but expect to pay American prices - pretty expensive compared to other Portuguese spots!!!","time":1659360079,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Murray Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106312710134200104659/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SPKERLg5QNbDPAPtwqoLgAh-sDJLZLEP_qrVKZuA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Delightful little food and drinks place overlooking the skatepark- you can purchase drinks and fresh food which is really different and appetising.

The bowls come in three sizes, and the tastes are incredible, from smoked salmon to tangy seaweed with lovely bases of rice, highly recommended.

Great for parents sitting watching kids on the skatepark!","time":1560691253,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Deb Luckyone","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109833528281629550895/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QvxppYZbVFs1RZRnzVw1cwdXVDyrL6K5o-UlFJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Just amazing! The poke bowls are really tasty and the staff is super cool! Definitely would recommend it.","time":1571244421,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elbaz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101116805222068129259/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RvLfui30V_m6nqFIENlYDMUgbZnc5ZBkCcjH91pw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Really friendly stuff and delicious poke bowls really nice place with a beautiful view the best place to have a break and watch skateboard around :)","time":1629639462,"translated":false}]

column8: Bar 6 Foz do Lizandro, R. do Passadiço, 2655-130 Mafra, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Walter Basile","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107020118964635383785/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SWIZ1wImdPpqUF3XbwpI1_scDKG3tEEagsE9nLHA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Nice dinner. Ingredients in Portugal are mostly local and they make good use of this. The meals were simple and yet delicious. We liked everything: Tuna steak, Angus steak, Veal burger and Octopus. The wine selection was fairly good. The premises  were particular and rustic. Staff was friendly, everything went smoothly. The view must be nice in the daytime. Definitely recommended 👌","time":1661355323,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tainá Guedes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110934998737919156751/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qcle54YCJdaLi225VFXE-BX3P5WipaphrQuZWCqPk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We have been there with our family, and everyone found something to drink and eat. That’s to say that the menu is very diverse. From nutritious smoothies to beer. From french fries to healthy vegetarian bowl. It is not the cheapest place (if you compare to other places in Portugal) but it is worth the beach, the view, the atmosphere, and of course the food/ drinks.","time":1637869538,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hannah K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106795537035117167452/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZy7jHANLXElqI23b-_U6CsMkxZUM3MHV_lLrpP=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I stumbled across this place with my friend when we were sheltering from the rain! It has lovely views of the beach, the staff are friendly and the food and smoothies were delicious! It's a little pricier than other restaurants in ericeira but the food is also a little more \"fancy.\" This is our bread basket - different types of bread with truffle butter, olive tapenade and flavoured hummus!","time":1648990095,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yevheniia Vishnevskaia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105899819890941508792/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RtAEUcTEPHsfoV2bCeuE3-POaFszWnaPqvw9t7JKI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Nice place, good music.\nBut price is little bit high.\nWe was there just to drink)","time":1664961575,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gabriele Angeletti","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104489558179586531391/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QvOLZ6GFUjzEgJ_Wm9wQEMrtK2N1TWDkhiCogA2E8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Went here to take two drinks. Waited around 30 min just for them to take the order. After another half an hour of waiting, we just left. The place is beautiful, and the food looks good. Just make sure you have enough time to wait.","time":1675611296,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Helen Aasa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115090866468980309508/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QSBcbrUTudmk4uztQCaYTaff8eJCMYEfTnG9K0wjo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Best bakery and coffee in ericeira. Period. The coffe tastes like actual coffe, and the crossoints and natas are delishious, cruncy and soft. So glad i was led to this place!","time":1668253747,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tawnee Waldron","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111684431243469619387/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYQa7I0lHm9K87OAcMZKgWJonUKj-jMxlsXCoAL=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"Fantastic espresso and pastries/baked goods and the service is so good. Everyone is very nice and helpful. Our favorite in Ericeira.","time":1678725870,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Fabrizio Harper","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104756364787883247523/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SCUNe7ijX2HOXY7TE-75LY6rFmS2szfzupZlWc10k=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"This is one if the best cafés in Ericeira. The baked goods are off the charts good. Not only will you be tasting the freshest bread/pastries in town, but you'll pay what is absolutely normal prices for such good quality.\nI highly recommend this as a great place to get your morning coffee and pastry. Enjoy!","time":1676483510,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sarah Kerr","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101925156214738678989/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T72nfU3nZ3RVZ8E9loIzW3SdLtCseJToZj7DMRfw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Good price (cash only). I often purchase bread and croissants to go, which are very good. The pastis de nata are delicious too. It gets crowded with people standing in the doorway and around the counter, but it comes and goes in waves. Could be organized a bit better to allow the flow of people.","time":1666039181,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katharina Draxler","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104831488134610112645/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbqcH-0DyrGpSByAwPhDuVXSmv7coqI9H1UK4rK=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Best pasteis de nata of my life! The croissants are also extraordinary (never ate something like this outside of France).\nSuper sweet service :)","time":1664212087,"translated":false}]

column8: Estrada Nacional 247 - Praia de Ribeira D'Ilhas, Ericeira, 2640-051 Santo Isidoro MFR, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Zarina","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103696902495547969115/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QlW6suvM4Qx16HJeHSkyZI9OS-Q9x1D4BGNyPqOg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Inside and outside dining available. Great scenic view of boardwalk,  coastline. Beach. Etc.  Came here 2x.   Once in the day time for nice red sangria and loved it so much , that I came here again for the sangria during end of sunset for a great quality time.  The red sangria is amazing. During the day lts very busy and service is slow and uncoordinated.  During the evening the service was great. The ambience & atmosphere is great.  Overall definitely recommend.","time":1656251466,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexander","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111318787507202551870/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZMkskRK-JZN_cdVo4YPyxfWFNAZdKZDf-_3FNX=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"A truly unique place worth visiting both in summer and winter.  Located on the beach, in a modern new complex with the expectation of surfers.  An excellent and extensive menu, and the food is delicious.  I have been here many times and have chosen different things: pastas, salads, steaks, burgers.  Everything is at a high level.  The staff is a little relaxed, but this is Portugal, and the place is conducive to a long lunch or dinner.  All in all, it is a combination of a unique place, great views, delicious food, to relax and contemplate the moment.","time":1673866823,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexandru Istrate","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104319782745993903879/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QSXPxJ7dfOPGr0ceIYM1DkRUjccMYaM13eZ3_yFg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Great beach bar, with good variety of tasty food options.
It has typically a dj playing live music in the afternoon and that’s when it gets busy as everybody wants to enjoy a drink at sunset.
Plenty of parking nearby
Friendly staff and decent service","time":1661375482,"translated":false},{"author_name":"John Carmichael","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103400877634560542057/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SwNYGMGDzjMAGA2Hrwurr2Usqregn_oCjTKH-b1g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The staff are a bit off.. but the food is so incredibly bad. We read the reviews before we went but thought we would give it a try as the location is cool.. but my god the food is so incredibly bad.. the burger was very very low quality processed meat and had clearly been microwaved but it was still cold. We ordered the chicken burger, but it was more like cat food compressed into a burger like shape on non-fresh bread.. it was so bad we could only eat the over greasy chips and washed it down with beer from a cracked glass 😂 so bad! Believe the other bad reviews this place is terrible... Check the photos.. I don't know what that actually was but it wasn't a chicken burger!! 😂😂🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮

Oh.. and when we explained, we were not offered anything 😂 in town this restaurant works not survive!","time":1634754940,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Рома R Victuk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116254516826753371547/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ32nnUQLhgbk4HEmCajySMqZFqUsJiTnxkkYRd=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Not tasty food... Service and place good!","time":1668787680,"translated":false}]

column8: Ericeira Surf Center Estrada Nacional 247, 2655-483 Ericeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Christopher Paul","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114812302329644651526/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QVtLQnpbY49vXxqiuBcE-9Uq4z1_iEcXYoAqVGLw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Awesome place with awesome staff. They've got everything a surfer needs and they're super friendly. Nice café as well with nice staff.
Will drop in always... 🤙","time":1677000338,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Рома R Victuk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116254516826753371547/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ32nnUQLhgbk4HEmCajySMqZFqUsJiTnxkkYRd=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Good shop and cafe. 🤙🏻","time":1669285978,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jesus narvaez tames","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100730301492641216841/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYQedztmstgK04YUYDZCtHJe82G1K6zev3i2DoW=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I was there last day with my girlfriend. We wanted to buy our first hard surfboards and we got lots of information and recommendations. At the end we bought two beginner tables and we could try them today. We are absolutely hapoy with the buy and with all the attention and help the workers provided to us :).

So many thanks!","time":1641937849,"translated":false},{"author_name":"GGE Nutrition","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112424725004419147626/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZhsJetqkTJWNKnhe5cTGzyPsI8-P9Q8DRXPOcfwQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Awesome surf shop, lots of brands, products and staff. Flagship store hands down","time":1628115277,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lena H.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110251427513841116876/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbsGwBRBkOmDgDezKo06XmQpxceCmaIAzY7DJxR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Great surf school with amazing teachers! I am an intermediate surfer and was taking classes with them for 5 days. Got many useful hints and managed to improve a lot during my time there! Thumbs up 👍🏽","time":1658990405,"translated":false}]

years ago","text":"It has a lot of excellent coffee.","time":1537657471,"translated":true}]

[{"author_name":"Christina","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113535423291179766284/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZYW_7IK4-SVMvm_wttdM0Sbjr3sSYvbDiZw1iX=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Cute taberna run by a lovely Spanish couple. Their hospitality was heartwarming and the food was delicious. Small menu with fine food. Can highly recommend.","time":1653857137,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Laura Headley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107261860650536644809/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbhpDl59D0HLt2tTs8dz-zlbrvV8qtBwaiZht7S=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Taberna La Popular is the place to go in Ericeira for octopus “a la gallega” and other Spanish tapas.

A cozy restaurant in this sea village, tucked in a typical jagoza tavern just off the main drag. Varied menu, well balanced flavours, affordable pricing and fun front of house staff who make it feel like home. The perfect place for friends to meet and chat over food.

Go for the octopus, fried potatoes with black garlic and pray the kitchen has almond cake from Santiago de Compostela. It’s spectacular. The local wine are very delicious too! Obrigada :-)","time":1661284553,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kang Zi Jing","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107991870406422666023/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QodElLQajc9v6HCwBn8vlQL7ShpMQCNRveMXfr=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"The name of the restaurant is real. It is really very popular. Luckily I came with locals whom have made a reservation, otherwise I think we would have needed to wait an hour for dinner.

I recommend the patatas negras (?) and croquettas. It’s a tapas place by a lady who migrated from Spain (might be zaragoza? Cannot remember).

Anyways the food was really, really good. One of my most memorable meals in Portugal, and in fact, I was 2 weeks in Spain before coming here — and the food here was even better than some I have had there!","time":1677772895,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andrew Armour","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110981597077504712918/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QQrGZqIc0KumGjMc7a54K8c7PeoA45tepuxZlwRg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Awesome little bar. Lovely people, great customers, nice wine and port. Happily spend every night there!","time":1672356249,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luna Diaz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109383563425714737936/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYpjST_AK2PCjl7cIR5e4iiv4HEsV43Gi12S0ca=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Beautifully decorated and super cosy. All the details make this small restaurant really special. A small and delicious menu. Impeccable service. I look forward to going back. Gracias!","time":1679734620,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Tzvetan Devnaliev (TD)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101638695620086886856/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDC8o29sMs1bfqfzZEIr9gBfrh1Ks9cTvSX2JnWA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Excellent jamon iberico and salmalejo, tomatoes were very fresh even off season. If you are looking for a higher quality ingredients for not too much of a price increase this is your spot.","time":1664207182,"translated":false},{"author_name":"MaGabriela","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113670950900587796442/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxadDrIrS8dfI-tPAhV9Zk4HsLbNp-YLCulbMKnT=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Love to go here for lunch or merienda. We had the croquetas and huevos rotos and both amazing. The service was great, very attentive and friendly. The only thing I didn’t like was the bread charge when we didn’t order it and didn’t eat it but seems to be a common thing in many restaurants, would just recommend to ask if patrons want bread.","time":1670415484,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rudi De Greve","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107594717519685573222/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tx5eTAS_ehMe2DDklResPlBg-60sQsvfENnvy4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Went for diner with colleagues . Food is good , not more. Quite expensive versus the quantity of food you get. Place is very red meaning the colour and might be a bit overwhelming . Disappointed with the service . Asked for advice on red wine , got one we liked .Ordering a second bottle we got told was the last one . We got proposed another one .asked the price and it was the most expensive on the list . Feels like ok foreigners let s sell them the most expensive stuff …","time":1637763979,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luis Ernesto Reyes Urquia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106090475656589109484/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWHA22dxa9JTSMdQET-deiRS93uc6n0KSMZllPnA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Great place, not cheap but 200% recommended we didnt know the place was a lucky shot but its hidden gem","time":1658500887,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joanna Sable","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117894060032020449119/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S5D5U845Vo0KG3of11ghULYBcBpUJ3HfjUWaQ0-HA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"For a beyond amazing full on Iberico pork experience head to Joselito’s. We sat for 3 hours and did a tasting of aged Jamon from 2012, 2014 and 2015. We also enjoyed beautiful wines and other delicious dishes like croquettas and empanadas. The pork neck was tender and perfect. Dessert was a delicious bread pudding with vanilla bean ice cream. Look up the anniversary of Joselito. It’s number 150! Must be doing something right. Thank you for the really cool experience.\nPlease follow @joannasable on instagram for more food fun.","time":1551571234,"translated":false}]

column3: Vibrant indoor market with grocery vendors, international food stalls & public events.
column8: C. de Sta. Isabel, 5, 28012 Madrid, Spain
column11: [{"author_name":"Michael Barton","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110063207238250789189/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZSTzLgcNwKxVgVLfZTYJ7jnAnxR32qt9lLSIta=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"This market is truly a locals shopping area. It's not flashy, vibrant, or bustling, but it still demands a visit because of its authenticity. You'll find food vendors selling everything from beer to ham to vegetables. There is a public restroom but you'll have to ask a vendor for the door code. The men's restroom is on the third floor and the women's is on the second.","time":1671396520,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gioconda Vidal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109859026783413804437/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QAthObLB-iYtt6josjnSnU7dsRXrGd_g7fyoFMMeg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Madrid has a lot of nice, chic and very original places all over the city, and this is one of those places. This market is right off the \"Antòn Martin\" metro station, it's a two stories filled with all type of vendors and products. You can find fruits,  cheeses and all types of Iberic Hams, different kind of olives,  fish and seafood, meats, produce. You can also find coffee shops, a few Japanese restaurants, a Mexican restaurant, Tapas and Wine, and much more. The place is very well organized and very inviting, with really good prices. You will enjoy the cute small spaces of all vendors. Highly recommended ✅","time":1642630776,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elena Gallego Álvarez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109205400104212731113/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tc_sWDXLbgsx1LBvBzWvAaOU-_nRr7koZ9biACZGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"One of my favourite places in Madrid to eat. Not crowded and you have lots of choices. You will find Japanese restaurants, Colombians, Spanish, Argentinian… not expensive either and it is situated in the centre of the city.","time":1644919815,"translated":false},{"author_name":"zayn alam","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113847644113977609282/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SReBA6VQ5KDNDdNYXIeZOZfS4YXBuIJi_CHUNk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Amazing mercado that is a must visit especially on Saturdays. From different cuisines of all over the world, to desserts and drinks, the Mercado has it all. [{"author_name":"Nina Simkunas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100900393336051639159/reviews","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb3sORn98FN9XxOxfof7ZcPmERVd9wli9W07rzt=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"","time":1642424917,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Marta Turkopule","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114991524832831377224/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SSiP5nEyvsN9IY_Fnxw84OHGl-36SfVdno0AKPUg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"I was on holiday in Lisbon when I got really nasty toothache and infection which caused my cheek to get swollen, so I contacted the closest dental clinic, in this case - Medidental clinic. They were able to make an appointment later the same day. The staff was very nice and helpful, they all spoke English well and the dentist was really considerate and careful. There was nothing much the dentist could do because of the infection, so she took an x-ray, explained me what is causing the infection, prescribed antibiotics and explained what should I do after. I paid 30 EUR for the visit. The overall experience was pleasant considering I was in pain and very nervous. I definitely recommend this clinic. The antibiotics worked their magic and I got better the next day and was able to fully enjoy the rest of my holiday.","time":1675078606,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Edwina Smith","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114645057457367801151/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZJQMoEYISYwIYilQWSfGWqAV_4OGtfVbMmwT9NgQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"From the very first contact I was impressed with the manner and attention given to my enquiry by the receptionist. Great dentist who was super helpful and explained everything. After a check up, any areas of concern where explained to me and I was given a detailed cost. Fantastic clinic (Alcântara and Campo de Ourique), wonderful staff. Very happy with my experiences and will definiteley return!","time":1667558063,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Raxma shirwac","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117570719750510440838/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYbP4EqFsmXZYjYIQneDC2boiGz34SdLq47HAIe=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"The staff was very helpful and knowledgeable! They took the time to explain everything, making sure I understood, and I am very happy with the way my teeth look and feel.","time":1679769629,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mika Leppäluoto","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100586161646284764558/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaSn07L9j3MLNOSZnOj5fJK1-NJak68DelSWGHI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Great dentist and also a really cool guy. I had fun getting my teeth cleaned last week.","time":1680114345,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Oleksandra Ivanenko","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105099356627099543625/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RqP8GVfOT5Fpynlw3SwIYuDUp1JCs6lLItLX_sGw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Awful. I’m strongly not recommend this clinic. I came with a complaint of a very sharp pain in the tooth, I had a nerve exposed on my wisdom tooth. The pain was wild. the doctor examined me, suffered for a long time, but she couldn’t take a picture of my tooth herself and sent me for X-ray after she said that I just had a normal inflammation and I needed to drink antibiotics and painkillers for 8 days, and only then after 8 days they could remove the aching tooth.  During the conversation, it turned out that she was not examining the tooth that was hurting, she just did not understand me.  But even after she discovered a right problem tooth, she said that everything was the same just to drink antibiotics and painkillers for 8 days.  It seemed absurd to me because the tooth hurt so much that I could not touch it with my tongue from pain, I could not imagine how I would live 8 days with a bare nerve.  Immediately after this non-professional visit, I decided to go to another clinic, where I had a damaged tooth removed in 3 minutes without pain at all.  If I had listened to the treatment of a doctor from Medidental, I would have suffered for 8 days and it is not yet known what was with the tooth, perhaps an infection would develop there and there would be very sad consequences.  I do not recommend this clinic. Doctors of a lowest professionalism level work here.","time":1655250091,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de Sant'Ana à Lapa 33, 1200-796 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Patrick Ohearn Ph.D.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100142908462387349487/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tk9vs0pzdqO11NXy3YuutaYDT6Nh1yOOz0DdIsRw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"A terrific cafe/restaurant serving breakfast and lunch opened recently in Lapa, and it is well worth the visit. It’s casual but comfortable with friendly staff. the breakfasts are healthy and hardy, very tasty with good portion sizes, many with an Asian-Japanese flavors. We had the bowl, avocado sandwich,and split the granola bowl with fruit and yogurt. I ordered the full breakfast that provided coffee, orange juice and homemade banana bread. It was plenty of food and well priced. I’ll be back.","time":1669392599,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emily A.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115629994159585597410/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYKV1Do7NgWP-Uwr3QuGuBIILZq2b9-BklfYFCU3Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We loved this space. Took the brunch option with okonomiyaki and the Dede’s bowl as mains which were very delicious and filling (even for my hungry bf). Also great freshly pressed orange juice, banana bread and coffee for a fair price. We‘d definitely recommend 😋","time":1664792447,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hatty Horscroft","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111558152620366165803/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TS-oUFJEc3FkWMSgKO2IKDqyKCZaxhwvDY2iEPxN0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Gorgeously tasty and creative food with a great ethos and atmosphere! The food was delicious, particularly love the fusion of brunch food with Asian dishes - the okonomiyaki was fabulous! They have speciality coffee too which is a rarity in Lisbon, really good cold brew. Dede was very charming and we'll  definitely come again 🤠🤠 and buy some pickles !","time":1656775255,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Julia Dimaczek","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117942446760401686115/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYChrdrcUgm7EjZeB9WaJGLbWULn_mqBGWStRc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"One of our favorite brunch locations in Lisboa.

Everything from the menu tastes amazing and it’s really something different (pulled jackfruit sandwich & Japanese pancakes).

We also really like the staff at the café as you can really tell that they love what they do ♥️

(And yes, as you can see from the pictures, we have been here SO many times already 😬)","time":1645088787,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mara Simmons","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115300815379192933399/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaOhI7wLBmVjFzwuKnfHF0Bb8qYlvCitn7JpTIc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Super cute cafe with a delicious menu including lots of vegetarian options. The service was excellent and appreciate that they have outdoor seating. The reason for the 4/5 is that the prices are a bit high making it less accessible to frequent more often than an occasion.","time":1657136261,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Cónego Luciano Afonso dos Santos 2, 4700-371 Braga, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"JSS","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108827796989389241946/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rp7noxx6oZRtNon36LnIuhJ66iLbjoh6wAMsfThQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Make sure to come here as early as possible. There’s always a queue. But it’s always worth the wait. The service is good, and the food is something that i could say ONE OF THE BEST FRANCESINHAS ever. If you’re visiting Braga or Guimarães you shouldn’t miss this place!","time":1662338956,"translated":false},{"author_name":"João Afonso","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117438962795546291726/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tx3YvQuOU9EQxslsz3hQEoblRWHjcv0-AgVtUfRvE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Taberna Belga in my opinion serves the best francesinha in Portugal, surpassing all others.

Taberna Belga has two locations, Taberna Belga 1 and Taberna Belga 2, which are located a short distance apart. Both restaurants are owned by the same proprietor and offer the same high-quality Francesinha

The quality of the food is exceptional, with both the regular and vegetarian options being incredibly flavorful. I personally find myself choosing the vegetarian option more often, as it has a smooth texture. The sauce is the standout component, as it is thick, spicy, and has a delightful color.

The francesinha is large, and with the accompanying French fries, it can be difficult to finish in one sitting. However, it is worth noting that you can request a takeout box and take the remainder home, and the price difference is not significant. As an alternative you can just request an half instead of the full one.

Taberna Belga also boasts a great selection of beers, with most being from Belgium, but also from other countries.

The staff are friendly and efficient, ensuring that diners are well taken care of.

It's important to note that the restaurant can be quite loud inside, which can be uncomfortable for some. During the summer, they open the outdoor seating area, which offers a more relaxed atmosphere.

Finally, I would recommend visiting Taberna Belga before 7:30 pm, as it gets extremely busy and you may need to wait for a table. During the week, it's usually not as crowded, but weekends are always busy, and the waiting time can range from 10 minutes to an hour, depending on the time and size of your group. Despite this, I believe the wait is worth it, as the francesinha from Taberna Belga is a true ambassador of Portuguese cuisine.

The delectable Francesinhas, along with the friendly staff, vast beer selection,  make this restaurant a must-visit in Braga. With the perfect balance of taste and quality, the Francesinhas at Taberna Belga are truly one of a kind. Whether you're a local or a tourist, you're sure to have a memorable dining experience at this fantastic restaurant.","time":1675622819,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Shawna O'hara","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116726710481800847296/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RwnY9qXb3eRpPWaWk1QcD5FIlA-uGf4yDuedVu=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Amazing Francesinha sandwich and great beer selection. Service was friendly and offered water for our dog! He loves the fries!","time":1660051487,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Fábio Santos (FacS from FacS Studios)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110865229131156728289/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWnadf_03rqGh3xw7XUVVVxX59L0jgo0g-J7ZQxIc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The francesinhas are incredible. Lives up to the expectation. The staff is very friendly and helpful. They normally have a line, so I recommend coming in early.","time":1657972065,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andre Dasilva","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110294500065175075489/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RFT_k9KThkW9ZzQRUSrWFFoIgyyTRiOhd0EifI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Hands down the best place to have a francesinha. I have tried them all from Porto to Lisbon to Barcelos to Algarve this place is simply a must. Not only are their francesinhas top notch, their natas to ceu are just magical. They clearly came from heaven. Not only do you leave happy, you also leave with a few extra pounds of deliciousness.","time":1660154629,"translated":false}]
undefined

[{"author_name":"Tomasz Doroz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102962990987651616866/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R-iI7FhC5SQ4YnfAuhPhVJM5oHfk5fww2moMcCXg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Visited for dinner as they had free tables and were on our way. Turned out to be a great choice. Super nice staff. Good food and not expensive. Decent selection of foods and drinks. Recommended.","time":1676886479,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Κωστας Νικολοπουλος","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106505815741579002771/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbsUAWJtexvytdmxgFl6vU4U6vrY68OXA12qNCp=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Very cute little place with nice food. francesinha was so nice as the sandwich with fillet and goat cheese . The sausage Alheira with egg was very tasty but too soft and the texture wasn’t pleasant.Fries are not fresh . Prices are good . Service was friendly!","time":1677801918,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Neda Klebauskaitė","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106571838728061256372/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tgx4blxPnqYO1aezQRZP9q_lz8JjygM3nnPCPCCw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Cozy place, warm atmosphere and very delicious food, of course! Don't forget to look up - you may find a surprise there. :D","time":1650654501,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rene Kls","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100594165871207949733/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QxbOlB2HScPLaEGtEX5Hf46FIT-UIzGztJCAZtOv0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"we totally recommend this place.

The owner and his staff were super friendly! The location is nice.

The food we had was delicious, unfortunately too much for two. If you order keep in mind that the portions might be big with fair prices. Additionally we had wine and 1l sangria.","time":1628882309,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Redd Meade","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112439438373078244577/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RatsPJaED8dr0sDeCfUq2jG68TWyUJ16k7u6o75Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Great food (the pork and cheese sandwiches are incredible) with a relaxed, warm atmosphere. Lisa was the friendliest waitress who made sure we had a lovely time. Thank you.","time":1678047802,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de Santo Ildefonso 219, 4000-470 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Antonieta Ponce de Leão","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100990311848358368618/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S9rQDh4-cYFGe7o58egm0oNpXt-VjD4GLi7fr3Fg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I’ve come here for several times, the first time was a fun lunch with some work colleagues in the summer and I felt we were good enough waited, but on the following tries not so great.

I like the pregos and I believe they have the correct price.

The francesinha is not great!

The French fries are super tasty

Although they advertise they have the best chocolate cake ever, this is a cake I would not eat.
I’ve tried it the first time I went, only of my colégios asked for it, but the fact that They have so many cakes on the freezers makes me feel the cakes are not fresh.
The cake is made of something like a suspiro/merengue.

The beer is Heineken which is great and they have IVAVoucher, reason why I visited more times recently.

The toilet is clean!

It also has two internal gardens, you can smoke on the bottom one.
The top balcony is usually closed 😔","time":1639592614,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joao Antunes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106101202757980864193/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S1NOH3K1nxEt8JCASXKoPCCSYmnIkQCWxsYbcV6Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Great food.
Check the chocolate cake. It's to die for. Expect a chocolate overdose. It was amazing.
Not expensive at all.
Customer service was 5 stars.
Pretty busy at lunch hour so expect some wait time or queues.
Cozy Portuguese place.
Totally recommended","time":1662809360,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andrew Wong","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111804308177962480767/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qh1ZzMztUFuUrZaZJTX_jzfzBl-C_wUxNSE63M-7U=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"First time visiting Portugal but I was a little hesitant to try Francesinha since it's known to be a heavier dish and friends were split on whether to recommend it to me.
