Anyways, I decided to try it anyway, here, and it was freakin' amazing.","time":1661887054,"translated":false},{"author_name":"A P","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109376687840271597249/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T2kgZOW5nts4IN6qheq1JUgJkCjX1TA88Mc77Xxns=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"affordable prices with decent casual food. the shrimp and patron peppers were a bit on the salty side is my only complaint. their steak sandwich looks decent (smaller size) so i would try it if i return.","time":1633802668,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sergio Lopez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113018547728421948670/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TADZoiZSshwZ2_2LwCYH744v0n_z_0Kl5EcqPMaA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"*American traveler - please 'thumbs up' if helpful*

I was a bit underwhelmed with the Prego.  I read so much about it and was really looking forward to it but when I saw it in person it was a little disappointing.  To be fair, they did recommend and almost insisted that I try it with cheese but I declined because I wasn't feeling very well; take the cheese.  The meat was of great quality and better than I have found in other restaurants so far.  Originally, I thought it was undercooked but looking at all the other reviews it appears that it was served at the intended temperature.  If I go back I will certainly be asking for it to be cooked just a hair more as I personally prefer a medium-rare.

Finally, they open at 12:30 but I strongly recommend not arriving before 1 in order to give everyone a chance to get set up.  We were still getting used to European dining times when we visited and we went right when then opened.  The owner/manager was incredibly helpful and attentive but you could tell than he was getting the staff in gear for the day.

Summary: give it a shot, temper expectations, take the cheese, come late","time":1675468932,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Tammy Belanger","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110423823601100986179/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RdZFWKMRK8jyHYqjr_mxKQD7ciMsxJkwWQWblU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"We stayed in an apartment near by and the owner highly recommended it.  If you google it or walk by, it doesn’t look like much but honestly the best food we had in Portugal so far.  The place was packed solid even when we left around 10:00 but don’t let that deter you.  We didn’t wait long and we are a family of 5.  Did I mention it was INSANELY CHEAP? Don’t hesitate to go and experience local food…you won’t regret it.","time":1656448764,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Erick Liu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105650584489202489373/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RwftEACcdP0X6J_Exw-HFRkT655Vy1h1FtgQWuBA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Great spot to try some traditional and authentic Portuguese digs. The restaurant retains its old design and the menu items are pretty no frills. We ordered the recommended fish dishes which turned out to be fried, personally no my cup of tea but I can see why many like it. Many dishes come with rice.","time":1655609235,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Greg Davis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103272059991143602313/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QRXuUdV7IP1xIqxs54pDEpvJzxignlRFx62j3o=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Fantastic service at this traditional Portuguese restaurant in the heart of Porto. Amazing value. Big portions. Service is slick and friendly. Arrive early for a table or expect to wait. Highly recommended whilst you are in Porto.","time":1651762424,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Justin Tam","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101922904802810694995/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SdhH4JnfqQ7zSC2xltr2-Xnp9TkX3A7ptJZtiaBxY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Potatoes perfectly salted
Fish, perfectly seasoned
We had 2 daily specials on 2 different days: the feijoada and the tripas. Deep, deep flavours that felt like a loving, home-cooked embrace
Would come back to Portugal just for this

(A lot of reviews say the food is "too salty", but the dishes are *properly* salted.  It lifts every flavour in each dish)","time":1656710957,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nevin Thebus","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105836101776541441248/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T_6TMN6XcYbXMdXY92nHicqLOoVBt4Ja5s_ewnuuA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"I love that this place is so authentic and that the owner serves tables and that everything about it is so old school. It has a certain charm to it. The food is not Michelin star but it is pretty good. The wait time for it is not too long but you definitely can tell that there are plenty of orders. It was rather busy, so this should speak volumes. The staff are friendly and do try their best with their limited English (and my non existent Portuguese 😝). The place and the food feels like you've stepped into the owners home. I liked it a lot and apparently the travel magazines and other food crits do too.","time":1658785898,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"SJ Bey","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118004441062583885052/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RjyCrk-q5G7Nn0J5TKjMwVMoEScYh50gpsWs9UyUc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"This place was independently recommended by two different locals from Porto for meat based dishes. We showed up and they were all booked. So, we managed to sit at the bar. And I tell you what a great decision it was to go there! The goat dish I ordered was the tastiest goat dish I have ever had in my life. The rice was cooked with fat and meat in it much like a biryani. But I think the magic was the quality of the ingredients that contributed to the greatness of the taste. We also had octopus and it was again outstanding. The dishes were so good it brought back memories from my childhood as I was chewing it slowly. Growing up in a small town with access to local farms I had a lot of good quality meat. But it has been a long time since I have had anything that tasted like back then. Meat doesn't taste the same especially what I buy in the US. Thanks for such a great experience and serving quality food at affordable prices. This place will be on my list every time I go to Porto.","time":1678804155,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Carsten Kleinmeulman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114090137485599455094/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ru6fck93sBBPOoWyPE42Jwk6QkXbqMtB-WbaW6KA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Great food, super friendly service and it is a cute place where an old MTV screen is still playing, even though it’s quite fancy inside.
We had an amazing steak and fried octopus. The octopus rice was nice as well, same as the homemade crisps.
We finished it off with a nice caramel and condensed milk mouse, which was great as well. Highly recommend to tryout if you like fish, meat and are up for a joke from the service.","time":1663749384,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Catarina Alves","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110288342300195883534/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TJnhhoA4yRdlihgfgSOZWnFGNVpe0klOLl8zDAXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Delicious Portuguese Traditional Food!

Delicious food, great service and affordable prices. The staff is extremely friendly and welcoming. Mr. Abilio is always available to help us choose a good wine, a true expert! Congrats to Mrs. Rosa that cooks delicious food!","time":1661774632,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kriz F","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115874816769498725477/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYAELvmA5Z7Sr6erpsPm9N4tWmfjUC1AI64VAiO=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Ohmygod JUST AMAZING. The lady who served us was so friendly and attentive. The food was phenomenal, easily one of our best meals in Porto. There will be a second visit. Make sure to book ahead because there are only a handful of tables and they are ready to turn you away if your party is big.","time":1658151873,"translated":false},{"author_name":"ooerim","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109781125479068459290/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qv9W1BdoP_Ipqv_ODTwkf5bmr_5SI3HEWUj3aSrMY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"If you are looking for a local place, it can not get any better despite there were more tourists than locals due to increasing popularity. I went for the grilled octopus which was really nice but the other dishes looks quite delicious as well. Abilio was very friendly and got me the seat at the bar even though the place was fully booked. If you want to secure a spot, make sure that you have a reservation in advance.","time":1664133930,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Silvana Keiling","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111964411949275755429/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYx7jNnIvuTRt9XbotiAwb_u9UWbvaMm1XEXWo1=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Very good, traditional sandwich. It’s a must try in Porto. The pork meat is very well marinated and has a soft texture, close to the pulled pork. The french fries are good as well and a single serving is enough for 2 persons. The place is clean and the staff is nice. Strongly recommend.","time":1657028367,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cynthia Edmonds","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109855194720908849736/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb6PsEnbnqfHevdarBIN7q1HWrrbdhVFgdQwzIo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Casual, order at the counter, neighborhood eatery right across from the park.

Indoor and outdoor dining.

Many variations of the traditional Portuguese pork sandwich with tender, flavorful, marinated meat on a very soft roll. Full menu with other options, including souos and a salad.

The chicken soup had pasta and very tasty shredded chicken in a flavorful broth, perfect on a cool night.

Rounded out the meal with a shredded pork and cheese croquette, a large Super Bock and a small red wine.

A very satisfying meal with lovely park views. Restrooms/WC down the spiral staircase.","time":1665492486,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Fliss L","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101605097817213342935/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TO98fRa6kqzqZ0oj4209F1Jx41qaZ1HQz8MwX9cA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"AMAZING hot roast pork sandwich. We ordered with cheese which was strong and beautifully flavoured. It worked really well with the pork. They also have mustard which you can add if you like it. Beers are reasonably priced. Loved this place. There was no queue at 6pm on an October Tuesday. My only dislike was the bread roll which started to disintegrate quite quickly.","time":1664920562,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Philip H M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101407471222011851041/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sat5LcjWDfS7X1w5i0fov3yzFgrFWFRb6ypbXjsho=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing! One of the best places I’ve been in Porto. Besides having great food, I was treated to an amazing team that cared for all my requests and went above and beyond to make us happy! I really couldn’t recommend this place enough.

Great food. Great atmosphere. Amazing service!

Important: the cues are often big, don’t hesitate if you are invited to sit at the bar! We were treated amazingly well by the staff and even got some treats by the bar staff.","time":1636040495,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aine Kelly","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109070989064867660628/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sr4EQsF427o5Cxx0MTnpelPQiRCiyTMyT5ynjl=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Worth the hype. The pork sandwich was absolutely delicious. Service was warm, friendly and efficient. It was also super welcoming to babies. A must visit for a quick bite.","time":1678292319,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de José Falcão 199, 4050-199 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Patricia O","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104283836227662365653/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RVaeUoNxGoIh32uabg-33FM2Ws8zuDNqO5MSIK=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Torto i would say is one of the good / proper cocktail bars in Porto. As a person who loves enjoying cocktails, i really make it a point to go to a promising cocktail bar per city and Torto did not disappoint. Cocktails were really good and curated. Place is really fun and interesting! Ambiance is amazing. Would recommend!","time":1668060174,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Riccardo Tosetto Photography","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100233282636589448666/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDANIrLdu5mee7NRDdgwnzNkg18CkzAHmHKSub4A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We found this place walking randomly around Porto and we have been happy about our choice! Pretty nice cocktail bar with a nice atmosphere inside and very good cocktails! The prices are higher considering the average of the bars of the city but the quality is superior for sure. Good vibes and music inside, definitely worth a visit!","time":1647861545,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Melanie Abrantes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107500397655308073117/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QcUS9dFmR19B6SZvJ4FG7dd5xFhW5S0sdWOsb2=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Came here randomly on a weekday evening and was totally surprised by the delicious cocktails and ambience. Very friendly staff too! The bartender explained each drink to me when I ordered and the drinks origins. I was truly impressed! I hope to be coming back again soon. Great hidden gem in the city!","time":1646667219,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Brad Hardman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117100816018388115781/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TWI-6bIcI9qe632Te0wJFn2XNUnY-UbRHdZvCPPA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Great cocktail bar, friendly and knowledgeable staff and the bar has a great vibe with cool music. Really interesting cocktails such as one with rum strained through milk to add an oiliness. They have adventurous cocktails aswell as some classics, and had good non alcoholic options too for the non drinkers.","time":1665839424,"translated":false},{"author_name":"D O","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105661963606832174152/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ436NcgdGz1ndgxgmys68ww9acbckretSU32OF=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"After reading the back and forth between the owners(?) and some of the disgruntled patrons we absolutely had to try this place. In my opinion their complaints were without merit. I'll start with the place and move to the drinks later (save the best for last right?)

So theres a big neon strip in the middle of the room. I actually think this works really well against the graffiti. While the graffiti isn't the high art style you might expect when you see the word, it just works. If I had to change anything, and this is just my opinion, I'd get rid of the spiral behind the DJ station and add more of the graffiti!

Anyway. On to the drinks. The server popped over after a little while with a menu. There was a good selection of pretty good looking drinks but we went with a couple of whiskey ones in the end. They. Were. Great. Fantastic aromatics, excellent flavours that complemented the generous alcohol content and elevated the flavours of the drink. Not to start a flame war online but honestly, there was the exact amount of ice needed. For our second drink the server recommend something which was also delicious.

They were a friendly and knowledgeable bunch and if you're not sure what to get they're happy to help. All in all a good shout to come here. Even got invited to take part in an impromptu opinion poll on asparagus... :)","time":1678525557,"translated":false}]
undefined
undefined

column3: Baked goods & savory fare in a traditional storefront space with grab 'n' go eats & sit-down dining.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Chip Marley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107322862308367464062/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R9OXKhL9v-wtnpKQ50z17rJOLowJD3gn50vchoCQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"What a wonderful place. So easy to find.
Beautifully decorated and fantastic service.
Food looks wonderful, freshly made and the atmosphere is incredible.
Seats 60 to 70 when full.
If you have a sweet tooth love home cooked pastries and great coffee. The No.1 place to go.
On my walk on Saturday I found the shop busy but across the road is a fantastic covered market.
Look it up.","time":1679759555,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Stavros Giannis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102284149789320408467/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWlGD6zrgzYOucDPRLRDqm4sxnLB0ptTkRWAHnLg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We discovered this place through a "10 things to do in Porto" blog and at first I was thinking to myself, yeah I'll go there at least once.

We came to Porto for 5 days and I have been here every single morning. The food is fresh (baked in-house) and you have a lot of options so that you don't even have to repeat what you're eating everyday - even though I would suggest you get the croissant daily. The other main thing is that it's pretty cheap; we (2 people) would spend 7€ and be stuffed until lunch.

The atmosphere is very nice as well. Honestly I can't think of a single reason why someone wouldn't like this place.","time":1645090837,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joanne","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118154233787282879635/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKY04_Wp8gL23R2ZyzjEQHA7RgY8a3Q5LJkjvYHg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"We visited this place twice when we were in Porto! I am in love with their Tigelinhas do Bolhao - make sure you try it if the server doesn't recommend it to you! We sat in the cafe area both times that is located in the back section. First time we went, it wasn't busy and there are open tables so we were able to sit down and a server promptly came to take our orders. Second time, it was extremely busy so we waited by the pastry case until we were seated by a server. The pastry were delicious and the coffee was solid. There are many sweet pastries to try, but do not forget to also order the savory pastries!

When you finish ordering, the server will place a card with a number on your table. Take that card to the cash register after eating to pay for your meal.","time":1655849637,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christian Harris","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112766759013501151099/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TZ51ee_e8RoJQvp4ZHqHo5tRKzreQhOk8z8qnq=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"This is the oldest pastry shop in Porto. Sometime ‘oldest’ means ‘terrible because we are resting on our history’. Not here, we ordered several different pastries and each was amazing. It made us realised how bad the other pastries we’ve eaten in Porto are.

It was very busy though, so we did take away.","time":1667120680,"translated":false},{"author_name":"C Cutler","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103851917865389599440/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rp-8LxfNN-zQCI9dp1lmBHIA0WZk_2MFFi1Jg3T7s=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Atmospheric cafe serving delicious Portuguese food, wonderful selection of pastries, cookies and sundry items. Friendly servers. Small but impressive craft beer choices.","time":1642288805,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"C K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115225073908273556062/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5St8y7j1Lq479hK-EYdbXLgk12KHYrHq7ltk0j3WA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"My partner and I reserved the chef's table and it was a very pleasant surprise (Make sure you make a reservation they fill up fast).
The chefs are very nice and explained all the dishes too us. You could tell they really put in a lot of effort and love in their creations.

The food was really good, fresh, and a nice twist in flavours combined.
We ended up trying almost every dish on the menu.
Even the own made bread was good, recommend to get it to clean out the nice sauces from boards of the dishes you order.
They also made it so that the portions are for sharing. Something we love to when we go out and eat.

Paired with a nice wine and hearing 90s hiphop in the background my evening was made.","time":1654157320,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luis Almeida Fernandes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104929724501086325460/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_vjQoeZpq42oZ8YoLyU6f0f0H9OfEPGdm-6AH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Fine-dining in a relaxed environment. Tricky’s feels like it could come straight out of the East Village.

I like to go out for a high quality meal once in a while. Have some unique, delicious food. I’m willing to pay more, when the quality is there. But most often, good meals come with a stiff environment. You get the feast with the fancy. A bit of a bother.

Not here. Tricky’s has the most relaxed environment I’ve seen in Lisbon dining. The waiters are having a good time. The cooks look for a chance to tell you about their food. They are incredibly competent and professional without rubbing it in your nose. The music is fun, the crowd is young.

And the food is amazing. A local base with creative twists (hints of East Asia - chili oil shows up throughout, soy sauce comes now and then). Everything is local and organic. Follow their recommendations. The waiters here know best. Try the beet, mackerel, octopus, tacos, off-menu mushroom rice. Enjoy an original cocktail, they’re outstanding.

Tip: if you can, sit at the counter.","time":1663069038,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jahmarley Grant","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109807440429227111408/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S5Xnm_nw6Y-xo39OHkwzLJLZy2PN_p2ou9gfvqEw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"I’m giving a generous 4 stars as opposed the 0 stars that were earned for the chef coughing over the stove repeatedly.

Overall food was fine but not spectacular. A few dishes were not my fave but I’d rather not dissect each moment. Good beer and wine list. Service was fast and kind. Overall was okay just not the place for me.","time":1678915420,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Julia Heather","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109750874285965672446/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYfjL2GsfG4-BnlTQ66_07wq7PWIaIDnbfsoQYQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Trickys is serving up super delicious food, cocktails and natural wines. We loved all of the dishes we ordered and loved the various cocktails and wines we tried. The staff were all so lovely but special shout-out to the blonde guy with the mustache who took us through the food and drinks menu with the best detail. He really made our night! Just remember to bring cash if you’re international! (There is an ATM near by) ☺️","time":1666277195,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Saïda","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115657379747025311699/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sm0PCzTJ31NNai87Aa-G5RCFWNk3Ktw383wokwCA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Definitely a new Food gem in Lisbon! Amazing dishes to share. Each will mesmerize you with it's beautiful presentation and explosion of flavours. The staff is so lovely! Providing you a unique and beautiful culinairy experience you can't miss when visiting Lisbon!","time":1656003387,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Amanda Dowell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109919629895806119185/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5StvqzCRFRq7NbXy2J06Ury-PEzPOywmWdUsRuPbQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"What a great find! We came here for lunch on the recommendation of our Taste Porto Food Tour guide, he said it was one of his favorite restaurants in Porto. Very authentic and simple (in a good way) food; we asked our waitress what she would order and loved her suggestions. Before and after pics below :) The owner came by and we chatted with him for a bit, he had great suggestions for dessert. For authentic Portuguese food this is the place to go!","time":1653271223,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexandra","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103625005908417033045/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYUQesyxJ11Vtwa4nuwZTC0KZBUSYy7FH2j2U69=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Food is amazing and at cheap prices! Coffee was €1.70 and beef tripe stew was €7. Filling and delicious. Staff are also friendly and speak English well - gave great recommendations. Would recommend to anybody who wants to try traditional Porto food.","time":1671664506,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Fares Al-Bishari","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101415515618562752243/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q_0vroJPjJcNn3jgz9HebugJtrjB-bMZJVzW0kDA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"It's a hidden gem, really surprised to find such a great restaurant at this place I was walking with my GF late at night and saw this Local restaurant full of people and the nice smell of food, which took us by surprise and we went inside and ordered food and it was the best night of our life. The traditional food there is the best. Also great price not expensive","time":1669215860,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kevin Yang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115305266448701559173/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ3xVpYQXp5MNOSXz4pZN0008UHeYgm9tHFPk4C=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"The food here is incredible, I'm guessing that they have a rotating menu because we did not see the house steak when we got there for lunch.\nAlso, although they are open, but the kitchen doesn't open until 12. It got really busy when we were done, so if you don't want to wait get here a bit earlier.","time":1651755376,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rebecca Clingenpeel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113190515694066698915/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TI91dWri9tOgxwGsy3MrH2xSLqwERtO3kdoeHiKuY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Great restaurant with traditional dishes, cheap beer, and friendly staff. We had almost an hour wait on a Sunday for lunch but we had some beers while waiting (a small is 1€ and a large is 3€). The rabbit and veal were really good and make sure you get the pastel do bacalao! The chocolate mousse for dessert was also amazing. Super happy with this restaurant and a bill of 30€ for 2 people.","time":1650999617,"translated":false}]

column3: Trendy destination focusing on imaginative, wood-oven prepped dishes with area-sourced ingredients.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Darya Milko","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116778909178301265674/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S0gQp-DaG62x-dhI4WYu9A0sVg2xdRWBIHRcrvMQI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 weeks ago","text":"So, it is officially my #1 place in Portugal!
We are leaving tomorrow and my biggest regret is that we didn’t come to Chama earlier so that we would have enough time to do it again 😁

The concept is “surprise menu”. They cook something special every day based on the fresh local food their suppliers bring them that day. So you never know what to expect.

The atmosphere is fantastic! I recommend you booking a table for 18:00, so that you can be in the first group of visitors. This way you will have plenty of time to communicate with the owner and the team, and probably with other guests as well. We had a great company of other guests from all over the world, talked and laughed a lot together.

The food was amazing! Made of local products, it gives you a full range of taste sensations. Our menu contained 7 dishes to share + tasty local bread.

So save space in your stomach before going there! 😉

Overall, I really recommend! It is a must if you are in Porto!","time":1678397532,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Beks Bower","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110535166666415082110/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SlrBxVbwTn0ch5KctBoi0PC3SZiLWSATxUqfWR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This restaurant had it all: exquisite drinks, food, and atmosphere! It was one of the highlights of my trip to Porto and served the best food I had while I was there! You will be entertained, you will be fed well, and you will have the best time! Try the cocktails! Book in advance and make sure you get to experience this gem of a place ","time":1658960084,"translated":false},{"author_name":"simon yeung","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115872494574592744584/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYc-lMqp7u8G2zx_hLF8KaVS1MOCH5ghYT7sklv=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Great dining experience. No menu; they just feed you 6/7 courses for 30 euros per person. Great flavours and execution on point. Service was very good although it slowed down quite a bit for the final 2 courses when the restaurant was full. Must try. Loved the decor as well. Porto seems to be full of places like this.","time":1674431392,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emese Anna Gyöngyösi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112369051044610151469/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TUMkltBa7zDVgU7WpDuJ5ITieCNlz2OAhBNVJY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"The place, where I had the best dinner of my life!
The hospitality, the atmosphere, the taste of the food, the drinks. Everything was perfect and incredible!
The ingredients are all 100% local, and from the actual season.
If you like to eat and like gastronomy it is a must for you to try this restaurant!
P.s: do not forget to book in advance. We were extremely lucky, that we got a table :)
Thanks Chama Team, you are the best!","time":1666515747,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ana Paula Rivas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106671454833970079790/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QFZOBO-QjXoDtzoM-8R7F9PDHLBVjD1Pts1KW75A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"During my first stay in Porto I discovered the Chama restaurant “accidentally” on the first night out. However, everything was fully booked for a full week so I promised myself I’d visit the restaurant the next time I come back to Porto. About one year later, I fulfilled my promise and booked a reservation for Chama. So here we are. The night has been outstanding, full of fun and joy and excellent food. It has been - without any exaggeration - the best restaurant experience in Porto. The waiters are not just service staff, they are entertainers and, most importantly, your friends. During the whole evening you have the feeling your best friends invite you for a special home cooking event with wine, cocktails and food recipes you haven’t tried before. So one thing is for sure: if you’re in Porto and you haven’t been to Chama, well, then you haven’t been to Porto.","time":1668176227,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Brandon G","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100154091338032741759/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RsUVIFnS32WVs_yvNhz5MPLqmcwJE9w207773WPA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"I was served by Carla and Pedro at Elemento, this was my first Michelin star experience and I was blown away by the service and food. I ordered the full tasting and the wine pairing and Carla took the time to show her knowledge of the pairing and significance of each drink and dish. Pedro was attentive and kind always making sure we were completely satisfied. I would highly recommend anyone even slightly interested to give it a try and be amazed.","time":1668467637,"translated":false},{"author_name":"João Carlos Filipe","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109814305597852733704/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QkLz69Avs9bFwU31QUz95SWnI0QgDt3kzGf5TvRA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The overall service was marvellous, all the staff were super lovely and attentive. The place is very well decorated and welcoming. Great selection of wines with a price range. However, we were not impressed with most of the food. The fish dishes from the starters are very fresh and beautifully presented, but lacking some flavour punch. The duck was divine, but the goat was extremely salty, not edible at all. We let our host know about it and left the dish behind. To our surprise, it was still included in the bill.","time":1659185109,"translated":false},{"author_name":"L. Burrill","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104562270358799466001/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Szj3PxSNxpqtRTZMIkyDo7auj-oC9_E67H5vTmrw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"An incredible full sensory experience. Choose to sit at the bar and you’re in the heart of the action. It’s warm but worth it. I loved to watch the chef team work and the food they produce is amazing. The service team are friendly and well informed about the food and their wine","time":1648967579,"translated":false},{"author_name":"G T","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103186722448164711064/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaU8f1V1vUK-EH1Rg3HeCoK9f5LOHhYi9SfRiC7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"The best ever meat meal I ever had! Ask to be seated at the counter in order to enjoy the full experience of the restaurant, watching the chef and his amazing team cook all of the delicacies ... with and on fire! No has kitchen is used here! This is absolutely a must-go-to !!!","time":1649976092,"translated":false},{"author_name":"AZ","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116593730296948778136/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxasPByjQ6BMRcsGT9CE0V8nsl3nkcnTjduqWeaQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"We have really good fine dining dinner here.
Tried set menu with wine pairing and separately duck.
Everything was amazing, thank you guys!
The staff was a little nervous and wine presentation could have been more professional, but that did not spoil the evening.
If ever in Porto again would is it the restaurant again.","time":1658698750,"translated":false}]

column3: Casual open-air bar featuring cocktails, wine & beer, as well as cider & coffees.
column8: Passeio dos Clerigos, Base - Quiosque Jardim, R. das Carmelitas 151, 4050-163 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Virginie Lapendry","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103300592210420785710/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S05gwyypX79RtqSKeGh5Qf7Cfvd1cvRMXY1bK1ag=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great place for a drink outdoor!\nLove the vibe and music, sipping cocktails (or anything else) under an olive tree... brilliant!\nTip: not sure if it happens everyday but we had a little \"bell concert\" at 4pm from the next door tower.","time":1668554985,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chad Schallick","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109110751795039368628/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S7bxax2JBeUEpCKQDWAHMe_Owi52_AUxI9NhH2Tg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Base Porto is a great place for a drink outdoors while in Porto. It’s close to a lot of attractions and historical spots and we stopped in for a few drinks while exploring the city. The bartenders were full of personality and we were laughing it up while ordering drinks! There is plenty of seating and you can always sit on the grass!","time":1645669614,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Geoffrey Holtsclaw","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110967906519565312577/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RIrdUuSaTHyN55AL1K4CqJt38TaoKmYrHrnV7wXZ4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Easily one of the best bars in Porto. It's all outdoors and the music goes until 1am on the weekends. It's super easy to get a drink and listen to the live DJs from the grass or a table if you can find an open seat. Really friendly staff and awesome vibe. If you're looking for a spot to dance or chill, this is it!","time":1659659527,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marco","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104290150403315655237/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RvN-Soy18SttNC10cBoTplTDbSIHSd1hvF32bxhg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Best outside location in Porto, especially when the weather is good. DJ music, cool drinks and nice atmosphere. Just go there!","time":1648578656,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aaron Santa María","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101963875936870472691/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TtgwtQnUDsHsoP0_YQEmAKyTrqB9Y7xB86lyK9sKk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Good drinks (that might err on the slightly pricey side) can be had in this bar/garden beside Torre dos Clérigos. The spirited atmosphere is perfect for having drinks with friends while sitting by the small tables scattered all over the lawn. Come around sunset to watch the place transform with their string lights and the surrounding buildings illuminated.","time":1635590579,"translated":false}]

column8: R. da Imprensa Regional, 4490-588 Póvoa de Varzim, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Tobias Duske","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111140589321039207993/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TlAeu1UJr_l_peJ6mTV8YqnY8JZR3VIYfiRkZTSBA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"If you want to have a very nice quiet dinner this is a place to go. They have everyday very fresh seafood. Good selection of wine and Champaign. The service panel is looking after you and they recognize your name. Sunset you can see on many tables best places to go before Sunset and enjoy","time":1676479662,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lázaro Marques","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107603934227852523311/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TVtUbV5C8rao5SPuCkkA49SnzLBjinbUpILFT0fA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Awesome place to hang out with friends, close to the beach. Has a good selection of drinks and has a restaurant inside so you can ask food, or a snack. Close to the beach creates a good mood for the summer. It has a great view to the beach, the only problem is the parking spot that a bit hard to find, since it is a bar close to the beach.","time":1624011721,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sian Lloyd-Haydock","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114290957869688744320/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxawJJoiUpQeD_adKbYrZjdBL3vHLpWWHzdUgQM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Not very welcoming, had a few cocktails here which were lovely and snacks which were average ( hardly any chicken in my wrap)… location is beautiful but that’s where it ends …booked a table for the evening and despite there being lots of room on the enclosed terrace they wanted to put us in the very back … not happy so left … no apology or reason for poor service … all very superficial.. luckily we found a much better restaurant for our evening meal so they did us a favour","time":1660940384,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christian Stoner (TheCStoner)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111155134419234055241/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R3d015-1Kgk4pDRgs_NCubB3OiZy5CMDpWt7pLMv8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great Coffee 😀, but all about LOCATION LOCATION LOCATION.\nRight on the beach with a beautiful deck with white sofas , and if your lucky on a good day surfers in those super tight wet suits 😂","time":1670435368,"translated":false},{"author_name":"James Gallagher","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104175604881870655443/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TULqKVOQghYvtBvXOSfhHNiN7J52bLuN6S-FEv1w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing view and terrace. The drinks I had were good, really well made and the staff we nice! The food was fine, nothing special but not bad either. just ok. The one downside to the place is the lack of staff. Even though there seemed to be a lot of people walking around at time, it can take a long time to get served.","time":1629719332,"translated":false}]

column8: Largo Miguel Bombarda 23, 4400-222 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Jimmy Shaw","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101992602653634465943/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwuYfbWSnRf6oknzklWHZ89j1JvRjXW-Shu6Zz-jw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Everything you could ask for in one place!

The wine tasting experiences are amazing. I’ve been twice, and both Rafael and Mariana were not only incredibly knowledgeable about the history of port wine, but could not have been nicer and more welcoming if they tried. Both of them made these experiences A+ for my friends and I.

The rooftop is also a lovely spot to hang out and enjoy the views of the city from the other side of the river. Very hip
place with great drinks. I’ll be coming back here for both the wine tasting endeavors and to get my rooftop drinking fix in. Great spot.","time":1656596700,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katja Becher","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102205187882151173267/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TqRWEfps7McG57xACnA1Wh1RI1XcTvjatE44sM5Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Found this rooftop bar by coincidence and expected it to be too fancy and crowded, however we were pleasantly surprised that it was a pretty relaxed vibe and we managed to find a seat.
They have a lot of drinks on offer - a good selection of cocktails too and the view is amazing - you probably can’t find a better rooftop on this side of Porto.
The prices were reasonably and the staff was friendly.","time":1665857225,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Iani Batilov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106820024946776578246/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T-nNyKE9h77Wp5vutNz7NtR3WhgL9rrkMUEIXMjrQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"This was the best roof top bar scene to the most breathtaking views of the river front and the old Town of Porto on the other side of the Duoro. Drinks were great too, recommend trying a Porto Tonic to complete the experience.

Picture perfect spot, fun vibe, and a highlight of our trip.","time":1667733474,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Veronica Rondinone","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102215633333946976563/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rxmjqj7LRfPzR6JlDDniZG68X0p0MF0uKhf5868A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"This place was recommended to me and I’m so glad we went. We did lunch at the 360 restaurant where we had delicious food and received amazing service. We then did port tasting on the patio with Rafa which was a great experience. I would recommend this place to anyone visiting Porto as a lunch with a view and a wine tasting spot.","time":1661459126,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sanne van 't Net","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103649509162236189165/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RY4-vExV-vsx1W6eQvHrPGRdxGDE75Dyr619ZWqZs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"We went to Porto Cruz to get acquainted with their port wines and taste a little of the atmosphere. We were welcomed enthusiastically and provided with the options to choose from. After we made our choice we sat down and Christina came over to introduce us in the world of port 🍷
She was very kind and told us a lot and asked all our questions.
Nice, relaxing atmosphere to enjoy a tasting!","time":1676012475,"translated":false}]

column3: Tapas & international cuisine served in a compact restaurant with a laid-back ambiance.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Helena Ra","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107130624690828836871/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QfamzfX-rOf0-3HAXc7Po63LtlBEoFHEwnOMdD=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Amazing experience. We came here because of the Google reviews, and it even exceeded our expectations. Adorable staff.
And heavenly food. Everything was perfect from the starters through the main dish up to desserts. We enjoyed so much every part of the experience and meals, and the desserts was just a big WOW at the end. We need more restaurants like this one please! ","time":1660135044,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Oliver Schrott","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101960836675005947221/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RuJdyKqrh3NpmS5g_iQdCjr1FyariNnTaIcyYakw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Just great food with a huge variety of flavors, from traditional Portuguese to Asian inspiration: All dishes were delicious and the service team is just so attentive and they functioned like a perfectly oiled machine. Everyone knows what to do and how. Even though it is hard to get a short-term reservation, just wait 30min before they open at the entrance and there are usually enough no-shows to still get a seat. Definitely worth the wait! We will come back as well, definitely! Loved it","time":1650875040,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Holly Wong","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110497150327306007861/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZPvsq2aI-T6AXvHXhI7nbBh2txvo8bmYdMvbH0llU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We were in Porto for only a few days so we didn’t have many opportunities to try all the restaurants but, this one was one of our favorite ones. It’s busy and reservations are recommended. We didn’t have one but the hostess was able to get us in. Good service and solid food, with a decent selection of tapas!","time":1664851051,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chris B","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110507740929852759333/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb4ITa9iQujSZXf8i8MSCAtbzQsGASlGYSP_dRv=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Fantastic option for Porto. Probably our nicest meal in four days. The fish curry, clams and croquettes were particularly good. The restaurant was busy meaning service was a little slow but at the same time, I never felt rushed. It feels a little inauthentic (mostly tourists) and the prices are higher than elsewhere but quality of the food and pleasant atmosphere more than makes up for it. I'd highly suggest making a booking in advance.","time":1655851410,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nada Mufarrij","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102114354484760923465/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaNAteRVvdHfhrH_4RGOhTKLpyxbxpSYlHyB1ZP=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great service, great food!

I usually don’t like fusion food at all, but this restaurant does it so well.
The flavors were amazing and you can tell that the chef is very smart.

The only thing I can say is that it’s expensive for Porto..

But really delicious food that I don’t think I would have tasted anywhere else :)","time":1668432281,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de José Falcão 122, 4050-315 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"A Fowles","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105320627895212377554/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qgg63KQVt2U7RmmUryIxu2pOQOoFkiMvJsv7ttxw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"For any coffee lovers, go here. Amazing cafe - coffee, atmosphere, service.

One of my favourite cafes in Porto. Such a lovey setting with outdoor seating and lovely indoor spaces. The coffee is fantastic. Really great flavours.

Highly recommend","time":1658314249,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Giorgia Dimiccoli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113557156548701265195/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SYrkGQ6Q0wHX89g-cqQdEV75yPQN-Ce5_yPJVfzA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Flavoursome coffee, mouth-watering pancakes, and stunning surrounding. We got some freshly roasted flat whites and super soft pancakes, which were very tasty. The cafe also offered some seats outside in a quiet green space. I'd definitely go again and try new dishes!!","time":1662043772,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Monika Maria","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103911790545008706928/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTmSgEM7ow-qJrUuzPh3HDHovyGPcsU8G8dRNGxw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"I am into speciality coffee for a while now and have to say that this coffee shop is a real gem. The coffee is really excellent and staff is super friendly. I wanted a quick iced coffee but also tried an espresso to get the full taste and ended up buying a pack of coffee beans too because the coffee is really heavenly - the perfect balance! Thanks to the team.","time":1652479207,"translated":false},{"author_name":"I R","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103423171677171414690/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tce6Ny4htHDSBbKQA2D3kvnPbe7yXQ_l_DAzSz0g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Great coffee place with a small garden out back. They have a solid selection of premium coffee beans, a variety of hot drinks, a small breakfast and lunch menu as well free WiFi. Perfect for anyone on a workation with an appreciation for coffee. They offer classic espresso and cappuccino as well as V60 slow brews.","time":1651997803,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Brad Hardman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117100816018388115781/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TWI-6bIcI9qe632Te0wJFn2XNUnY-UbRHdZvCPPA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Nice coffee roasters with a chill atmosphere and nice seating area with a garden. My coffee, a double espresso, was not that exciting - had more of a traditional bitter flavour than something more exciting like I was expecting from a speciality coffee shop.","time":1665841301,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de José Falcão 199, 4050-215 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Bola�os Madriz Stefany","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117667053039395211054/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RtumHYNbx9KZ49-Fj6-w0Xw_L0ld-imkFWGptdcg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"It sounds weird, but this place was so cool that for the first time in a while, I was actually excited about going to work.

We worked at Selina Navis for a whole month while we were in Porto and absolutely loved it. For starters, the staff was very kind and helpful (special shout out to Julia!!) The place is beautiful: luminous, the desks comfortable, the internet works great and it's in a great location, near to pretty much everything.

The staff really gives the extra mile at making sure you have everything you need, and the community aspect is great! They have events that you can join every week, and you get to meet interesting people from all over the world.

When we come back to Porto, this will definitely be our co-work again. We are grateful of having had the chance to find this little gem :)

Thanks Julia and all the staff for the amazing work you're doing!","time":1660929027,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Laura K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118148278413203615020/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tu6JMZUk8IAhmQfKGWNwMAt-1VBOi2vs2byV0tUg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Worked here for a week and enjoyed every single day. The building is absolutely beautiful inside and out and the space is really well designed for openness and comfort. There’s a very relaxed vibe and the staff is really welcoming, friendly and helpful. Would definitely come back.","time":1647166390,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christopher Cauchi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106285195766223603831/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sgvd19QkhDmz1Ut2Iba7hgs_NSHMtpaQMlQkfxxA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"The building is wonderful and has all the coffee and water in the world to get your day going. The receptionist was also quite cool and gave me a good spot without reservation. Perfect place for productive work, I felt like I was in an office.","time":1668960437,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marysol Villegas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114482066496354333623/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TNoUFKEPj9n5R0jD1tsD20dXbwBLOHaQec0Sy8iCU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Amazing place to work remote if you're visiting Porto. Location is near restaurants and shopping. Friendly staff at the front desk and they give you a tour of the space to make sure you have everything you need. The decor is so pretty, it feels cozy working here for a day. Would definitely come back on my next visit.","time":1674829719,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helena Gaspar","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115096967251815296418/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SMb8Itk0xXxhHzW-gu0rfClg38ZQQVdy7tDOBqaA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Sounds like a perfect cowork right? Wrong! I bought a pack of 10 daily passes and I haven’t been able to use them because the space is so so crowded. Every time I texted to check availability, the community manager informed me that they were full but neglected to warn me that my passes were going to expire. Today, in person I was informed that my 4 remaining passes were expired...it has been 3 months. I get the policy, but it feels like a trick...and no other option was given to me. Really disappointing.","time":1666347080,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"pronins","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108465661175606255624/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYhWKKx013E3mR8AfT3Z7e8o80rqbPgwXkhfpTR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The quality of food was good and my waitress was very nice and polite. The menu was quite small and limited, only 4-5 dishes available. Also, this restaurant is a bit overpriced for what it is and for Porto in general.","time":1645798741,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Simona Rosoaga","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118138990107200518941/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SULBFb8RN9AR8V6jXL5oBGviDuRcGk_wsAW9ZEKw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"We came here for lunch and we indeed enjoyed a good time. The food is tasty and pretty authentic and the service is friendly and fast. The decoration has some interesting details but it could be improved. The only downside I see is the fact that we have left the restaurant smelling like all the food cooked inside so better ventilation will improve the experience a lot.","time":1661642980,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elisabete Costa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112576749913905880085/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tz3EU98HdrZ77wy7NcPZfrcuq8EPJlFUxd4Lknj2U=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Definitely a good experience. The food is delicious. Great quality. As for the staff, very nice and welcoming. I'll be back!","time":1659477770,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Antonio Lopes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104285172183574006975/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RYg5-cMPUUSPNrv8eSQ1yal4JXHbdPCHpj6SLlzQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Excellent, authentic food!\nI had the Tteokkochi starter, the Bibimbap main and tried both the peach soju as well as the cass beer.\nEverything was great and I was surprised how good the Japchae a friend ordered was(will order it for myself next time)","time":1641978854,"translated":false},{"author_name":"yalda alhabib","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101809383378504955311/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qjawq2eAjfRj_AWipZ9X-_ksqgbNEGtLXUT7GTBQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I tried the fried rice cake on stick today and it was pretty good! I would advise to have a table booked if you're planning to dine in as the place was all reserved when I visited it. Very friendly staff!","time":1660856068,"translated":false}]

column8: Av. da República 278, 4430-192 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Sophie Dg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117955237603702758330/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TItTI6zjolLeZZUfNQdBoalqPl7NiQkldxJPrEu90=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Disappointing experience in this place, both by the food and by the service. Food tasted okay, but not amazing, definitely not as good as in a typical Italian place.
Service was random: we had 5 different waiters in total, some not caring at all, others friendlier, but we didn’t like this approach of having so many waiters.
The decoration in this place is however super nice, and gives a good atmosphere as soon as you enter. It is then a pity not enough efforts are made on the food and service.","time":1645638730,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tung","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110498337150401269222/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S6103Fv9YOfyii3R0vqMaIPBnZZGrYcXGJf3pjHgw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Food is good.

Made half vegetarian half normal pizza. Thanks for that.

They don’t serve free tap water.

They cook fast.

I asked the black pepper from the manager but he asked me to ask the server.

They took the food that wasn’t finished too early from our table.

Please note Carbonara pizza has a fried egg but not a baked one.","time":1652210712,"translated":false},{"author_name":"sinan wannous","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115812158553843742006/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYFNhzJHYLo_ii2jo4vAo7FGEmqoxgFt6mh_ArlC_E=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"We had am amazingly special spaghetti with cheese and mushroom, and tiramisu for dessert. Both are really great and deserve the price we paid for them. The restaurant is Italian and fairly new and most staff are Italian as well so this makes it easy to bring these tasty dishes to Porto. The next time I'm gonna try their Pizza. Highly recommended for special meals.","time":1658667743,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lucius Lam","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117417353491374623738/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RsS82LrJ3Ao82IrJmmg5IQRKkjWz9RuuFosUDUhQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Nice inexpensive restaurant here in porto!
They offer a variety of islands cuisine such as pasta, meat, fish, pizza etc!
I recommend reserve a table before coming as there will be alot of people waiting","time":1660809986,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joana Azevedo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101874637438816013001/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TKp-dzrC18fNQQ6HtoNLg1WCXY739LbdngVxdd=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Went out with some friends at this restaurant. The prices are really high, although the food is good. Waiters are really nice, although they don't speak portuguese and sometimes don't understand the language. The complains i have is that the food took really long to arrive than expected and the sizes are really small for the price paid.","time":1659477762,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua de S. Victor 148, 4000-512 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"정지혜","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101684737017881079214/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S0D_t_vJKgfo5mNi1sYmZhpoUnuDbKJz-fCHbV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"It was the best Korean restaurant I've ever been to. Then, of course, I can say that this restaurant is DEFINITELY number one in Porto! All the staff were very kind and the food was so excellent that even Koreans ate them!\nIn particular, Kimchi-jjigae is really hidden menu! If you like spicy and sweet taste, DO try it!\nYou must go there and enjoy!😊","time":1661671343,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tae Lim","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101885520590443577389/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QnI2D-KxQeN3sAEXXJU2l319GfEtoco7ugGuuajg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Arrived in Portugal from Washington DC for the first time on Sunday.  We've been venturing around Gaia and Porto trying highly recommended restaurants and local coffee shops.  Loved the experience and had some great tasting dishes.  It is only Tuesday night and we've reached our limit on local foods already.  Too much seafood and too much greasy/oily food in short period of time.  We  sought out Korean food and came to Ondo.  Was a thirty minute walk from our Airbnb in the rain and came in with some hesitation.  Boy, am I glad we did.  Kimchi jjigae cut right through the greasy upset stomach and brought us back alive.   We also ordered Kimchi fried rice, original spicy Korean fried chicken (boneless) and kimbop with a bottle of soju, Cass and makguli.  We orded with expectations that we will take home some left overs.  I don't think we will be having any left overs...  (Look at the last pic).  Our server (pink hair lady) and the cook/owner? were fantastic and super friendly as well.  Will be back again with our kids before our departure on Saturday and try out rest of their food on the menu.  Must try if you are Korean, highly recommend even if you never had Korean food before.  I don't think you will be disappointed.   :). 😜","time":1669159796,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tess","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112988206440590009743/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5THwXWoNbFCbQQ5Z5SHeNF3BWIHlh0O97cRwVq7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Such an incredible hidden gem in Porto! Maybe the best Korean fried chicken I’ve had in Europe? I think so. Barbara our server was so kind and the food was next level. Everything was delicious. Run don’t walk to Ondo! Worth every bite","time":1652626359,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rodrigo Maia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118077406651806856086/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb-LLxCN60uhT1zOqKIjamMu8YN9iEx_Uzct2C_=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Great food, great table service! We went on a Saturday for lunch. Just amazing. Amazing Korean BBQ and Kimchi. I dont know much about Korean food and they were able to kindly explain us the whole menu and the appropriate way to eat it. Thank you.","time":1653752496,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Simon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115131665570817562462/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RD-9mvZQFnwGIFA0vPhLkZHkA8sxGbg80ArVIC-rQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Overall we enjoyed the food quite a lot, the Kimchi fried rice, fried chicken, black bean noodles and Gimbap were quite good. The Tteokbokki however didn’t taste very authentic according to my Korean friend. And the staff was very friendly ☺️","time":1669376906,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Jorge Campos","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101192546531095355804/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rg0z12kMtYeYWegbqfAWhuWWjueuULt_cQQPpj=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Tasty food, fast service, nice staff! Ticks all the boxes . Granted it’s not a fine dining spot, but you will definitely enjoy the meal (if you are not vegetarian)! Apart from the birds walking about it is a very good place to eat.

P.S. Beware of the slippery floor!","time":1650980522,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kakhaber Samkurashvili","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113092327899217628977/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbz9QTl440Ri13-De3dy6YbFhOFcPPigzVKsFuu=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Authentic experience - local's favorite

Tried a local sandwiches here and it was totally worth it. Service is quick and organized. Prices are quite low.

Place has authentic atmosphere and seems to be local's favorite rather than tourist hotspot. There was Porto football match when I visited and place was crowdes.","time":1661852142,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lesley Martin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114795092096245780304/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaBPUytfWMLNc3gtw9H8RxIntt4pK1jSMk7_0v9=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Why is this place two $?  We had their specialty cachorrinho for $4 euro each and a steak sandwich which was great and drinks were average price. We loved everything we ate, even the fries were good.  Lots of locals there. Going back tomorrow","time":1666887661,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Egle D","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103806647920018291121/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QvR98dSDTi7gMmjxNhriFtPe5Z-r4HvZRTD1TZ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Do not expect aesthetically looking food, but it’s incredibly delicious! Prices are reasonable and I would say on a cheaper side, staff is amazing! Would recommend!","time":1655410843,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rico Adhitya","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115584695369222731463/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QkpU5hs6wwA_1YfjBsbT8VyTW0_zb1rF7lj3F8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Great food and great service. We had the traditional hot dog and garlic steak along with some chips and beers. Sat at the bar and the staff were happy to serve us and even chattted with us.","time":1662550076,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"G Z A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101133860890215704322/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QmKHSRh-AjrOkHEqLis8uLd2SK5T-bclRuxY1x5OY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Great place for a healthy snack. As you can see I've been here multiple times. Staff is super friendly and consistently makes the bowls look just like in the promo pictures!

Expectation vs reality is good in this place!","time":1641738715,"translated":false},{"author_name":"jiyoning","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113239819015213101130/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ-newbYq8qQcby8thXHzsL_XOANNT_rGLmvEsM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"I really enjoyed here, so I visited two times for 2 days. I'm not sure whether she is the owner or clerk, anyway the worker was so kind and nice. The taste is also good. It is delicious and healthy. If I have time(because I'm a traveler), I want to visit again. I strongly recommend you to go there. Furthermore, the wife is available.","time":1674906925,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michael Winter","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107299162126688640848/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TntIU2DTqjZ0BT5mK9iJlH_bNquKFn7UpFQ0GmgQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Friendly staff with fast serving. Took a smoothie and an energy tea. The smoothie toppings are getting blended so they are very drinkable.
Definitely recommend if you would like to try Açaí.","time":1651244531,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maja Stefanovic","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102055763377318702238/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qm3Qe8C3RXkXBykidbKRcES7muh1Mkhg0DbcN1FA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Best acai we had in Porto (we tried three other spots), really nice staff and so many toppings to choose from.
