The acai pasoca was also really good!","time":1628715413,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ellie Evans","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116561357233835712930/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tgy5eWrpc9yNQ8kvZnz9yWpTFSeJX8Z-kAWnriUQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Absolutely refreshing! The girl that made our bowl was so nice and helpful. This was exactly what we needed to refresh us. The crunchy granola was perfect. Not too sweet!","time":1635265877,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Rafaela Graf Schreiber","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117802801015664885964/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q4g9qs_t8J_9h0pO5rrXjN88ShOF_5V2qCOLRJMeE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Outstanding food. The quality of the fish is really high, the staff is extra friendly and helpful. The drinks are really good. Each sushi is a small work of art, beautifully made and with an explosion of flavors. Definitely one of the best meals I’ve ever had.","time":1644684639,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Muna Fakhroo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103667671896630459923/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R3iUgvdbc4LosI1vYt4VOG2geDFQMw9Hn7Xscs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Such a beautiful experience. The food was so pretty to look at and the taste was great too. From the appetizers to the maki rolls and dessert. The type of food I would expect from international restaurants.. well done chef Olivier on this restaurant. Staff were very friendly I would like to thank Camila who took care of us and my family needs. The lady who checks the reservations and takes you to your table needs a bit of a smile and better attitude though.","time":1658960995,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Stephanie Hernandez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118409656203168585329/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaco1da5mQYIj6bjqjCLGnmn3lLVm6NcQ6wq4xS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"One of the best sushi experiences we have ever had. Not only is the pricing affordable, the items were extremely high quality. The service was great and the ambiance was perfect. It was truly a great experience in Porto. If you love sushi, this place is a must. My husband and I shared the Yakuza sushi combo (16 un. sushi + 16 sashimi) - every single piece was amazing. When they bring out the meal they do this really cool dry ice experience. We enjoyed it so much we ordered more of the tuna belly and salmon. We ordered the 'Sakerinhas Yakuza' and 'Mojito Yakuza' - both were delicious!","time":1673806337,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Arti Masturzo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106895461092081232225/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYngkbxmV6Z1XEvrPQjV68fxOdKag8nhS9snk8o=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Great sushi and our server, Daniel, was amazingly attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable. Why 4 instead of 5 stars? The simple answer is that this Yakuza is no where close to the sister restaurant in Lisbon!! Compared to Lisbon, this felt like a very average Japanese restaurant.","time":1658180571,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rhicke Jennings","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104484595493251774615/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sg8vx3jtUU3-FvubiC4n42aPV-yFb2JiTlhzVL=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This is an elegant restaurant in the center of Porto with an outstanding selection of sushi and sashimi.  The gourmet selections of sushi were the best I have had anywhere, including Japan.  It is an expensive meal, but it was an experience to have tasted such creative combinations.  The fois gras and wagyu gunkan was the highlight of the evening.  The service was also amazing and the servers make excellent recommendations.  My wine glass was never empty as the staff work as a team to provide stellar service.  This restaurant will be one of our special places and a regular treat for us.","time":1657963314,"translated":false}]

column2: Jardim da Batalha Boutique Hotel by Shiadu
column11:
[{"author_name":"Nofar Asher","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105651921066362644147/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbj8rcqR44ZwDg1Pj295ifajNeZLZbzAtU-bnsh=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Unfortunately, I cannot recommend staying at this hotel.
First – the showers. The system of the showers in all the rooms of this hotel is so annoying. You have to press hard the bottom in order to make the water flow; the water flows for 12 seconds; the water stops; you press hard again, and again, and again and so on. The shower becomes so tiring that you think twice before you take it. Very much not a "vacation shower experience".
Second – My room had a maintenance problem, which caused a very severe noise at the room that prevented me to sleep. I reported the problem as soon as I entered to the room - but the reception refused the minimum of changing my room. This refusal was despite of the fact that the hotel was not full at all and there were other available rooms online in 3 different sites. Amazingly, I was only offered ear plugs (!) and then I was even accused of having light sleep (!!). Very offensive and rude.
The day after, the hotel promised the problem is solved - but the at night the noise started all over again. In sum, second night without any sleep. This completely destroyed my vacation in Porto.
And here is the worse part - they didn't even offer me any compensation or even a small gesture to make amend to having 2 sleepless nights on my vacation! nothing whatsoever. I even requested to leave the hotel, but they refused and said I can leave the hotel but without any refund, not even for the nights I didn't sleep because of the disturbing noise, and not even a partly refund. Not even a glass of wine. Instead, the hotel manager argued with me endlessly and even insulted me, blaming me of having "light sleep" and being "problematic" (even though the problem required maintenance teams twice so it was obviously not me!). I've never experienced any such bad service and bad hospitality in my life I thus I advise not to stay there.","time":1659348269,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Can Iscan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109988391239422031762/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxan442OhLx_lx32dFxKMgOxf9pGAE_hpvWc8_RQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"A great hotel, strongly recommended. Fantastic breakfast and very nice people. See you next time","time":1679995987,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Stacey Tester","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102449407039148805865/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RZ8EOA1zrVCdfKBR4virwwtqdkDFKwDxoXLY55VQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"This place is a hidden gem. As a female solo traveler, I felt like Ligia took care of me the entire time. From local trips to how I wanted my eggs cooked- she was always there. The room was cool, comfortable, and had everything I needed to make a restful recovery after a bad Airbnb experience. These are the toes of local, boutique hotels that make you want to travel more and miss home just a little less.","time":1662818582,"translated":false},{"author_name":"E Boi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117170949934674029841/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxarabXY3WZ-lehmA_DOKZv8kgwwWwtCCRNh6Ij6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"I liked the hotel and the ambiance a lot! I can recommend this hotel for sure! It is really nice, the design and interior looks very good and the the staff is also very nice and helpful!

The only thing I would like to mention is that the breakfast could be better. It is quite a basic breakfast and I expected a bit more variation for the breakfast.","time":1659521578,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christina Beattie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110982490741712348695/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbaA26H0hAB0D1lt0QmZdbcBSQTJ71JnY1AELwo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"We had a great stay in a large room with a balcony looking onto the neighbouring hotels' gardens.  The staff were very accomodating, postponing and rearranging our booking several times due to the pandemic.  Our 2 year old was made very welcome as well with a travel cot and highchair at breakfast. Well located not far from the historic centre with some nice restaurants nearby.","time":1658262238,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua de Fernandes Tomás 985, 4000-220 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Cynthia Edmonds","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109855194720908849736/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb6PsEnbnqfHevdarBIN7q1HWrrbdhVFgdQwzIo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Loved this charming place!

Our friendly and kind waitress spoke English, so she was able to answer our questions and help us choose the best items from the menu.

We ordered the Avocado Toast and a Detox Juice and Eggs Benedict with Bacon and the juice of the day, which was Strawberry, Banana, & Pineapple and so good! Both entrees came with a fresh side salad.

I loved the sweet potato sticks as a crispy sprinkle on the avocado toast.

We dined alfresco, but the inside was so cute. There were quite a few menu items we wanted to try, so we'll definitely come back to this great place. It was rated 4.6, but I'd give it a full 5 stars for fast drinks and fast entrees. So delicious!","time":1664659264,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicole","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102327013892915338328/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QamqwprEJupJhBoCFx_4TF5MHw2aT9WE8kYDKplr8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Cozy place that’s not doing the overpriced trendy thing like other cafes around this area are doing. Prices and food are good and staff is really friendly. My wife and I both had toast with humus and scrambled egg for €3.80 each, really nice. Also shared the max n cheese (no bacon) which was great. I would not get the coffee here though.","time":1659690716,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Assem Zharma","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109734000841907350169/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYGBg0lifz2_V3gBwOVkR7k3qyyEmIWAqj7dI12=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"We went for a brunch here on Mother's Day. The food itself was amazing, especially mac&cheese and vegetarian burger! But shrimps popcorn was too oily. Hence 4 stars, also we had to queue for a solid 20 minutes in order to get a table for 3 people and service was too slow.","time":1655252747,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katya Sukovataya","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113021019882575870358/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QHhVuyS8AW5nc-mRASEpcv4vmkFKglru5P3wdSvA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Quite cozy and ambient , a bit of waiting time but usually not too long. Wouldn’t recommend a coffee here - extremely over burnt and I simply couldn’t have mine at all. Salmon poke bowl was nice, if maybe a bit too tiny for the price. However, I enjoyed it overall ) so 4 stars solid.","time":1657537513,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christina Naim","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107374453646608688654/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QrYjbhJaByV9ZKu8hohyHNNsmued-wedLw09YO-A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Fantastic breakfast/brunch & a must try when in Porto! Ordered the “Garden” pancakes which came with fresh fruit, syrup and Oreo crumbs, just wow. Acai bowl was fantastic. And the gyozas were tasty! Sangria also great and coffee. Would highly recommend!","time":1652442445,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Guedes de Azevedo 117, 4000-272 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Thalita Prudlo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104412058651662954407/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZxgULECRDsRbxpqUHQMkwTSfDHxGm9ca72bffcZ0I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"I’ve being there for the third time and it still a very good place to eat and drink. In large groups of even in a few people it’s a nice place to be. I recommend from the classic pancake, the salmon toast, the chocolate cake to the Porto tonic and the mocha ☕️. Everything is good and fresh.
On Sundays it gets a little bit crowded, but
the staff is friendly and helpful.
Good!","time":1652949103,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Angie Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117745267060084541035/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QIY0JTT_5B6u0dwV8TnSsAHn45ohhUqR2eZZhWPQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Very chic interior & a lovely quiet venue where you can enjoy a relaxing morning or afternoon with family or friends like you do in a private club atmosphere.
Good food & drinks - brunch menus so expect eggs / pancakes / waffles.
Their salad option allows you to choose 8 items from their list and they will mix the salad for you. Good place to chill indoors in Porto.","time":1666732839,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Johnny Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103492693104533701668/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SIH5hobFrwh1QB1G_uTwOunAPsvuXQn2ZL2y4G-w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Just finishing an excellent lunch, Chicken, Avocado eggs on toast with additional sweet potato crisps on the side, also had eggs poached in tomato sauce with spinach, also had a self-selected salad. All 3 were superb, along with a couple of coffees, OJ, and a beer. The decor is really cool too and the service was great, especially the elder gentleman who was very polite & friendly. This was a great recommendation by friends and definitely worth coming back to.","time":1666621180,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Zara Jay","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103810068314202747334/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R49p2_cQLkzuI_L9uIEaeBBtoE6BO9uTYcjYDpaQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"The best breakfast in Porto!!! A little pricey but totally worth it. The presentation is fantastic as are the flavours. We had the Oreo caramel and banana pancake which looked and tasted amazing as well at the florentine eggs on toast and the fruit bowl, all of which were perfect and came out together and in good time. Customer service was great on top of that. I would recommend.","time":1676827771,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sindy Bellemare","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109608587913161350752/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S6OLf8KGeM8TLXo7Y_mH5e6yQR8ZjIn8UzDdv5DQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"The restaurant was fine. I went for a quick brunch & coffee. To be honest, I truly did not like the coffee. I ordered a cappuccino and did not end up drinking it.

In saying this, I had the fruit bowl and it was delicious. Very nice variety and blend of flavours.

It may be worth it to try this place but if you are an avid cappuccino drinker, I would go elsewhere or order something else.","time":1652956780,"translated":false}]

column3: Relaxed restaurant serving traditional Neapolitan pizza & lasagna, plus cheese & sardine boards.
column8: R. do Dr. Barbosa de Castro 74, 4050-090 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Alicia D","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100874420877114248094/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxayb-JpyAr6JGQ5oNPR0PyHN-7OK3SE0nO-NF4DrA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I couldn’t start this review without mentioning the staff at Farinha. Absolutely world-class in customer service. They made us feel so welcome and we loved chatting to the owners about their time in Canada and their move to Porto to start the restaurant.  Not to mention their shared passion for food! It’s so nice when a restaurant takes time to talk to their customers. 😊

Now on to the food…pizza perfection! A light fluffy dough, delicious toppings - what more could you want?! Absolutely delicious.
Sidenote - hugely recommend the cocktails! I really enjoyed the Earl Grey cocktail - never had anything like it before.
The restaurant also has a nice selection of port and we had some great advice on which ones to try.

In summary: a great spot for a romantic meal, an evening out with friends, a celebration - any occasion, this restaurant truly ticks all the boxes 😊🤩","time":1645197757,"translated":false},{"author_name":"rola awad","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108464369356987487706/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZEypq4QLjC3A1k7JpbryaYRxx65aQwreos81Nd1g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Rafi was amazing.  Super friendly and helpful.  The salads were excellent. We ate the pizzas so fast , I didn't have time to take pics! A nice break from portuguese cuisine. Must-try in Porto","time":1660045161,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Miroda Otto","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105495640219153061843/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TJ9BXCeI30U1YVgOBY-EvnHYEFG41o9n7fjMDBHsU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"6/5 AMAZING food and amazing staff. We really enjoyed our lunch here today. The starter of sardines and tuna rillettes with fresh soft bread rolls was already a 5/5 and then the pizza arrived with one of the best pizza bases we have ever had. Can highly recommend having their white port as well. Awesome place!!!","time":1655821500,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Isabella Schmidt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114744204567302262615/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxa37ircgGCXxZ4-iX5rfHpLSQusSsX-Iw3EuHNA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"One of the best pizzas I ever had, especially the one with goat cheese & honey. The service is really friendly & engaging.
I have been there already 2 years ago & coming back was absolutely the right choice & I definitely will enjoy these amazing pizzas again.","time":1663443010,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Raihanah Lukman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106469782133981419505/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZgG1C1nRHtbpRTKoToS-1-Aealy0U2gEYaK6ex=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"amazing amazing amazing!! if i could give more stars i would. we arrived when it was raining and since we were a large group they couldn’t accommodate us inside. so while we sat at a table outside, our waiter, Mo tried his best to find spots for us inside and managed to seat us all together.

we celebrated a friend’s birthday here and they even turned down the lights, lit a candle and sang happy birthday for her, did i mention we got 3 free desserts?

the food itself was fantastic! no complaints whatsoever. would definitely recommend the salmon pizza (it’s the best one for sure!!), the 4 cheese pizza has blue cheese which can be a bit strong depending on your preference so keep that in mind if you’re ordering it.

overall, the restaurant is amazing, prices are reasonable, the food and most of all, service is unparalleled. my only wish is that it was bigger so that they can accommodate more customers!","time":1655987517,"translated":false}]

column8: R. do Conde de Vizela 141, 4050-640 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Shreya Patel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112823594705978709052/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKkM_fa5R928WwulG-QvXtxnucRGKDss3LyQDIJQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Family of 10 came to eat & every.single.one.of us enjoyed every meal. Given we are all vegetarian, the restaurant went above and beyond to accommodate but they had wide variety of vegetarian items as it is. Must try their spicy olive oil. Absolute hit at our big table of 10. Service is outstanding and everyone is amazing from the moment you walk in. Must visit when in Porto! 💯 the photos added were the few of the items we had, the rest of the dishes we ordered were eaten before pictures were taken. That’s how good it all looked! Loved the Risotto Funghi!","time":1645655744,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Human Zacharia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103353242331977933467/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb-C5qFkXfuHWrTHPyxApMiy5G_4zX8uLNUmMiH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"One of the best Italian meals we've had! We had the Mushroom Risotto, Eggplant Parmigiana, and the White Truffle Linguini. The servers were all very friendly and super helpful. Great spot for vegetarians as they have tons of dishes without meat. Ask for the Chili Oil if you would like to add some more spice. The ambience was great for date night or dinner with friends.","time":1642427057,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lisa Helmboldt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101274422688950875384/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb28-hrZOQYxgNgZzZnzJ4uhEdvvjxq_y60mHVw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"If you're in Porto, this is the place to go.
The best Italian restaurant we've ever been to. The truffle pasta is so delicious.
The staff are so attentive and friendly. We went to the restaurant two days in a row because we liked it so much.
A real insider tip. 🥰","time":1661027043,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Legna Primera","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108272523209600342507/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T-y3Xvz0ADg6FiFohapv3B3ZzgYFz9LDkjyyJ0gw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Probably the best Italian food I’ve ever had.

We came here after doing a quick google search for restaurants near me. We were a group of 5 without a reservation, but the kind host found us a table. Our lucky day!!!

The seafood risotto was the best thing I’ve ever had. The rice was perfectly cooked and the seafood was super fresh.
The fusilli al pesto was my second favorite. Very creamy and the sun-dried tomatoes were the perfect touch.

Can’t wait to be back!!!","time":1673438438,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mario Thiel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115065862601204237556/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaOJKKJpdW77nnGVjgy3-bCf9BB4B-RQMl2PBO7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"It was an amazing experience! The truffle pasta is dangerously delicious. The staff is super friendly and they are really helpful in deciding what to choose. The food tastes super fresh and you will have trouble what to choose. We had to come back to try what we could not try on the first visit.","time":1654030328,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua de Fernandes Tomás 449, 4000-216 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"M. K.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101666441278020484443/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QrPNWKyTO5en6LnWETXk2CJxPUu-M9KrOnYYGVMg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Another great place to have a bite in Porto. Everything is made fresh and you can enjoy it either in or take away. Great selection of empanadas and drinks. I’ll be going back again!\n\nIf you believe this review has been helpful for you, please don’t forget to press the 👍 button. Thank you.","time":1650118869,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chloe Chanel Ponciano","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115197792507030407936/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxah5IweiZFsGgCE-m_QeZYEKT038z1RUqjtGH5P=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"We absolutely loved the empanadas here that we even brought some back to London! There were so many fillings to choose from and the lovely staff were so helpful too. Must visit if you’re looking for a delicious snack to eat!","time":1667164918,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elena Dor","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116337891401513223517/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q06o7R-IwztpDAYrDhwgxdd1AE3dI0pyBTYWQfYw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Love the empanadas! We have been twice already and will be back! Tried different kinds and all good! My favorite - BBQ Chicken and Eggplant with Parmesan, my family loves 4 cheeses, corn 🌽, paprika chicken cheese, Caprese…","time":1656182760,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Libor Manak","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106306970989861185587/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYb2HQ3WeIVYQjahghI9QXQJ7c0CE4XEv_z-MWl=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"I loved these empanadas. I tried multiple flavors and they were excellent, so much so that I can't even decide which were the best... Maybe the 4 cheeses. Yes, they are a little bit expensive for the size, but if you try 3 or 4 it's actually very filling. The only thing I didn't like was that they are kinda greasy on the outside.","time":1650705087,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tiffany Giese","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109856179460554334249/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RRc6eCbs5atImm7wQfPLUhHeR8VP6Q_LmFm2QLQeE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"These empanadas were the best I've had in years. We tried the pork and the Thai chicken. They were perfectly cooked. The meat was plentiful and flavorful, and there was no fat or gristle. We accidentally found this place while looking for a place that was open on Sunday. We enjoyed the 6€ special which is two empanadas and a drink. I highly recommend it.","time":1655043798,"translated":false}]

column3: Simple, intimate restaurant tucked down an unassuming alley offering Portuguese seafood specialties.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Ronke Alao","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116193793904424915595/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QnFqP4dtoZieDjlw1mJM4VuT1TIQBo0Q0MQTL1Wsg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing food, good quantity, and well served. The waitress helped remove the bones from the fish right beside us before serving on the plates, which leaves you with fewer bones to take out while eating. The ambience was really nice too. You can easily eat here with a group of friends and have a good time.","time":1644592222,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Evgenii Protasov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106029442100215572786/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Si8LpgOcWk7nV3cjQ8mNcLns-uSj7eEdDEnFUi1hI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Fresh delicious seafood. Try octopus with shrimps. You'll get the whole octopus, not just one leg/tentacle. Also home white wine is good for fish. Lemonade is a refreshing and fits perfectly to the fish. Staff are very friendly and attentive.
Also, they have aquarium with crabs and shrimps so you can even choose what you want to have. Maybe not for everyone but for some definitely a plus. Atmosphere in general cozy and warm.","time":1677004616,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Phill Man","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110799266480731155687/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TD5nrqaPSEzxP69X3ynLZLXQ6JgJjYyv7keqTWEA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Good food and good service , good value. My wife got the squid and I got the lobster with vegetables, starters oysters and garlic shrimp. 👌
The shrimp tasted like it was drowned in oil , and didn’t pack much of a garlic taste.

Restaurant is small and recommend booking a reservation.","time":1654846590,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maggie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105950416994684816982/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R0s1zFmBGRq5sEz_3HmSuUJ-MKeLYoZAbhui0_=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Fresh and delicious seafood restaurant recommended by a friend recommended that didn’t disappoint. Price us definitely on the higher end with most fish entry above >=€18 snd it is hard to get in. Book ahead of time if you can as it is normally full by 7:30pm. Friendly device and a nice dinner spot. They do have fancy live lobsters and crabs 🦀 that is quite cool. Yes they take card for payment. ☺️","time":1657063299,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Catherine Plumb","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117031223095644936012/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RCmpzFqzI7Y-LqbTOzmehnnWSbEyYXRV01NZ4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Solar 31 offers an incredible Portuguese seafood experience. Their fish, octopus, clams, and shrimp are all outstanding. Thoughtfully prepared, the food is fresh and bursting with flavor. The house wine is delicious but they also have a great bottle selection. The best part, however, was our server Lucy. She is a treasure and took time to get to know us, as well as show us some incredible hospitality. We ended up coming back for a second dinner just because she was so lovely and the food was so good. Definitely prioritize taking a meal here. You won’t regret it.","time":1639602120,"translated":false}]

column8: R. das Escolas Gerais 120, 1100-220 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Nicole Park","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113287189622110150813/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QjeJj-A8WLQw5vjNL6m918kSslGx5rLlTTUSYOcQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"I mean. Best hidden gem in Lisbon. Why would you go to Alma and pay 160 euros per person when you can get a better meal at SEM.

Preferred to get our own bottle with the tasting menu versus doing the pairing. The fermented ingredients are incredible.

One of my top meals of 2022 definitely. Greattt innovative food. Great staff. Great wine.","time":1656700642,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Stephen Sheets","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100821283815283092538/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TwWxXFTDqv-yp7-Qf6WGEyHgGhDER_O6XfKTo7sQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Beautiful perfectly executed small plates.  Every bite amazing with great layers.   Insanely good wine selection - I had two bottles of wine one from a region I’d never tasted and the other a style of sparkling that showed me new possibilities.","time":1659351178,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elizabeth Walton","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103756170315958208502/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbnkVnyLLWUaNwTBdMv5qlRjClztSjixgSWZe7U=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We started our evening enjoying an amazing selection of Portuguese natural wines in the bar before moving to the restaurant to enjoy the 5 course tasting menu. The food was amazing, and the chef very accommodating for vegetarian options. The menu is thought provoking and unlike other restaurants, as SEM takes a unique no waste approach to cooking. Wine pairings were spot on and delicious. Will be back","time":1633088115,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adrien Gomes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100362514410318658927/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TACh00n0hoMmoFngmg6SaS-PrH35TuWq5711s4NA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Really interesting kitchen that makes you dives into fermented dishes and really complex and creative tastes. Great selection of organic and Natural wines from Portugal and world. Worth the experience","time":1658847862,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michael Denton","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109092262745621044510/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYe3OAMNInH79eba1PWtsOlT-AMCYvIiOLSyYBq=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Went for the tasting menu and would highly recommend. The staff were very friendly. Each dish was very thought out and tasted amazing with great wine pairing to match. Lamb and the butter/bread were my favourites. Great experience","time":1657201599,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua das gaveas 38, R. da Misericórdia 59, 1200-204 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Dr. Curtis Gregory","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108663126300535398828/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SoXikIhTc0uuaxze0KFAjP_xXQbln8bcmjJKcD5Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"I'm not sure why some of the ratings were low. The best octopus I've ever had paired with a great white wine. It gets crowded after 9:30 pm, but the service was on point.","time":1672879800,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Isabelle vd Linden","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117729673329541540597/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RSVIYvzkp1Hz8JAgLq6i0uPlnNOPHxAo76F0SNAw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The food was really bad! Fries were not done, burger were horrible and baked way too hard. Wine was way overpriced, we paid 20 euros for a bottle of wine that costs 2,70 euros in a supermarket. The service wasn't bad though. If you want a nice meal you should defenitely avoid this place.","time":1629830617,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emily Rees","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105958520050208813213/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QVH9qfVDiASYXRLE78Uzi5dkLYT9m5qdft79FUXQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Wonderful. There was a group of 7 of us all with different dietary needs, likes and dislikes normally always an issue finding a place that covers all. After looking around for a while we walked past Wine Lover and entered the waitor was amazing. Such a kind and helpful man, clearly very passionate about wine and the food was happy to help all of us and made the experience all the better for it. The food was wonderful as well  no complaints from anybody on the table. Would highly recommend for food or even just a drink to anybody that visits Lisbon.","time":1673389250,"translated":false},{"author_name":"nps lbj","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105862820160876335976/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RydtbkqynaWlkIXWmHhcdk6Px2vAHp3128LhdN=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Amazing food and wine! Will definitely come back for the cos cakes and shrimp!","time":1668189376,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ann Ferris","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102419208452945047663/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYraU0V3fYAoMwTjOPqkoprYSX4Gtx-bSALv7ep=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Interesting experience and can relate to the 3* reviews. Visited earlier this week. Front of house was amazing although clearly his remit was to sell products and he did it so well! One of our group was a Sommelier   felt there was a  clear drift towards to suggesting more expensive wines. Food was ok  mainly........ charging  in excess of €5 euros for a salad of lettuce, onion  and tomatoes  seemed (to be  accurate) including carrot, when requested, to be excessive in anyones language. Would I return,  probably.","time":1668224446,"translated":false}]

column3: Refined, stylish restaurant featuring Japanese fusion cuisine, a sushi bar, cocktails & sake.
column8: R. Júlio César Machado 7, 1250-135 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Kaden Scoles","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118155656965336253147/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qs2M4EiwHjOEkAo8EnU5z1BiNRpAfsx3hrpiwqhTc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"This is one of the best Sushi experiences I have ever been able to have. The ambiance of the restaurant is astounding and every single bite of food was delicious. The only reason I am not giving it five stars is because our waitress messed up our order and even forgot some of the things we ordered. Otherwise, amazing!","time":1661781924,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eric Lin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103103101366888355748/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_xHzR5Y1lnPhnPJDcJpE4ayx9LY7zeX8gGI5DOQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We had an unbelievably good experience here! The music and vibes are amazing, the entrance feels like you’re entering a secret club. Pro tip: go for the Yakuza Specials and Sashimi combo dishes and prepare both your wallet and your palette. The cocktails were also delicious, and the wait staff were incredibly kind and attentive. Can’t recommend it enough.","time":1663796394,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sharmin Siddi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112020924111433510630/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TxhHfYvh5MxO-ndKJnFthkpgz3ANlXqf-zgB-R=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Really beautiful restaurant, felt very fancy. Decor was really nice, service was great. Was nice watching the chefs prepare the food in front of you.\nMajority of the sushi rolls were fab, especially the yakuza hot roll. There were one of two dishes that weren’t mind blowing which is why this review gets 4 stars.","time":1641295874,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Zanzoun","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107737562444393776966/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TrKRdvERJWaCUUmi17zn-JJjNyHSv413Jul7XlLw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Delicious experience. The ambience was lovely- the music was great & seating outdoors under a tree while dining is an experience. All the waiters were attentive. The food was amazing. By far- the best california I’ve ever had! The yellowtail was filled w/so much flavor & the truffle lobster roll was something out of this world. The yellow was lite but packed a punch of flavor. No matter what you order- you can’t go wrong.","time":1655311127,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Claudia Rubina S Franco","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106825683083303883480/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb_90OCsTkDOnT6hIFxB-46gTlpxalNmLDY6glg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"The venue is very interesting so a lot of points for that. Very nice setting for a meal. The staff delivered an incredible service (considering the amount of people that only go here to make stories for Instagram, the staff can cope with a lot more than what should be asked from them :) ). We tried to have a bit of everything and, although I agree it is not a cheap place it is definitely worth if you are the type of person that likes gastronomic experiences. this is exactly that. a great combination of flavours and textures using top quality ingredients.","time":1665594581,"translated":false}]

column3: Sophisticated destination specializing in meat dishes & wine, plus seafood & vegan options.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Malou Brogaard","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115606042031702769145/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R0DRwvihRU0z4TvEQz6INyJAgmRSwmiTO0QNm7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing food and service! Big thank you to our waitress Rose for being extremely helpful and going above and beyond to ensure that everything was perfect. The restaurant also had a really nice gesture with us by offering two complimentary glasses of their own sparkling wine (which is outstanding!) and dessert. All in all, one of the best restaurants in Porto - cannot find one single fault. We look forward to visiting again!","time":1643748155,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yoran Dons","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112648312526203697649/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TDjYJCXjbMA-JHASIvvvLmPzpJFad5qcntbuDgGw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Eating at Muu Steakhouse was more than dinner, it was an entire experience. We arrived a little earlier than expected so we were greeted with a glass of their own Muu Steakhouse brand champagne while we were waiting for our table to clear.

When our table was ready, we were guided to our table. At the table we were greeted by an appetiser, on the house.

We weren’t sure what to eat so our waiter took the time to help us decide on what was best for our company by giving us some examples and stories of other guests.

We ordered the T-bone steak, which was more than enough to share with 2, with a side of rice. The rice was of a pretty good quantity for 2 people but apparently we got slightly less than usual. You know how they fixed this? They gave us another portion of rice on the house.

The staff kept on checking if everything was in order, if it wasn’t then they would’ve replaced it in a heartbeat.

The food was amazing, the meat was cooked exactly like we asked and the portions matched with the description we got from our waiter.

All in all an amazing experience, props to the owner and the staff for giving us the best culinary experience in Porto.

I’ve attached some pictures of the food in this review but rest assured, it tasted even better than it looked.","time":1657279340,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vera van Duurling","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115228744306835484995/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxboB3k3azpP1JV9TLPF5K8TtAQTlaQC1nbUXB-9=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Lucky lucky us…getting in without reservation!! We had to wait one hour for a table (10 pm > 11 pm), but got a starter and dessert from the house and were treated like real friends. The staff helped us with our choice of meat and wine and were treated so personable by each member of staff. The service here is 5*. Even at the end of service the chef spoke with us to make sure everything was of the finest quality. This team is hungry to be the best and to us, have reached the top of Porto restaurants. Would recommend to everyone.
Our only learning is to book in advance! ;)","time":1661558580,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eric C (The Canadian)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111299021940834383886/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RhIPvty5-GhmGcAEX0mW0TC7_fJwFoRzbkt-XW=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Seated right next to Tasco is a wonderful steakhouse called Muu. You should try to get a reservation. However, if they are fully booked (likely booked a week in advance for my visit) don’t fret, you can wait to see if they have no-shows with a nice glass of their in-house sparkling wine.

The front of house staff is the best. They were very welcoming and were immaculate in decorum.

Honestly, I have nothing negative to say about this place. The Tomahawk steak was cooked perfectly for my choosing (raw) and seasoned to perfection.

Wine selection is broad and accommodating for every palate.

Dessert was so simple yet so tasty. I have no idea what it was. There were hazelnuts and I forgot to take a picture, so apologies.

Just go here.","time":1653064336,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jenan Abderrahman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102021250423248167847/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RxmMGWeUwahQu879x_38xpyPSi4VhmAY6LUOwJ5Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"One of the greatest meals I've ever had. It was an amazing experience; the staff, the food & the ambiance were perfect. My husband and I fell in love with Porto and we will likely go back again just to be able to go to Muu every night! Truly an indescribable experience!

Definitely make a reservation!","time":1653422155,"translated":false}]

column8: Praça Vale do Lobo, 8135-034 Almancil, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Louise Schaffer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112180307176785925872/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T1v-ZW1Hr3hWjxpCysbkhn0cuTLJWkseSt0oU6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Fantastic lunch in a beautiful setting.
A brilliant team of fun & attentive waiters. Delicious food - the sushi was absolutely perfect, as were the cocktails.
Plenty of other food for those who don’t like Japanese. Go!","time":1654687229,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mark Hirst","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114894987234158393389/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R7x4P3KHF2mZSpU9M4oBt8QTMWbJj5vIxQB2KrmI0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Had lunch here today and we were not disappointed.  Fantastic, friendly staff made even better by the live chill out music - great experience all round.

We had the salmon salad and the Asian salad which were both delicious.  Would definitely recommend to others.","time":1665332878,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Reanie Smalley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114384427738067276300/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RYlTpdr2XpdHeL8Repi3p7VzrvQGBDp7asW7i-LA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Great live entertainment, mostly a crowd aged 30-50, with the exception of some young children. Delicious cocktails, quick service and lovely staff. Sushi platter was great. We plan to go back again!

Only thing to bare in mind is that Well is VERY expensive, cocktails around €15 and food around €17-20 for 4 pieces of sushi. Entry to Well beach club is an extra €25 each , even if you’ve eaten in restaurant.","time":1657559237,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Thaynna De Oliveira","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102495488647982755762/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ4L8H2ROqWtCSY1FsPz_ZcLtYslOoqA8eXAWCG=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"What a great experience. The food was amazing but overall what made our experience even better was the waitress called BRUNO. Well done for your professional experience and attitude. You are an amazing asset to this company. Thank you for the great recommendation and patience.","time":1656670680,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Danielle Mota","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106998440529879445471/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SKxTD2GyV8cjh3tpqYA0OU2Xv-UWxuWNVaMqKCUA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Wonderful place to enjoy day or night! A day by the pool or nice evening dinner with lots of fun.
Went for a sunset drinks and ended up have a nice meal of sushi.
Great staff, very kind! Thank you for your attention and excellent service.
Looking forward to my next visit!","time":1652339265,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Cris Charneca","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114196142853266504325/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rloz4zYWYVOsI4bjHtgXhcuvQS1BWiFYPTO-w2yQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"It was a fine dining experience on Xmas day, with live music, super nice décor, good vibes. A touch of the 70s.\nOnly the waiter was upset because we did not expect to eat meat and did not like sweets - about 5 dishes of the 12 dish menu was that - that was awkward.","time":1673310142,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Francesco","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103638875426039039887/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SBLE9A517H3zYDqhP1mx6sUsxmYMUG730S0EcWGQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Came to try the sushi chef’s tasting menu. We let his creativity feed us. Once the 9 dish menu was done, we simply asked him to continue making whatever he felt like. Almost didn’t leave the restaurant! I’ve tried every good sushi restaurant in Lisbon, and this is #1 by far. Amazing food, very polite and accommodating staff. The restaurant reminded me of my trips to Japan with a little taste of great fusion. Finally, world-class sushi has arrived in Lisbon.","time":1627383089,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marco D","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101449247470148583128/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RDiJLtpaWCgZivCeYtLQZSXuuiTXPffKmt97eyF7I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"The restaurant is stylish and the service is attentive. I had a taster menu, spanning across the sushi sashimi offer but they offer pretty average sushi/sashimi (although well presented), with occasionally some good combinations, but not justifying the hype and the price. Pretentious, nothing really worth remembering in terms of culinary experience.","time":1665563409,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Márcia Mora","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102032347684332083850/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZutvGEcLJAOgAGEMIy3Ltfn0rDiX01xoYRIf_V=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Amazing restaurant with one of the best sushi that I have ever had. A great selection of wines. The staff were very nice and proposed the best option. It is a bit expensive but really recommend this restaurant, it is an unique experience.","time":1676917880,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wang Mickaela","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110495317874436661864/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb94Y8aLWg1VCKnb1JozHuibXNMApTl_ge0UIcW=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 weeks ago","text":"very good quality sushi . The lunch menu is very economic and good!","time":1678386308,"translated":false}]

column3: Stylish rooftop restaurant & cocktail bar featuring brunch, shared plates & grills, plus a terrace.
column8: R. de São Pedro de Alcântara 35, 1250-237 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Ruwani Sodhi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101730661222728593788/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaleGuEZyDxdNd6gQW1B8atL4lwsj_XJlNyQTCH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"The food was amazing! We loved the spicy shrimp as it was different to all the garlic shrimp we had eaten before that. The octopus was cooked to perfection and had the texture of scallops. We originally had resos for the rooftop bar but the weather didn't cooperate so they seated us indoor (which we didn't mind at all).\n\nDefinitely worth checking out if you are Lisbon.","time":1669268850,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kalliopi Irene Pahountis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102174037377331334397/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTPoS3s6Y6AhE_GCx9GHVSceFfF9KhxX6HDnhnSA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The staff were so incredibly welcoming and friendly I can’t say enough positive things! The view of the city from the rooftop is spectacular - we went slightly before sunset and it was just perfect. The food was also very fresh, very ripe ingredients, and delicious. My favorite was the cheese platter and the burrata and nectarine plate. The Portuguese beef and potatoes were also very tender and delicious. Highly recommend - just make sure to book a reservation in advance!","time":1665090044,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicolas Pallier","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104537279746917175454/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sr3qzHVt9u-jShywFlxs0sXt20cbraO2H7G5vTSZ4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Excellent service, astonishing view and delicious food. Very great experience overall! To enter, do not hesitate to get inside the hotel and use the elevator to the fifth floor! Also, the rooftop terrace is heated during winter and they have warm covers, so it's enjoyable any season!","time":1640821807,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Amanda Lowell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103195074849587712433/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SmVIneIQo8mZYOcfVU5VTjYnvceam3HkMNlX1gqFU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The roasted codfish a bras was SO GOOD. Beautiful views, wonderful atmosphere, nice and quiet, away from the hustle and bustle of Lisbon. We were happy o have a little escape away from the chaos of the city. Really good food and we had a lovely time.","time":1658001879,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ragnar L.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112070213198974632262/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RmPQS5QDJhahA1Gqk_OMVWY55jJuedM7jZ4c1h=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very nice and service oriented personnel. The managers always ensured that everything was alright. I was also able to work there with my laptop a few hours without any issues and I was able to change table too, because it was too hot in the sun. I went there with three friends for lunch and the food (chicken wings and tunar tartar) was delicious and drinks (strawberry lemonade and negroni) was amazing as well. The rooftop has one of the best views in the city and I can definitely recommend this place to anyone, who wants to see that amazing view. I recommend making a reservation a day before, because it's a well visited place. All in all it was an amazing experience and I will definitely visit that place again the next time, when I'm in Lisbon.","time":1661088942,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"S H","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113823836636754323305/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S2aC6ZyHyjmDUnssXtJSg_J3cIJAnODPAgb1LsCWY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We ordered  delivery.
I ordered a veggie burger and the patty was big and very tasty. I was happy to have it.
My husband ordered a double burger and it looked so huge and heavy. I tasted a little and it was also delicious.
Fries were also big‼
He said he ate too much and would order a normal size burger next time lol","time":1647156487,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mundo Viagem","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100309083094323133040/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TlsE9UXbR8Pv-pA25R4uXg3-5MS4bV6Y8F6u-5zQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"A burger place right beside the train station where you and friends can hang out either indoors or outdoors. Pleasant vibe. Good variety of menu for a place like this. They also have a toilet that is clean. Food is so-so and not as great as what was described. It was not disappointing and there was some taste. Sweet potato was ok but not surprisingly awesome. It’s your average sweet potato fries like in other restaurants. Hip bread color in green blue red. Staffs were friendly and helpful, something to appreciate. Music was very cozy and not annoying. They are able to play it in such a way that it gives good feel to all the customers. The burger was your average burger and for a €11,50 meal I just think there are better places that can offer for a more affordable cost.","time":1630249716,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Allan Lambert","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114159910015030119088/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SQmt66WMlsuupBeiZKttsxb7pUBjgxMl-Yte3kAfU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Part of a local food chain. The food tasted good and was reasonably priced. They were "out of stock" on many menu items which was disappointing.","time":1679913704,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Matteo Maso","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107738146386543358120/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tiw4A6qVROwGjjeufNf9O3Q_HOOyngcSzQN5tDeJY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Nice place with tasty food for a quick meal near the 🚂 station!","time":1659006398,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Masha Kovalova","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116583524270246494789/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q-6HcmurRplhUOkQr-NdpqVRx_VQF4VGYtPSMUhg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Great burgers, very nice people, loved the place!","time":1673712440,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Ján Polák","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117055848880945568628/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TGRzseoxS04wQWsBlBJIylc66EPW8vRnVU_-kEG3o=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Food was great, full of flavors and really tasty. Garlic prawns with sourdough bread was a nice starter before main dish of tender braised tuna with vegetables and rice. Finished with lovely desserts (caramel cake was especially tasty). All accompanied by a glass of interesting green wine. Service was also very nice and attentive. Nice experience all around.","time":1654265329,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Shona Jane","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114787766959357108372/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T5CrdhO9cO7zshnZ03iwpVak4sRYt3u0FJhuA7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"Absolutely loved this place and would highly recommend. Very aesthetically pleasing interior decor, with beautiful tiles, red velvet chairs and Persian carpets throughout, creating a calm and beautiful atmosphere. Staff are exceptional. We visited for dinner, when we had port elderflower fizz cocktails and rice bowls which were delicious! Definitely recommended to reserve a table for dinner. Then again we visited one morning for brunch, coffees were very good, as well as their food. The attention to detail and presentation does not go unnoticed! They have many options for gluten free food, including gluten free bread at brunch, as well as vegan.","time":1679482149,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chasity Rosa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109596862676351825011/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY71cVr06AxEJ3SExxt55gqmSYXjyz6NbnOq6xQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Really cute brunch spot in Lisbon. Came here while on vacation and during our trip we stopped by multiple times. The decor inside the hub is beautiful and creates a nice atmosphere for having a get together with friends or  using the space for studying. There's also a patio you can use to if the weather permits. The food is all very fresh and the service is great. The owner really cares about the food and service he provides. Would definitely come again if we're in Lisbon again.","time":1646060780,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kamila Juszczyk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100205444353005796492/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ3ErixLAikBdK0eZIl-L30EvSx6c6Dv7LwM8z2=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Everything was super tasty. One of the best garlic prawns I’ve had ever 🤩. Service is nice. Very down to earth welcoming atmosphere. I would go back for sure.","time":1662212446,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Carolin Hanisch","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111571486192978781768/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RQK2HxohpIaz078banwmMoCHSMOPrf0Q1DO4-D1g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Went there to have beyond meat burgers and oysters but ended up ordering the bowl with tempeh. The bowl could have needed a bit more flavor or some kind of dressing besides soy sauce but in general it was fresh and tasted decent.

My Partner had the braised Tuna and it was the best he ever had.

I didn't like that the starters were served with my main course and not before. The starter - shrimp with coriander, garlic and sourdough bread was incredible though! Very tasty.

About the oysters, advertised as "Weekend Special" - they were not available on a Sunday, which was very disappointing :(

The staff was very friendly and attentive.","time":1655893824,"translated":false}]

column3: Viewpoint looking out to sea, part of a national park, with a lighthouse housing a tourism office.
column8: Estrada do Cabo da Roca s/n, 2705-001 Colares, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Nikola Lapenna","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110964433694403785546/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ0H8d5G6au8n8kqemdhbeUFYraAZoQxFFUQxDS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Really beautiful area at the western most edge of Europe. There's a small monument along with a couple buildings and shops near by. The trails near by are short but the views are beautiful. Taking in the view is peaceful because it makes you feel so small compared to the earth as a whole. It was peaceful. I recommend making the trip - it's not too far out of the way","time":1655929700,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ljubica Perić","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108373888106944155691/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SP9DyB7I1bsvpwKUentrKxc4kyVOe-c6RzFKBa=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Great view from the most western Europe point. We came here during not such a good weather, but had a luck that the sun arrived just on the sunset.
It is accessible by a car. There is a lot of free parking space.","time":1667695684,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ayodeji Okanlawon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100364807871465527111/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QmfJ3S54ENEO3MkGt8D2GYz3MeXLMhGOlIsUQ0kSM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing beauty and an oasis of life. This is just wonderful depiction of the beauty that nature offers beyond words. Fresh breeze slapping over your face while your soul is enveloped by tranquility. A place to pause, to think that there is more to life than just living..","time":1645206862,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Arkadiusz Rolak","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109067537305683588623/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RQJ-fiMTUsG5MaisJ7-57wGV8XawUWrRCMCFazjg0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Cabo da Roca.  A great place where Europe ends and the Atlantic Ocean begins.  Beautiful views, landscape and cliffs.  A lighthouse and a certification point for reaching the end of Europe.  I recommend seeing this place.  Amazing impressions.  There is also a restaurant where you can eat tasty.  🤩😍😀","time":1654037008,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hein Bester","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107512060295726621305/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TX4WQbVDweIRT4o6Gj7Z7llkeYCnWRJr0AeMq7F5Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"A must see; must visit place.

Easily accessible with any form of vehicle, but might get crowded during holiday season.
There are beautiful views to be found and some great hikes for the energetic. Pack a picnic and enjoy a day out.
There's a gift shop and toilets in the area.

On a clear day you can see for kilometers. With the blue sky and ocean, get ready for beautiful pictures (no filters needed), making memories.","time":1649518211,"translated":false}]

column3: These scenic oceanfront cliffs feature a natural archway & open cave created by pounding waves.
column8: Av. Rei Humberto II de Itália 642, 2750-800 Cascais, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Fabio Perrotta","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102380658425285165564/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QMkqiLyK7U5HCFtIEEGajSi-1xzUDitzpUwbfhDw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Beautiful place to visit. Nature was very generous to build something like this.

It's easy to access the rocks, has stairs to help the walk to where you can take some good pictures and sit to enjoy the sunset.

And you can walk just a couple of minutes and find interesting restaurants. The parking is public in the street, it's paid but very accessible.","time":1664872425,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joana O'Brien","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111135443804754002524/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbLEQz6mroDDGNAz-jThPg6rnLxJZg7itLWZiMn=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"The Inferno's Mouth is well dubbed. Around sunset, what looks like a few jagged rocks with mild waves, starts swelling and rising and crashing, pushing into the tunnel that has been created after thousands of years of erosion.  The energy that the ocean has is palpable and minute by minute it gets more and more aggressive.  It is awesome, in the purest form of the words definition.  There are plenty of safe places for people to stand to watch this incredible performance.  A distance away there is a peninsula with a pier that starts signaling its light -- posing some incredible scenes for picture-taking.  Although it was the end of June, the place was not packed and it was easy to walk around to find scenic photogenic angles.  There is no cost associated with attending this fine show and plenty of places to park. It is also surrounded by multiple restaurants and is a skip and a hop to Cascais.  Beware of those selling souvenirs - they are bad quality and four times more expansive than in other places.  If you're in the area, I definitely encourage you to visit Lucifer's jagged mouth.  Also, if you look closely at my pictures, you will see a dragon (or is it just me) herding the waves into the mouth!","time":1656420842,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christian Scheinhardt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109370504485622490756/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QHkPd_nrS4GTN4K5uFOXNS5PkerYM0gGJm8SSkmaw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Guarded by countless laughing seagulls, the „Mouth Of Hell“ is one of the most beautiful landmarks near Lisbon.
Completely designed by nature with its infallible hand, the area is presenting itself with a rough charm which is created when the sea and the wind as bride and groom come together to meet their best man, the rocks of a coast line. Over millions of years the natural forces created the shapes one can see today.
The waves keeping on coming restless and powerful, pressing through the mouth into the basin you’re looking into when standing on the edge of the cliff.
When you get lucky, the weather will be just fine. With a deeply blue sky of a color you will find nowhere else around the world. And bright sunshine, which lets the foaming water look like dusted with countless little gems.
Look and take in this endlessness of the ocean. Breathe deeply and get a sense of what it is like to inhale the sunlight. Then close your eyes. And just listen: what the flooding and ebbing waves got to tell you. Whatever it may be, the seagulls will keep on laughing. At all of it.","time":1646422711,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Samia Kamel Mahmoud Hegazi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117263476095643657603/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SbsxhyP8TYLhRrg3FKnF_VVO2CEu2807By6bTB=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Boca do inferno is a must-see in Cascais.
It is easily reached on foot (about a 25-minute walk from the train station) along the coast, so it is absolutely pleasant.
The best time to go there is from January to April, when it is not too crowded and you can enjoy the beauty of the place.
There are bars and restaurants around there at moderate prices.
Even if you are afraid of heights, don't worry, the place is very safe.

Absolutely recommended is the sunset.

Use suitable shoes, especially if you choose to go all the way down, the rocks are always wet and therefore slippery.

Enjoy!","time":1673959691,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wilson Tsang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100618295330470233704/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QJppk6T4--06kCRaIJmbhtUK5gQDdCsnC36gPRYg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Free natural attraction about a 25 minute walk from the city center, which is picturesque all on its own. The formation is very cool, would have been even cooler if it was high tide. Plenty of beautiful pictures of the formation and sea to be taken, also some cafes to eat and drink at as well as shops to wander","time":1659432728,"translated":false}]

column3: Trendy rooftop cocktail bar featuring international cuisine & views of the city.
column11: [{"author_name":"Thuy Würfel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117699026589305178145/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RxHLKLe6Xuh_2jHZJZE-WtDogj7PHTdsXrqpd16Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We stayed in Lisbon in Oct 2020 for 4 weeks and went to this bar twice a week. The cocktails were very delicious, the view was great and we loved the atmosphere there. They had live music on some days which we really enjoyed. The food was good, too!","time":1645869346,"translated":false},{"author_name":"P Layn","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106674287803964844042/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QHDBGEmz4K7cV1XsyOQTzIE2sKUYidPB7ywJclZw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great place to have drinks with a great view! However the cocktails were too sweet.
