Maybe better to have beer or wine.","time":1669478458,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jenny Shen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102340879415110887026/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tp9UYlbs7ImWgOSobB0ZYML_PIPUBC8tR2_042=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Super fun rooftop bar with a pretty good view of the castle! Friendly staff and great atmosphere! It's on the top floor of a rundown building. It was very busy when I visited, but I enjoyed it as a solo traveler. Pretty good old fashioned!","time":1651263514,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ruby Corcoran","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104575526120144655336/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q_Ly1x_TN7PATrEkJ3DtAECrlVg0J2mgeXnNpw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Really good drinks and lunch. Staff are pleasant and detail oriented. Views are amazing. Free arcade machines. Nice outdoor area and cute seating areas inside. Nice decor. Would recommend.","time":1662301924,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Erica Weiss","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113817856156090505865/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R2xie0PZgG9SCMiIUkkzFfhsAhgLtjEHUNAkB4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Was difficult to find, but was great once I figured out how to get there. (Go into the plaza near the metro stairs and then take the stairs all the way to the top floor.) Great place to watch the sunset over Lisbon.","time":1675113868,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Zuzanna Andrzejczak","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105061406907370973035/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TMxFkZuP1C3iE46nCmg4omXAYh3Bd02PvQ4gf0jQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"The food was very good and the drink was excellent. It would be great if the pad Thai was at least vegetarian.","time":1677748080,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Thu Huyền","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102554426707044953222/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RssZm4shmdeiuNSDklvPlnKOsP9COMJNnQpXoZZQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Staffs are excellent, we arrived around 11PM and didn’t have a lot of choices. Food is good and quickly.","time":1672087395,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lee Langford","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110640207446677835147/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ttof6oK-qWAPcAcO8z9NheGwI2ySVH2Qi2MTP0VfQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The owner is a very nice guy, a lot of time for you and really helpful.
The food is full of flavour and the menu has a great selection.
The bao buns are a triumph.
Portion size is good.
The prices are in line with what you should expect in Lisbon.
The place is well kept and clean.
Nice selection of Asian beers and drinks.
Deffinately worth a visit.","time":1631794804,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elisa Estrada","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110768589788081718309/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SxNwLMjo7Pi_YvzBZzcUR5aH3uUpTBVy1QBPLV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"Is a nice place if you don’t like to eat good food, nice decoration and everything but it’s not worth it. Stay away from the Chicken Noodles, it’s simply so bad! Taste like nothing and it’s disappointing.","time":1601668678,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Johanna","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112538902359604898639/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RGh-zVUBXAILKchLniddmezHX_WyMSy-z8L9RqnIs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Food was awesome, especially the vegetarian BAOs and the corn tempura. Staff was really kind. It's a bit more expensive than other restaurants but the price is absolutely reasonable for the great experience.","time":1675892903,"translated":false}]

column2: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova Country House & Spa
column3: Elegant country hotel on a wine estate, with a spa, a pool & a fine-dining restaurant.
column8: Herdade da Malhadinha Nova, 7800-601 Albernoa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Sydney Kaufman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110137806178036631983/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q7BkrWWYZj634JLwwWsqaIyOxsYub6bljPXNnrvNw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"We spent a few days at this lovely vineyard and hotel for my sister's wedding. The location was absolutely beautiful and the staff were overwhelmingly helpful and kind. They made our stay relaxing and enjoyable, we got to try out some wonderful selections of wine and cheese and toured around their wine cellars. Our guides were very knowledgeable friendly, I definitely recommend touring the vineyard when you stay here! Thank you again for being so accommodating and kind! We will visit again!","time":1666201008,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Youri Claessens Photography","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104701665072949591240/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RrdjM2IPNf7oU2ceZh9v_vP6qIDDW-HksoQnhgmg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"I had the pleasure of photographing a beautiful three day wedding at the amazing venue, Malhadinha Nova in Portugal. The location is simply stunning and made for the perfect backdrop to capture memories that will last a lifetime. The staff were incredibly helpful and went above and beyond to make sure everything ran smoothly. I would highly recommend this venue to anyone looking for a picturesque and unforgettable wedding experience.","time":1676313744,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Simon Thompson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108063571915127272106/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SlMialKYkZQAj2zYhmj1VZREsMKj6wxcna5iD_=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"in the last week","text":"Stunning place. Great wine. Wine-tasting was amazing. Thanks Jorge - you are a star!","time":1680613048,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Stephanie Seller","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109587624556644246844/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Re4IxAV6p0IKxWZGIz54Ke1tfDvsNY92fBFTdIpA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Malhadinha Nova is truly a magical place and embodies the slowed down nature of the culture of the Alentejo region of Portugal. We stayed in Casa das Pedras #4 for two nights in June 2022 and you could be outside on the patio or in the plunge pool and not see another soul for HOURS. Very romantic room, we should have stayed longer. We were there on a Sunday night when the restaurant is closed... and the staff has a \"barbecue\" which can only be described as HEAVEN ON EARTH. They have a beautiful buffet and a carving station, and live music! If you get cold as the sun sets, the staff has blankets on hand! They have thought of absolutely everything, and it was one of our favorite experiences of our entire honeymoon. We had a picnic lunch which was also amazing, and very thoughtfully done even though it is somewhat difficult to control the bugs when you have a picnic. The staff is outstanding and so accomodating. My husband and I were not eating indoors at this time because of the pandemic, and they graciously set up a table for us outside when we dined at the property's restaurant. The food and wine are delicious, and one of the cornerstones of the experience here.  We will certainly be back, and we cannot wait to stay in Casa das Pedras again!","time":1671317520,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sierra Michaels","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117217780932764283490/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbLPmSwu-dJ7IQxeUjMcB2aMMNfmg9h9LuQoOhG=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Exceptional. Everything from the attentive and helpful support from the staff to make every moment pleasurable and special to the unbelievably delicious food and vino. We will definitively be back and would recommend you don’t walk but run to book your stay here soon too!","time":1668677207,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"N Vila","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114170590832687106469/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY8h9Is_I5dUd6Doa2VtJz8vB2Dr4UoMXYsf6RR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We had an OK meal here. The duck confit was tasty, but a bit on the oily side. My husband ordered the burger and found the bread to be quite hard and not so fresh. The garlic olives included in the couvert were delicious. Also enjoyed the pineapple express non alcoholic cocktail but it was a bit too sweet. We also ordered the brownie with salted caramel ice cream for dessert but I wouldn't call it a brownie. It was more of a chocolate cake with nuts in it. The ice cream was nice though. Overall it was an OK experience with good service but not sure if we would come back for the food.","time":1644361155,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chereese Foster","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113454046191020742661/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RB7NyNGjk6xaki87NBMR3jOf1uoZ0cObwia2WDGnM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Food was flavorful but lacked salt and the shrimp al ajilo and tiger prawns in my risotto were over cooked. The risotto was delicious and well-seasoned but rich and a big portion so I couldn’t finish it all. Service was attentive and fast, which seemed to not be the norm in Lisbon. Lower rating mostly due to the overcooked shrimp.","time":1667092371,"translated":false},{"author_name":"s. charmer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114514130594961576239/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RSecwuYbB5B8JopKvr4P2Mkb-ul6NY2Jdm27ft=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This restaurant is located in the centre of Lisbon, inside of an hotel, is totally worth the experience. The food is incredible, the service impeccable, and they have a great selection of wines. The best part is the ambiance, the dimmed lights really entice your dinner.","time":1668634960,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Deborah XUDI","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104030571074117989013/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R0awKdBsa5itCJenyCQlC-1K9Qcrls7ksSaZxK_oA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Nice service with great food.
Both cod and cpnfit de canard are very tender,  risotto is tasty as well.

All dishes are nice but highly recommend dish:
1) couvert: mint herbs paté is very fresh;
2) dessert brownie, perfect brownie than you ever tried.

Avrg. price: 55€/p.p (2 glasses of wine of each)","time":1658265460,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michelle Sjogren Leong","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111051510824532260118/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKworPkAjY55A3qjpuNfi90p2-wLoUr5M_p3A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"A hotel restaurant. Monday lunch, very quiet but not an issue for us as we got an extra attentive waiter. Good variety menu. Ordered bread (couvert) for €3 & got 4 fantastic different kinds of rolls wt 3 different kinds of dip; pesto, sundried tomato & tuna. Off to a great start already! Shared the grouper & prawn risotto as starters, not just pleasing to the eye but yummilicious! Got a glass of white each to go wt that! Great value Grainha & Quinta da Alorna @ €6 each.

Had the confit duck leg risotto (foresty wt lots of mushrooms) & goat ballotine (large portion & unctuous medley of meat & pistachios). A tad salty but wonderfully decadent dishes! Washed each mouthful wt sips of Quinta Nova de Nossa Senhora do Carmi Reserva. Tasted it when opened & a bit tannic but wt food…omg €40 of deliciousness! Gave it 4.2 on Vivino.

For dessert, had egg pudding (tastes much better than it sounds 😜) lime ice cream & pineapple carpaccio, plus a glass of moscatel & a caramel walnut chocolate brownie wt madeira. All in all, 2.5hrs of pleasure at around €150. Great value, service & highly recommended!","time":1677062180,"translated":false}]

column3: Seasonal water park with slides, pools & rides plus live falconry, reptile & tropical bird shows.
column8: Portugal PT, Vale de Deus 125, 8401-901 Estômbar, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Georgina Botros","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107061427190983810403/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QHS4lAqjnT-Eq1_GwYGHChP-51sZ7ArKeBWaQZ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We had so much fun in this water park!! The slides were varied and adventurous. Everything was clean and looked appealing! WHAT YOU SHOULD NOW: 1. book the tickets online to save 10%; 2. take drinks and food with you (prices are okay); 3. take enough towels with you (deck chairs cost extra).","time":1664210603,"translated":false},{"author_name":"shannon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113026147573669980127/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbLeHyJO34kdzR4QDdTajG8LosSMwzn4RYYJh6o=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Really fabulous park. I can’t fault it on anything. Spotlessly clean and perfectly maintained. There are lovely grounds with lots of shade from bushes and trees. We went for two days (there is a great offer with a big discount for the second day). I didn’t see a single piece of litter anywhere. Nearly no queues on either day (the longest we waited for anything was 10/15 min and that was mid afternoon. In the morning there were no queues. The kids got their picture taken holding the parrots and a snake which they really loved. Loads of great rides. Really lovely place to spend a couple of days.","time":1656059102,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gudmundur Oskarsson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112661086308910582745/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T1soPDUh95jTgDMoQKyTOD47Jael8vfHkN62hBXh4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"A lot of people, they really do let in a lot of crowd.  It’s a water park in high season so can’t blame them, there are always going to be lines. Never been to a water park with no lines. Staff are very friendly. The park is very clean. They have a water-path so you don’t burn your feet. The food is not bad. You can rent umbrellas which is pretty cool. You can hang out on clean, green grass. The kids loved it (10 and 14). Longest wait was 30-40 minutes. Been to many water parks, one of the nicer ones.","time":1658783320,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kenneth Joachim de Castro Bendix","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108284532298450938431/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R2nbzVsWJocg-o6F21FeIyDgd0nxnT3fs4RExuPA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Slide & Splash Waterpark is a super nice water park.  Perfect for families with children.  There is a lifeguard everywhere and you feel really safe.  There is free parking and you can get an online discount if you pay for your tickets online.  The park is clean, well maintained and the staff are really friendly and helpful.  There are ice cream huts, pizzaria in the park and you can also get a massage if you wish.  For a family of 6 people, the entrance fee is 145 eur, which we thought was an okay price.  We can definitely recommend visiting this place.  👍😎🇩🇰","time":1656595262,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vanessa Pile","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115847726569939911404/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RNfNgaRNEorHPQbiT4QXzuiopTbpyobCoM11HCI-M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"A great day out for all,we took picnic would recommend taking some sort of shade but can hire umbrella but be sure to anchor it well as it can be windy and we saw 3 umbrellas fligh off in to sky and out of the park the day we were there with belonging going to!!\nfood snack bar with pizza  available and cold drinks and ice-cream, they do a couple of bird show and tropic animals you can have a photo with to buy for €10","time":1659007048,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Primeiro de Maio 23, 8600-315 Lagos, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"L Dilley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102342450261944417387/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb85n3xWphi_nIfU_s7QCWdyqns-GLg3Ve_hpZJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"We only tried a pastel de nata and a cookie here but there were lots of other options with some really yummy looking cakes. The pastel de nata was on the big size with lots of custard.","time":1668432193,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wild & Sea","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108232083249142971686/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SZqR7b4z7KQUF-Z1HvSPFG8YhE-pmC_I6n_Hr_8A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Really great local bakery. As I'm a Moka addict, I asked them if I can get a Moka with vegetal milk. They have soy milk. The lady kindly prepared step by step the Moka, in a nice cup. Moka was really nice!
I also tried those little almond balls, it's tasty and not too sweet.
Atmosphere is lovely and the ladies all really nice.","time":1669713817,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexander Mitrofanov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103962691283662692094/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbofhoDmPJI8hj8ET896bndq_CoH81AU8VVh88e=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"A great place. Very cheap with a lot of variety. Overall I believe I ate more than 15 natas there. Best natas to my taste. On our last day in Portugal we made a 40min detour just to get natas from them.","time":1666907950,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Irene Knowles","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110782615657663219765/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZoawa2Tdf9U1e87u9X8PGy7rxdhRcv3o7XPjO1=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Fresh pastries, good coffee, fast service, and a great traditional atmosphere, very different in nature to the many hipster eateries and American style brunch cafes that by now dot trendy and expats-laden Lagos.
This is an ever popular shop (as proven by the fact that there's a number system to manage the queue), but it's excellent for a nice quick brekkie with the amazing selection of freshly baked goods (both savoury and sweet), as there are a couple of stools to sit down and consume your purchase.
One of a select few characterful places in an increasingly "globalised" town, I loved it. And it's reasonably priced, too.","time":1676241616,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sara Tavakolian","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105351831945761355268/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TPClZfoaUqrEbVD0v9B_83c_MDcEMc0qV3B96ywY8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We'd rather the pastel des natas more in Lisbon, Mantegaria. Here the eggs are baked in the cream.

I loved my moringue pastry and the fresh orange juice. The croissant 🥐 tastes like bread 🍞 though.","time":1647455207,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Nathalya Musa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105845131821579486627/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwI0HiIAY-CvkbvuOl_FZisbVWFJT-9PJWeL9KE7Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Gosh, where should I start from? Service, ambient, food? Everything was outstanding and Maria Petisca was so far The best restaurant we visited in Lagos so far. The food was absolutely beautiful, I have no words to explain how tasty the main dish (salmon) was. To be hones, we are planing to return tonight just to try more options fr their menu. The lady who assisted us during the dinner was incredibly friendly and helpful. We got over excited with the tapas menu and tried to order more dishes, but she kindly warned us that it would be too much. It’s a pity I can’t mention her name here but she was such a sweet hear. Prices were just fine, we had plenty of food, tapas, main and a bottle of wine and the bill was a bit less than €60x I totally recommend the place.","time":1654420222,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jessica Clancy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113223923648161387883/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tu3e1yNSWMQvDT9SEwZabk7bo3l73eIoYFw1C9xk4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Easily the best meal we’ve had on our entire holiday so far!
The sausage puffs were so tasty, we wanted to eat 8 more! The duck was cooked beautifully and was absolutely delicious, the sauce was incredible. They have limited quantities of each meal, and I chatted with a customer at the table over who came back for dinner tonight because they were out of the duck the night before!
I’ll be dreaming of these dishes when I return home. Highly recommend a meal (or two) here!","time":1664059249,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andrew Streams","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110527979414070392568/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbbJUZLVVnb6xg7s41pOT5GwDX8TlTXAE_eolc7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Went with friends who recommended this restaurant and we were blown away with how tasty the food is. Plus really friendly service and great wines. We had the Maria hamburger and the duck our friends had the steak. All dishes were amazing.","time":1651730259,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ivan Stefanov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105645387530199335151/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbpRTbOWI-VoI-HAFhn0wjkqKyYFbARNON5T9Y=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Found off the beaten tourist track and the old town, this restaurant offers a much more local experience. While most of the staff spoke English, the other guests were primarily Portuguese and we were happy to have a more relaxed, laid-back dinner than what one usually gets in the tourist spots.

The food was plentiful - huge portions and one can get a full meal just from a couple of "starters" (I recommend the pulled pork "sandwich" with fries). Tasty Sagres beer at the best price I have seen in whole Lagos. Also open until later than most restaurants.","time":1661856271,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tim Dyck","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109156262034715388745/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RihfjH2skdpQZqf7wE6vkzjnDN20zMmIaSo1EddxU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"My life is now devoted to Portuguese steak. Incredible service, delicious food. Make sure to get the sausage puffs as an appetizer.","time":1664218566,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de São Pedro de Alcântara 83, 1250-238 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Elodie Jupin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116182076872998292384/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY2MYQSBlKp61ntwCSbPIBMq6l6nzfgLd_-Go59=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We were a large group of 25  staff was amazing handling all our requests.  Food was unusual and really good. Kudos to the kitchen staff. Kudos to all our waitresses.  Great evening","time":1665188333,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ronnie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107415432192481380953/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sft0oDnI4AUIbF6qrSJFW3v6hcrH0y9wyc0UROMQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We waited for a little while to get into the bar on the roof terrace. Very cool and unique cocktail bar. The cocktails were very good and well made. The staff were very friendly and provided a fast service. The evelator to get up there is extremely small and has a pretty low weight limit. So be prepared to walk up stairs I think it was only 3 floors so not so bad.","time":1636278215,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dan Dd","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114173072073918276995/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R4_OG0NZHK6Sff-A5vLh868Os-G73uqD8X5fyAjg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"A nice cosy rooftop. Amazing view. And a dj was there that night. I didn't tried the restaurant but seems very charming with good food. Prices are reasonnable for a rooftop.\nStaff is really friendly.","time":1645354073,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anna Kaczkowski","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111767463909734512425/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S6HEBhegtH9fwHoD3Fi_6Hst6d0DWqo2mg8dxp3Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Great location, cool environment, quality drinks and good vibes! The most perfect location for a drink overlooking the city. One of the best rooftop views you will find in all of Lisbon. Do not miss this spot for a pre- or after dinner drink!","time":1655764756,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alec Gardner","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103024426412705021090/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tp6v917o_X1_71AJnLHB7THbZRUZ1TmSJiljkFBNQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Great entrance. Walkie-talkie service, VIP treatment through the curtain, up the red carpet stairs, 3 stories walking and you arrive breathless to a pristine rooftop with a view of the castle and if you are lucky, like I am, the moon rising over São Jorge with its pale beams of silent delight. The drinks are nothing special and the classic cocktails are butchered with “home made” ingredients that steer the ship way off course. Avoid the ginger beer like an iceberg.","time":1662845168,"translated":false}]

column8: Praia do Garrão Poente, 8135-170 Almancil, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"becky Sharp","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106456402554930048276/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbCRtN13bzIFXJ06BJn4wwIFIqtfs2ZuocFf1fO0zQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The most beautiful setting, a rooftop dining area overlooking the beach. Very chilled and relaxed. The waiter was fantastic and the food was incredible, one of the best meals I've ever eaten. I'll definitely be visiting again.","time":1664387881,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Warren Williams","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112670721092138532300/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qd7YQ5MwhaL4PEhTxeuMLYv8pq_4TsLVI_hEs2ag=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Third visit to the Algarve, Second visit to Maria’s and once again did not disappoint.

The atmosphere was a party, the band was very good and everybody got involved. Even a few celebs were up dancing.

The food was good and very reasonably priced for somewhere as exclusive and difficult to book as it is.

I had the octopus salad and the Peri-Peri chicken & my partner had the Tempura prawns followed by Tricolore salad. For desert we shared some lemon Sorbet.

After the band had finished we ventured up to the roof terrace for some cocktails and a beautiful sunset.

Highly recommend you visit during your stay but be sure to book WELL in advance.","time":1657539117,"translated":false},{"author_name":"IG ruicaroco wines (ruicaroco.wines)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115009259233092545565/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SJxvO9TgLNrbxDaz5sLbnldRQuP-1wDO3AGglK-g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Fantastic place, right on the beach... great space, great food, both traditional and more sophisticated... good wine menu... fantastic sunset... great DJ... a must go... to enjoy Life...","time":1659726801,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Devin Ramdutt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115619047556375390506/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RSlXH-GHExt2S1GZ9j6T3_6SWIYlXHXo22htVNuFw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Lovely restaurant on the beach with a large open air deck (mostly shaded). Food was good and only slightly expensive. Sparkling sangria was super tasty.","time":1655754003,"translated":false},{"author_name":"C C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104765264161215274944/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SYvtNlOj_rbkiHikHwYNJsRT3YFf2pXDIeTXzN3bA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Lovely place and perfect views. We had a drink in the upper deck and watched the sunset... the Sunset View drink is delicious. Food and wines were perfect.     *Make sure to reserve ahead.","time":1656664864,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Daniel McGwinn","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118004076150332449286/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZiRTF7cGyflWPO2YnSxvdDvrenGLPfRIRsK5oS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Great bar that has one of the better selections of beer around, and some great food too. I have no idea why Google maps insists on it being called ground when it's clearly called Grains. I have been here a few times on this holiday and it's good for just drinks or food too. Saturday had a live singer who was really good. The bar is done out well. Friendly staff. Varied and tasty menu. Their own Hanook beer is thoroughly recommended, excellent. Doughnut was lovely too. The two eateries/bars opposite are the same company and you can sit on any outside table when using any of them.","time":1572125339,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Grace Garrett","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105567095395513321583/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SIMJwXed8LVP2M4d97BuAdmgqUbRoLZH5eRQlhyA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Terrible service. Asked for a menu no one ever came to take our order. Went inside to order and staff were unapproachable. Got our beers, wanted to order more but no one ever came outside to do so. In the end went inside to pay and left within 30 minutes... Not a good experience.","time":1676750211,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lara Mills","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103763926631571897825/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R5y3bYkCfOtX5fpAkl9U79XMMPghLGKg57LDgu5A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"I used to love this place! Unfortunately, something has changed. I had a terrible experience with a very unfriendly waiter who seemed very annoyed just to give us a menu or answer questions about what beer they have on tap. The food is still okay but the attitude of this server made us not want to return again.","time":1677159392,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vijayendra Rao","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112901592998229850693/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R0ZMv6U5qWtNDhyzFgYrplQyCVADkRTF0EFJAwqQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Good place to try out beers! Unfortunately, I got a bit unlucky with my selections. All the three beers I tried were on the bitter side (even the blonde portugese one). I used to love bitter beers, but now I prefer sweeter ones like a sweet blonde or a Belgian triple.

You can get a taster of 4 beer plus popcorn for 5 bucks. It only includes beers from the tap.

The food was quite decent. We ordered onion rings (awesome batter), fried beans, tacos and bean burger. Beware that the corn carrot cob has a whole carrot in it. I expected mashed carrots.

I thought the service could have a a bit faster.

Recommended!","time":1560874279,"translated":false},{"author_name":"chaluleau cassandra","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102842226084546867521/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SIxXKCIuz4rsLIfUTMae6EOCpJcovGlj2Emt-m3g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"Very good and original burger, the waiter was very nice and he gave me a great advice with the beer. It was a great discovery
I can definitely recommande for vegans and vegetarians, the choices are quite interesting and satisfying","time":1605476566,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Dom Francisco Gomes 9, 8000-283 Faro, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Yvens Tiamou","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111529176138370036255/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q0wz-cYdy1mFTucdQ8Gxi2QlxobFAKvrkkHZFuYA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I wanted to wait until I frequented this Café a couple times before I made up my mind. This is because their menu is very large and expansive. The first time I came for Pastel Nata, the second was for a Latte, and the third time was for a full breakfast. I wasn't a big fan of the Latte, due to it being too milky. But the breakfast we ordered (Tropical smoothie bowl, smoked salmon on sourdough bread and French toast). The smoothie bowl was wonderful and refreshing, with perfectly picked fruits. The salmon was lovely, soft and melted like butter. However, the French toast was less to be desired. I think pancakes would've been the better choice, considering how they looked and most people around us ordering it. Overall, I think Chelsea have some tasty options on their menu, and some options that are underwhelming.\n\n3.5/5 stars","time":1662138778,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Teréz Bertók","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107913051945267657618/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxanrlDVK2YsNjLZVESUPLYd-NCnTDDOgXXaJk9n=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Best brunch in town! Delicious food and fast service. The staff is really nice. We have been back 3 days in a row. The eggs and pancakes are just yum! Just a tip order some extra spinach next to your eggs.","time":1650794037,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Effie Paraskevopoulou","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115920972698788931489/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sn_Wy8Jkx6D193yiaKHb-ZyCaq_rCrhXGat9NiPGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Chelsea is the place to go to find good coffee and tasty breakfast/brunch. They have dairy alternatives (soya and pea milk), and the coffee tastes good. Brunch was great, I liked the tapioca crepe as it was something different that I enjoyed. The salad bowl was flavoursome and freshly made. I also recommend their desserts- great variety to choose from.","time":1671528847,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bonnie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105423645061646879742/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaPr9U6YhSXuV3ytWGpdS3Hs4x3IrJPjDzo64XCI2I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Highly recommend on skipping the tapioca. It was the strangest texture and bland. The eggs Benny looks great- definitely heavy in the salt. Food was warm at best. The latte was great- good location. Would come back for coffee but nothing else.","time":1666445217,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ody Macedo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115454390867894337101/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RqhYyoHcE4_KY2Hh2d9gmLqYJttkppq8UUQv6ftM4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Repeat with me: the best cafe in town! Just amazingggg! The food is tasty and they also have the best coffee in the store… fair prices and incredible decoration! The cafe is amazing but 3 I went 3 times and they still not accepting cards… don’t make sense…","time":1664256979,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de Santo Amaro 25, 8600-708 Lagos, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Justyn Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102467233142379859920/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZffXQ1u3eyZgyuu08nKP33Zn17pcpdJyARXqR1=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"The food was absolutely incredible.
Tuna ceviche was one of the best dishes I have ever had at a Japanese restaurant.
All the other dishes that we had were top notch. Urumaki, Carpacio were devine. Heavily recommend. We had a delicious wine to match, Terroir mineral was her name.
Chef Ricardo came to the table at the end and was most attentive and informative. Freshest fish, delivered daily so expect seasonal changes. I can't wait to go back as he mentioned the seabass Ceviche was worth a visit.
Also, quite an extensive beer list I did not tuck into.... This time.
Can't recommend highly enough.
J","time":1674226706,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nadine","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103863664434740935882/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tl38y6VSwy-kZFUa1VSo686JKPUf4nDGhdVTrpaA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Pretty sure this is the best place for sushi in the entire of the Algarve. We’re big sushi lovers, and this is up there with what we’ve had in Japan. Fish was fantastic, melted like butter. Small downside is that they don’t have miso soup.
We will be back for sure!","time":1653208965,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106448042821226229309/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QB1GVjog7j_6_3YppkqkNycmGTAwDefDqCOH9PQQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"An average sushi restaurant.

(Caveat: I have very high standards for many Asian restaurants.) By its name, we thought it would be a very sophisticated sushi place with all sorts of options and unique plates from someone who has a high level of experience in Japan with sushi cuisine.

I am not sure if that is true or not because the offerings were not overly impressive. A lot of salmon, shrimp, and tuna, and not a lot else. Very sadly, there are other, less desirable sushi spots in Lagos with far more variety in seafood. No eel, no scallop, no octopus, no white fishes, no urchin, no clam, no crab. Just one type of tuna, salmon, and shrimp.

The tataki did not appear to be seared at all, or extremely little. Just covered in sesame seeds. (I have noticed in Portugal the idea that "tataki = covered in sesame seeds" which is incorrect. Tataki has nothing to do with sesame.) It struck me as simply tuna sashimi with sesame seeds on it. It was very tender and smooth, which was very pleasant, but lacked the slight seared flavour and fragrance of tuna tataki.

The gyoza seemed like they came from a frozen manufacturer. I don't know if this is the case, but they tasted cheap. Also the wrapper was very thick. Gyoza wrappers should be thin, not thicker like Chinese potstickers.

Salmon tartare was average also. The sauce was too sweet (most Asian sauces in Portugal/Europe are too sweet), but the salmon was fresh and the avocado base was very nicely made with bits of crunch for texture.

We had some other sort of wrapped tuna roll which tasted fine, apart from once again the sauce being too sweet, and it was sort of sloppy and hard to eat without it falling apart. Not very refined.

Wasabi had no heat and very little flavour to it at all. However, they did have good pickled ginger.

I ordered a cappuccino and got what was more like a latte/galão... but it was so delicious! Very creamy, well-made latte. It was surprising that the best thing at a Japanese restaurant was the latte.

It was an okay meal, and probably the most ambitious and "high end" Japanese food in Lagos, which is a very good thing. It is hard to find any good Asian food here anyway, and at least this place is trying to bring the level up. I hoped there would be proper variety. The chef (I think) was nice and asked about the food, so it is clear he is interested in feedback and making people happy. A very good sign.

This place does not even have a website. Just a Facebook page, which does not match with the concept of refined or upscale Japanese cuisine that a name like this implies. It is not a bad restaurant, but it is not nearly as sophisticated as the name would have people  believe. It is a fairly basic sushi place with very limited choices, but trying to do them better and more complex than other spots here.

If you like sushi and aren't super picky like I am, you will probably enjoy this a lot. It is trying hard to be good and different from those cheap/awful all you can eat buffet sorts of places here. This is the best I have had in Lagos so far.","time":1674928299,"translated":false},{"author_name":"adrian pike","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114379445686054294761/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYg9vcUPzTACgjbR0Z88xG75eb5VtsJzxxlMZvT=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We have just enjoyed a gorgeous sunset meal at this very special Japanese restaurant; the food was fresh, tasty and beautifully prepared and presented. The chef/host Ricardo was very friendly and knowledgeable and gave us some help and recommendations with the menu which is varied and comprehensive. Quality food, quality setting, quality service… perfect- thank you.","time":1635364349,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sandra Lux","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104118026335727326361/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R81fr0IUFFGPi6JEAI1ogQSH153P6jbrRlX3hSOA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Great experience (group order take-away). Ricardo went above and beyond, by not only providing awesome sushi, but also by an amazing service not everyone understands to deliver. Top of the Sushi list in Lagos!","time":1677829454,"translated":false}]

column8: Praia Do Garrao Julia’s Beach, Av. Oceano, 8135-170 Almancil, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Ange K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104062671195820900463/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QqFdsK81HRZGt8LLZCCyP3JHGL3UIkrdIHm7snUA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"What an experience, the food was absolutely fantastic. I don't think we'll need to eat for a few days. We had the chowder for starter followed by the most amazing prawns. The service was a little slow but that is only if I was being picky. It isn't the cheapest, but the quality of the food justified it. You can see how this is a perfect spot to see the sunset, we were just a little too late on this occasion.","time":1635896573,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mart A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115905513469926130370/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TU3G8nHcs8sdBrPqO3zPH4CEAMQ2M2V2Zisc00fg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"After returning after two years due to COVID-19, we returned despite some bad reviews which we can't understand as never had a bad meal in all the years we have becoming to the algarve. Throughly recommend the beach bar and restaurant, srvice very good no long wait for food, lovely location just to have a drink relax on the beach, you can even get drinks bought to you on the beach. Julia's carry on what you do best..we will be returning very soon","time":1664090577,"translated":false},{"author_name":"L. Fu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115454996062491428859/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxatLte-QYQDl9waoDfuCVHrkncPh-140TW8B1f5=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Restaurant has a breath taking view. The location is on a highly frequented beach. Reservation is highly recommended especially in high season.\nWe had mussel as entree and as main course the \"cadeira Julia\", monkfish and the spaghetti frutti de mare.  The food arrived fairly quick. The material is fresh. The taste is, well, to be honest in my opinion quite bland. The spaghetti e.g tastes basically the same as the spaghetti with tomato sauce from the kid menu. It is apparently not cooked in fond, too sweet from the straight tomato sauce without any additional spices or herbs and hence lacks any mentioanble taste, while the noodle is little bit o overdone. With the other food it is more or less the same. A little bit pity for the high class material and somehow not justifying the relatively high price.","time":1659473085,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eloise Liddell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112395184191449976096/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYwARJe4zRSm6VGtUTssXfdqcTBk-rSzh_SF1P0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Wonderful views and good food. The staff were friendly and professional but we caught them on a very busy day. We were waiting for almost 50 mins before ordering drinks - we would likely have ordered more had we been served quicker.\nHowever I would recommend a visit if in the area.","time":1629030032,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kevin Beresford","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109687270816144867882/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QC8n2vs_Tasn5N37T6YD6IgWQo1REI24Wwq1itVLk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"had lovely lunch with beautiful views we only had the lunch menu food was very tasty reasonable price for a beach bar 👍","time":1657190612,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Peter Dawes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116686076453664367528/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZKb5OcaabgfiaETFP8AtrsRTuFnu5jXLNiogGE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Ideal link to the beach and can be part of a loop linking walk along the shore to Faro Beach and a coffee, before a return along the Ludo trail. Great for watching the wildlife.","time":1652024071,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adam Sewell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101249278901052961002/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SbdEU4P82lrWru3Sw4EPGmbey1hFPiw26i2BGl=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A fun way to access Quinta do Lago beach across this long wooden walkway. Lots of wildlife (like crabs and birds) can be seen along the way.","time":1661972193,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ron Wheatley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110207763730124338371/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Se2VLEDpzb_SVi-0k1WxiEBp1bHVCUEY7YoOrvjk0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Fun day at the beach, waves and drag are quite strong, steep shelving, so watch the kids.","time":1667759584,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Martin Daly","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109419730452469218769/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QZIRlVkVvgflHZ3K6OCwthMlz8t6Sw1DIa9P2CpA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Excellent birdwatching but very busy with walkers and cyclists.","time":1647097292,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maciej Kłosiński","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107127662367685537856/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QQAbfsQAg2WurulwWqtBgzQodeRSV9aJXWJxgv=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Long wooden bridge that let's you pass over marsh to the Quinta do Lago Beach.","time":1564762857,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Waltraud Fritz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113786864792435779139/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZXCbxKQR3FQRLUzKFlkL_qtTv70P0HyBeoAy5L=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Impressive, with a huge sky, the light playing the leading role during this stroll!
The water all around you, and at this time of the jear, late January, meadows full of yellow flowers providing colourful impressions, very uplifting, and the constant breeze takes care of an invigorating walk.","time":1674554412,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Z Baghestani","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108902405004772034275/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tj0ACMo2U8ksaQAW9U2kMW2BwHuSXTHkTOsg746Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"It's a flat 7 km loop with a nice view of wetland. A lot of bikers and hikers are around. You can spot many birds","time":1679840081,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tomasz Ścisło","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111324900381868687790/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDAjODW0AbmFVtjWh2vGZBl1DgyDAjR-GQ6D6zbQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Very nice experience! We were promised flamingos and we got flamingos! Besides that it is an easy and nice trail.","time":1656170577,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dave","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111117946079874488504/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SLgV2u4jqYb-4LICt16HXozBhgXXENnxQ1GYciZQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Wow! This is one of my favourite places in Portugal, it has it all! You can park at the car park next to the airport and spend 30mins watching the planes land and take off before heading for the Ludo Trail (gotta love a take-off and landing, it's like magic). There is so much nature to see on this walk so don't forget your binoculars. Lots of birds like spoonbills and flamingos to see. Also enjoy the flocks of flidder crabs on the mud flats (when the tide is out). Follow the walk along and you can join the boardwalk to the beach, like this walk couldn't get any better! A beautiful sandy beach with lots of space and beautiful blue water. You can loop back to the car park via the beach and a very cool and long wooden bridge. Highley recommend this if your in the area.","time":1653856254,"translated":false},{"author_name":"David Tuval","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114677942865613661053/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaMk9kTPyuzAAF5iqtI125JsWTQKBxryfwQNZ0N=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Wonderful trail, especially if you have half a day. If you parked by the airport fence (this location), don’t be discouraged by the trail’s humble beginning along an artificial battery with planes taking off over your head. Many birds to see, but the best is up ahead.
After a mile or so, next to a golf course, the trail reincarnates as a beautiful wooden board walk. Continue straight on for about 3 miles, or improvise a loop via the beach and the bridge (see map photo).
To bypass the beginning, consider parking in one of the parking lots on the map (some are paid), which will get you closer to the best parts. Riding bicycles is also quite popular, not sure where to rent them, probably in Faro.","time":1631962376,"translated":false}]

column8: R. da Fonte Santa, 8125-020 Quarteira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Gina Britt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101169197840188162448/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RgeXVuYmEqBWx2-iA-PHi9kEbVwDfMCHggKSlccQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This was an authentic portugese experience, which excellent wait staff and laid back vibes. The tables are long and shared.  The restaurant was busy but everything came in a timely manner. The waiter remembered our order by heart from table of five, which was impressive.  As a vegetarian, the options were limited but I got the vegetable soup, salad, bread, butter and olives.  (the olives were complementary).  My family ate the chicken and prawns and said they were absolutely delicious.  This place is down to earth and lovely.  If you enjoy seafood this would be a great spot to visit in the Algarves.  The bathroom has in good condition and had the paper towlels that are re-usable.  I love the retro vibes and details of this place (see pictures attached).","time":1668857248,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mario Petraglia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115983900147718012980/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYdiC3pyfI9KgM-W5piajHp78oCLhJHjSEY6Xfx=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"Does this place need another 5 star review ! Well known to be the best chicken piri-piri in the area. when the food  arrives, you just dig in … Amazing tender chicken , the fries just cut right and a nice selection of wines . The casual ambiance and the friendly staff is just right for this experience .","time":1678573133,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Frank Costa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103509364883800367026/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TiQtVmJHS69b20gvybd8bevSLDQBt5PsFDVAJsLYA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"The best BBQ chicken around. I came here 23 years ago, the chicken still being BBQ on charcoal. This place is packed to eat in or take out....","time":1677034006,"translated":false},{"author_name":"shereen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115142767928410228908/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SaRI3sca5SpGRUVlYlMO1dxPgh9X0ghWtkJYn_COg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Waited 30 mins to be seated but was worth it! Spent €35 for a family of 4 and a couple drinks each. Very good value for money, speedy service and tasty food!","time":1660935584,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ignácio Correia (igcorreia)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108333356048623226026/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SZw7rMbODyeoAPNqIH4KA3nQbTbj-BYmNEP8zgWFc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"The best grilled chicken 🐔 and fresh fish 🐟. Please make sure you go early as this place is always fully packed. They have two restaurants that next to each other due to the high popularity. They don't accept credit card payments. But is a must have if you want to experience the best of Algarve food.","time":1670105153,"translated":false}]

column8: Avenida da Fonte Santa Urb.Al-Sakia", Fonte Santa Lt LEE2, 8125-020 Quarteira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Sandra Richards","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103477133222401995791/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RxGq_8o7g3sXP4XsNpw8frYulVWdTDsFZu4PsVrw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"We love our Lidl - we use it in UK so why not try it out whilst on holiday. I guess I am bias and stick to some familiar looking foods (although different brands) I love the fact that you can choose a loaf and the the bread guillotine gives you the option of thin, medium or thick to slice or cut off chunks accordingly. There are cheaper brands in the local bigger stores but on whole I still think the shopping is fair in price.","time":1677771088,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ian “Red” Redmond","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107604455076837798624/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TnHctfism5SifgJMn5pwyvMzFCvVNkZ3RsPc3ivks=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"A bit difficult to navigate as it's got completely different options to a UK supermarket but, some fantastic things you rarely see. Fresh frozen pick your own sea food for one. Masses of fresh bread, cakes and pastries to choose from. Lots of fresh fruit, salad and vegetable options. A hint though, don't always go for the biggest 🍉. Not the sweetest or most edible TBH. 😳 Great store, very helpful,  English speaking Staff who are modest about their service and achievements. Well worth a visit for a big family shop at the start and midpoint of a large group holiday! 😉🇵🇹","time":1662983508,"translated":false},{"author_name":"shereen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115142767928410228908/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SaRI3sca5SpGRUVlYlMO1dxPgh9X0ghWtkJYn_COg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Fully stocked, good range of produce at a good price.\n\n€4 for a taxi from the beach.I was staying on Quarteria beach and the shops and markets there were sufficient.","time":1660936242,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Terry Harron","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104157420056044587387/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RVyylFIdzCSGWBtYABLNMCAwfu12CQxg-rzbLoBQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This place has a nice variety. Good bakery and produce areas. Not a big store but has everything covered. Quite busy on a Sunday morning. Lots of parking. Definitely has some items not available at competing stores.","time":1669753911,"translated":false},{"author_name":"e lectrogroover","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103341039221110089921/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SYWfdTWz6MuIdkx-GeSGSdn90GHHOoE6bLCJC_7Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"A very large and clear store. You can find everything for everyday needs.  Fresh fruit and vegetables. Fish and meat. Also many prepared things in the refrigeration. If you have an apartment with an outdoor grill, you can organize your own typical Portuguese barbecue.","time":1663941206,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Adam Ogiliev","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105126328937745424485/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S08QC6b93mDlHN_EOT1zCb_BddPi5TWNhiYOrk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Best burger in town. I know picture doesn't do it justice, but this was by far the best burger I have ever had the pleasure of eating in a restaurant. Team / Guys here are fantastic, they really make you feel at home. 100% recommend.","time":1663082696,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Becky Hall","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112758251422243549688/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RasK6ugqzP9H5dq4NFRUBq8l5OUolblj_uxeGB=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Wanted somewhere to have dinner and watch sunset in the algarve. Went on Google recommendations myself and couldn't have been more happy.  Food was amazing, venue brilliant, location fab and the staff were all so welcoming and kind.  All 3 of my children came away singing BJ's Oceanside praises too and will definitely be going back","time":1660634662,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hayden Bailey","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110975891654176365678/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5THSrIPy8SnPdlpSHZUaod_-4u4-Sz5a3hpnMwTKQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Headed here on a Friday lunch at 15:00, turns out they had live music on! Pretty calm when we arrived but by 16:00 the place was bouncing. We both had the kind prawns (€40) they were excellent! Highly recommend this place for lunch on a Friday if you’re up for a lively time. If not I’d pick another day. We loved every second. Thanks Bj’s","time":1656438891,"translated":false},{"author_name":"K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110308700856331436463/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rdlo2oJQANolYywJGvF91WxmGy-Gb3nQO086FIFeU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Had a really great afternoon here, party of ten celebrating a birthday.  Food was fresh, tasty and what a great atmosphere. Live music while you dine and a great location right in the beach... Good service and the owner is hands on which was great to see.  BJ was there too, just an adorable spaniel that makes you feel at home.. would definitely visit again. Thanks BJ's","time":1653375902,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lace J","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112239196637652093352/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SNsNkDg99t70DTUWdxOZAqm2taONWhxZroNJwR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Fantastic views. Excellent service. A real find. The starters are amazing so I imagine the mains are to die for. Definitely worth a visit when in this neck of the woods!","time":1667657088,"translated":false}]

column8: Beco da Fonte Santa, 8125-020 Quarteira, Portugal

[{"author_name":"Ronald Holmberg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107487430954057634693/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QBovz6xLipUFHbU59n60PDogSz8tY_Njzy0NqWjg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Exceptional restaurants. Great views, amazing food and the roof top is just stunning.

If you get a chance to get there try the tiger shrimps Passos style and salt bake fish!

Thank you team for looking after us!","time":1656442994,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jean Kilroe","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102171279355016446367/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SkYHuGT8ZAOk86j6DgCHxT5kjv9tFzBxgr08KkrFk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"All you could seek in a good dining experience. Excellent quality food, well presented on the menu, plate, restaurant and surrounding coastal view. The tiger prawns are orga-n/sm-ic. Sole is superb too, seevice will de-bone for you. Cheese board a winner. Atmosphere great, Portuguese hotspot too. I almost forgot to mention the brown rice...","time":1670144387,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gina Britt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101169197840188162448/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RgeXVuYmEqBWx2-iA-PHi9kEbVwDfMCHggKSlccQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This place is absolutely incredible.  It has a beautiful view of the ocean and the land around it is not built up.  You walk up these long wooden stairs to get to the restaurant, which is perched overlooking the ocean.  The vibes inside are amazing.  The architecture is rustic, yet elegant.

The food is declicious (vegetarian here...).  I ate the salad, vegetable crepes, cous cous rice (with edamame for protein) and chocolate mouse.  They were all declicious!  The crepes were more like filo dough pastries on top of a bed of greens.  The salad had onions, thin freshly sliced green peppers, a yummy vinagrette and tomatos.

We tried a liquor drink naitve to portugal called Medronho (also known as fire water and the golden liquid of Portugal).  It comes with little shot glasses and a big punch.  The acohol percentage is 50%!   The chocolate mousse was filled with flavor but a little too rich to finish the whole thing.

Every time they receive a tip, they ring loud bells.  It states to watch out for the chameloens on the dunes as you are walking in but I did not see any.  The wait staff were friendly, prompt and spoke English.  This is a michelin star restaurant with high quality food.","time":1668977507,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helen Robertson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109440841045946251219/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TfronpwbBv0r46_3V1TqNlpefWbPytHflhB6DZsw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Food was very good. We had been recommended to go by friends the prawns were amazing.  Service not so good.  If you were a regular customer brilliant customer service.  It was very transparent.  We had to pour our own wine and water. Asked serveral time for dessert menu additional drinks. Very much a them and us attitude.","time":1663964089,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Robert Barnard-Smith","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108637153952403200871/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qi5aGhzIMlB2ompelw5dZloDbv4RP_SabBQoSZxQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Played golf early doors and retreated here for a fabulous late lunch with great fish lovely rose and watching the sun go down. Thoroughly recommend coming here. Cheers RBS","time":1677351680,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Cynthia Edmonds","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109855194720908849736/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb6PsEnbnqfHevdarBIN7q1HWrrbdhVFgdQwzIo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"We stopped by this tiny place for lunch that we enjoyed at their only outside table on their wee porch.

A little seating was available inside, but most people were picking up takeout.

I ordered the Veggie Breakkie on a whole grain freshly made bagel. He had the French Twist, which had two thick slices of turkey with a very tasty cranberry sauce and brie on a cinnamon raisin bagel.

We enjoyed both sandwiches. Fantastic bagels and very substantial sandwiches.

Friendly service at this cute place that changes to a burger place at night.

We returned a second time in the same week and ordered each other's sandwiches with an addition.

I had the French Twist with the addition of fresh arugula, which made the sandwich perfect! He had the Veggie Breakkie with the addition of cheddar cheese. We both had them on whole grain bagels and enjoyed them in the sun on a nearby square.

We loved them as much the second time as our first visit. We both highly recommend this place and we'll be back.","time":1668286938,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vu Tran","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110797752683053031401/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S-vT5be2C7cQJhIq2JejhvksjuVH3P3WT2nzu2tQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"Finally a REAL American style bagel place in Portugal!  If you live in Portugal you know how difficult it is to find great bagels.  This place has amazing tasting bagels and bagel sandwiches!  The 3 ladies working were friendly and kind.  The service is fast and the food is delicious!  In the evening is bagel shop turns into a equally delicious burger eatery named Illicit Burgers.  Try them out as well!","time":1679337967,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emma Jean","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104174256257615031734/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TsB-dHncVbBr6TcaoqYNOwdmTNLlDiAT_7LY3-sg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"The best bagel I have ever eaten I got the “favourite “ and added roasted vegetables on the “everything” bagel. It was delicious. Amazing combination. Great value","time":1653220816,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Madalin Chirila","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114871746135862157390/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RoQDVmVo-VM-YHy_tWRXFtzpPKajEVNyJRwNuqyKM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The bagels were very fresh and tasty, we super loved this little hidden gem, we'll definitely go again and try more stuff! We've had smoked salmon with cream cheese and bacon and egg, both absolutely smashing!","time":1637251194,"translated":false},{"author_name":"María Lucila Abal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114735889736492897930/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SMzoTZlJbZlggAxdAUXTflaUZ5Zniy14_E6dVCYg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Awesome bagels 🥯 try the veggie one and the traditional salmon and Philadelphia 😍","time":1655760214,"translated":false}]

column8: Shop 11 Trocadero Square, The Rock Dr, Lekki Phase I 106104, Lagos, Nigeria
column11:
[{"author_name":"Laolu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107991625213393202248/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RqwiT_ayU2bIsCeRcQutQssibYcXQ7IG-J92JsYw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Great place. I didn't know this beautiful place existed! Will definitely visit again.","time":1664268794,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yemi Adejuwon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102497823899627485055/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TlpGXVbMWd_MphMm0a6P3aZRjFbNQ0PZlqCMAdDQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"A really nice cafe, peaceful with a nice view and aesthetic environment. I used their co-working space and the plan (which is affordable) comes with a meal that tasted quite good. Great customer service as well; had a top experience there and will recommend 110%.","time":1668887272,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alade Ayomide","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115698463105008278960/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TNUgjNDu-bsHN2Uy_ehYawocAVoSqdWCXSTwzj7Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"I’ve been to several Cafés/restaurants in Lagos. But this particular one stands out when it comes to good coffee and sandwiches, the staffs are homely and welcoming, the environment is clean and cool…and yes!!!!… I’ve never had their kind of wings elsewhere .. it is so fresh, fleshy, and tasty. They also have a co. working space with free wifi. This place has moved to the top of my list. You need to be there!!","time":1679005700,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tomisin Adeshiyan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105788973761418783970/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RaXgpCglkl74JfwbUm_b9sDrEbCcx5E_J6sR78kg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"I really, really like this place.  Since I discovered it, it's moved right to the top of my list of co-working spaces on the island.

It simply does what it says on the box. It's a nicely decorated (bamboo and wood finishing as well as potted plants), naturally-lit space (large floor to ceiling windows on each side), with a quiet and welcoming ambience.

It's quiet enough to read a book, the coffee is great and also a good spot to network as well as co-work.

There's WiFi and the first hour is free, and you pay a reasonably priced 500 naira for subsequent hours of internet use.
