10/10 would recommend to the digital nomad / remote worker","time":1658039790,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adaeze Ereojikwe","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111034141133028279312/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tio2s4fNfLqxyhDjp355GIvOwCxnJXW2Ho5y6laQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"It's a nice and quiet spot to grab a cup of coffee and get some work done.

It's located on the 2nd floor of the Trocadero Plaza, just beside Filmhouse Cinemas.","time":1653911604,"translated":false}]

column8: Edificio Casa da Praia, Av. Tomás Cabreira loja 16, 8500-802 Portimão, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Dryic","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118266860182444783679/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TfluHGv8O4_FuBLOdjruVw2VgBhpNa8ItJ_Wxy=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I wish I could take this place home with me to the UK.
Great place to socialise. I took my family on few occasions and 6 month baby.. they all love it.

Food is delicious and always so fresh.

Protein drinks and juices fab too. So much to choose from on the menu.

Staff all so friendly and helpful.

Here are a few pics of my tasty bowls . Peanut butter choc / granola yogurt / prawn salad","time":1661851404,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Caitriona Higgins","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102987671919157336206/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxa6uJyknXyznfqg1L1yhhL21M62XCc-RJ--Y7WX=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Being a vegan I'm super happy I found this place. I came here every morning and we came for dinner also. This place is unreal for food, smoothies & juices. It's so healthy,  presentation is superb and best of all the owner is friendly & accommodating. I highly recommend this place","time":1665745559,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nathalya Musa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105845131821579486627/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwI0HiIAY-CvkbvuOl_FZisbVWFJT-9PJWeL9KE7Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Nice place with very friendly staff and affordable prices. The girl who served us was super helpful and nice. All staff speak great English. Coffee was super tasty as well as the chocolate chip cookie, however the avocado toast was a bit disappointing, lacking on flavour, I would not recommend it but the place is certainly great and full of other nice options, from açaí to pancakes. Bill for  2 was less than €15, very affordable.","time":1654727728,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pascal Becker","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117069931399267631202/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S5oyXghAiZWg0VKzJjDgUOOTtoksJ9LW7EFLol=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I'm really happy we discovered this place, we went there both mornings we spent in Portimão. Super Juice is great for its proximity to the beach and its wide range of options on the menu.

We're especially thankful for the numerous vegan options, and had two super juicy breakfasts. Options range from fresh juices, smoothies, coffees to cereal bowls, stuffed Papayas with homemade granola, sweet potato brownies up until hearty options for an early lunch.

They had a chess board which we enjoyed both mornings; the staff made us feel super welcome and we had two perfect starts into our day! We'll be back!","time":1640551251,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Morris Naqib","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105934931436624668186/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QK7zvBXhXrDesrYWtCpTrcYGAUNdMs4KoMfgUm6A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"We spent a week in Portimão and made sure we had breakfast or brunch everyday here. The food is super fresh.. the staff is awesome and the vibes are cool. Dont miss out on the tuna sandwich with grilled pineapple and peppers.. oo and make sure to order a smoothie.. too many choices.. too much goodness! Highly recommended…","time":1650199980,"translated":false}]

column3: Relaxed eatery with a rustic-chic vibe, specialized in New York-style Italian dishes.
column8: Largo Rafael Bordalo Pinheiro 32, 1200-369 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Emma Bridget Walkin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114905437399281776859/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SvaA2NUYcXmwUdHSKy9kNc3qSP7pJ14BfYTUnIpw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Came here for food but stayed for the cocktails! It's more of a cocktail bar than Italian restaurant and we were the only ones eating in a full room. The gnocchi and pizza were good, small ish portions so don't come too hungry.

The bartender was incredible. We sat at the bar and really enjoyed watching him work. His attention to detail was amazing and I would say without a doubt these were the best cocktails I've had in Lisbon (and we tried a lot!)

The staff were all very friendly and the service was great too. I would highly recommend a visit here. We were sad we only discovered this gem by chance on our last day.","time":1650727422,"translated":false},{"author_name":"U S","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118301525809857144667/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TWw94DIuVl73I6XsleVG4KBOneZTVr1bRmQmjXLQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Nice atmosphere and lovely staff. Food is good but not amazing (half of what we ordered was not available). It’s just a nice little place for a relaxing coffee.

« i swear to tell the truth, only the truth » La marquise","time":1669555017,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Antonia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106347177387918389480/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QqFKZjAFX0FdYZdDS26M4EqoLYGXgxQRjo1qNApiA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Absolutely delicious food. I'd come back to Lisbon just to visit this restaurant. We came here after struggling to find vegetarian options at some of the local restaurants.
I was giddy by the amount of choice here for vegetarians (there are also some vegan dishes) the Verde Gnocchi was brilliant!
This place has also got an incredible selection of cocktails, with knowledgeable bartenders and a well kept bar.
Overall a truly wonderful experience and dinner... And one of the cheapest dinners I've had out in Lisbon!","time":1657142006,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wild & Sea","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108232083249142971686/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SZqR7b4z7KQUF-Z1HvSPFG8YhE-pmC_I6n_Hr_8A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"We love this place!

Food, coffee or cocktail are all Excellent. Service really good too.

I think the risotto maybe our favorite..and the cheesecake pistachio

Interior design is beautiful, really well done and the space well used.

The wall paper upstairs my favorite.🐆

I did recommend this place to all my friends, they all loved it.","time":1670875993,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anastasia Balandina","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101982615030030392870/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tz0_z4xr4KzA8bYGEmzJm39wTAmNZ2lip16rcEww=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Awesome place for a breakfast. No queue in the morning on a Sunday, plenty of seating outside, although rather small inside seating space. I highly recommend going for the melon juice, as I have never had it been served it anywhere else before and it’s like drinking a melon","time":1664466861,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Pablo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107374261157786398375/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbfpeZN8DvjsDvTQbtLqgBV4IVOaDpd9FiS1pAA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Really good specialty coffee, good vibes.\nHonestly the best coffee shop in Santos. Oh, and did I say I love their gluten free cheesecake ?! Absolutely delicious. The service is also very welcoming. I just love this place.","time":1676894037,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alyona Gamm","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110211128539479167553/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbs7t4tAQCQBcBFoI23chfjCjYvFI8kjwBHm66a=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"a place where they care about the quality of specialty coffee of each cup. Very nice atmosphere and awesome music always. Try their and avocado croissant.","time":1652856671,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Angelo Neto","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111717334488700337489/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RI_sFShsE9wDizk6sgLpzvy2CTn7CXjWPadZyp1w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"This place encapsulates what is, dangerously, happening in Lisbon. Prices far away from what a regular Portuguese could afford. A croissant with berries and cream cheese and a coffee 7,70€.\nIt’s not a premium experience, neither place a with a gorgeous view. Nothing justifies those prices.","time":1661610601,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hannah Solley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106851426586575551792/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QYNpmnSbk-M_4e9V57-TWNzpIo4o_L-JroeZ3XXgU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Great nutella coffee and ham and cheese croissant. Friendly and welcoming atmosphere for foreigners, The staff was very nice and conversational!","time":1655751206,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emily L","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115685304855591628153/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxavXx3gRbYWn4APEbuqAXHwUl-zne60PRa_1Bjx=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Excellent specialty coffee experience! 🌿☕️The cafe is beautiful as the people working there, a bonus is delicious vegan cakes and fresh croissants 🥐🍰","time":1667845633,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Caitlin Ayoub","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118147322726691524980/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QfLnEXR9RyTd_qW47lr1LMrPlpU821TwKN31Cs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Worth the wait! Great brunch/lunch spot. Food and service were top notch. Good variety of options and my flat white coffee hit the spot. It was about a half hour wait for my group of 6.
My only note to bagel fanatics— while bagel shaped, the texture ad consistency is more like regular bread. Still great, just don’t except a “true” bagel ;)","time":1666560127,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Craig Veitch","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110719857978442476187/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ4B31HulPosrJAZx_MFy1m69dpbdoDxYsr9jIG=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Lovely for breakfast been 2 days in a row now. Staff great and food amazing always busy so be prepared to wait for a table but is really worth the wait. Pancakes with the banana, peanut butter and maple syrup are simply delicious.","time":1667643268,"translated":false},{"author_name":"StrenFormula","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109113203819710750852/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TVhdTO7vqnw4Y5DFVb4yHztRaHYOE4dneSA4AK5w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Breakfast cuisine, Small restaurant on the corner down the street from Metro. Food was top notch. The spot is small so be sure to get there nice and early. Dishes for all lifestyles (vegan, vegetarian and conventional) eaters.
We give this experience a 5/5.

Cheers to the cooks and waiters ect!","time":1662196435,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yiyuan Zhu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112906221312912676458/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RK9n8NT4OF0wbbYZRnm106x1gVMvqAhiASjxZPNg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Lovely affordable price for a tasty brunch! The pancakes are extremely fluffy~ people working there are really helpful & friendly, dishes served fast even when they are super busy! Will definitely go back again ^^","time":1668882117,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sonia Sortan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114498868514678647032/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SJu-vnFgYVECBwcjzYrlt2DAMVOasRZc3fXj7N4ts=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"A M A Z I N G! One of the best veggie burgers we’ve ever had! And the matcha tea was prepared in the traditional way, I really appreciated that. Many thanks to the staff, they are so helpful and nice (and speak very good English at a regular basis). Will come here for lunch again, for sure!

Later edit: we came for lunch the next day and we had the halloumi salad and papaya smoothie. What flavours and colours! Loved it!","time":1648322761,"translated":false}]

column3: Laid-back venue serving tapas, meat dishes, seafood & burgers, plus local wine & cocktails.
column8: R. António Barbosa Viana 17, 8600-677 Lagos, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Jéssica Moraes (Jéssi)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112803725367104258953/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5To1yDFgR9XzP08e7WgjbzHXS4tbnLpAliW_8gZfF8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"Restaurant has a great atmosphere and friendly employees. Food is well made, not strongly seasoning. Therefore, it is possible to taste all the flavours in the dish. I tried the Moroccan grilled chicken and had a natural juice (which in my opinion was lacking a bit of fruity taste). Overall, I recommend this restaurant in Lagos.","time":1649747221,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anthony Boudreau","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109252209703380154990/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T3JKfx9seY6h4yza6emmj40CF6RUphdvZG2Popqro=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"in the last week","text":"BARBOSA Bar & Kitchen is a delightful find for casual dining enthusiasts. This casual yet trendy spot offers a perfect blend of mouth-watering dishes and handcrafted cocktails, all served in a lively, inviting atmosphere.

The menu features an array of classic Mediterranean dishes, made with fresh ingredients. Among the favorites are the grilled octopus!

Guests can also enjoy a selection of wines, craft beers, as well as delicious cocktails.

With its warm, attentive staff and cozy, rustic decor, BARBOSA offers a charming retreat for a memorable evening.

From my point of view though, it loses a star due to the overall quality/price ratio. Delicious dishes, but the prices are quite high for what you get (probably due to the touristic location).

Overall, BARBOSA Bar & Kitchen is a great choice for a casual evening out with friends and family! Whether you're in the mood for a romantic dinner or just want to unwind after a long day, this is the perfect spot to enjoy delicious food.","time":1680363699,"translated":false},{"author_name":"marcel gerum","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112854043484226268896/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZNOafDaooL_9estAXj04ESfQl87umUGRqxFyqp=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Great!

Really delicious food and nice staff.
Our served wine was awesome as well.

We are completely satisfied and would recommend this restaurant for drinks (hell yeah they are making a great espresso Martini!)

Very welcoming staff and overall a nice and cozy atmosphere.

Food 5/5
Price 5/5
Ambiente 4/5
Service 5/5","time":1654016333,"translated":false},{"author_name":"J Lin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102558056655270417107/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZpVStiQdiGd7bNS5LQ-2FPQCFDKD9V9DkZc3dU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The service is friendly and the food is great. It has much more international options than Portuguese cuisine. It’s a great place if you are looking for some creativity in good food. We ordered the seafood plate and Moroccan chicken coccus. Both are fantastic. It’s a shame it’s not on some typical travel guides. But it might help its availability for spontaneous visitors (as many renowned restaurants here are always fully booked)","time":1659822260,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wenzel Srb","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117408133761612914427/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TYQSbtfOcx_azB8bbfjAXg-K20Lkis7UJuSLIujg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Three stars seems a bit low compared to the average score, but my visit wasn't really all that great. Let me explain...

I've been here late November, meaning it's quite cold outside, even for Portuguese standards. The doors have huge gaps, which means cold air is coming inside the whole time.

Three parties sat close to the doors, all there asked to be moved to other tables more inside of the restaurant - us included.

Than there was a suuuper loud group of folks, but I'm not counting that towards my reviews, just stating.

My girlfriends dish was good, but kinda cold (Octopus Risotto), my dish was warm, but just okay - Shrimp Curry. And our starter Tuna Tartar was also just really average. I guess most people here just come for drinks and burgers, which are probably great.

Staff was nice too. But overall it was a rather mediocre experience.","time":1637788773,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Wong Shu Ning","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111175631885931056641/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SxzsiSU6i1eVBtZZHRK1NvQdbEgxvJyWDAFVwTTw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Cosy and quaint little grocery store with the cheeriest staff. They’ve got a bunch of interesting items to pick up as souvenirs, eg. Small bottles of port wine and honey/port wine candy. They’ve also got pates and other little things to try like 1 euro for a shot of liquor. So so so cute. A little underrated stopover, but a must go if you’re in the area. Locals seem to like the place too! Gave me major mama shop vibes from SG. Owners are friendly, warm, and we’re one of the highlights in our short trip to Porto. Shoutout from Singapore! ","time":1671117461,"translated":false},{"author_name":"MF Hsieh","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112188867172724512318/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T7TrtARMQT1rAcInQ65L2Xryl40niha8VdqdgD4xc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Very friendly staff. Full of variety. We bought lots of stuff and paid 43 Euro.","time":1655740933,"translated":false},{"author_name":"vivian Teh","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107429409488881288317/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RxN2F3Vn4D5fiTNqKy541KI_tR5lXw6cmOkN2ApBE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"Not a normal traditional grocery shop that you can find anyway, its exterior is so colourful very pretty.","time":1553461962,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Claudia Cavariani","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103635796229980401747/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ssl6lix-m4_kGLVG253agLKgmI4BaPc6ITMGV4jzU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"In a city that is becoming super touristic and where locals run away from places like Lello Bookstore or Majestic Cafe, this shop/cafe keeps being an authentic place to have a traditional bite. Service is super friendly.","time":1515174112,"translated":false},{"author_name":"José Manuel de Almeida Freitas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103430110543502770106/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RmdHYhKq__Iiuh6LRkq3SlBusOJ2OdR6cq5lfe=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Excelent food shop. It is the most beautiful shop of it's kind in Porto city. Very varied dry fruits and nuts. Also excellent quality cheeses and sausages of different regions of Portugal.","time":1499632146,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Phoebe Yuen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106160856863663924266/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbrpLhaVhJs9Ab1X1Nl7CJaUnP5VoumvkdEv3tR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 weeks ago","text":"Well located cafe by the station. Staff are very friendly and speak English. Food we ordered were very good, especially the sponge cake pão de ló, €3.50. Highly recommended.","time":1678457221,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Greyson Lewis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111985567727482337293/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWpZN2m0wpxeQbPkIO-ntLg7J-dUhSKQ41HBUPLw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Excellent bifana, delicious caldo verde, low price, kind service. Go here!","time":1663158218,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michelle Trinh","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105855385428108416062/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ttd3GGAQqX4j4qg4S3FFuOJSiBXzj3uVFtaGq6Wu8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"A little cozy and cute place which served very tasty spicy pork sandwiches (bifana), caldo verde (Kale soup) and papas (a thick soup cooked with blood and shredded meat). They have Superbock in tin/copper barrels. The services were fast and friendly. The cost is very cheap as well. 2 of us 2 bifanas, 1 caldo verde and one papas, 1 water bottle 1.5l and the total cost was €8.5 Highly recommended!","time":1608129900,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tatsu T","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108323932944054846046/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SW8LVg6VHt81CIJu2M3GJJ3IbGnrlpMNlz5BAF=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"This is the most delicious Bifana in Portugal.","time":1673731716,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lo Lita","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117584905979058952875/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S1_6_kZKMLIHMi7uJcgmX0dryngY4S-3Wo4_Hqwg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"This is a great place across from the Porto Train Station, grab a bifana sandwich and a drink to-go.\n\nThe bread is fresh, soft, the sauce that they pour over your pork, melts the cheese and all that goodness into a delicious bite, nom nom snack on the train back home!","time":1634489662,"translated":false}]

column3: Belle Epoque-era cafe with ornate interior featuring carved wood, mirrors & chandeliers.
column8: R. de Santa Catarina 112, 4000-442 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Akari","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112082158645306442911/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZqvH7OMevO-E1g1QuX5UuPzFi77p--GTzFooMIw6s=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Menu was overpriced but I knew what I was going in for. At places like these you will be paying more for the aesthetics than the quality of food… although, the food were actually great! The francesinha and chocolate cake I ordered were both pleasantly delicious. Plus a cup of white tea made it even better.","time":1679776501,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Reizl","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115700202774167766404/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R4HFzk5WQH7uxKl8KAH2-TGso51h3KDbucneUg3g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Many travellers said if you visit Porto you must visit the Majestic Cafe. Very old cafe in town near to high street and you can do shopping here.  Foods are average but the French toast with little surprise and taste was good, chocolate cake not too dry not moisture and taste not bad and not too sweet, cappuccino was good. Little pricey, friendly staff, served foods in good speed although expecting a queue to dine in but we were lucky when we arrived at 16.00 we have seat after waited 5 minutes.","time":1666051827,"translated":false},{"author_name":"SPICY","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104874332399015491514/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RVx0PCM6oJGEUvRtFJYy6ONwPbYfYDSsMGHA4VKRA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Expensive and long wait for table but worth it. Majestic French toast, Majestic seafood soup and cheesecake are all best but not the best coffee in Porto. No rush service here your can take time as much as you need here but don't expect service to be fast.","time":1653555444,"translated":false},{"author_name":"CIGDEM AYYILDIZ","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104519127438478979617/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TMOP4WoLuQI0qMi5vE9eC60LnMjYFMS5-abKlFEg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"We had chocolate cake and almond tart and tea here. All were delicious. Historic atmosphere. Loved all these but a little over priced. Thanks for the experience","time":1658487279,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Davide Messina","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115296817986539764260/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RqOMzU4-tE2_nRMdtbofCMbwnqOMF2SBmJOTbnUt8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Nice but overestimated. The service is ok but the offer is very limited, not outstanding and definitely overpriced. I have been here because of my wife whom forced me to go. It's always packed so you must wait to be seated. I got a chocolate which was the worst ever at a price of one pizza, my wife got a French toast which of french has only the name and price. If you wish pictures, I suggest you enter to use their toilet and then walk out.","time":1662813900,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de Sá da Bandeira 637, 4000-453 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Alex Pennypacker","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104545188986341714010/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZaqYXab7JXo90yISoMxs9j8m192KFXL24OtfFM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"If you enjoy chocolate or would like to have something different as a souvenir from Porto, this is the place for you.  Homemade chocolate in unusual flavors (e.g. whiskey, port wine or mango).  A very cozy ambience, stunning fragrance and a very friendly atmosphere and competent advice complete the impression.  Anyone looking for discounter chocolate is wrong here ☺","time":1654636074,"translated":false},{"author_name":"P","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102212772656690309984/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbTeqEMVXz5-ZX0VyjJCdc5A_2pTZPJ1NwVnRD-=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Exquisite! I especially love the milk chocolate pieces. I bought a mid-sized box for €25. Now I wish I had bought the biggest box; I can't get enough. The staff was helpful and patient while I deliberated what flavors to select. My purchase came with a postcard and descriptions.","time":1649349619,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kang Zi Jing","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107991870406422666023/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QodElLQajc9v6HCwBn8vlQL7ShpMQCNRveMXfr=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Top notch impeccably presented chocolates that make for perfect gifts and taste exquisite. Missing star just because I thought it was slightly priced (I’m comparing this with other renowned brands like Läderach and Sprüngli). Staff were professional, helpful and approachable.","time":1677769541,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hermut Loehr","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102335372051552248222/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYqdbarx-Ame9uuEcf7aOW41f7sjwRW5gJQcqlS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"I knew what i was looking for, but i was positively surprised by the excellent quality of the products. Hopefully, the producers will benefit from the elevated prices, too. Kind service. Go and see for yourself!","time":1679522273,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Amber Olivia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104547678470296200606/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SmiZXxeFA3gjdCa94fIHj6BmlanaX32avGuI4a=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Delicious chocolate, beautiful shop, affordable prices for well made chocolate. Recommend the truffles and milk choc if you are used to an English chocolate style","time":1680183259,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Gonzalo Martín Amador","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115893558977841271175/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SqqNhyl_y9PzTqpY1AZt_oyTDmv6614t_oJxt6GQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"It is a hidden gem in the center of Porto between beautiful streets.
Here you can find products at an incredible price, even taking into account the incredible views that the place has. It's really surprising!
The staff is very friendly and always greet you with a smile.
We will come again!","time":1658329388,"translated":false},{"author_name":"JC M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114422142166922072581/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZP5-Je_dcBmTpzxMdPY2hwghxGYlRRmaiH2Ef6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great establishment I’d recommend to anyone coming to Porto. This is a historical site and organization with knowledgeable, charitable, and welcoming staff.

View is outstanding, drink selection is expansive, wish I could attend one of their events but my stay in Porto was only three days.

This is a bar so expect bar food. It is cheap and pretty flavorful as far as bar food goes. €2.50 Bifana","time":1668634634,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helena Carrie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104850626100714402877/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SQyu4OHcnxNs0Xf4j4Zxub_gtirGdphItnZq-M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Hidden gem - no frills, but fantastic location and drink spot! Best place to sip a beer, enjoy the sun and see the bridge and Douro river. Not to be missed. Small - but good looking selection of food. Must visit!","time":1654530600,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luigi Sciarrone","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111510958780765682479/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S1Z4K2KmdI9GXZa_LGwHU32ZNJUBf7dZY30MkA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Strongly suggested place to visit/eat/drink in Porto if you are looking for a local casual scene. Amazing view on the Douro and the Luis I Bridge; huge variety in the menu for both drinking and eating, including local stuff; very nice atmosphere with music, chill vibe and nice people around; very reasonable prices; toilets did not miss anything. Straight 5 stars for me!","time":1659465931,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Paul Murphy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102378527602838419241/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYpzfmLmgDlYkNzfL3NJuk0kgy9FE8ct1aCc9h_=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Perhaps the football club with the best view!
I spoke to one of the staff who told me a little about the history. The club is a small local club who now play their matches up town. More a social concept about for looking after the old community and where the soccer/sport is secondary. A great idea and worth supporting. The view from their terrace is pretty good also.","time":1654037545,"translated":false}]

column3: Arched bridge carrying low-level road & a high-level metro line between Porto & Vila Nove de Gaia.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Rishi M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102790699119463797650/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T0wXziqFh0i5kdnf6PUrrpV1xIJV_MsX1rXsNIVEI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"It’s one of most beautiful locations in Porto hence a must visit. Take a walk on the bridge and do a cable car,  costs €6 per ticket and have a nice walk along the river with plenty of options to eat and drink. You can come back through the cable car by buying a return ticket for €9.  It becomes really beautiful during the sunset time.","time":1644972165,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yevheniia Vishnevskaia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105899819890941508792/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RtAEUcTEPHsfoV2bCeuE3-POaFszWnaPqvw9t7JKI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"This is the most beautiful attraction in Porto.  When you walk along the top of the bridge, the height seems prohibitive, the view of the city on the river and the trams that rush past is wonderful.  The only moment the bridge is partially under reconstruction now, and almost half of the lower part is covered with building films.","time":1657016249,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adrian M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103835090223588760426/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKqAY2v3nfokdCk3QqzQKjdf0HQ5XRb0069btdz2I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba8","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"It's a must visit place in Porto, and as a pedestrian crossing the top level with trams and sidewalks.  On either side and especially to the south you can walk to viewing points to look back and marvel at the engineering, design and beauty of the bridge.  From the top of the bridge, you can get good views of Porto, the south and the Douro river that separates them.

The bottom level is currently closed off to cars, and pedestrians are directed to one way lanes to cross that have limited areas of viewing.","time":1664482146,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kai","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108280103532659984412/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TczvHhfsTU958BbLgxm4JQO7SNJtcQU5Fd3k5IqcM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Beautiful work of art. Visited in the end of March and there were so many tourists - I cannot imagine how it is in the high season, summer 🙈 But it is the most magnificent building of Porto, so it is understandable :D
They are renovating the lower level at the moment. Be aware of the train on the upper level! Absolutely stunning views to Porto! Be there during Sunset, when it it the most beautiful!","time":1680119400,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109536917295751724835/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T_dRSc1STTA7jVIou5kDj0KqG7kWeLh-b6BBq2rj4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"A beautiful walk along the bridge. Such a gorgeous view with scenery to match. Well built and kept quite clean. It was quite windy when we went and it was a strong wind so can be a bit daunting but otherwise a completely fun experience.","time":1648495391,"translated":false}]

column3: Iconic, buzzing, no-frills snack bar known for unique hot dogs & classic Portuguese sandwiches.
column8: Tv. Cimo de Vila 4, 4000-434 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Frederick Rijos","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112902887497716570442/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZsA2yhkg1v0Afoy462OeqL3ALEpEJHwJLNSHty=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"My wife and I went to this spot and we loved it. The staff was amazing, very friendly and the service was fast. They were pretty busy. However, they were still providing outstanding service. I ordered the cachorinho and my wife ordered the beef sandwich. They both came out hot and where delicious. I had the Super Bock Stout and my wife had the regular one. The price was very reasonable compared to other spots and restaurants in the area. We would definitely go back and recommend this place to others.","time":1655847165,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Davide Messina","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115296817986539764260/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RqOMzU4-tE2_nRMdtbofCMbwnqOMF2SBmJOTbnUt8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We've especially search for this place to taste their famous sandwich and the wait was worthy. The bread is warm and crunchy, the sauce and the sausage are very delicious. I suggest you order 3 piece in two people. We sat outside and it was windy but inside was dark and packed. Price very low, I recommend.","time":1662798642,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Don Christie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105774590846463681242/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RBtAa7EFVyCdqlae_LfLO5RSbIU7H3pQO8mZg9OA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"On the smaller side but still very tasty the special €4.30 hot dog was a great lunch.
Chopped in many fingers with stretchy moss arepa cheese and has a slight chilli spice to complement the crunch from the grill.
The fried seemed homemade and rustic, but sitting outside they went cold very quickly.
The beers we icing cold and all together the bill was €14.80
Definitely worth trying out if you just walked the bridge!","time":1672678646,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gregory Z","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115675571717078315549/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TLfqhmWrhcQMJUZj5-RaCDDIKlG6I87F41IXGYThg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Delicious hotdogs with a fun atmosphere. I went for their classic hotdog and some chips which were made fresh and were delicious. They also had a selection of Super Brock beer which paired with the food quite well.

Have to say that the guys who work there also create a fun and friendly atmosphere with their banter with the customers","time":1669222190,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Chi Pham","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105019665237020758737/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RrJJ-cSIiNPp0XYFm3j3dXpjoGM6tsuvZU8SOzDQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"This place was real busy when I visited around dusk. I luckily got a seat and was served food quickly. Their hot dog with spicy sauce was great for a quick bite and would go so well with beer. Would recommend this for an afternoon snack!","time":1672308625,"translated":false}]

column3: Historic riverside promenade with terrace restaurants & bars below tall, colorful townhouses.
column11: undefined

column8: R. de José Falcão 32, 4050-315 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Caroline Munier","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101450852011652208891/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q5pytNG2cqro6DA7ZFalMYlyoxI87hgNIJIrRXXEI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Amazing food 😍I love the idea to be able to choose everything - from the dough to the toppings. I really loved the food and the place until I went to the toilet and it was extremely dirty and the doors for the girls bathroom is broken so you can’t even close it. So then I started wondering how is it in the kitchen but I preferred to not think too much about it and focus on the food that really taste good, I would have gave 5 stars if the whole place/experience was amazing !

Ps: we went around 3pm so we didn’t queue at whole :) and the person who served us was really nice 👌","time":1675712340,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Monika Maria","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103911790545008706928/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTmSgEM7ow-qJrUuzPh3HDHovyGPcsU8G8dRNGxw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Be prepared to queue outside and have a really long waiting time. But people queue for a good reason because the pancakes are really delicious. And the best - you can build your own pancake and put together whatever you're craving for. The team is also very friendly. Overall a really pleasant experience.","time":1652791415,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Human Zacharia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103353242331977933467/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb-C5qFkXfuHWrTHPyxApMiy5G_4zX8uLNUmMiH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"O Diplomata is a cute cafe with a design your own pancakes menu. These are definitely the best pancakes you will find in Porto. We ordered one stack with chantilly and strawberries and a second stack with caramel, chantilly, and Portuguese biscuit crumble. I wish that maple syrup came standard with the pancakes rather than as a topping, because while the stacks were delicious, it felt like something was missing.

We also tried the toast with goat cheese, eggplant, and jam. It was good, but had more goat cheese than any of the other toppings. I wish the menu had more savory options including additional options for eggs beyond just scrambled eggs.

The service was great, Elena our host and server, was energetic and super friendly. I definitely recommend this cafe for pancakes and a great vibe. Please note, they are a cash only establishment.","time":1643759406,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anne Megan Davies","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100471236534974450096/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TacI7lZk1FjgtOjeHHQ_SiC5YvbKko60HHL76GNtU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We went here for pancakes of course! You can get vegan pancakes here too. They were really good. I wish there was a chocolate option with the vegan ones but otherwise I can't complain. The service was also really good. Super friendly and welcoming staff. Recommend!","time":1647357847,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christina Shakira","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109301437113936440274/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYHbqLWbOp0CLfrHK45hzaMB-abUgdMPe_-g6EL=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Amazing little place!!!
We loved the cozy and chill atmosphere!!
We had pancakes, coffees, eggs, everything was delicious and it is very cheap!!! We paid only 20€ and got so much stuff ( much cheaper than most places in Porto)
I totally recommend, loved it!!!!!!","time":1671634596,"translated":false}]

column3: Sung bar with a buzzing atmosphere & a terrace with an olive tree, offering light bites & drinks.
column11: [{"author_name":"Alexander K","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118196535665844435208/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SpC5xHi5bprwvPQlv16UzogspldXA7yS_SWIPdAQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"What a cool spot! Tucked away with great outdoor seating and plenty of inside booths as well. Cheap cheap wine and the food was great. I had starters and they were basically meals. Can’t imagine main courses. I loved it here, I hope everyone can make the trek up the hills to visit. 5/5","time":1676736705,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christian Weger","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106208699499264540780/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SiidQLXvVGubaDa9l_6M-mVimgVDK_teJ9j0Pdww=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"My absolute favourite place in Porto. Great drinks, coffee, and small dishes. Cool crowd, relaxed atmosphere and always a great playlist. Perfect for meeting friends and people watching. I think I came here every single day for a month.","time":1667325187,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helena Carrie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104850626100714402877/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SQyu4OHcnxNs0Xf4j4Zxub_gtirGdphItnZq-M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Fantastic local spot. Brilliant wine and food at very cheap prices. Service is great - and the perfect little spot to sit and watch the people of Porto. A must visit spot away from many of the tourist traps. Top recommendation!","time":1654530811,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Annette Patterson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109138981002388669546/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q_-H4MEbehAXg0Z3QmPmWK6bAzZnJY6KXvKQu_4B8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Stopped by here for a drink on our way to lunch and we were greeted by Sergio who was extremely informative about the wines of Portugal. Gave us a few wines to taste before we ordered as well as excellent service and he was extremely pleasant. He made my daughter a fresh Mojito which was excellent and we were served a beautiful cappuccino. Very pleased and the price point is excellent.","time":1663070236,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bálint Kósa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113896970730846952219/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RUWzJSf_1BqocUc3ONdVZM6Q5OgLnL79cXWywCe60=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Favourite bar in Porto! Cozy atmosphere, good vibes, decent prices, great and very kind people. Usually full, as it is not too spacious and lots of people like it, understandably.","time":1672692203,"translated":false}]

column3: Lavishly designed historic book store with an art nouveau exterior & a winding wooden staircase.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Gonzalo Martín Amador","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115893558977841271175/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SqqNhyl_y9PzTqpY1AZt_oyTDmv6614t_oJxt6GQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Whether or not you are a fan of Harry Potter, this bookstore is one of the must-visit places in Porto.
I would say that getting your ticket online is a MUST if you don't want to waste a lot of time in the queue. Seriously, the lines at this place are insane. When you book your ticket online you can select the time you want to enter and it is important that you are there at that time. Thanks to this you will be able to avoid the queues (at least we were able to avoid the queue the time we went thanks to this).
When you arrive at the site, tell them that you have reserved for X hour and they will tell you what to do.
The bookstore is beautiful, it looks like something out of a story. Of course, if you want to take a photo without people... good luck because it is practically impossible unless you arrive first thing in the morning.
Inside you can find a wide variety of books and also Portuguese literature. They have their own bookstore collection with some of the most iconic books, these having special covers and decoration. With your ticket you have a discount of 5 € to buy books (the price of the ticket).
In short, a must-see in Porto, as long as you book online and manage to avoid the queue, because if you don't, you will wait a long time in line, losing time for other activities that you can do in the city.","time":1658494455,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jeff White","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104361925432422808821/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYnoUDVGjiYRztb_tn1wsYAjhdYd7SEqpAvn4TO=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Beautifully designed.  Total tourist trap.
Small book store with a very limited selection of books.  Definitely caters to tourists with the book selection.   €5 entrance charge but they do credit you that much if you purchase a book.

The stairway is beautiful but good luck getting a picture without someone posing on it.

The staff was very friendly.

Not really worth the wait in line if you are looking for an actual book and not just a social media post. But the staff was nice and it is beautiful inside.","time":1664735234,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dessie Hristov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103922617217014518735/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SV9GVE5DN3_MCw_c6PjLbUs3GRoMWS_ka1scuRlCk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"A phenomenal place to visit! You get back in time in a place that has all the bells and whistles! Every detail is amazing - from the central staircase to the ceiling and side columns! Soak up the atmosphere of the grandeur of past times... They do have some organization in place but it is still quite crowded! €5 to get in which goes towards your purchase if you buy a book. I would highly recommend making that ticket purchase online and prior to getting there because the line is quite long. The online purchase puts you on the shorter- fast track line. The prints are elegant with gold finishes - they make a great gift! You can also pick a recipe book or a city guide with amazing photos! I would highly recommend this place!","time":1665277151,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Verónica Díaz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100769562722174255701/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R-kCiWvqzIrEWK_hgWib-p41-YYQm0pIJRktb4flc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"Very beautiful place inside, it's small place but it's a nice location to visit and take photos. You have to pay 5€ per person to enter, the books were pricey but is to expect since is a tourist attraction. We came on a Tuesday at around 14:00 and it was busy, hard to walk around, very limited space, my advice will be trying to book or come in a less crowded time so you can have a good experience and not feel overwhelmed.","time":1679470201,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Susan Hiltz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109010579254602025952/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbyhP3BG-YWsTIh8lIvKd0AvM3gQVVpVx7MAEbt=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We walked up from our Apartment on Douro river... 30 minute walk. Very interesting to walk though ... 5 Euros each but if you buy a book that 5 Euros goes towards it.
Buy your tickets on line with the time you want to go in. So much easier than doing a line up to buy tickets... when wait until the time that is given to you to get in another line to enter.","time":1662818301,"translated":false}]

column3: Baroque church with a marble altarpiece & a 75-m bell tower that is a symbol of Porto.
column8: R. de São Filipe de Nery, 4050-546 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Wenyi Lee Stones","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107577338002407594863/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T8hSgx02pPfXjWayeZ0bm1chVksrAbV-QI47yKJYY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"A cool tower with a magnificent church and nice museum inside. Climbing up to the tower you can see the city with a 360 degree view. However, the information board is incorrect in stating that Taipei 101 is in China. It is In Taipei, Taiwan. 🇹🇼","time":1648289127,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vishesh Saxena","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104358061443672971620/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S2SkLeEtZCWDZdv1IQPV7t6qBXQulW5F10evXQTw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Beautiful museum and the view from top of the tower is incredible. There is a ticket of 6 euro per person. The museum has some really interesting articles related to brotherhood of clergy.\nThere are a lot of stairs to climb for the top of tower.","time":1671920671,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katarzyna Waszczuk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111093320876080945247/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SOkFXDqjG502BYquW5b5XofuGOkC92Wn_EJLwP=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"A very pleasant church.  We visited on a Sunday and happened upon a concert and an exhibition.  If you come across such a combination, it's worth to sit down and just lose yourself in beautiful music.  There is a nice little shop at the back of the church.  Unfortunately, we did not visit the tower.","time":1675640866,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Soufiane Mamri","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118150307413868143554/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QLkkFKL9vRrjKuJ75TiG_BzlqK-FlXzNXyiEKPQA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Full 360° view on the entire city at the highest point. The tower is 76m tall and you'll have to climb it all by stairs. You get to visit the entire church and all the rooms. The church itself is nice but not as impressive as all other churches in the city. The visit is totally worth it just for the tower, go for it.","time":1662896394,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Abbie Auster","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113571262942124953649/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QQ0SncEZuYY3uDzCOJyzvBNR0giq3oNe59jpFgU8w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"The Igreja dos Clerigos is worth a visit if just for the view. The adjoining church has some magnificent architectural detail and art, but truthfully we had a bit of church fatigue at this point in our trip, and without much description of what we were looking at, it was hard to differentiate this church from the many others we'd seen. The tower itself though has the most fantastic view of all of Porto which is worth the wait. Keep in mind the tickets are timed so you can't just show up and walk in. You either need to buy your ticket in advance or you have to wait.","time":1656117039,"translated":false}]

column8: Praça Guilherme Gomes Fernandes 47, 4050-293 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Adrian M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103835090223588760426/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RKqAY2v3nfokdCk3QqzQKjdf0HQ5XRb0069btdz2I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba8","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Was walking past and decided to drop in to try this place for an eclair and coffee.  I tried the Classic which had an ever so slightly crispy pastry, but overall it was very sweet with the sugar intense chocolate top, and sweetened cream filling.\n\nThe coffee was decent and helpful in balancing out the sugar.  I wouldn't suggest getting a sugary drink like a hot chocolate with an eclair unless you have a really sweet tooth.  They're decent eclairs and worth a try, but be prepared for a sugar hit.","time":1664736918,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hanh Nguyen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102393772277727279274/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxatcH7NPYU89cUEgTb59HGAkDtY8eir4ie2xbJJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Local pastry shop where you can sit down for coffee and teas as well.  Spacious sittings indoor and outdoor. I thought the prices  are quite expensive, over 3 euros for a small eclair.  My husband’s chocolate eclair was hard and not as good.","time":1677520430,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ana Filimonova","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104720149661374380849/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TRNIgUcf_qXnXpViqC3PhTLy9qy3rH1psLOffqrA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Interesting local experience, variety of éclairs, with fruit and chocolate toppings with a gentle cream inside. I'd love to have prices on the menu as they are absent and sometimes crossed out. In a whole, the place is enjoyable and definitely worth visiting in Porto because of its unique character.","time":1667122296,"translated":false},{"author_name":"E P","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110428589602200112774/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T_tkm1RPVkDSiW57F28sbyGHeUhY74Pt5jPTS6La0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Eclairs were generously sized and not expensive as you'd think given the status of this confectionery. Try to come as early as possible because a lot of flavours sell-out quite fast. We tried the classic and forest fruits flavours.","time":1654239639,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Riccardo Tosetto Photography","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100233282636589448666/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QDANIrLdu5mee7NRDdgwnzNkg18CkzAHmHKSub4A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The perfect place for a break during your exploration of this beautiful city. Amazing in the morning if you want to be kissed by the sun, in the evening looking for a quiet place for the afternoon break. Coffee is very and unexpectedly good being Italian, tea is very good as well. And well..eclairs are amazingly good with a super variety. Still thinking about them! Don’t miss this place because it’s absolutely worth it!!","time":1637789363,"translated":false}]

column3: All-day brunch served alongside cocktails, coffee & juices in a cool, industrial space.
column8: Praça de Carlos Alberto 86, 4050-158 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Sarah Zup","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110508917547053996080/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RCWXPneloXMzinQQp9c2zl2wV_wZrz0LkKvzVE4D8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Beautiful plates, generous and tasty food. Always crowded like in Lisbon, they have a waiting list at the entrance and need to wait to be seated. If you're lucky like us, groups before you will be too hungry to wait and leave the queue so you can enter quicker.
Zenith eggs and all pancakes are really good and very generous. Friendly service, a bit pricey like every trendy brunch place, but nothing excessive.","time":1673193413,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Diem Allis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107338864328157080386/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QS9_2uSKZmXJg70gfdSS0NI8CYXW-Yb8UxJ-wAnMs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Amazing food and great service.  There was about a 15-20 minute wait.  The presentation of all of the food was spectacular.  Some of the portions were smaller than expected but were still delicious.  The croissant sandwich was small but very tasty.  The berry pancakes and Nutella pancakes were yummy as well.  The French toast was great as well.","time":1665952360,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adrian Sikora","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114705769625217877382/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Szro5njghyODVPnfr52ZWsSI95EylBM-pjBq54IQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"This is one of the best restaurants I have ever been. With the first visit we got addicted.
Here You can brunch all the day. The food is incredibly good. I really recommend the bowls and the ridiculously stunning vegan pancake 🥞.
The drinks are very nice. The atmosphere is legere and people very diverse. The best is the team.
Awesome service. very polite and nice.
You can stay here for hours, drink, eat and enjoy the nice Vibe.","time":1665237023,"translated":false},{"author_name":"dolce bibobi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113755863430044252682/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Srn18AVdOiiovcujSQry5SSZ2dxa6VqNbEZyg4XA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Really delicious breakfast / brunch place. The food had great flavours and the portion is quite big so good value for the price charged.

There’s nothing much to say, we loved everything so it has my recommendation if you’re looking for a place to start off your day!","time":1671402493,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eric C (The Canadian)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111299021940834383886/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RhIPvty5-GhmGcAEX0mW0TC7_fJwFoRzbkt-XW=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"The patio fills up quickly for Brunch. Turn over is decent. Service is quick and very attentive. Pancakes were fluffy and delicious. But I have to say I do miss maple syrup, Ice cream will have to suffice though. My wife’s eggs Benedict with bacon was more than enough for her, I unfortunately had to finish it for her. Great Aperol Spritz in a city of Port Spritz’.","time":1653063081,"translated":false}]

column3: Warm, rustic boutique stocking vintage & locally designed apparel, accessories & housewares.
column11: [{"author_name":"Waymeo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116393209609376292799/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RSTY0hclvPWJ8RmwDKSMDzHhvKwt9i_cIRAshH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"A very interesting store with a mix of unusual homewares, personal items and vintage clothing that is beautifully presented. Great for unique gifts.","time":1639382813,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Patrícia de Toledo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106368049672560387615/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5StNs9C5nqsDd-ecHBzWNXByoFu0raNJqxzPA95FZs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Cool concept store with coffee/restaurant in the back.","time":1677433487,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Volker Pilz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104252440417156164194/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5ShqKqrZggae4FfIt9jzh-bQLobZTS5gav9-ySk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Super nice shop offering a mix of vintage and local products. Friendly owner and a very good selection of different goods. I've bought a leather belt from a local designer and am super happy with the quality and style. A little gem in Porto!","time":1503944000,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yuxi Chen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110979418244252960768/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TIpVBk0JsWJsL1DuyXJHCr_nxQqIiJHbDM5b0dFQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Super cute store, well curated. There’s a small japanese cafe in the back with outdoor seating area that serves japanese rice balls.","time":1662631507,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lara","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107051034713760476279/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ty-9gk3UDUN1kzmJBIA8fb5P0N17JRUMu4PS2U-Io=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Beautiful shop! There is a Japanese cafe in the back that looked lovely as well","time":1666101393,"translated":false}]

column3: Compact, unassuming eatery preparing traditional, homestyle Portuguese specialties.
column8: R. de São Nicolau 1, 4050-561 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Emily McKenna","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102359647307726119957/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SlU8BMgOOaWCULpKgs1s9utzoc0lrvOz8z0vyXag=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"My experience here was not bad at all, but i do think it is overhyped, considering all of the wonderful food to be had in Porto.

Pros: friendly and attentive service.
the location is great, it’s tucked away off of the main river walk area.
the interior is very small but gorgeous.
the cod coquettes were fantastic

Cons: be prepared to wait. We arrived right at noon when they opened (we did not have a reservation) and there were already four other couples waiting for a table. this place fills up fast.

i ordered the highly rated octopus with rice and just found it to be okay. the octopus was well cooked but a little overly breaded for my taste. the rice was nothing special

my husband got the cod and it was not very good. the sauce was very oily and the boiled egg was way over cooked. the fish itself was tasty and cooked well.

overall the experience was fine but not worth the hype.","time":1662734156,"translated":false},{"author_name":"C Zhao (Cody)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111494182255383535449/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QYFg0FoiI1VGt2jAa_3V35gtYFnc7WQdtvTf9bxw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This is a restaurant you must try once if you are in Porto. The foods are delicious. Highly recommend the grilled king prawn and prawn in garlic sauce, also the octopus rice is very interesting and tasty. We try to come day before and they are packed and lucky to try again day after to manage get a table. Better book a table or you may end up waiting. Alternatively try to come off peak time and easier to get a table.","time":1657647744,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Savitri Balram","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116041138243874532252/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QB9kqATjV0SPijKwaY4XLBnpdkxzdpLmuyqmXIEg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Came across this restaurant via a local reviewer. We were lucky to get a table just before the lunch rush. Tasty dishes, but slightly salty and oily for my tastes. We had the octopus salads and the cod with potatoes.","time":1670861083,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108015902385376846927/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbVWiRcoBfHQHXrHXUIq13pAu8WNcShK00BFnI4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"This restaurant was rather disappointing considering looking at the reviews. There was something a miss with each dish. Great portions for the prawns however it was too salty. The seafood rice had a bitter taste, lacking depth of flavour and so watery. Rather expensive compared to other restaurants which serves better quality and dining experience.

I understand it gets busy in the restaurant but I advise future diners not to queue as unfortunately it wasn’t worth the wait.","time":1664650209,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Danny Want","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118074396884678145422/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaXZH3jDAdOSdGl-YgrXwt9Yr0pgXgl0n7tYqeY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"Highly recommended. Food was incredible. I had the veal stew and my partner had the prawns in garlic sauce. Both were unbelievable and portion size for both was on the large side of things. Service was very quick and really friendly! Would highly recommend, and book ahead of time if possible. Otherwise get there early.","time":1649761653,"translated":false}]

column2: Gaia cable car - Cais de Gaia station
column8: Av. de Ramos Pinto 331, 4430-233 Vila Nova de Gaia, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Luka Vierroth","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115523602730713824008/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWwXnheZ1xM5RJkgHS2fiPSK7hJZLqoAtiraW9wg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"A bit pricey for a short trip (while 6€ isn’t much, for 20 seconds it may very well be). But it provides a great view over the beautiful city of Port while also accommodation for your own group (minimum of 4) per cable car, if you ask for it. Highly recommend going up as late as possibly o view the sunset.","time":1658651351,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rebecca Caldwell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104020038095417788870/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RmITSaKoEEfhp5emKywpBxRBLSc4Ofs70ZU3AEbQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Great cable car over the city. Amazing views, incredible sight over the river with all the bridges. Very well organised, staff friendly and spoke English well. Good to get off at the top and go and discover more of the city. A place I would like to explore further for sure.","time":1668639556,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luke L'sk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117292505860511395536/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S8RA0hjKkjILS7RmANP-c72M91C4Ki6jQSjnWGaBA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"It is such a great design to have a cable car set up by the end of the area walk connecting to the bridge up on the hill when your feet is about to kill you. Surely  the distance isn't very long but if you a tourist coming to visit this City; might as well just pay for the ride and enjoyed the experience and the view.

the cost for the cable car doesn't cost you an arm or leg you can either choose return trip or just a one-way as part of your route to keep walking after a bit of rest

When I was purchasing I overheard that they have a family pass as well for large group. That is very considerate","time":1651428797,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cheryl Evans","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107600817384462462332/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TmQ_yN27sNdWfqQ29fzponMKAt5WpElxZQR_MMAA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"This was so easy. There is a big parking garage about a 3 min walk from the station if you have a rental car. We bought tickets and got on the cable car really fast. The views were amazing. The other end where we got off was perfect. Near some monuments and a little cafe. Highly recommend that you at least take it one way.","time":1673024499,"translated":false},{"author_name":"SPICY","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104874332399015491514/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RVx0PCM6oJGEUvRtFJYy6ONwPbYfYDSsMGHA4VKRA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"I like it.
