I have pay to see this view from one side to another from highest view point. Cable car was safe secure and quiet steady and took about 10 minutes ride. One time in your life if you have extra money to spend.","time":1653554330,"translated":false}]

column3: Landscaped gardens designed in the 19th century offering fountains, paths & Douro River views.
column8: R. de Dom Manuel II, 4050-346 Porto, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Jayson Fonseca","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106316280618713265328/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QX1EA7hsABWKACmKSj6WRwuDSbMiW_KmcehLe6NA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Gorgeous park with wonderful views! Throughout the park you can spot peacocks, roosters, and ducks. They are so beautiful! I visited in mid March and it the park was full of tulips and other types of spring flowers. The smell was heavenly. In the afternoon I ate a chicken sandwich in the food court area. Very good experience if you’re looking for a nice day in the park or just a quick stroll.","time":1649167234,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Monika Fryt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103074494670698330636/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RXaBvcWkTUP0kDB8ZjoCH3EVXLhV-2J8huLWIH9g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Definitely worth visiting , Porto sign the is guide tour that allows you to go up to the roof.
Beautiful garden and fountains all around .
Chickens , Roosters and Peacocks walking around the park .
And amazing views where you can view the whole town .
Great place to take pictures.

Unfortunately we come in February so there wasn’t any flowers and still looked a bit cold but to be fair it was  around 18 degrees but we still enjoyed ourselves","time":1677277150,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jay","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107081288118843956268/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaKZoROJSr0Txhh7xh7LwhtrKWqYn_oxhmHDYkUVA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Gorgeous large park with stunning views of Porto! A ton to see and walk around to wonder with lakes, workout, and playing areas. And an abundance of photo taking areas overlooking the River. Not to mention the multiple clusters of tulips that are incredibly beautiful. I highly recommend for tourists.","time":1646621701,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Leo Boni","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111446879625440185978/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TxTjMhdllr6UCV5EB_d_nMLYPVkf6XivusnLI-tw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"This place is amazing!!  Great views of the city, wonderful birds, and very well kept gardens.  There are several sections and styles including a rose garden and a small church.  It was really peaceful after several days exploring the city. They had chickens and peacocks which was really fun!","time":1651244508,"translated":false},{"author_name":"ieva Kaveckiene","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100255511400229871292/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QCjV-jcLBowX9bz6Rrkxx0bVlrbQEnkJ1_UEs3LA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Beautiful well looked after park for a walk or a picnic. You can spot peacocks, chickens and roosters running around. We visited in the middle of March during the tulip bloom time, I say the gardens look more beautiful late spring and early summer. Very relaxing place, highly recommend visiting it.","time":1647686984,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de Adolfo Casais Monteiro 101, 4050-014 Porto, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Marathon Franchise Consulting","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118142567216514065410/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxafdeqxQFkQ1WdgKlh9u_7IqFMdSnaZrYkuu-46=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"This store is incredible not just because of the amazing selection but also because of how freaking nice and genuine the people that work there are. Super helpful with recommendations and they have a good whisky/scotch collection in addition to all the wine. I even got a whisky decanter set eith glasses and a wine rack. Very reasonably priced.\n\nThis is my go to store","time":1666467800,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rhicke Jennings","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104484595493251774615/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sg8vx3jtUU3-FvubiC4n42aPV-yFb2JiTlhzVL=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This is an excellent gourmet shop featuring wines but with a variety of food and gift items. The prices on fine wines are competitive and a great place to pick out a gift. There is also a good selection of spirits. They also have teas, coffee, jams and items like glassware. I have bought some wines I have not seen anywhere else. I was also pleased to find American bourbon and Gray Goose vodka. Ana, one of two owners is lovely and helpful in finding the perfect gift. Daniela is the other wine expert.","time":1669654823,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tim Brown","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101205686984747628598/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwTZHDTbZLlL_Gfv0TB6QlngIsRv8d2mHWRPhb=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"My latest discovery in Porto, I haven't tried the wine selection yet, but there's a super selection of tempting deli foods and a decent cheese counter.","time":1670187783,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Andreea Popa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107243548557836706451/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sb7boJRCfCbgf8JH67BZ6qQtiZzsNtULVeA19K=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"the ladies will take great care of you and advise you on the perfect buy, be it wine, spirits or foods. wonderful!","time":1668797367,"translated":false},{"author_name":"veronica amadio","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101870059517054954576/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYQZ29_GRTjH6lDly7TqEou918mf27oQ4-7QsUB=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Very nice selection of wines, sweet and savoury treats and cups. Perfect place to look for a present if you are invited at your friends' home.","time":1657835783,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Aaron Ott","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114995921635345945282/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QLO-I2y2e6GDZZyGIcpm5nMBSVqeS_JiaCwLKArg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Phenomenal breakfast cafe with delicious food and coffee. The scrambled eggs were served on top of a huge slice of homemade bread. The French toast with poached pears was unbelievable, and the oatmeal porridge with persimmon and candied nuts was the best oat dish I’ve ever had.","time":1669658002,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Artūrs","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117967028766341278896/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbQb1WQDa6oYtl9Z5nf4HMhUx2Sy9IcuUhXLSjCkw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Came first for takeaway coffee, returned for breakfast. Coffee and tea (Chai Latte) were top notch with options for almond and oat milk. Breakfast we had was great - top place for the mouth-watering brioche dish. The sourdough bread could have been slightly more airy. Well priced. Chilled atmosphere, great staff.","time":1642957006,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emily A.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115629994159585597410/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYKV1Do7NgWP-Uwr3QuGuBIILZq2b9-BklfYFCU3Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The place, the food and the hosts are definitely a 5-star experience, I had to distract 1 for the coffee which just wasn’t my taste. Would return though (which we did during our 3-day stay) to enjoy even more of their delicious breakfast treats. Pay them a visit and try the amazing sourdough!","time":1665245429,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sarah Sheard","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101963107644210507065/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SEyO0z8QKEaAg6X-spQU1W2N3Ny8J1Dew9UONQ8Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"Came here two days in a row for the best sourdough bread we've had, delicious almond butter and excellent coffees (there were more vegan alternatives but the bread was too good to not have again). One of our favourite cafes we visited in Porto. Would recommend!","time":1649746564,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aideen Costello","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102748067600083539547/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZGqkRQfzKSR9wfGTvrbexjwcRvZM3JqTJtV_GR=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The french toast was really tasty. The sweetness balanced nicely with interesting herby/nutty flavours. I was sad when it was gone even though the portion was really big and I was really full. Service was lovely (but not super fast so leave enough time).","time":1657713456,"translated":false}]

column3: Two notable oceanfront tidal swimming pools designed in the 1960s by Álvaro Siza Vieira, with a bar.
column8: Av. Liberdade, 4450-716 Leça da Palmeira, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Assem Zharma","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109734000841907350169/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYGBg0lifz2_V3gBwOVkR7k3qyyEmIWAqj7dI12=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Stunning place for swimming fans. The water itself is pouring from the ocean, hence it quite salty, but warm, it was +22°C today yayy! I would recommend to go early in the morning to avoid crowds. The pool's depth is between  1,5 and 4,5 metres. Entrance fee starts with 5€ per person on a week day, bear that in mind.\n\nUnfortunately showers were available only inside next to the toilets. Outside showers need to be fixed, especially now during summer season! Some cloakrooms lockers were broken.","time":1655255712,"translated":false},{"author_name":"B B","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104512402288705839001/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaSBRlU6oo2f5j2ppberrTntPR1UoehHvlAzFIB=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"One of the most beautiful places! Must see. If you would like to see the architecture / the place without swimming, you can simply have a drink at the bar, which is open to everyone.","time":1656024316,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eric Velthuizen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114355566586520302957/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TK0wraemDpVNA8cESba9fqKfB2CTKRcV2b5dPU0Ew=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Beautiful swimming pool at the edge of the sea. Crowded, but worth a visit.","time":1659453114,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pietro R","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112877337014635651938/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbmQLCdcTQN7VTx3BzLbe553miqdt6-oQADw418=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Suggestive location over the ocean. Worth a visit during any season.","time":1664812652,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Paulina Fadrowska","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112151307643456827756/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T07g2aeXnDFjV5p9CKGiWjw3oT6h5-3aEVBFb91ig=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"My only complaint the bar and all of the area should be paid to use so it does not over flow with people. Disliked the fact paid to use the area however at lunch no where to sit because anyone can enter the bar/lounge area. The pool is perfect for taking a dip. The scenes are beautiful all around and everything else is just perfect 👌.","time":1498666331,"translated":false}]

column8: Avenida Doutor Antunes Guimarães Leça da Palmeira, 4450-620 Matosinhos, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Alex","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110566015804599880150/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QbwyP91QF5Zrs5ryXF3RQt-bqUUaxrL-koiDLywg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Group of 4 people, place is located near the dock in a nice location where parking is relatively accessible. We ordered a mix of cheeses and hams as entrees, and 2 different cut of beef medium rare. As sides we had rice, black beans, mushrooms, spinach, and grilled vegetables. The entrées were forgettable and average, however the 2 cuts of beef were excellent. One small note, we ordered both medium rare and one came rare instead (they will grill it more if you request it).
Final bill came to around 200 Euro with drinks (wine and sodas) recommended if you are a fan of meat, but skip the entrees!","time":1668457551,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bennick H","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108620336722914384349/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R3u6_yVxreOezHMF9Lg_5DVsoxw8eZr4PzBT8Riw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Amazing place for a very good steak. Pro tip - get the steak tartare to start, it was phenomenal. Had main medium-rare and it didn’t disappoint, perfectly cooked. We had the Cheesecake to finish","time":1661706966,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Isabel Guedes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110658630953134037677/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R0fays32DylyZXpbARF6ZauaUlEeGYE4OdaCeCG7E=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"The terminal has an industrial vibe with a privileged view over the port. The waitpersons are attentive and try their best to provide a great experience.
The cocktail bar is excellent. If you are lucky, the bartender can even cook you up something off the menu.
The meat was perfectly cooked. We took "costelão" the size is perfect for two if you go in hungry or three if you don't feel like leaving the restaurant rolling (we were three).
On the side, we chose rice, vegetables and "Braz de cogumelos". Although the three sides were good, I would put the "Braz de cogumelos" in the do not miss pile, while the rest was good but not exceptional.
Dessert, please do not skip the bola de Berlim!! Just go with me on this. It will be much nicer if you don't know what you are in for.","time":1673776020,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sam Taylor","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113880587938818837038/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ4fY7QrfEX0BBTpjQbOVLz6i7iMEEs1Rjahuzr=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Fantastic steak, nice atmosphere and good service with knowledgeable waiters. Well worth a visit out of the city centre.","time":1658615460,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Will Baker","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117426079678302932515/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q0DTb8MVgGVeduN0VAyg_EI0zq8ewkU26Ic8K-pg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Great food! Make sure you don’t follow Google Map’s advice of going along the inside of the fence. The entrance is from outside the fence on Avenida do Dr Antunes Guimarães. See my attached picture. Once we figured out how to get inside we had a fantastic time!","time":1670935263,"translated":false}]
undefined

column3: Surrounded by cliffs & pit caves, this popular ocean beach is renowned for its rustic beauty.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Anastasia Karpovets","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111298814162978360456/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SatAX-T4xKLg68aTp6nnAu4fYyGKpDaa0UDTf9QQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"It is considered to be one of the most beautiful beach in Portugal. It is beautiful indeed, but Lagos has also beautiful spots. Nevertheless, the arch with two natural windows is stunning. The view of the beach from above and land is better than from the sea.","time":1675350218,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wei L.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107918171044806337555/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QxjIsig9GUYv-EWbXvw04jTGlypK5XE1dnH5pY9w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Simply stunning view. Very picturesque from any angle. The 1.5km hiking trail is worth it, but could get very hot in the afternoon. Wear hat and proper shoes","time":1659717214,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Antoine Calon","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110348812686119418757/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SGIRVfydjjUEwXndCbbr7thYjagsf31_tgNpHiIwI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba8","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Praia da Marinha is one of the most beautiful and emblematic beaches on the Algarve coast, so much so that it has been ranked among the 5 most beautiful beaches in Portugal and among the 10 best in the world. Thanks to its beauty, it has become the perfect setting for photographic services and reports.

This small beach is surrounded by cliffs eroded over the years, which have generated a variety of rock formations such as arches, caves or natural wells. The most impressive of them is 50 meters high, and all the other small rocks seem to dance around it. The contrast between the crystalline and turquoise colors of the sea with the golden color of the rock is beautiful.

The rocky walls of Praia da Marinha hide the marine diversity present in the territory, such as anemones, sea urchins, starfish and shrimp. In addition, the algae hide cuttlefish and octopus. This corner of preserved nature, almost wild, is very popular among lovers of diving, since here you can take a pleasant walk among the underwater natural beauty of the Algarve","time":1661704786,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Laimonas Guiga","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112900841534122738649/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SkTyQPKdLMgleQaCLskdCx0BnbB_MuiBZiwCaJwQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Another fantastic beach in Algarve. Free parking, but the beach is popular, so you need to come early to get the spot. It is not so easy to access the beach, it takes around 10 min to go down.
The views from the top are spectacular.
Also on the beach you can rent a kayak and go to the most famous Benagil cave.","time":1657391742,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexander Lackner","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111848490118036913234/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TGouxzXoAjZlA4P3KGexI1a_7w71tAbtabc_8q-_4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Nice (walking) trail on the cliffs to Benagil. Parking's limited but some people offer private parking for a few Euros, so watch out.  Would recommend for a nice walk on top which takes not more than 30min one way 😎","time":1650030054,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Manuel Viegas Guerreiro, 8135-016 Almancil, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Marcus Schmermer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117959866070946308756/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TNf_qAzdB_bgqHrqdJ8e8rRSZeW6eVx3LBMY-O=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Fantastic authentic Portuguese food. We really enjoyed our stay. Super friendly staff and owner. We had a pleasant time.","time":1668348717,"translated":false},{"author_name":"George Parlade","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112120322379917115921/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbsyYqJWAYEgnX6uSoseHd3T6GWKtXpTChB8QLt=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"It is the most awful tourist trap you could ever come across. The chicken is all bones with hardly any meat. The portions are so tiny you will have to order 3  forv1 person in order to eat enough.
The service is attentive but only cares about closing time. The food was cold. The lavatory still uses the rolling towel system instead of disposable tissues in the days of Covid!!!!
Would not recommend it to my worst enemy.
Stay away.","time":1673137264,"translated":false},{"author_name":"ruairi costello","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116546098367206753363/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QCzshG0RHS2a4JgN-0O6_uJ8omMZtfPZJwhNslvp0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Very tastey meal. Freindly and helpful staff. The chickens are very small. More chicklets...1 meal for 3 was 55 euro with 2 glasses wine and bottle water which  was fine..","time":1650543609,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jeff Fu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100248946455173095694/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxauaFbWUsEBSK1aaRH5buPNBIAUJ0EPUSRdRWbP=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Poor food, ribs barely had meat on them, salad roughly chopped, 1/2 chicken equals to 2 tiny wings (size of a roosterwing). Fast and friendly service.
Steak was bathing under a ready made sauce. Outside seating is very uncomfortable. Pricey for road-stop quality.","time":1502223500,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tomás Nunes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117358732563234956801/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SbQ35jJfnxkXRGEAvMDrAXlJM1lVX-FJxIpjupaQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"It’s the first time in my life I feel like I was robbed by a chicken place.
Although quite tasty, and the restaurant seems nice, I went there for Takeaway and ended up purchasing Portugal’s most expensive chicken. But the twist was opening the bag at home and seing 5 miserable pieces with way more bones than meat.","time":1636562424,"translated":false}]

column3: Lookout point accessed by sightseeing train or escalator, with sunset views & bars nearby.
column11: [{"author_name":"Mark R","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109217675239906382678/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TX_LKBmpZerd1A-9kIK2Vl-qn0BNQ4e1-ywMB2Vg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"A great spot to take on the tremendous views along the Albufeira beach. Nice places to have a drink and something to eat. Of note, a superb vegan restaurant called ‘Veggie Momi’ is close by and worth a visit for a sit in or take away vegan meal.","time":1668859993,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cameron Appleby","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104317705671599286812/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY197199QAgO_1A9waWsUG8tpiD47Im2q1pGJj8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Fantastic spot to stand and overview the beach, ocean, cliffs and buildings nearby. Lots of space to stand so no wait, and a few benches to sit and enjoy the views as well! Located right next to the escalator to the beach level.","time":1668469688,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anthony Archibeque","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111761352362151897525/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZtWEmDNmMvOmNQOFGSOT-QP2wEUgozCjQqnIkB=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Great place for stunning views, beautiful sandy beach, tons of dining options, picturesque setting. The sunset is nearly as perfect as a Hawaiian Wakiki sunset. Albufeira, Portugal on the Southern coast is well worth the trip. Be sure to like the post, follow me here and on IG: @duecetravels for more great location and food reviews.","time":1674678819,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Thomas V","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102975286075770745102/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb8-7G4VUT7yB-_s90IheK6cPUEZv9GFEze6wkk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Beautiful view outlooking the beach Praia dos Pescadores and the city. Very easy to get there as there are 2 escalators taking you up. There are some benches up there and shadow as part of the viewpoint has a roof. Nearby are some restaurants and this is also a stop for the tourist train. Good spot to take some pictures ans enjoy the view!","time":1664316560,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cris Charneca","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114196142853266504325/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rloz4zYWYVOsI4bjHtgXhcuvQS1BWiFYPTO-w2yQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Nice watching point for the new years eve show in Albufeira: 2 concerts and a night skydiving jump with lots of fireworks.\nFabulous but the only place to be was the sand. It was full!!","time":1673309539,"translated":false}]

column3: Remarkable seaside cave, reachable by boat trip, known for a distinctive hole in its roof.
column11: [{"author_name":"Lisa Sullivan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109992859268701453522/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaRtM28OigzMutkRLzNcN2pPKFWUOL3pWdetdLdkQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"A must see if in Portugal and I would definitely go again.  A boat trip to see the caves and we were in complete awe.  Stunning scenery, clean beaches which if we had the time there was option to book a trip to enjoy a barbecue.  Just superb and excellent value for money.  70 euros for two and a four hour trip with guide and a dip in the Ocean if brave enough.","time":1650802088,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Richard Golding","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114831529933264897682/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ_xL7gmqdPYlZTNLkMIQtI0xWpup9a4W5y7PVa=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We went to the caves on a boat trip and it was beautiful! Our Captain talked us through some of the interesting points and was really entertaining! The added bonus was seeing a pod of dolphins on the way back which was beautiful. I highly recommend this trip. If you do go, take a bottle of water and a small towel if you can. We went with X Ride, you  can get your tickets in advance but there was the option to get them on the day.","time":1664135368,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anna Sweet","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112870459263539580111/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T7u7c8jT5M-orZtZxuJD3Un8U7L1xVRJTFxFpm9eg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Loved it,  beautiful coastline of jaw-dropping rock formations.  Beautiful colors.  Of course packed with tourists and impossible to get a person-free pic, but being there was awesome, a sight not to be missed.","time":1661711464,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Musty M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117956501983956749269/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QOpQXsuFRTuKLZteO528DpFgshn2ZnysbJv8vsSVQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Stunning caves and coastline. We visited with a company called '5 emotions' who I'd highly recommend. We also saw a large pod of dolphins which was incredible. Would be 5 stars if the caves weren't so busy.","time":1661806479,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anita King","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109364977872387001236/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R8VePTr3DTy1vDp7czqWoh1kpvp693OPnomUS4mQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Some great views and not very busy (visited early November). Booked an experience with Algarve Sensations and our guide was very informative and helpful throughout the whole day. We body boarded into the Bengali Caves, which I would highly recommend over kayaking or taking a boat over.\n\nThe Seven Hanging Cliff hike is just above this gorgeous view too. Some great places for taking photos - both scenic and for social media.","time":1669233949,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Bruno Sampaio","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113877654611728971782/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R-ycgmbjg-1l32j3ZTv-a73AqEEjlfyl5xwD_ZAuA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I'm not sure if the music is coming from here but we can hear it all over Praia Grande in Ferragudo for days now... It's awful. Super loud music always with the same rhythm. It's just noise polution and disrespectful. Why do we all need to listen to the same and why does it need to be so loud? Stop this nonsense, please.","time":1626016106,"translated":false},{"author_name":"INFORSPORT stats","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101175302947910933508/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tf6XwA9blmkTrCzlEXWnUtjBuR3OgtcLIKjk4wlA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"I like the ease of access, but by the river - the card system to enter the docks are quite unpractical. If you have more than two people on board you'll have to be sharing the acess card - they only give you one per boat.\nHaving worked with nautical tourism, it's annoying having to be on a hunt for the access card to take the customers to the boat.","time":1556013389,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Katrina Agacid-Nunes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116900651272092050593/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TVaHKvWvksIM-MmREBLGJ5THHngP-EjAshtn6pog=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"An enormous place to walk, extraordinary water view, fresh and serene.","time":1642124589,"translated":false},{"author_name":"MARCIA STROBINO","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102370609685659040985/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QxrDuefm1xcZXCSqMIfIHB1ROQyGbe3NUFCrofq5g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Beautiful place. Clean. A good place to relax and have a good meal.","time":1634988832,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Malcolm Wilkinson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111565691483110209666/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb8gdDqgTU_2CLjwo5O43YJmdPh9QZWFb_BdzdF=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Nice area to walk round. Plenty of cafes and places to eat.","time":1635098285,"translated":false}]

column8: Marina de Portimão, S/N, 8500-843 Portimão, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Ľubomír Hajas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111438090774092982388/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QS-pHc6JMmc-CacYO6VSPaqtVv1kp33p21GxNbAA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"If you looking to spend a day by the pool or beach, drinking some wine, beer or cocktails with one of the best sushi I ever had. This is the place for you. Definitely recommend.

Very friendly service, good atmosphere, reasonable price. The price for bed is €30 for a whole day. Make sure you reserve your spot as It can gets very busy in summer.","time":1650263682,"translated":false},{"author_name":"regina kis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107922553374232347808/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZuPSQMKoVo0UPPYyE0URHKWct6awoHkBfIPnUW=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"OMG. This place was amazing so far in all Portimão and so far from all the other destinations and places I have visited in the past!

Please do not listen or pay attention to all those pathetic, negative comments bellow.

I don’t like to leave reviews at all but I decided to do it now.

See the photos will speak for itself.
Food and the staff are amazing. I had the best stake in my life. (I am very fussy with food). The place is perfect at the beginning/mid. of May as is still off season and is not busy.
They pay attention for details such as clean sun beds on the beach with covers on them.
Always looking after you if you need something. Staff are very polite and nice! Hygiene is on top! 👌","time":1652637474,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mike Freemind","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100072737828522870793/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tqj-pV-bD7y9BVTRP2LwEMvJk1OGznsE6R5mFYbw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Nice location, with good music, directly at the sea with a private beach. Staff is super friendly and helpful. The coktails are quite good, for a low fair price. We also got the fruit bucket, witch was nicely decorated and fresh!
I definitely will come again!","time":1655748474,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alexandre Mendes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105730173584446237134/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RfhtDgaTdTaHKq2tFzgFotum5sZcnpHdIa93te=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Great place, great vibe, it's feels like travelling abroad in your own country. Full of beautiful people, it's one of the best places to go out in the summer. Reservations advisable even if we had a place for us. It's divided into two parts, one with pool and restaurant and other with the bar with access to the beach. Prices above other places but fully normal when compared to other similar tourist areas.","time":1660208744,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Henry Onyeka","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102104685794662637322/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SnRoBN5Fqebm8uJ76gbTvmDfLhhw1t7bxx49oeSA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A great location in Portimao with a lot to offer. No Solo Agua  has a semi-enclosed beach with unrestricted views out to sea.

The food was fantastic, my only complaint would be how long some orders took to be ready.

Nevertheless, the staff were very helpful, and my thanks to Fred for being a great host!","time":1662724097,"translated":false}]

column3: 200 wooden steps down to sheltered, sandy cove divided by ochre-colored rocks with hand-dug tunnel.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Binod's Vlog #TRAVEL KIDO","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112875354666812370751/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QRnrwMWKjt8ymO0csMS5ZATaQthIXjSCxgjWXqBg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"I enjoyed the view and experience of this beautiful place. The waves are amazing even in the morning. If you're lucky, you could see some dolphins. Try out deep sea diving around here. You'll love it. Plenty of things to do. Great place to visit.","time":1654468596,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sofia Reis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116165986217941581570/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T9UQ3Um0AjC7gUPw4aM9gNMmWwPeU9UqXA8W-35A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Great little beach. Get early so you can grab a spot in the sand: it gets really busy around 10:30-11:00. Great spot for snorkeling: loads of fish big and small, amazing spot to swim around the rocky coast and see fish swimming happy!","time":1658656996,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mike Patton","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109995942366370289607/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbaG4k9oP-lgwoHa0Hy3OC89rxZACMU6KpwH0_Z=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 weeks ago","text":"Beautiful, cliff enclosed beach with stair access…we were able to easily climb down and enjoy.  Expect a fair amount of tourist company, since beach is so accessible.  There are two areas separated by a low walkthrough tunnel.  Photo ops here are magnificent with the sandstone pillars and arches.","time":1679165749,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mike Tesselaar","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117939254974177847314/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rd7gD9Gq8uSOaEQRNc_wR__sNqtRFoCC1JGTkZ0A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"WOW! I was amazed by this beach. Just a few minutes drive from Lagos you'll find a very rocky waterline. By taking the boardwalk down, you can reach the beach and by a cave the beach next to it as well.

Only downside is shadow in winter months. Due to the low sun angle, the entire beach was covered by shadow early in the afternoon... If you take that in account (winter only), it's a must visit","time":1641756604,"translated":false},{"author_name":"nini x","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115826599045689716816/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QIoH1GS0rVquNy6wsOa-VjFfPbg8KvOr1w-IZX2Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"We came in Jan and it’s windy and cold!!!! But still beautiful!! There are many little yellow flowers that makes the scenery even more heavenly!!!

And there is very little people around!!! We came early so we had the beach all to ourselves for a while until less than 10 other people came! That’s the benefit of coming here in off season

Definitely bring a hat if you come in winter months!!! It’s very windy. We walks all along the wooden bridges and it’s beautiful and amazing!!

There are Bolt cars all around. Take a Bolt here and back - very convenient!!!

There is also a cafe right here - so you can take a drink amid your walk!","time":1674749658,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Carrie DeJesus","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104763969893548007334/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SP4KmUywrmHKzsa1bhguH5kThc7vX4c75BPGhM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Went on a tour and had a phenomenal tour guide.   He was super informative and a great sense of humor.

Crazy they built such an incredible castle to withstand cannon shots.   It totally worked but then they never actually got to use it in a war and it was used as a military prison.  The castle was made of sandstone which just compacts when hit.  The outside wall was built separately from the main wall so if one got hit and was too collapse it didn’t destroy the entire fortress.  It was built in a circular shape.   From sea it appears straight so if a cannon from a boat tries to hit it if they don’t hit it straight on there is a greater chance they would miss.   Everyone thought the builder was crazy but apparently he had some pretty darn good ideas.","time":1560901174,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elaf Mohammed","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111826603202044189593/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TWv006mcZY55IeL3acETYuYgr-Z6NMR4gtYNdHyA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"i liked the story of putting the first american flag over the walls of this castle after great battle occurred  around this place  and how the first american anthem was singed here at down time. i was luck to see this flag few days later during my visit to the DC
i recommend to visit these place together to connect the dots and to get full picture","time":1565526325,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jason M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117863090846113445042/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RMyInGYd3OU6cXEy9LQZ_P07yv5qYhM6LH459LAGY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 years ago","text":"It's a really cool place, definitely worth a visit.","time":1468775005,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jacob S.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115877614770092442595/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TUvyEhsMUA7qOyq51GBXzlu5YBWv3mXJ591iD_=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Great views of lower manhattan and some great history in this fortification. Must see for any history buff.","time":1500751820,"translated":false},{"author_name":"James Wade","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101957728346050445191/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbEbG73qfWPQ6C7akbrF8HGiQh3cIXKpTW33JCd=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"An old fort with lots of signs and some interesting history. There is usually some staff around if you have questions.","time":1505088766,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Carmel Tamburrino","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101399851815131344202/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYjbVHe2xbn1mm1EZQcWBf2tmBoIsRWVxCv_Ws-=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"We had an amazing welcome from a lovely man who escorted us to our Block D. Our apartment would have been difficult to find on first arrival! This block gave us a sea view although there was a lower block in front of us which would have given us an even better sea view, we thought. Accommodation was perfect and we liked the quietness of where this complex is positioned. We were able to have a good evening meal at the cafe onsite in early January on our first night. Closes 8pm. There is a Spar shop about 5 minutes walk away. Loved the beach area minutes away. Overall a good place to stay for the price paid.","time":1674244936,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Magda Farrelly","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107596380723790508227/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYwvsRDr6FEauhkHrFI2uaRbbCAEUC7lxsGfEBS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Person in reception was more than helpful.  Super nice with great sense of humour. Location of this hotel is perfect. Easy access to the Aipril 25 street and also beach. Unfortunately rooms are super dark and without windows 😕","time":1653311096,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Josh Dell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103756431446824698566/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QFH8xb7mGA1C7LMxG_0Jrpt8PUtE8uwSBrwFfevg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"The rooms are very reasonably priced and frankly a bargain for what you get. A little frustrating that the reception doesn’t operate 24/7, but there’s a phone number to call on the door and someone will be on hand to assist in minutes.","time":1655103226,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mike Brouwer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112176717710821282501/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SIfT752-iX1uYJaaQH5OZ5DKJ36EkISLYbek7oGA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The place needs maintenance and a much higher service level. Pool is freezing cold... Lots of drunk noisy people around making noise all night. The shops were all closed. Location to the beach is nice, but too dangerous too swim in. Go here to take a picture and go somewhere else.","time":1634816900,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Robert Eaton","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108852674073746402515/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q80eQNMQ6qdabc0bOrToTBEyCiNhfreohKBOVfJmc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Awesome location, quiet and still close to town plus beach and pool access.","time":1663426640,"translated":false}]

column3: Busy beach with towering rock formations in & around the water, plus hotels & eateries nearby.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Christina Chung","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102399354474336586609/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TQa_LNXXD5O7PDydkQ5b-UYBunKiBPCHYPPlJhnNg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Super long beach, great rock formations and nice walk to the lighthouse. It was quite windy when we visited (mid December). You can walk all the way to Praia do Vau too.","time":1672422960,"translated":false},{"author_name":"SK141212","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117265250260303338558/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbLkhtj5-64glwLCQFWO26FqCbyzoExjiqupQYJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"We are here for Christmas - New Year vacation 2022-23. Most of the restaurants on the boardwalk are closed but few are open. Weather is sometimes foggy, sometimes sunny. Water too cold for me to swim but children enjoyed. Very peaceful and not crowded at all.","time":1671999263,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dave Mc Naught","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109476592601449681658/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RGSjqa2avy17sAUpKOqvAIBoPFUBrSadlUxEaz=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Best longest stretch of beach to avoid crowding. Lovely clean, white sandy beach and plenty of space to find your own.","time":1656583739,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helen ICE","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103627329686588703922/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R1MG_3Hq-CE_-4lDsRSmhn36UJpKadyMrQd-_k=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"It’s a beautiful beach surrounded by some large rocks. Some parts of the beach have a lot of seaweed. I believe you need to take boats or kayak to be able to see those rocks and caves better. Be mindful that there is a wood staircase that you need to take to go down to some parts of the beach.","time":1659509211,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Martin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117106791715806677529/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T5uzXcR1h13fvq1tEVKcApHOPVoh4RasCJFZOvFg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The beach is very nice. We spent some calm days and some windy/wavy days here.

In some conditions the lifeguards will prevent you from swimming, which is a good thing I guess.

Surfers had a hard time catching a good wave.

End of September it was not crowded, but the water was pretty cold too: 16.8-20.3C","time":1664901168,"translated":false}]

column3: Laid-back cuisine served in a bustling restaurant that has tiled decor & shaded terraces.
column8: R. Lançarote de Freitas 18 1º Andar, 8600-605 Lagos, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"PilotCelini","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109586187392660025813/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RuFBwp9f4wLoTkC77bGuXZiwOOXwfQQKrueYPpsA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Very nice Restaurant with Chill Rooftop Bar.
If you plan on going there you should arrive early as it might include quite some waiting time - part of that time (for us it was roughly an hour) you can enjoy on the rooftop bar enjoying some drinks! We can totally recommend the espresso martini!

We had a buzzer that informed us when our table was ready an then you could take you time to either finish you drinks or to take them to the table.

We tried to different Steaks and both were very good!

The team there is super friendly and welcoming therefore even with the waiting times you felt very welcome and had a chill and fun atmosphere","time":1656406384,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Follow the Sun 101","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109700776268867975059/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RhxiW5-juh6lWwNcxHsh3ruy72c45amqV1zOrg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"This is a lovely little place for some great wine (and some sangria) and an outdoor patio ambience.  But, the food really steals the show.  The tapas were a good size and the plates themselves were full of flavor.

The staff is really friendly and even accommodated having a drink before being seated outside.  The place is tucked away and the patio is closed in by some glass paneling to make it private and safe while also bringing in as much sun as possible.

We would definitely suggest coming here for a nice dinner.","time":1652451573,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gregory Dunn","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108129594091521931512/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SsgY-OuTgLJ8JI2g4gMazCRfulj6BGT0dCqKskVw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"The best restaurant we’ve had the privilege to enjoy in Portugal and Spain.  Energy was fire and music on point. Every server was super cool.

Service: the manager/host (owner?) was super cool and set us up at a table since we were walk in. Had a few ice cold beers off the tap.  Once we were sat the waiter had our plates coming out in an organized fashion since I ordered a lot (needed to try a few dishes) YOLO

Food:  had the tuna marinated in this garlic piece sauce. Was amazing.   Followed up with the steak, a perfect medium rare and taste was ok point. A little tough but amazing. Fries had these incredible curls to them,  some of the best I’ve ever had.  Finally the seared tuna steak, amazing stuff.

Overall best restaurant We went on in Spain / Portugal by a long shot.  Keep up the good work guys.","time":1650650895,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Derek Bishop","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117512717530722653027/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tm4FyU4uyJk2nPYqiFOLwyzIpNXdAwexQzug9isw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Most amazing staff with top notch service. The establishment itself was beautiful. We got lucky and were able to sit outside. If you like sweet sangria I highly recommend the green sangria. I enjoyed both tapas, steak with piri piri,  and the prawns with garlic and chilies.  I liked my black pork entree but I LOVED my girlfriends tuna steak! Checking this place out is a must!","time":1664827994,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anuj Patel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112111733971552253879/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SdlEGWoWbXm-YcMR_N7JShzvQexAN2ftpDj-cjOhw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Nice vibes, delicious food, good drinks, and especially great service by our server, Marlon. He had great recommendations and was very easy to talk to. If I'm ever in the city again I'll definitely be back. Give it a try, you won't regret it.","time":1670856778,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Sara Chalarca","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114127477147237599902/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TtQ_mRR4ACGcSItmL1X6yNQRmRIpDDHgyb7Z0ckZA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Nice place for tapas!

Great service, everything was tasty, except for the ceviche, was not my favorite, it wasn’t very flavorful. The sangria was okay, I think they need to put more wine haha it was kinda sweet, it was like drinking a juice. The shrimp was my favorite.","time":1642357352,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Thirsty Duo Smith","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117482915433228824583/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RAbByjUdHxP-6dWqVSWqvLzUv1WxZxAStUvN_Alg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"We loved the wine list.  We arrived when the chef was on break, we said it okay.  We enjoyed the place so much we lost track of time. We ended up order peri peri chicken and some tap’s mushrooms.  It was delicious.  Our waiter helped us with learning some Portuguese… the owner came to our table.  We had a great visit.  What a way that end a nice day.","time":1666641914,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Amy F","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113435417874411878348/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SdstC834vZp4-tdmk-muXl8o1Li6X-p6AmgXJokQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Had a delicious lunch—mussels, veggie stew and spring salad. Location near the main tourist drag. Lovely attention to detail on the beautiful salad and tiny croutons for the stew. Highly recommend.","time":1654264069,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Vee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106448042821226229309/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QB1GVjog7j_6_3YppkqkNycmGTAwDefDqCOH9PQQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"I wish I had the same experience as so many others here. I wanted to like this little place.

The service was pleasant, and the woman was very kind. The location is nice too as it's at the far end of the road and not too busy with pedestrians.

Unfortunately, the food just was not good. Mussels piri piri were all right but pretty basic. The little sandwiches were very wet and messy to eat without much flavour other than mayonnaise. The Peruvian ceviche tasted really wrong. The fish was odd and off-putting in taste and we couldn't tell if the fish was spoiled or it's just that species of fish we don't like. But the lady was so nice, we couldn't bring ourselves to complain, especially as we weren't sure if it was just the type of fish. Portion sizes were small for the price. I left very hungry, partly because we couldn't eat the ceviche and partly because we couldn't see spending so much more money.

I really hope we just came here on a bad day because other people seem to have much different and better experiences with the food.","time":1674646394,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Niko J","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101756332564890891377/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaqzStD5ISLtevoF9SmPM4ioiFa3EkKvYeFeaJD=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Amazing choice of mussels in various flavours, also some really tasty veggie dishes. Chocolate mousse for dessert 😍Highly recommended.","time":1666638422,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Follow the Sun 101","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109700776268867975059/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RhxiW5-juh6lWwNcxHsh3ruy72c45amqV1zOrg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Coffee really brings you places regardless of where you are.  Coffee & Waves literally brings you Hawaii with their beautifully decorated shop.  The feeling is made even better with their loving staff.  Alan makes a WONDERFUL espresso that we enjoyed more than a couple times while in Lagos.  The food is fresh and beautifully and artfully presented (see photos).  The staff made it so warm by just being there and making sure you felt welcome.  They also have a walk up window for people who want coffee on the go.  However, I would highly suggest going inside.  They have limited space, but the bar is a fun spot to sit.  We love this place.","time":1653647823,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Isabelle Kipp","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107321949980684377028/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYYOToJwgGlkI_7J-eg-SJ6VlL8arHZmneXvQkn=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Super cute place for coffee, breakfast and brunch! They also serve coffee equipment,beans, shirts, some other merchandise! Staff is super friendly, all the food is great (we really tried knots everything since we were just coming back from a long surf sessions) you won’t regret coming here, it’s a beautiful place!!","time":1654350580,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wild & Sea","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108232083249142971686/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SZqR7b4z7KQUF-Z1HvSPFG8YhE-pmC_I6n_Hr_8A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"A big thanks to the 2 super adorable Barista! Finally, I found the best Mocha coffee I could have in Lagos! Mocha with oats milk was extremely good, suggestions of the day and the menu looks super tasty, price are a bit expensive compare to other places, I tried the cherry cake, was really good. Very nice atmosphere, love the table design with waves painting, this is a really great little cozy surf vibes place, staff super nice and chill & music playlist well appropriate.","time":1671714035,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicole Zhang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103872997776680932355/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QcsPijx_S6MnFKM10cA0mvtJyGYWtMdN3sYitLdQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Cute specialty coffee shop in Old Town Lagos! The baristas were really kind and friendly, and sure know how to make a great coffee. I ordered a cappuccino with oat milk and it was wonderful. They also have a great deal where if you buy a reusable mug (that actually can be collapsed for easy storage/ for traveling), the first coffee is free!","time":1671701325,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pavel Michal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115443139591652030080/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbe7D5gviZC_UCEls1P9BS-kziNK9P9wABnseDN=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Great coffee and friendly baristas! The concept and design are also really nice but what I would highlight is the welcoming vibe you get from all the baristas (all three of them in my case). That is very rare to achieve from my experience with staff in cafés so I really appreciate it!!","time":1663780983,"translated":false}]

column3: Well-known coastal rock formations with caves & grottos that are often visited by boat tours.
column11: [{"author_name":"Anna Tarczynska","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116553383594250432726/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tp3guzomuFeSX0tFq-IRS1x7J4K7EMV0rbrmPtu7A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"I was very lucky to have amazing weather . From Lagos station I took the walk all the way to this place and I was not disappointed. It was so worth it . This is one of the most beautiful cliffs beach I have seen so far . The road down to the beach is steep but you have long set of wooden stairs leading to the ground level . However , to appreciate this treasure , the best is from above . There is public toilet there an little restaurant . Also from here , you can explore walking on right side of the cliff or left side . Either way you will decided to go , you will see great landscapes .","time":1663182190,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Helen ICE","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103627329686588703922/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R1MG_3Hq-CE_-4lDsRSmhn36UJpKadyMrQd-_k=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"A beautiful scenic spot and the rocks are amazing. You have to take stairs down to the beach. One of small beaches have a lot seed weeds or algae (I’m not sure). But caves are very beautiful. It’s close to a large beach. Huge.","time":1659455347,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dessie Hristov","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103922617217014518735/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SV9GVE5DN3_MCw_c6PjLbUs3GRoMWS_ka1scuRlCk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Such an amazing place! Take one of the trails or go down the main path to the water where the boats stop. Beware of the steps - what goes down must come up 😂 - it maybe quite the undertaking going up those steps in a hot afternoon under the scorching sun! The landscape is beautiful, the rocks, the formations, the vivid colors of the place are so out of this world! Highly recommend you add it to your trip itinerary!","time":1665329954,"translated":false},{"author_name":"sandhyarani hegde","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109083461168116000339/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwuPdmXlO7IN-h6en6fFPzXcEe8MVihLZmfqr6eA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Breathtaking views 😍. Must visit place. We visited during early spring, so there was not much people. So we could see everything properly with our own time. The only drawback is that the public transport connection is not so good. But if you can drive there is no problem.","time":1644697448,"translated":false},{"author_name":"vianney valeyre","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116204787354097962457/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T52O-v4IZw2QeRyFCPG0oFqzo65mROsOKsuz_JUw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Beautiful, even more awesome out of the crowd. Spent some days in Lagos, perfect place to explore south of Portugal. Avoid sunny day as there is almost no shadow the whole place. There is a nice pedestrian walk along the coast. A place you must see if you travel around.","time":1649250122,"translated":false}]

column3: This small beach features a fine sandy stretch backed by rugged cliffs, close to a quaint village.
column11: [{"author_name":"Smoky Raindrop","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118372551684646745442/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QtMUmIbJuAOfu-WFjD-1vov-DnHIycGCsDU5A5MQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Beautiful small beach, tons of little restaurants and bars, friendly environment, everything you need in walking distance from the slip, overall perfect holiday destination for a relaxing get away with the option for coastal walks if you're active or just lazy beach days with cocktails on the sunbeds","time":1674551923,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Timo T","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103563771735015667612/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbTFq_-orqAFNf7Evj2j-pemyNXjlAdYOI7G5JTbmM=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Very clean and not too crowded beach. I feel like more locals than tourists go here.\nFree parking area at the main road above.","time":1629188284,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Halobates Skates","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100494725951653144412/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaEh-VIyUhjOAzmNDIi_CDkiCmOCgRljj6HbHV8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Accessible beach, esp for people w disability. Beach is quite small bordered by cliff with stunning geological layer. Sea is quite kelpy though, but very calm. Good for families with small children and older folks.","time":1663938918,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Robert Jacob","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107495269142467082321/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxavJm8aLsSeBvJ7cAjG_59Ljf9I9iNGmLKEbcRI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"This is our 'go to' beach. Steep walk but left road has steps at bottom.","time":1663832768,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anne van der Zee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105672415131279964072/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RlbfXAQIvTcHxR7-7h7b6fqP2i8hEHQOXew3Dr__c=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Beautiful village however the beach is very crowded with kids and no life guards around","time":1657366854,"translated":false}]

column3: Chill joint specializing in locally sourced, organic burgers & cocktails, plus a take-out option.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Conor","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105307352693578738123/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZmzU9KEi3hGUEO0VfG9cEpanVaF7wGJyfQe4su=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"12 months ago","text":"Fantastic service. Staff are super friendly and very accommodating. The vibe there is nice good music and your not rushed. As for the food the chips are fantastic very crunchy but soft on the inside, they come with a garlic and cheese dry rub. The burger is decent everything about the burger is great apart from the meat. I feel if they used steak mince they could cook the burgers medium/rare the patty’s just taste like any old burger which is a real shame.","time":1649409108,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pete Watts","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116536315788628773164/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TkIYHciiQCbkoHATV-aTlC4A2JV1s6wbsDgW0c5Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I can see why the Toucan burger is the winner of the top 50 burgers in the world! Plus the experience of actually being in the restaurant is quite something. Such a vibrant and excited atmosphere! Plus we really did have the best seats in the place. We sat at the end of the bar and saw all of the food being prepared, and wow every dish looked amazing! Plus the staff really were enjoying themselves in preparing and serving food and drinks, it was great to see and experience! I’m really looking forward to visiting again!","time":1661933784,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Follow the Sun 101","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109700776268867975059/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RhxiW5-juh6lWwNcxHsh3ruy72c45amqV1zOrg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"This was a really nice place for a great burger and fries!  They have a bunch of beer taps as well which were very refreshing.  This burgers are pretty loaded and the flavor is great.  You won't go away hungry.  The service was really good as well!  They have limited outside seating but they have a cool inside ambiance.","time":1653648996,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Richard C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109227092163517157111/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbeSljwic8VaHzofndxPu1gai4E72oh0q3kbcVG=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Very good dinner at nah nah bah. We sat outside and the three of us all had different burgers and we all enjoyed the food. Good draft beers also plus something else in a jug with ice cubes and fruit that my friends ordered before I got there. After two glasses I could feel the booze working so switched to beer. My friends booked the table and I would recommend anyone going there to do the same as people were queuing outside waiting for a table inside, which was absolutely packed out. Not sure how we racked up a 100 euro bill, possibly the booze is priced heavy but it won’t stop me going back again. Good fun place with good food and an excellent waitress in Lilly, who was very helpful and tolerant of our indecision’s 👍","time":1655116318,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kieran Ashley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110955868443369557234/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RWyEjrfOgvGxz-K4b7yPUWFDpKmaF9BUCHUqvofg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"9\10 would eat here again.

Food was amazing and came out really fast. We got the Toucan Burger (minus the pineapple) and the Fish Tacos. Was delicious. The Sangria was amazing too. Deffo stop by here if you’re visiting Lagos. I would advise booking a table as it was super busy when we went

Just to note - they weren’t taking card payments when we went but there’s an ATM right next door.","time":1656670664,"translated":false}]

column3: Easygoing, green-hued bar featuring ample brews on tap plus pub grub in brick-lined & wood environs.
column8: 156 E 23rd St, New York, NY 10010, USA
column11:
[{"author_name":"Julian Hermano","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117152570350745239893/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SRFLqtoZuEZh5vtmhukG88YOc6vNOcQ-fk5Bmwpg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"7 years ago","text":"I've had some solid experiences here, but after my most recent one I don't plan on coming back.

After being let in by the bouncer and grabbing a table with some friends, the manager decided to check all of our IDs--we're college students, we look young, that's fair. But after seeing my driver's license the manager insisted. "This isn't you. I don't believe this is you."

I've always looked young, and while it's a point of personal insecurity, I don't mind my ID being checked. It makes sense, and it's fair. But being kicked out because she couldn't recognize my face off of a picture makes me not want to return unless the place comes under new management.

We left and went to Tap Room around the corner and had a much better time.","time":1457767454,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nicholas Steele","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117813191243099977517/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TLgUj65FRM00hr1Qz4g40jMucYid847TWqi-l_dYs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Fine bar but overcharges.","time":1674792079,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gerard Metzing","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107878785259850620836/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbplcMNUY7dAmWp0s_O-DW3k2q7dY-YGVER0JpX=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Great food and good selection of cold beer.","time":1655595595,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kenny Schaefer","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102568975580171082428/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SR5PcKZ6cqqtQZYoB7ru5Q7UjHkMnymdQnRihhM0U=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 years ago","text":"Nice pub. They've got a pretty decent beer list. Bar snacks were good too.
