It's just a block from my office so I'll be back for more.","time":1520453410,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tracy Kingsley","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100564254280158342026/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYLTFoPxcu2ZFLy9Jv_OZkYER4tU1gkpjUXN4HF=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 years ago","text":"Good pub food; wide selection of domestic craft and imported beers; friendly, attentive service; live music on Mondays -- What's not to love about the place?","time":1530074756,"translated":false}]

column8: Estrada da rocha baixinha, Olhos de Água, 8200-379 Albufeira, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Steve (Rhino)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107251278579165707689/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY78EpZ6LK7mwr6CyB5rsIaXUHyUSmBBUA5oXz5=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Very relaxing beach bar/restaurant on the boardwalk, had beautiful fresh orange juice to refresh us (and use the toilets!!)
A great daytime vibe, will definitely return one evening.","time":1652477724,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Amir Yarahi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107696318927606286403/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SZl8_y1xmTy2-rCuBKCMTpaJPrbsB928j7LrUiug=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Worst experience of Service, Food and Drinks I had in a long time.
Food was not as shown on the menu. I ordered a sandwich which looked grilled, fresh and crispy on menu, while I just got a stonecold bread with cheese and cold bacon.
When I asked if they could warm it up they just answered "we only have microwave".

I had one bite and paid the full price for the sandwich.
The fries were served without any sauce and after a friendly request we waited 20 minutes and still did not receive anything.

And last but not least I still have terrible pain in my stomach from drink I ordered.","time":1664903596,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hilary Duncan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105097753962303207541/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZLMsvHlqmYhKYI1Rnx7Rjne9kyN2OO3zY4HL2D=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"We found this great spot on our last day at the Falesia Beach. The choice on the menu was extensive, from sushi to a whole range of burgers, amazing salads to interesting wraps and much more. Friendly staff & good service.
Delicioso!!! A must do!
You need to go inside &give name to staff, don't hang back if you see a queue as there is no sign saying how to book.","time":1598773839,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Peter Cole","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101555150198229152557/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SaOqOmEPKGPii1s3QZzbTB3DbCfG9i1R9a1SQirQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very disappointing!! The best feature of this bar, the upstairs area was closed at 6.30. The blinds were down so sundowner drinks this evening. A much warmer welcome by the staff in the bar up the beach.","time":1662572053,"translated":false},{"author_name":"simone sanchez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116581116287571850762/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZiOVWo5AyzRJzeRmxTBxVG8j4HfaKH5JiJCP3G=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This place has the perfect location and ambience with a live DJ on certain days. Unfortunately, the service is terrible and the food/drinks are overpriced when compared to the quality of the products. Today we waited over 45 min just for a sandwich. The waiters take forever even to bring you a drink so be extremely patient. You can only come here when it isn't very busy or you'll encounter chaos. Honestly, not worth it unless they improve their service.","time":1659706200,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Emma Keogh","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105703035432468693326/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qc4wFZO6V8p5GzGkeDxfnJZ89CghgRb8PcbmyRPg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"My friend had a Steak on a Stone and I had a Vegitarian version with Feta cheese. I can day hand on heart this was our best meal of our holiday. Absolutely delicious, can highly recommend.","time":1653820037,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Matt Carter","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116143139707621004797/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TSEGU7fidASWHM9L2wBFu1DMrRy4rfVtp-ebphqAc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"If I could give a restaurant in Albufeira 6 stars I'd give the extra one to the owner of the sizzling stone, based on reviews we took an uber to the sticky horrible strip of the new town and couldn't wait for this place to open so we could leave!

We ordered the piri piri devil wings to start and believe me they were hot as hell!

I ordered the fillet steak on the stone and my partner ordered the surf and turf, both were absolutely amazing and easily one of the best meals we've had on our visit.

The restaurant had only just opened at 6pm and we hit it instantly and were ushered to a lovely table In the courtyard.

We were given simple menus and asked about the wines of which the owner was very informative with, we ordered a bottle of Tons and indulged in our meal.

Less than €90 we were so happy with our meal we tipped an extra €10, the service was perfect and the food out of this world.

Highly recommend based on food quality and service to be reckoned with.","time":1663525930,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Duncan Bell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101179517562150726020/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZkSeNuWAkVtmd7bl7IlQ8Y7wQTBzfsIScS7qjZ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"What a fantastic experience with fabulous food. Cook your food to your liking on a very hot stone, we had filet steak and prawns with mushrooms, pepper, onion and tomato. You can get the same but cooked in the kitchen. Very popular restaurant.","time":1661005318,"translated":false},{"author_name":"jakeycuz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109920458665553720264/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QWOzQiMD6wofQZc3Kwc4CgPeM36868UQqXXPShVw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Food cooked perfectly and it's a fair price for what you get.

Steak was one of the best Ive ever had (top 3) and cost €25. Half the price of what I would pay back home for the same quality.

Drinks - €5 for a rum and coke, good price.","time":1675863459,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Arjen von Henning","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109773009216589859699/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TEKnt2Mpbb4zEHa2tcKtdUpN4nDHWx3GNcc9vHiA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"Very nice restaurant, the specialty hot stone menus are such a nice experience. The meat and vegetables are served on a hot plate so you can cook it yourself the way you want it. The meat  quality is really good. Also the other dishes ( without hot stone) are very good. No big neon advertising on the roof, but easy to find, just near the strip. You can see the personal serves you with whole their hart","time":1597137904,"translated":false}]

column8: Buganvilia Plaza - Edf. 1 e 2, Estr. da Quinta do Lago 1, 8135-024 Almancil, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Isa Sofia","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107626604614817852936/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYUU-Un7bmpmt4qaOnlJMjfOP2M31KPoteJ5ATw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Great environment, very fashion decoration and design, amazing food. The waitress are super kind. You must try the tuna and the chocolate desert. This is a nouvelle cosine restaurant so make sure you order a starter (you can share) and 1 main mean. I would recommend this restaurant and return back again","time":1660079917,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kalei Huf","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110858253005163092677/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QEd2th7XsTimQf2EA9qjKkurz5vVJov6rBESqbaw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Paid a lot of money for dinner, and on our way out, security stopped us and wouldn’t let us leave. They tried to intimidate us saying we couldn’t leave unless we presented a club card. We didn’t even come for the club. We went to the restaurant, and we’re detained at the exit. So confusing… it kind of felt like a scam to squeeze more money out of us. WARNING ⚠️ do not go here!!! Tourist trap!!!! Ended up having to pay over 750 euros to leave!!!!! Seriously, a scary experience.","time":1657934193,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pedro Martin Hernandez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104917668961103135358/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZNbPBiDEso-ovZMBvqIhx-69TVSvaoRdZDXy-l=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Supposed  to be a luxury restaurant, but I would just call it a very expensive restaurant, not worth the money you pay. There are better places to spend a lot of money in Vilamoura.","time":1657974834,"translated":false},{"author_name":"julio moreno-aleman sanchez","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104454998000049562063/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QZ91k6dYvjrQJ4w-yUbDrBYGui3KI8OsCy51Tfjg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Really bad experience.
We were a group of 5 people, had dinner ther, spent over 700 €.
But then when we were heading out they were aggressively asking for cards that we didn’t have.
Really bad attitude.
I wouldn’t recommend this place to anyone.
It was empty and still asking for more money.
Not a place to go","time":1657934288,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Liang Yang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117390509089846489790/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZlY9hsw0LtDMvPrqrrbyBpEOvZfXqgqIKFrphS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The vibe, music and environment is great!
But the service and organization is a mess.
My friend had her birthday celebration party here, the meat was served cold like sashimi:) we had to ask them to warm up again, we ordered a shared dessert for seven, they gave us just one spoon for it, guess they just thought we’re so close as to share even the spoon together:) not to mention that the so called dessert was just a mix of sugar and flour , and ice mixed with flavored sugar and cream:)
I mean, we don’t really care about the food and all, we were just there to enjoy the vibes and celebrate my friend’s birthday:) we had great time.
But for a place like that, for the prices all the customers pay, I guess they will Jus got the one-time customers forever!
No judgment at all, simply put the facts!","time":1629588562,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Michelle Chan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116558137546870499001/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SWV7UahqJB2-z2-_5hjJEQA7VxTHyzjEXALgXH6A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Nice brunch menu! Popular cafe with indoor and outdoor seating. The staff were super friendly. Portion sizes were good.","time":1634681244,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mondi Bkx","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112353837206131842483/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R_rPfuUCgUNomkWWaDLsboU75-nmPvU7uo4yrp=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Perfect place to start the day… clean and tasty! Recommended… always nice to be there","time":1661294518,"translated":false},{"author_name":"bradley beilby","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102651031232852244110/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RrZJnTsPUau0F8JOa_PPYX58jubPS1NTibu4Sq0g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Fantastic menu choices, food was excellent so much so we went back 4 times for lunch and breakfast. Staff were great and friendly with the kids. Highly recommended for a pleasant breakfast and or lunch.\nStaff decorated and made a special Halloween menu which was nice, I recommend the goats cheese breakfast bun and or the corination  chicken but in a wrap.. it was excellent","time":1667378949,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Russell W. Aylsworth","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113958457052118965604/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxakSngXh1IWVKZsGMr_h3NPc7jksXYxgkhAbcIC=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Good lunch options , great coffee and lots of sweets","time":1669990936,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cristina Neamtu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114255792897334754866/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TIm5dCcwLGho0qOnhsLdCn_DlFkuhHlBBJnimMig=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"I only have 2 coffees(cappuccino) 3.50€ one, and was good 🥰","time":1678028595,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Daniel Temm","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105742259684052789712/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxawumzODgvcsAbuch_sRRSuouFCAgb2hGggxL0i=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Incredible Course! Had read a lot of reviews before playing and a constant theme was the slow play and time it took to get through the round. Any course like this where tee times are every 8 mins will always mean there is elements of waiting but the course is so nice just relax and enjoy it.

We walked it and if you can I don’t know why you wouldn’t. Walking down some of the amazing fairways was the best part about it.

Course immaculate condition and Green Speeds were 10.5 when we played which we found great and not too fast as amateur golfers. All an all an amazing course and a very enjoyable experience.","time":1675498356,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pieter M. Gabes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101948369445718500271/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYpdHY2IZ67xYDNgOjrk2fEEAIL6J660OurxjX0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Absolutely stunning golf course, love it.","time":1669853175,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Doug Ross","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115601248611543943560/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TO3GYgaDFZ1M7YGD2m4D7eqU0ATGqJjyFiCJ-k=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"By far the best maintained course of five we played in the Algarve.  Everything from tee boxes to greens in great shape.  Lots of interesting holes with plenty of challenge but fairways pretty forgiving and wide.  This is not quite so up and down as say the nearby Ocean Course but it is a tough walk with a lot of hills.  One small plus is that the pull trolleys are slightly better than all the other courses in the area which have cheap, terrible ones that your bag will not stay attached to!  Might consider an electric trolley if you are walking.   Nice terrace for a beer afterwards too.","time":1664959973,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dean Watson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112613916016486230779/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaIZY04CHRyAYfGKRdzjFA4wgla5As6Cy94_rzB=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Fantastic golf course 5 stars for everything only down side is everything is costly","time":1650402363,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sílvio Baptista","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104191412499676460667/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TRNzYBrGC7AwBYd4wTBm-yAhCIrmhmWXOlaNU5DQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"One of the best places in the world to live and play golf.","time":1601125534,"translated":false}]

column8: Rua Marquês de Fronteira 157 163A, 1070-294 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Augusto Cangahuala","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108368167903919623426/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q1shUj761KX5PnJb_6Uu26PbRuGMENMqG9ROa8aFo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Wonderful experience! During our first night in Lisbon we decided to give this place a try. We wanted to try some traditional Portuguese food and A Valenciana has been around for a long time with excellent reviews. It turns out all the reviews and pictures are absolutely right, the place is lovely and with a great atmosphere. The manager was very quick to setup a table for us as soon as we arrived. Out waitress was also extremely kind and made us feel so welcome from the very beginning. We also noticed that not just her but all staff are nice and professional. The food arrived quickly and it was absolutely delicious. The tried the chicken and it was delicious. Then we had the steak and we were so impressed but how well it was done. Overall, we had an incredible evening and have become fans of this place.","time":1654905495,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eddie Tan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114210487608084082220/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QbQcfXjyMoGXJu0l3QnIYjvwyv3PLhGddwEugusg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Forever never fail to deliver good delicious chicken meal. The fries and rice equally good. The service is fantastic. The servers are so fast and excitement. Must come to have it.","time":1663179991,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Grace Savage","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109618709212110007331/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbPU94H6S4curNXh72Mv5lLID02FpNap7GWQRWH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"We went to the take away stop next door. The BBQ chicken was amazing, juicy and very flavoursome and the chips were great too. The girls serving were also very sweet. Bit of a walk out of town but worth it for some awesome frango for cheap, in large quantities!!","time":1678992694,"translated":false},{"author_name":"M. S","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101778967010977466201/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxb9-YznGjg8l1v1A3QgnbO4rigetTp_OW94eR32=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"Food was delicious and buttery. Had the whole chicken with rice and fries. Chilli sauce was nice as well. Our waiter was pleasant. This is a local spot, we were the only tourist there. Would definitely come back!","time":1678802360,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sanaz Nik","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109896005300575081070/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R-F6_of7BCR2dgBxH8-AiCMulADo08cGpVg_A9mQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba7","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"I believe this restaurant is famous forcits chicken, I did not try the chicken but my friends did. They liked it. But I had a beef which was OK.
The service was good .
Employees are nice.
There is a parking near restaurant.
It has indoor and outdoor sits","time":1665239421,"translated":false}]

column3: Lively eatery with a patio serving breakfast & brunch specialties, plus coffee, cocktails & wine.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Yana Popovych","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114873027202245746243/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbzik08dFZ7AjAXuWI8wqu2wP7g-Kn4IgfaeWMK=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Nice place to have breakfast/brunch.
Food and coffee are tasty enough. We liked eggs though waffles were a little below my expectations.
Design is green and cozy.
The place is crowded on weekends, so the staff places you on the waiting list. Waiting time was about 15 minutes.","time":1667736046,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Natalie Hickerson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115599642120656570298/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RiSGVF1R3UWc1gyP7BBoYaGM-4b7Y3l1ReK966zw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Delicious breakfast! Very fast service. Beautiful decor with a great ambience. Vegetarian friendly too! Would highly recommend the full hearty breakfast which was healthy, flavorful, and so filling! Love the grilled halloumi and mushrooms.","time":1666433221,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Natalia Nuckowska","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113663534863519344140/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFD7ZIZ4w3op8YTm3yPwIJmWmls6BHip3YquXKRQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Love this food and the vibes of this place!
I would only add bone spice dips option to menu as my was a little bit to spicy.

We’ve ordered: vegan burrito, pulled pork sandwich and 1 x cappuccino and 2x black coffee and we paid around 40€","time":1669109700,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eloy Bustamante","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101529999052426035772/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ss42Ku8kJxUJqbDQ7A2HeWnz3jEawzfsspm3kJxA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"This place is just FANTASTIC!
The staff is extremely kind and the service is really quick! The food is amazing (portion size and taste) and the price is quite fair. They gave my dog a bowl of water and treated him like royalty! The place is quite cool with a very nice vibe. I keep coming back everytime I’m in Lisbon. 100% recommended","time":1660248138,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kristjana Nikolls","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105959778565272748138/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S2zZeetE8GyUrjCVrlwRTs-0QcXMi62Xp5eulyoiw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Got a take away oat latte from this place. Staff were really lovely and the barista was super friendly and attentive to the coffee. Coffee tasted good, very light creamy taste with next to no acidity or bitterness. There is outdoor seating and the morning lights the coffee shop making it a really beautiful spot for breakfast. The overgrown wildlife hanging above is also a gorgeous touch. Super funky coffee cup design too!","time":1672479105,"translated":false}]

column3: Meat boards, focaccia-bread sandwiches & pastas, plus cocktails, at a hip tavern with a terrace.
column11: [{"author_name":"Rafael M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112665006412014107591/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TO6bF4FzOpSihY3othQSaURIV4teoBZwU9Yorlnw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The street in which this place is located is calm during the day and animated at night. It has been nicely decorated and you really feel the sea vibes in here. The staff is quite friendly and they are willing to help you out. Everything we tried was great and prices are not high. They also have some nice wines and cocktails !","time":1663062317,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Paige Pope","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112554964733590643227/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qq_wxsPQGK7jZ74wR6ezYdk_0n7QNY43uJ9J8S5mU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Loved this place! Went twice during our Cascais visit. Excellent ambiance and service and food. Some unique cocktails as well. The mushroom pasta and the pesto pasta were simple, fresh and delicious","time":1665675739,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Arielle McCracken","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117174020071951255926/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TWLQ2sZWhucdaPAZ6scSJzrLpzUpUoh6OPDXJRyg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"One of my favorite meals I’ve had in Portugal. The food and wine was incredible and our server was very sweet and attentive. We had a great time! Will definitely be back.","time":1653472804,"translated":false},{"author_name":"J H","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115689911403942855800/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaoX7kFFbUAnurIiVw8TcjPZLAC8tfkMR-EGJAC=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Service and food were fantastic. The location is cute and we really enjoyed our time at the Taberna. Good choice for a relaxed drink and dinner. Prices are reasonable and the presentation of the food is extra nice. We hope to come back one day.\nReservation recommended - it’s a popular spot.","time":1656759377,"translated":false},{"author_name":"charlottedebruijn20","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117200408814073164993/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbee3eA_Lqi0g3xd3fvJwhINygcz7xuxAUjzFMV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"One of the best experiences I’ve had in Portugal (and I’ve been many places). Service is super friendly and quick, great atmosphere and above all delicious food. Been here 3 times during my last visit. HIGHLY recommend ❤️","time":1657055119,"translated":false}]

column3: Lively dinner spot & dance club dishing up grilled meats, pasta & dessert, plus cocktails & sangria.
column8: R. da Cintura do Porto de Lisboa, 1200-109 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Mr Glade","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111951398882508892240/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZhmzwo7me9Cm2k04QjKnr3dIpEpNJT5hawrUTAiQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Don’t mind bad reviews, club is good spacious with great international music. Smoking is allowed inside (might be disadvantage for some people, but not for those who party). Security is kind and understanding (despite lacking some English proficiency).","time":1677994103,"translated":false},{"author_name":"trin cren","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109532129586067404377/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYC0-OnBxz7lFdcN6ijNqVOORu-_G1QRfWc6U5V=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"unfortunately every single other review is correct. i have no problem with them not wanting non Portuguese people in there. but if it’s going to be like that, then they should advertise as a local only club.
trash club
techno music
wants to scam foreigners
wish i could give it 0 stars.

BUT went to a club down the street and had an amazing time, so i still love Portugal 😊🇵🇹","time":1671278952,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Gianvito Romano","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101816218525249226839/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RFnt7xssJ3hp0UmnmAgDKiZE9XJsbdn32DLHaL0g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I cannot give 0 stars for this place just because maps do not allow it. This is one of the most beautiful club in Lisbon, but at the same time managed terribly, expecially the queues and the impact that employee, in particular bodyguards, have with people.
The smell of racism is something disgusting, if you are not from Portuguese prices are random, probably based on sensation or spread. It never happen that the expected prices matched the reality. If you have some "knowledge" you enter for free or paying less, but if you are tourist of course is not the case. If you are in Lisbon and you are looking for a club, please do not go there, never. I would never suggest this club, even if the location is sensational. Finally, there are thousands negative reviews that confirm my bad experience. 0 stars!","time":1667315201,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Siiri S","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108406726326341797207/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ-qfcU6jc1tWX12TDlMJtvDWf9y3CKzzapJAY8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"We went to the club on a Wednesday and they apparently had sold out the coat storage. The workers there were very rude and kept yelling at us for no reason at all, without telling us what the issue was. I get that working in a club can be stressful and drunken people are hard to work with, but it was in no way necessary. Also I agree with the other comments about scamming and singling out tourist and people who don’t “fit” the clubs aesthetic. Especially the female workers take issue with the girls in the club. Not worth going to.","time":1675348887,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bryceton LeFlore","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104439008434521904819/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SbKlr-rBx0nkXfwa73xwnKff2hulrYQYzAYrDiWg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"RACIST and terrible club atmosphere, club bouncers are extremely rude.

For all looking to go there just look at the reviews ;) i think you wont see one positive review in years this is all you have to know! They obviously paid for good reviews on other sites.

DEFINITELY DON'T RECOMMEND PLEASE WHATEVER YOU DO DON'T MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE WE DID !!!!!","time":1678848326,"translated":false}]

column3: Narrow, traditional room with artisanal products lining on shelves & serving historic tapas recipes.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Inês Coelho Ferreira","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104184977644274011112/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RlgT_xVjROTHwIIC5eKpT1yPQsdBBc_3sYcEw3tg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"This was a surprise! And a good one! Went for dinner and had the most delicious and creative tapas ever. Staff were amazing and so so helpful! They explained all the dishes and what they recommended ordering. You could tell products were as fresh as they get. Definitely worth the 45 min await. Dishes change depending on the day you go and on the products in season. Got the chance to try some of their persimmon dishes and they were amazing, specially the goats cheese one. Highly recommend.","time":1671442430,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mikhaiil Wehbe","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113945301010288205352/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TB29UgT4uxg2MgaowE4mFBAt99dcJ2SuolBBQqHVc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Substandard food served with a LOT of pretense. Cheap house wine sold at ∆ high prices.
Was there with my family.
If you like to be greeted, treated like if you were at a fine restaurant and end up with low quality food, that's your spot.
I would avoid.

Addendum: the waiter was rude, to say the least. He came to apologize for something that went wrong, saying that he understood something that we didn't say. I told him that he was told twice and he nodded twice, "just say sorry and that would be it". He replied something like "please be polite..."!!! That sent me off and told him repeatedly "Go! Go! Go!". I blame it on the language. He probably didn't understand what he was saying, even though he had a perfect English when he explained the menu...","time":1650468124,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emily C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115106825998875435398/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TGTDPI0Y1ejFMPWn7fPmZCLPjjuZIzlshfI1yUiQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"This meal was a dream. Through & through. Worth the wait and every euro. The atmosphere is charming, the staff were friendly, and each bite was superb. Order a bottle of Serra Oca and enjoy yourself. Cash only. We’ll certainly be back!","time":1648491052,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anna Lee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108357409657438593663/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SZZ0G6JpITXe3YScTQPttHm-fUvspnod5w17uzQgU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Lives up to the hype!! Had a toddler in tow so I made sure to arrive by noon to get seated right away. Sure enough there were already 3 parties there waiting before me. I was at first told to wait 15 minutes but then the host reconsidered when she saw my baby and let me sit down. People after me had to wait some time to get seated.

The menu is written on chalkboards and they bring it around and walk you through each option. The prices are very reasonable.

I ordered the peixinhos (fried green beans), rabbit stew, and chocolate mousse. I tried to order two mains but the waitress stopped me, telling me what I had was enough. I didn’t know green beans could be so good? Everything I tasted was exceptional, and I feel like you can’t go wrong here. The service was kind and attentive. The restaurant interiors are a vibe.

They’ll offer you bread at the beginning as though it’s included, but know that it’s an extra charge, and it’s nothing special. Cash only.","time":1666987624,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Delilah","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113056126961655818170/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RSXzE7f_BpTOAkJ2MmZS4p1iGxELoNjnl1WC94FQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"CASH ONLY

By far the best meal I’ve had in Lisboa.
Beyond memorable and just absolutely excellent.

Pro tip: get in line at 5:20pm or else you’re going to have dinner at 10pm

Must order:
Prawns (so tender) our favorite!!!
Scallops
Green beans
Grilled beef (they say smoked)
Clams
Grilled pineapple
Tiramisu

Our bill was €91
And we had 2 glasses of wine, 2 desserts & 5 dishes","time":1664826300,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Anastasia Karpovets","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111298814162978360456/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SatAX-T4xKLg68aTp6nnAu4fYyGKpDaa0UDTf9QQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Excellent octopus. Melting in the mouth. Loved house green wine! Refreshing. Dessert with caramel and banana was also very good. Authentic and small place with many drawings and reviews pinned to the wall. Friendly staff. We loved every minute of our dinner.","time":1672473055,"translated":false},{"author_name":"oğuzhan karacüllü","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113716358334204260512/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TiFH5qWWougbgcBY3f5htYEokFcOx0QSYtz854Bw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"The staff is friendly and the ambiance is nice, the foods and wines really depends what you ordered. We liked the king prawns and bloody moon cocktails but the fish mix was mediocre. The house wine was so sweet which I don’t like. In the end still one of the good restaurants around worth to visit
Second experience: Green wine is better and lamb chops were tasty we also liked the couscous salad. Sea rice still not the best one but better than the fishes","time":1662456233,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wouter van 't Grunewold","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101344121459808621136/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S4Ibdv8QiQmz76qWc_vaA-DD1mSUWRbvLmS1GQ7Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Duque is an amazing restaurant, located in the central (historical) part of Lisbon. The restaurant has an amazing menu, with a great variety of tapas, starters, fish dishes and meat dishes. I asked the waiters for a recommendation, and ended up by eating one of the best cod dishes I've ever had.

The staff is very kind, and speaks English very well. Prices are good, and might even be considered cheap. I've enjoyed my stay here, and I would recommend everybody to eat here.

It is however recommended to make a reservation, especially since the restaurant is quite small.","time":1647203465,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Valerie L","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107488888150168542936/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYb3M5rnol1wxl9ygFfVCpMYdRFCvnaUgW3_6Hc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"We got the pork cheek and seafood rice and omg!! Both were amazing. Then we had some banana pudding like dessert in a jar that was also outstanding.
The place is decorated with 80s tech and gadgets and has a very nice ambiance.","time":1668027612,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Douglas Franks","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101280308901089647027/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RO0ST1QTpenIhWV5AF_vifL25Ttx2hYPd9RUGMPws=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A small and intimate restaurant located in the heart of lisbon. Duque has a small menu that offers a great mix. The food was amazing. We started with the goats cheese, bread and olives which was delicious. We then had the grilled prawns and lamb chops with an octopus salad. The lamb chops were the best lamb chops I have ever had, I would highly recommend. There was a great wine menu as you would expect at a restaurant like this and they offered a strong selection of portugese wines from which we had a lovely Douro. The decor of the restaurant was lovely, very rustic  with a twist.  Service was brilliant and very accommodating to our pram in such a small space. Be aware you do sit very close to other people but for us this wasn't a problem as we met some wonderful people there.
The food is extremely reasonably priced and brilliant value for a local and authentic Portuguese that isn't a tourist restaurant. Fantastic experience all round.","time":1661256937,"translated":false}]

column3: Large, airy bakery cafe offering Portuguese baked goods including tarts & breads.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Maria Frazão","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101095427956415219914/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RNZpKaL3Y2OBVdl_xULUGnJsncKkJPuLVAv8F8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"I recently revisited the famous Pastéis de Belém and I must say, I was thoroughly impressed! The Pastéis de Belém were crispy and flaky on the outside with a warm and creamy custard filling on the inside, exactly like my childhood memories. It was simply divine! The chicken pastry was equally delicious, with succulent shredded chicken in a perfectly seasoned puff pastry. I was pleasantly surprised by the generous portion size as well. The “Bola de Berlim” was generous and tasty. The pastries were served hot and fresh, making every bite even more enjoyable. The pastries alone are worth the visit! Was one of my favorite places to go on weekends for a “pastel de Belém” with an espresso, when I lived in Lisbon, and apparently it still is. The restaurant line is faster than waiting for takeout… Unless you definitely want to grab and go. The staff was also friendly and helpful! Overall, I would highly recommend this place to anyone looking for top-notch Portuguese delicacy.","time":1676472955,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rox Avila","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103375592704981355757/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QyckH2i-Mkof3qiMKVQfhDoG1RsjEgXB124iK6nQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The reviews were all true that you can get in faster if you ate in the restaurant than lining up for takeaway. Food is cheap and the ambiance was refreshing. The servers were friendly and had really good suggestions on what to eat. This has the most authentic but extremely affordable Portuguese egg tart that I have been craving for years. I loved it.","time":1664819555,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ebun Oluwole","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105313194568509561104/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R4wwWZnbHuGgvi1hlLHPAqtkDe07-4wFVJea8O=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I wasn’t really a fan of the custard tarts but I really wanted to try the other pastries but they were a sold out.

Guess it’s best to go early in the morning to the best options.

Notwithstanding, it was to experience the iconic pastries.

Also, the queues move pretty quickly as well.","time":1667147444,"translated":false},{"author_name":"L A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117309616514419999530/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RwdQ5JRi09z0NIUmqVgWtrLE1qosaK5zfe5CYGvg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The most delicious tarts ever. Not too sweet. Slightly warmed. More creamy than other ones. You can sprinkle on icing sugar and cinnamon. You can either get in line to sit down or take away.","time":1662823242,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bilal A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105484944715455191085/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S7X97iZvdnbmdVhrACgd3YM_GTM2cAlaEswDOR9g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Probably the most famous place in Portugal and Lisbon for the tarts. It tastes more of a custard compared to the ones in other places in Lisbon (more egg yolk). They having seating indoors and you will definitely be surprised when you see the number of people sitting inside or waiting to get a table. Expect wait times to either buy or get a seat. The tart costs 1.2 euros.  Definitely worth trying when in Belem. Recommended.","time":1657897209,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Yaryna Zheldak","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114315327972949399248/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RDeDv4lCmOrHx2B3eA6k2Q4YBoWEIA75JC-2Y2bxg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"One of the best brunches I've ever had. The place is not big, but it has interesting menu and interior. Salty pancakes with bacon were a bit dry, but still tasty. You can get a brunch menu with a toast, granola, and drinks. In my opinion, granola was the star of the brunch - full of fresh fruit.

The location is convenient.

Waiters were very friendly and helpful. Must-visit in Lisbon!","time":1669310807,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eveline Coppes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118256602422605430712/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sg_MgcNHgcsJHlJExUpUN25JdalRIuGAGJnRLY-Xk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Sometimes I wished there was more than 5 stars to give. I loved the Break Café with its nice ambiance inside and the delicious food on the menu.
Portion sizes are generous, so don't over order.
I visited with my children and they are still raving about the great breakfast they had this morning.
Highly recommend!","time":1659271057,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Phoebe Dhi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116781997422148106920/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Spfh5NWTKk4GI4tHG_5VoDDmIW7y23iiea6fdvuQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"A wonderful place to sit and have your brunch/ lunch after walking up and down..
The atmosphere, the attention, the interior, the food & drinks.. everything was just perfect and beautiful.

Highly recommend!","time":1652594859,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kristin Wilson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114005457828778723389/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S98rZEQkIWGV5-h2A5fLx8Ezlmg1YaloebjI56Ltg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"The friendliest service of anywhere I’ve been in Lisbon. Cute café with an extensive menu. If you can’t decide what to order (like me), try the brunch menu. For €19 you get a coffee or tea, juice or smoothie, toast option with salad, and yogurt with granola and fruit or pancakes. Everything was fresh and delicious!","time":1668588198,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Manuel Suarez Abascal","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100632839653887251038/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SKfVMwsxTBp4a2iQcFISaCWc5nChsAnzXCaEd43Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Beautiful and cozy cafe. The staff speaks English, are polite and professional. The cafe is located next to the Lisbon Cathedral and Portas do Sol view point. The food is good but it's not really too generous.

Overall it's good place to eat but I think there are better places for the price and quantity of food.","time":1645529928,"translated":false}]

column3: Unassuming mainstay turning out Italian-style pizzas, Basque burnt cheesecake & natural wines.
column8: Rua de S. Paulo 79, 1200-427 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Daniel Dragojević","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101242116052080363983/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYkSXpE1NwGvKhqbDKuc7bB-iwbbZ0FclNwd3sQRA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Amazing pizza in one of the most vibrant parts of the city.

You can eat at the cozy restaurant or you can get it takeaway and go watch the sunset at Cais while eating a delicious pizza.

Whichever one you go for, you will not make a mistake. Personally I am not a fan of mushrooms on pizza but their mushroom pizza made rethink that.

However the pepperoni pizza was on point.

Definitely recommend it!","time":1675692208,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kyle Maxwell","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103137830136409510693/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S7DTfcadTa44r26e_peRuVQbI8hAAaVtfeQGKvsA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Went to timeout market and didn’t want to fight the crowds for food or a table. So I walked out and tried to find a place close to eat. Came to this small pizza place with a good ambiance. Ordered a margarita pizza with some mushrooms. The mushrooms are really good because they didn’t use just one kind. The pizza sauce and dough were also good. Would recommend.","time":1663450115,"translated":false},{"author_name":"A M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113082132148058990726/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZvVBnCOsasQQaJLP7Re0IouPiPhpoIulexDzJ8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Do NOT walk.. RUN to Lupita’s.

Thee BEST pizza we’ve ever had (sorry Roma) hands down. Could’ve cried when I finished, we got 3 between the two of us and ate every last bit.

Staff were so incredibly friendly and cool, inside is beautiful and bright, great music, great food.. all round incredible.

Coming back before we go. Might even buy a pizza night before we fly home!","time":1653229576,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aitor Falx","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105003384107821541873/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZiB9vTEAhUqxvfWiXMBHlQHXI47lgEd6Qaa6I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Awesome pizza, service and vibe. I ordered the special pizza of the month (with anchovies, burrata and mushrooms) and it was excellent. The dough is homemade and very light and crispy. All is done on a stone oven. Service is great!! 100% recommend :)","time":1668802977,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cindy T","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110794148403670517687/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sx3_PkXh8bK7PKiKTvRyca-bc7QekgzegQyFtHXg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Wow, this pizza spot was sooo busy, people and online orders lining up for their food. very very busy on the weekend.

I got to Lupita on the early side on a Monday and was able to get a pepperoni pizza within 20 minutes.

This is a gem of a pizza spot in Lisbon!!! Great Neapolitan pizzas and the prices are really reasonable.

They were so good that we went back for more pies!","time":1653960612,"translated":false}]

column3: Cozy specialist spotlighting tarts filled with egg custard & topped with cinnamon, plus coffee.
column11:
[{"author_name":"L H","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116117641846220971025/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S5CwC62ZKPkquItJVbhw18EVQGsj1fGnol9yeXpw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Tried this after seeing such positive reviews and was let down. More descriptions below:

The texture of the crust was off to me. It had no layers and is not crispy or crunchy at all. It’s somewhat “fluffy” that it falls apart in your mouth easily. Some may like it. Though, I’m pretty sure the crust is made from croissant dough that’s flattened.

The custard was good. It’s very soft and had slightly watery texture (not necessarily bad). The top of the custard is nicely caramelized. I’ve tried several different spots in town whose custards either had hints of cinnamon or ginger. The custard here is not bad and not very special.","time":1657449208,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Wilson Tsang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100618295330470233704/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QJppk6T4--06kCRaIJmbhtUK5gQDdCsnC36gPRYg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This is my favorite spot in Lisbon. The pastries are always perfect and fresh, the crust is flaky and just right and there’s a little bit of cinnamon inside that enhances the flavor (I don’t think any of the others I’ve tried has cinnamon inside). Don’t think, just come and eat some of these delicious pastries!","time":1659434100,"translated":false},{"author_name":"JC M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114422142166922072581/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZP5-Je_dcBmTpzxMdPY2hwghxGYlRRmaiH2Ef6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Very popular Portuguese egg tart. Staff were all radiantly smiling and enthusiastic about their craft. I would definitely recommend stopping here.

Don’t get me wrong, their egg tarts are absolutely delicious. It is hard to not give them a 5*, because the crust is absolute perfection.

The flaw I found was that the custard was too sweet and lacked umami (egg yolk flavor). The cinnamon garnish that came with it helped balance it out, but I almost wanted to put some flaky sea salt on top to balance it further.","time":1667821831,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jainif Marediya","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100496024813967467447/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RWPp_j2N6dbATp7ZjkBbzAMS86aaxO_45aWX_b1A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"This place is pretty good for the pasties but it isn’t significantly better than any other pasties shop. Make sure you put cinnamon sugar on top. The service here is alright and there can be a line depending on where you go. No seating inside but there is a standing bar","time":1652250818,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lua Sav","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114034384314045008795/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TVi9uVzKsy-EraQb_l9TnCPsB5CdyfHs4H6RXUvg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"The long line indicated it must be good. Checking the reviews we wanted to try it out and we were not disappointed.
Delicious! Ate more than we should have. So fluffy and delicious!
Must try for sure!","time":1677348587,"translated":false}]

column3: Pub plates & cocktails served in oceanfront surrounds with a stylish, roomy terrace.
column8: Rua de Santa Apolónia 59, 1100-468 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Amanda Fox","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108240610604293696826/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RiY108nqZNSRkp2gv3DVm81HkQag9h6W5Qyq9xhg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"This was a blast for our family’s last breakfast in Lisboa!

Top level overlooking the water, super unique and cool atmosphere, delicious food, and SO MUCH FOOD! Kids menu. And cotton candy is included . Service was wonderful, everyone was so nice. I recommend this experience!","time":1657966539,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Олеся Малеваная","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101058613683516369253/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R6Chhdr9J105FaXv3z-zBzqv0tcXxmDK7Bbz_62qw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"I love this rooftop with a big terrace.
Really good service, and great interior.
Big brunches.
No overcrowded at the weekend.","time":1656160693,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alyssa Burnett","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106663677337418254969/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qv7bOu2kRHr_a7qzfF7fS00TWjQ46CnyF06E_SjQQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"We were lucky enough to snag a table before a reservation was due to come in. It is a rooftop spot with a stellar view. We came at a weird time on a Saturday and they only served brunch when we were looking for more of an appetizer situation. We instead ordered a bottle of their sangria and it tasted like a melted strawberry fruit popsicle - so, extremely delicious and easy to drink the entire bottle. I would love to come here at night, but you'd probably be better making a reservation instead of trusting a walk in like us! Would absolutely come here again just for the wonderful atmosphere.","time":1650132074,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Devin","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106584070891761502013/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZW-RBmRxk56mXEbd_wx_AiZkzQTU4OtcWfyiErw9k=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Fun vibe, great view, very limited food menu. There's a few appetizers, burger, pizza, and a misfitted tandoori chicken dish which actually wasn't too bad. I'd recommend the burger overall - the regular one (the other comes in an odd soupy gravy).","time":1629949203,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Travel Ralu","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111911250234453048916/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SFBs03uPoGqWM-o-t9cqMNeHSM3Ihd9iFb3pp3JDk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Enjoyed a quiet brunch on the terrace with a lovely view and nice service. The vibe was chill and prices were ok and loved the presentation of the cotton candy which you can order with your brunch. Need to check out the night drinking scene though.","time":1666537603,"translated":false}]

column3: Sunny, chic open-air bar on the roof of a hotel with cocktails, live music & city panorama.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Lara Castro","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115289347284158982780/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TspB_miteXVFAMXtRggBk_M_YDGWpqDB3oKIFSTA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"It’s a must go!
What a view!!!
They have an huuuge drink menu, seriously, it’s huge! And I tried to taste as much as I could.
They have a comfy environment also, everything it’s breathtaking and the crew… lovely!
The music was perfect, that kind of edm that chill you out and It’s the kind of place that you leave wanting to return.","time":1660547063,"translated":false},{"author_name":"AK","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108185766192260674349/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SYOxMh1PLo1rUQLdNSSUo8Mi6GFjXBbSQfdY4u1b8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Extremely overrated. I’d not recommend it.
• Value for money: 0/5
• View: view is ok 3/5 (better spots)
• Drinks: 1/5 drinks are overpriced. Cocktails for €14-€16 and water bottles for €7. Coming from Luxembourg we never paid more than €6 for water.
• Music: there is a live DJ, very good 4/5.
• Service: 3/5 nothing special. Inside very good, outside questionable.
• Vibe: 4/5
Btw, all plants are fake :/ and guys, try to avoid wearing shorts.","time":1661281631,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Charlotte","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114844000642900075260/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbkb-qgLDuiyh9VQydnkbGAG6pSyqORwu-7UINV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The food was average and overpriced but the cocktails were delicious. The actual bar itself and the view is beautiful but I guess that is what you are paying for. I would eat elsewhere","time":1643213404,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hamid Sharafatian","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112602890504812027201/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SStn7y4WroRlDm1UkbRkJ_m2690EY3ojP7yg0YX-M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Really nice place for drinks. Service was slow and not that friendly. Great city view clean and modern","time":1667031539,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Diwas Karki","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112871371672489384139/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RK50TFusLXmnO2AeXBKXNi77rclncfcy9x18DOVN0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"I am Really Impressed by the setup of the Bar.
Really good cocktails and friendly staffs.
Little expensive but you can hangout there with nice view of Lisbon city with cocktails 🍸 in your hand.
They have SISHAS TOO ! !","time":1655563194,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Lorraine Ryan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117410804375354907105/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYS98hfqvPOXfEPTKZu1LCkqIWb6zRfIcpzJLrx=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A gem of a place! We went for lunch and the food was very tasty- some of the best we have had during our trip. We loved the vibe so much, we stayed on for cocktails. A lovely way to spend the afternoon. We ate inside as it was busy outside when we arrived- don't worry, the decor inside is gorgeous. We moved outside for drinks later in the afternoon. Highly recommend.","time":1662046116,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Seanna Marie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113294712666147273315/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RHAgs9OZuXtWN--j_zNEbWa7SXIHnM2GJKmD6RHg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"If you are looking for a delightful & delicious restaurant, with fresh, healthy, quality ingredients, welcoming staff, an attentive chef, indoor & outdoor seating, than Palma Cantina is perfect for you. Sitting under the sycamore trees, amongst Parisian bistro style tables, we enjoyed the vegan vegetable Tzatziki salad, crisp shrimp tacos, avocado toast & their signature dessert of grilled banana with homemade coconut ice cream, topped with roasted coconut & a drizzle of molasses (truly so amazing)!","time":1665159464,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alison Udall","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112098530775224899194/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbI9LJi0OojzZFLOdmOTssAstG0CaXKVsPS8rs5=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Just a wonderful little place with great outside tables, many under large trees. Located in a beautiful plaza with amazing tiled buildings. I had a scrumptious green juice and avocado toast. Will be back for sure.","time":1653134436,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Grabinsky Sergey","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112099372256189525372/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TFAp3DebPC5h2eQMizNGbZst6m7U9cy4DcLfR1Gg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing place! All dishes were simply great, cocktails tasty, guys are very friendly ✨\nIf you love coffee, this is one of the best places in the city. Cortado is better than the flat white what I usually drink 🙂👌","time":1637365466,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jade Hllrd","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114075455095867067819/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TTkEjYcts9wGYmtSZjJVp_qpuRimL9lgQZGhuoLw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"A very cute hidden spot with a nice terrace. The food was incredible, we couldn’t pick one plate so we ended up taking 2 dishes too and it was absolutely amazing!","time":1674115740,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Caylin Smith","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115601858606142762035/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QNvxmH59239plNulGv-RUBNXeZmzMJSrgbvllp5q0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Really lovely spot to grab and drink and/or take away a bottle. The staff are incredibly knowledgeable about Portuguese wines; I really appreciated how patient they were when examining the different regions and varieties. Would definitely recommend popping by!","time":1672124963,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Patrik Jansson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117131642209719850692/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QVOYN_lrTKesoV53kfjLECTmbc03Om9V_el_HJBw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"This is a great place for cheese and wine!

They really make you feel welcome even though I knew nothing about wine. They explained the wine types and patiently gave me suggestions based on my preferences.

The waiter was awesome, and the wine and cheese was just as awesome. The goat cheese was AMAZING!

GREAT PLACE!","time":1634410449,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Adrien Griveau","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114243027592644288828/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TuiPzdUl5E_RcC_1mSDkPVYlMcDabt1iz9h4CRIw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Lovely bar. Friendly staff very good wine selection. I highly recommend if you are around.","time":1677251352,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rolf Pedersen","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106371831376173683167/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T_Jk41BMoHdHcjIcnF78x3x0ocXvFsXTlYXkTMnQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Charming local cosy wine spot. Knowledgable staff. Beautiful watching of the nr 28 tram going pass too!","time":1662148541,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Richard Grice","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115317426575053281580/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SKj1scbb2F72TSQmgrjInmlPH1Xz8NeKuECdVFcyA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"A delightful neighbourhood wine bar! We passed a pleasant couple of hours trying several nice Portuguese wines and chatting with the barman Bruno 😋","time":1657980521,"translated":false}]

column3: Casual Peruvian spot serving ceviche & seafood dishes with an Asian twist, plus pisco sours & wine.
column8: R. Dom Pedro V 129, 1250-096 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"David Beilis","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114661755895910219100/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TFCLeSm0ctb1gnljnp6M5PorVcoQ8eAFONxwaK5g=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"This was a unique place in its own category and a special experience that had seafood Portuguese cues.

Most of the dishes we ordered looked amazing but were refreshingly cold and they would have been perfect in the summer. We probably should have ordered tapas following recommendation.

The service was amazing and the place brought a tasteful diversity to our foodie adventure. If you are into this type of kitchen, it is an interesting place to visit. It is located in a very nice neighborhood with a nice park overlooking Lisbon next to it.

The place was not cheap. We resorted to a few dishes to experience that special style and went later for another place with slightly different kitchen.

Enjoy!","time":1672242738,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Felix Kleinhenz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106401288754539337231/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SpgBlwA73h87bOPBmgaNjK9_L3kjkL8zalL4inwQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"The food was very tasty however the ceviche could have had a bit more spice. Also enjoyed the corn bread and the traditional peruvian corn which made the experience very authentic.
What could be improved is the service. Es waited very long and other customer that came later got their food a lot earlier. Also we were not allowed to move two tables together which I think was a bit strange.

Nevertheless I can really recommend that place and will visit again once in Lisbon.","time":1655240248,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dominika Valkova","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109357887213611953135/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tx0rD91cfgYGXXwma0CX4Sr_CMMn1T7Uc1ABIrstA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Absolutely amazing place. The inside part is small and cozy, and there’s few tables for outside seating too. The staff is super fast, attentive and helpful with picking your dish. All the food I tried was so good I only wished for bigger portion. Really well seasoned and fresh. The combinations were unusual but so tasty. The atmosphere is nice for evening dinner. I’d love to come back.","time":1672864579,"translated":false},{"author_name":"maggy horhoruw","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116803914195551284270/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T5gFajcoJ6eNYRquMjbzJtDHPBQIzdzcXUI7pvgQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"We had the tasting menu (5 dishes + 1 dessert). It’s quite filling at the end despite the smaller serving. The pisco sour and recommended white wine are very nice. Service and ambiance are wonderful.","time":1641816112,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luca Bozzoli","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114911388668353532240/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxabx07WvShMYT9rez5DZuRJ9TOtkOiPktzzeU_x=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Recommended but…
I love these kind of place around the world.
Here at A Cevicheria the quality of the raw food is amazing and the menu absolutely at high level. It is probably the best cevice I have ever eaten !
The missing star is about the service.
These kind of places needs professional waiter
We waited quite 2h for a table for 4 people (in the meanwhile we had an happyhour outside the place) and waited so much long time for all the course we have order.
Overall I really recommend this place if you have patience ;-)","time":1660913851,"translated":false}]

column8: R. Dom Pedro V 81, 1250-096 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Suzanne Frey","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108854355910193896778/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SW1Xf0yLpyJVoQoQIR9fqEkR43MmueCrAC81fVgdw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I went for lunch and, as with so many other Michelin restaurants in Lisbon, it was super-lovely at lunch. Service was impeccable and the food outstanding (portions were so generous that I had to take some of it home!). Someone else called this "Spanish" food in their review, and while there's some overlap, there's a lot of original Portuguese here.  As a solo traveler, I loved sitting at the bar and met a fantastic solo-traveling individual while there as well.  Highly recommend!","time":1660572108,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Benswing Rich (Ben Rich - Electric Biker)","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104692698131500910957/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwZYw-qNneV3aRmyP0aY1x0kikPgIg2zVkAe9mmw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Excellent tapas with superior service.  Reservations are highly recommended.  We showed up without reservations and they let us enjoy drinks and appetizers on a tiny table next to the door until our table was ready.  Once inside it was comfortable and the courses were truly delicious.","time":1655627676,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bruno Bachiega da Silva","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104786944474919640578/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TUR9yEVnYRQjsqIzLGMeUERtuLZZxNyboyWiMZxA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The place is small, but well organized and the decor is cozy. If possible, it's best to book a table in advance, as the place is always very crowded.
There are good drink options on the menu, as well as a small but excellent and super affordable wine list.
Dishes take a while to arrive, but they come perfectly hot and delicious from the kitchen. The price is fair and affordable for a Michelin star restaurant. We ordered a starter, a bottle of white wine, a main course, a dessert and a coffee. We left the restaurant completely satisfied with the experience and we would definitely come back and also recommend the place.","time":1641829975,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anne Silva","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115233751116806073768/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ2l8nxMk1PDQwOMbN0ciEiKaj-se_8i2hDa67L=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Booked the restaurant 1 month in advance and expected it to deliver on its Michelin guide reputation. However, overall it was a very disappointing experience for the following reasons:
1 - asked for filtered water to which the waiter said they didn’t have so we then asked for tap water which the waiter then said “was running warm”. We further asked if we can have it with ice and he again declined and said “they are low on ice”. We eventually said ok to the bottled water which he clearly just wanted to sell to us. We later saw glasses of ice being served to other tables.
2 - we were recommended to order up to 5 dishes due to being 2 people. We ordered 4 options and the first 2 came out which were pretty average considering the price of the dishes.
