The portions were quite big, so we thought that the 5 recommendation was a bit excessive but still fairly enjoyed the first 2.
3 - As soon as these were finished, we asked if we could change the remaining 2 which was denied because they had apparently started cooking it. Fair enough, however most people around us had ordered the same thing and we felt like this request could have been easily accommodated.
4 - the final dishes come out and the duck was good but the cod à Brás was very underwhelming. It was extremely salty and soggy with no texture whatsoever. I proceeded to give this feedback to the waiter to which he looked very offended by and responded with “this is the Portuguese way of doing it”. Funny enough, I’m actually Portuguese and have had this dish at least 200 times in my life.
Overall the food was mediocre especially considering the reputation it has. The service has a lot of room for improvement.","time":1657400708,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Michael Ip","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116967894570372950581/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T58njThUS2PxB6s5u2rGgqZiHIBXYw9O46LU3CvA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"This place was highly recommended by a friend and it didn't disappoint. The menu is very well curated and to the point. I ordered the octopus rice which was amazing. Their vermouth selection was great as well. Definitely come early or make reservations because it fills up fast.","time":1660676285,"translated":false}]

column3: High-end Portuguese cuisine, rich with fish & seafood but with meat too, in a family-style setting.
column8: R. das Portas de Santo Antão 150, 1150-269 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Kristjana Nikolls","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105959778565272748138/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S2zZeetE8GyUrjCVrlwRTs-0QcXMi62Xp5eulyoiw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Service 10/10, atmosphere 10/10 with an interesting setting with celebrity photos everywhere (mostly Portuguese). The food was mostly amazing but the grilled codfish was a little lacking in flavour. The prawns for starter were beautiful and we kept dipping our bread in the oil. The prawn risotto (a traditional Portuguese dish) was astonishing. The food portions were immense and we could not finish. Overall and amazing place. Definitely up market high dinning. We had the old 1974 recipe cake for finish which was creamy and light.","time":1664866914,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Virsavia Bereznaya","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117381546044256628962/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SACRxwBgeq5oFFfhBtpT5rArhyz4jXhmRkER46ig=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"INCREDIBLE!!!🔥🔥🔥 I have never eaten so deliciously in my life! Definitely worth the money. If I fly to Lisbon again, the first thing to do is to come back to you. It was superbly delicious! Highly recommend this white wine, we really enjoyed it! Personally, I just love this risotto. I recommend you try it, you won't regret it! 🔝","time":1677534097,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eddie Lee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108369276935092505661/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QsPpwvapUZ0DIabaxVTGrzvdK6D3daKXwkxerhit4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"Top Notch Service from beginning to end.  Cannot compliment the kitchen and staff enough. Rui was our server for the evening and he ensured we were well taken care of with great recommendations and excellent attentiveness and great conversation. We can't wait to try other items on the menu, as some entrees and the seafood platter had us satisfied!","time":1679036874,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Maddie Ratte","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109987296287771371488/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q_pZDXthDlpdJjMk00Abhx0yqjxZaTJRqD5N_58BA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"The food was good and the staff was very friendly, but overall wasn’t my favorite dining experience. If you’re visiting, I’d skip this place and go somewhere else.

We were sat upstairs and it was a large space, bright lights and very busy. Not an intimate setting like you might find elsewhere.
We ordered the codfish and the lobster and prawn rice. The servings are HUGE. Both dishes were good but wish we had only ordered one.
I do understand how some people have called this a tourist trap. The meats and cheeses are already set out at the table but be warned that you must pay for these even though you didn’t ask for them. If you don’t want them, be sure to tell the waiter right away. Also, this was the last restaurant on our week trip and the only one where the waiter mentioned an option to tip as we were paying for our bill.","time":1665945444,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Can H.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106694073646334454804/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYbQMUWw-kNPqrIihNKGdDjOls99NmZmagoOi8S=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"It is good but you will pay for it. Think like steakhouse for this place. Quality decor, fresh prepared food, good service. Good for a special evening not your every day place.

The seafood paella although expensive is very good. Creamy but not watery. Lots of seafood and a good variety. Definitely worth a try.

What is on the table when you arrive is charged if you eat it. Everything from the ham to the bread and the cheese is great. We liked the cheese so much that we even got some from a supermarket. It was one third the price.

They have fast and attentive service. Nothing was late nor too rushed.

You might need a reservation even though it wasn’t full. We went in during the weekday. There are parking options available however it’s metered street parking.","time":1658674140,"translated":false}]

column3: Relaxed option providing pastries, pancakes & light fare in a rustic, plant-filled storefront.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Carlijn Popelier","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110170261750369948319/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q13RnU_jEysj9RaF7sv1JYGd9Oul8W87RVfPSWLX8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Unbelievable brunch menu - it took me 10 minutes to choose. Decided on the smoked salmon on toast which was lovely, lots of smoked salmon. This place is dog-friendly which is not always easy to find and the staff were so friendly to my dog. Amazing service, food and ambiance. I will definitely be back.

The only thing I would ask for is some comfier chairs next time, I felt like I was back in school! ;D","time":1644335553,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Burak IŞIK","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112815586247801444528/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SHFRVvZaoGBk-ig-p1KNgUnywXe57GB3eWH3InyA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"They are good in overall, kind staff, fast and proper service also good tastes. However I just have negative feedback on salty pancake. Amount of maple syrup was too much. Even for sweet package is was too sweet. Really left the half of plate. I see they have good kitchen but wrong choose for salty packages.  Most of the place brings maple syrup separated so you can choose the amount you want to add. They can try it.","time":1675598582,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dorothy Ooko","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101910981278379342209/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SOS35Wm4FsPAZ2h2ajPoGMY86pKVE3dmQQk1iZxVc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Love the vegetarian options here. I was lucky to get a seat without a reservation. I had two eggs  with fried quinoa on a bed of salted sweet potatoes with salad -- exquisite! The service is equally great. I highly recommend this even if you're not vegetarian, they have you covered!","time":1680193831,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kevin Simms","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106317436776973326767/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RZf8BGAK8-B_dk66HhlE0rG1AHrj7WxgQ5WaU-Lg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Lovely place with fantastic brunch food and cocktails. Cute chic vibe with friendly staff. The Botanica egg toast and the salmon nest were delicious and worth a try if you like wild mushrooms and salmon respectively. Popular place so reservations recommended. Worth checking out if you’re in Lisbon.","time":1657719805,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anastasiia Holiakova","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109766346741120025759/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T04I_WrleyaBFnX-qGAOupPnH1RlSaoUd4RwAU8A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"My opinion on it: overrated place
I mean, it’s cool atmosphere and design. I would go there to have a cuppa coffee but not a brunch. Bagel with mushrooms was too dry with no spices and taste actually. Bowl with pasta is super oily. As a waiter said “you should have said that you don’t want much oil”.
I went there because read cool recommendations about it but I wouldn’t come back here again","time":1643927533,"translated":false}]

column3: Tapas & cocktails served in relaxed digs with floor-to-ceiling windows & a terrace with water views.
column8: R. de Santa Catarina 17 3º, 1200-128 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Malte K.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112222202886457833496/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TrrXZrw-X7L8LfJV01F14uPPlarOZI1bZzRbNjUow=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Soso - view is top - food is way below Lisbon  standard.
Salad - Mango/Avocado for 9€ and Burger - with a green patty 10€ was both not good. On the salad a lot of onions and no creativity on the burger the part was just deep fried vegetables.
View was good. Service friendly but as well below Lisbon standards…","time":1651582000,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Raafaela Freeitas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102200006892330461509/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RUw_WPMwzaFz-HiHpAXbAxeY8sKlzyCkEYzll1Rg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"I went to celebrate my mother-in-law birthday. Have in mind that during summer the tables outside can be in the sun, so better to reserve inside. The menu could have a little change, it’s not diverse and a little complicated to understand de dishes. However nice staff.","time":1655655574,"translated":false},{"author_name":"omer sadeh","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111890596977146112874/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SJEMjmJBBfoLi5ECZXKalJbOjJAGz0yGXL2I4x7_A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Decent food in a nice terrace rooftop. Great for brunch. View is great, atmosphere not polished enough","time":1662110431,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tanios Hokayem","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110319926700842597821/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QAOdHCpP2TZ-SRN61raUdZCfAnEGNQpm_uMjLw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Amazing rooftop with great view overlooking Lisbon.","time":1664207943,"translated":false},{"author_name":"André Borges","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107795120811921864720/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QmIHRWJOZfvRusXpVUMv5psC2Ra4_Xa3TrkzpeSN4=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 years ago","text":"What a great discovery, another gem in Lisbon's rooftops portfolio. Totally reasonable prices taking in consideration the food's quality, location, great table service and  amazing views.

Also they're doing an Happy hour promotion where you get 2 for 1 in drinks.","time":1595103040,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Duarte Carvalho","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113078926747665579463/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SDK8s1OuJzwHmknJOs5ZqYG5X2uSY2hLxGso-kHA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Absolutely incredible experience! The flavours of every dish were off the charts, the octopus was super tender and the risotto with razor clams was one of the best we have ever tasted.
The environment of this place brings you to the seaside while being in the middle of Lisbon. Unpretentious and a fair value for the quality of the food you get. An experience to repeat soon!","time":1672183639,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lacy Gardner","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114335830693641425137/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RbVbq6VPwr3xCkjrULzFpBnJrseA5eM-g9FDIJQQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This is a delightful and bright restaurant. The service was attentive and we were seated immediately with our reservation. We shared the fish tacos, the crab bao and the pork sandwich. Everything was very tasty. The fish in the taco was cooked to perfection. The bao bun was impossibly light and crisp. The pork sandwich was delightfully savory but also had a pleasant acidity. I would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Lisbon.","time":1668447495,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Laurent Viau-Lapointe","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110412435718497890659/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYyiV8_HZL0ISRvUMnrGHAzhVYa0WFbJncU1mTtsw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Amazing restaurant! I went there for lunch because it was fully booked for the dinner, and I can’t recommend it enough. The place is cozy and the waiter super friendly. The octopus and wine were delicious and fairly priced. A must go in the city!","time":1657130626,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eugene Malobrodsky","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102552022700659321044/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QA9cmyKIUaDVOxzUOUks0CUYHdPH-zwY6HKPNo87M=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"One thing to know before you go: This place only accepts Portuguese credit cards, so bring cash.

The food is good but I would say that its not amazing. At the same time for the price its very decent. One thing that was really annoying is all the Verde wines and Rose wines were out and the resturant opened 30 min before fe got there. That was disappointing. Service was fairly quick and attentive. The Golden Shrimp Risotto is very good and highly recommended. The other dish that was  good in my opinion is Buffalo Shrimp dish. Also AC does not really work so it was very hot and the resturant is very small. It has maybe 10-12 tables.","time":1657614176,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kristjana Nikolls","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105959778565272748138/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S2zZeetE8GyUrjCVrlwRTs-0QcXMi62Xp5eulyoiw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"In truth I think it’s a very unique place but the food wasn’t anything special. The octopus is a must have and I would definitely try that. The green eggs and tacos were ok. The raw fish tacos were lacking flavour and punch whereas the soft tacos with friend fish were much better. The crab boa was decent. The risotto with saffron and shrimp was slightly disappointing. We had all three deserts - I would recommend the cannoli but the mouse and tiramisu were ok. Super interesting interiors and great staff.","time":1672925067,"translated":false}]

column8: R. de São Bento 106D, 1200-820 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Carlijn Popelier","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110170261750369948319/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q13RnU_jEysj9RaF7sv1JYGd9Oul8W87RVfPSWLX8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Lovely staff and great atmosphere. Love that it is dog-friendly, there is even a dog bowl for water and another dog walking around. Enjoyed the food, music and atmosphere. Went back twice in 3 days. Once for coffee and a craft beer and the second for the 15 euro brunch. I couldn't even finish it it was so much! Great value :)","time":1644335394,"translated":false},{"author_name":"DVN","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103095801098376796249/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYLXSK9MyNhaH_oZt8x-vKrRa7QxP9s-8ChZRo7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"I love my new earrings! We stumbled across this fantastic store. Super impressed by the design and decor. The kitchen is on Monday and Tuesday. Please stop by and say hello to the handsome mascot Rio.","time":1665431636,"translated":false},{"author_name":"tigox brata","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102471567446883534358/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RpcOdQls_waJ6re48D8E1IEBtkTpOo4Wuay4grA28=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Super cozy place, unfortunately suffers from a barely functioning Wi-Fi that strips it of the 5 stars. Check out the full review on Instagram @entrepreneurespresso","time":1676395103,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Anna Drokou","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111787229131037918388/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYWfpP7PA9bik3jzEk9p-fVQWZeR18zX5QxoxDK=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Maybe the greatest and most value for money brunch i ve ever had in my life!
All of the above 17 euros with top quality products!","time":1635673884,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lisa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106793682261829999149/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RzvqNQ_VUBaPDD83sGs50Reytkle_QFuL6EehoNA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"-pre COVID review-
Great place for lunch or a lanche in the afternoon.
You are surrounded with a exotic/beachy vibe. While waiting for the food you can also look at their interesting retail offer and maybe pet the handsome dog which is so cute.
We were going there every other day for the bowls.","time":1618517414,"translated":false}]

column3: Relaxed, informal 3-floor seafood and beer drinking eatery established in the 1950s.
column8: Av. Alm. Reis 1 H, 1150-007 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"James MacCallum","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114595703259440542080/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SBgRC6ebbu87jiMbHaSAAa5Vw1IvwHjwhNMz4HMw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Saw this place recommended on ‘Somebody Feed Phil’ and several food blogs. Can confirm it is worth the hype!

This was one of the most enjoyable meals I have ever eaten! We ordered clams in garlic, barnacles (bizarre-looking but tasty) and a giant tiger prawn between two. Oh yes, and oysters. Everything was delicious but the highlight was the prawn, meaty, flavoursome and huge.

The atmosphere is bustling. The staff are efficient, attentive and friendly, and the service is super quick. It feels like an absolute institution. A well-oiled machine with a team of people who love what they do.

Probably best to reserve to guarantee a place, but we chanced it at 3pm on a Friday and were seated straight away.","time":1677523943,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hassan N","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101300310358219592575/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S7nQJ0KJ-L5TeD0J_sDqVJTTYifM9eGtzIyB-MSw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"We went as a walk-in around lunch time. It seemed busy, but we were in luck and were seated almost immediately.

We were sat down at our table and it was certainly loud with lots of people bunched up together enjoying the food.

After a short inspection of the menu, we ordered some bread, cheese, shrimp in butter sauce as well as some tiger prawns.

The food doesn’t take too long to arrive despite the busy nature of the restaurant. The staff are clearly very busy but also attentive and friendly.

The dishes were unexpectedly amazing. Such simplicity in the way the food is prepared yet full of flavour and super tasty.

The quality of the shrimp and tiger prawns used is great.

The combination of the bread and cheese dipped in the butter sauce with the shrimp was particularly beautiful.

I strongly recommend for any seafood lovers to head down to this place and enjoy a fantastic meal.","time":1675016438,"translated":false},{"author_name":"A C","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116886413276907632994/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tc1ZIX1gTEIcvQt9XFDIXGQkMLG0xHLN5r4YBCAg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Very nice seafood! Super fresh and the good selection of seafood! Staffs are not really talkative but super efficient on serving. Visited twice during 5 days visit of Lisbon.

Must order the giant ruby prawns, giant tiger prawns and razor clams!! Only 12 euro for plate of ham which it was quite a lot for 2 and perfect to share for 4.","time":1653412746,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rocky Mok","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112755460932801830662/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TGKx5ulAwokCGM033vOEI7Hm5-UsYYnjQtwPUWXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Super fresh, live and very good selection of local varieties that you don’t typically get so fresh in the southern hemisphere, it’s not super expensive not cheap, but for a good feed it was a good deal in my opinion.   Service is great and typical of the restaurants we visited. The downside is it’s way too popular and the wait is insane.  There’s booking online available but we didn’t use that so I’m not sure if you really get a table for the time you booked. As everyone that eats here surely takes there time and is in no rush to leave. Our ticket was close to 3 hour wait…..","time":1672336866,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Lucy A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114794623728273155760/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RlzcPBTEXmIjKQavv1doZ7MtVw-LteGmRsdTC8J3Y=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Bustling seafood place full of locals and tourists who probably saw it on Anthony Bourdain’s No Reservations. I’d advise booking by email in advance to avoid the long queue. It took us a bit of time to work out the menu and how much to order but you can always order more. Everything was fresh and delicious! Best to go with a group so you can try a lot. We liked it all, especially liked the grilled tiger prawns :)","time":1648739214,"translated":false}]

column3: Trees line this landscaped garden, with plant-filled greenhouses, waterfalls & a kids' playground.
column11: [{"author_name":"Patrick Ohearn Ph.D.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100142908462387349487/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tk9vs0pzdqO11NXy3YuutaYDT6Nh1yOOz0DdIsRw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"One of the most beautiful places in Lisbon on a beautiful day very peaceful and pretty yet Lively. I walked my dog. Lovely gardens, a man-made pond with ducks, some casual dining venues, water closets, right across from the beautiful glacier. Highly recommended.","time":1646654359,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ahmad Farooq","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100682566917170634526/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TZriHfCUyPxwa5VcBnR1B5sP9SG-e2rJdT9Nrj=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"So soothing place in Lisbon to sit and relax in lush green surrounding. Its facing iconic landmark church. The setup of garden is beautiful with amount of seating. It's pets friendly place. There is a small pond. I saw multiple people doing yoga and training which also add life to this place","time":1674183278,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Miklós Nagy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110070898870039890328/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SV-jFaaJ9a4mTqrzgPWRp7EfgEivj287-MAmkHgA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Beautiful garden with diverse flora. It is an ideal location in the middle of the bustling city for a little tranquility, an eye-catching walk, and it’s also a must-see tourist attraction. The huge-rooted trees erupting from the ground and the sculptures enchant the park into a fairytale landscape.","time":1645962588,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Guy Hupert","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112077776206990648809/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rm0u9e7JY1YoJWNV0pz_e42pWSlQUiyVM5DmD6zjU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Beautiful small park in Estrella with lots of benches and pathways. Despite some reviews, it seemed well kept and clean during my visit. Lots of people and I saw police on standby so it’s secure as well. I gave a 4 star because the 2 coffee shops do not do justice to the beauty of the park. They look more like canteen take aways and that’s unfortunate.. worth the visit for sure.","time":1662232699,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Zara Jay","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103810068314202747334/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R49p2_cQLkzuI_L9uIEaeBBtoE6BO9uTYcjYDpaQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Beautiful peaceful park in the Principe Real area of Lisbon with a children’s playground. Lots of green space and two cafes. TIP: take off your shoes in the kids playground as the stones will definitely get in your shoes and cause pain!","time":1654510713,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Julian","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112505325582314199540/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RZHIxCY9rFIhoaD5waQ28DPhDeeInDbVnqgr-u-Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Wonderful culinary experience! It’s a must visit in Lisbon! Great food! Great drinks! Amazing atmosphere! Nice people! Definitely a place to come back every time you are in Lisbon. There are plenty of choices for any kind of food, very good red wine, best beer in town, you must try it!","time":1662580712,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tamara Cakic","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108020296892885916590/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Thyu-3L8a8YwMIC-fztUG_pz8jNmHdeGVOar-8Ch0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"What a concept! Exceptional organization, delicious food, I couldn't decide myself what I want to eat because I wanted everything!!! Every single stand looks so good, dishes are shown so you can see how the dish look like. A lot of people here, it was a bit difficult to find table, but it was worth it. I absolutely recommend this place. If you want delicious food, possibilities to choose, and a big big company you should go there. I am blown away!!!","time":1679686413,"translated":false},{"author_name":"julian willacott","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117145882260795549383/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T-w4sd8Gpfv_Fk4XHnQHUomqu376MGUwDQ_kxmLg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"A vibrant food market. Good selection of different restaurants. Everyone seated in the centre with the restaurants around you. Busy but not long to wait for a table. I went for a burger. Dirty fries and onion rings. Glad I did. It was amazing. Onions rings to die for.","time":1645459755,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joo Hock Gooi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117159579963015645056/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RUD2qmUeRy46OifMSNx9l_RoW_nQRjklfz0jz5Pw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Highly recommending for people who wanted to try out all the good Portuguese restaurant brands in one place.
You can find cod fish cooked in many ways in different stores and we ordered 3 types. All are delicious.
The seafood rice in Portugal is different from Spain as Portugal style has more gravy while Spain is more dry. Both are delicious.","time":1672264326,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jamez Ali","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117846689960901083816/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TNpirOyXaS_ru7tOS_ltc4O8UuU4fOD8-auS00KQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Loads of Hustle and bustle! Busy place first walk around eye up what you want to order. Then stalk some seating and someone will have to sit there whilst one goes to order. All communal type seating limited seating. Overall recommend it as there many vendors inside so you get to try different types foods!

The food
Well its down to personal preference for us I really enjoyed the Asian Lab! The food their was full of flavour. 5/5

The salmon sandwich was ok 3.5/5

The sushi place
3/5","time":1677440402,"translated":false}]

column3: Late Gothic Manueline-style monastery housing archaeology & maritime museums in its wings.
column8: Praça do Império 1400-206 Lisboa, 1400-206 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Roger","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105711998216209990928/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY-SkaYQ3Ol0TRj8t721L3_8FMVCwC6yViPBbwi=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"The courtyard of the Monastery is very  calm and beautiful. The stone carvings are fine and delicate .\nWell worth a visit but it is important to understand that you first need to buy your tickets from the machines in the entrance to the Archaeological Museum before joining the queue to enter the Monastery. There are no signs to warn you of this and we saw numerous people being turned away after being in the queue for quite some time.","time":1678525545,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Samad Golzari","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100633261963386662900/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Ri1fI8Ik5bcbObtHbGL85lvtW-Ve5M0s0COpAh=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"The exterior of the monetary is very beautiful. There was a long line when we arrived but the line moves fast. We had not bought the tickets already so I tried to get them online. A bit of hard work. The inside garden and fountain are were pacifying and relaxing, especially in the heat of the summer. Place for enjoying the quiet and making some beautiful photos.","time":1659192468,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Harshil Dave","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112787437286485237387/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q2mWVkHWER_U4J7Dk_jqwKDqyEaGd3iXRMAHUTDQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Simply stunning piece of architecture! All round spectacular views. The entrance is free if you have Lisboa card. The queue is much shorter if you have Lisboa card you can enter it straightaway. It is very close to Belem tower so make sure to visit both when in the area! A must visit attraction in Lisbon.","time":1676151071,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Akhil Dakinedi","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113542570010048132805/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SJV9Cqd-zaB2_v0BEM7I_Np4nJHDyGwITs7XdUXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"The architecture of this place is truly stunning. The finest example of Manueline architecture anywhere. It's hard to notice, but every column on the lower level of the cloister actually has a unique pattern and design. And then every side of the cloister has a different arch design on the upper levels. Pretty crazy how much detail and ornamentation is packed into the arches and ceilings with just one texture and tone to work with. Definitely worth the €10.00 entry fee. Buy your ticket online and completely skip the ticket line, you can walk right in.","time":1652394749,"translated":false},{"author_name":"BSN","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109891752396557470193/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S9YRCE-Avzj6T9BFc2HPIGOpFbxlMpLrJcdx14=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"“If you really want to see more, this is the best place for you in Lisbon” such a masterpiece of architecture and art.  It's powerful!  From exterior to interior, every wall, window, arch, and ceiling is so beautiful and elegant, full of detail and creativity.  This is a must see place in Lisbon.  Along with the garden, the church inside is also very beautiful.","time":1669838910,"translated":false}]
undefined

column3: Gardens & public art adorn this stately, Parisian-inspired shopping street with high-end stores.
column11: undefined

column8: R. do Poço dos Negros 188, 1200-425 Lisboa, Portugal
column11:
[{"author_name":"Sue A.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114250932058408084172/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TiOwSo_7-JFNWSJcPU-sqYF-fdNLR3Zg3oooow=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"First time in Lisbon and really love small, intimate local restaurants that are off the tourist radar and cook excellent food. We decided to take a chance here and were pleasantly surprised by the really generous starters and the huge main portions. The wine recommendation was also on point and paired well with our food. We were lucky to grab the last large table early before the dinner crowd as we saw many patrons had to be turned away due to the popularity of this place. Thanks for a great experience!","time":1652459043,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Luc and Winnie","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117038035191079114691/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZE2DC1W2RiQK3bEpSUeyMiSQTSOGZAcVsrDQxn=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"We came here based on the recommendation of our host and the good reviews. We were not disappointed. The waitress was very nice to us and the food was delicious. We had the prawn, the octupus and the cod. All the dishes tasted great!

Edit: We came back to the restaurant and the food and service was as good as the first time. We had the salad, the sea bass and the octopus (again). This was our favourite restaurant during our time in Lisbon.","time":1667077975,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Вика Глушкова","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100750205540058586579/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZ_xpQqESjrSYqxeLUgLtnkFqwXacG6wDnQtLwJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Cool guys run this place. Snacks are a compliment. And spicy cheese was great. Gorgeous octopus salad! And the roasted octopus is also beyond praise. Husband ate the steak, said it was not bad, but my octopus is better :) We will definitely come back and advise you!","time":1647802263,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aleksandra Schmidt","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110139071102208064745/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S4KSfdf5-xqItMGaV_6RyPHZmBTpsmG1wQbSzMiwk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"It was the best dinner we had in Lisbon. The food was very delicious. We ordered fish and as a desert a traditional Portuguese cake. The restaurant is small and very comfy. It has a great personal!","time":1666115493,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rafael Pereira da Costa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113007115368319881937/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYlc3K-Gs6oCnJ7c2MdsHEOXevDzIJ2j6sPyL52=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Very special experience, I went with my wife for a dinner, and they were very devoted on delivering a delightful experience at every minute. And they absolutely did it.
The food was spot on and the same goes for the service, very friendly and pleasant staff.
I recommend, there will be no regrets.","time":1653073953,"translated":false}]

column3: Ornate, Baroque, 18th-century church with twin bell towers, housing Queen Maria I's tomb.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Miklós Nagy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110070898870039890328/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SV-jFaaJ9a4mTqrzgPWRp7EfgEivj287-MAmkHgA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"It is a beautiful building inside and out, seen from below and above. Gorgeous decorations, works of art painted and carved in stone. The combination of natural light from the dome and the artificial lighting covers the interior in a special mix of colours. The roof offers great views of Lisbon in all directions.","time":1645820734,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mark de Bruijne","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111087336492891027461/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SZSXGPK0HEXuiwI2CSG4-t3ImWv7ZABPflCvxV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Beautiful old church. When we visited the church, on a Monday around 11.30 in the morning, there was a service ongoing which ended around 12.30.

It’s a beautiful church but do not plan a whole afternoon for the visit, it’s not a very big church.

There’s an option to burn a candle for € 0,50.

Make sure to also visit the park behind the church, absolutely worth the visit.","time":1651528716,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Victoria Yang","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117511249084584617276/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SvCjLDLuS_jrSkwKMlgousm2jAlWrFkcVjJD-SPA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Beautiful Basilica on the outside while waiting for tram. Didn’t get to really go inside, but checked out the free section part. Not sure why everything needs to be charged to get in… this didn’t happen in Italy, some of the historical monuments were even free!","time":1671887524,"translated":false},{"author_name":"K Y","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114682379607836339461/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZD8lGmhncqlr3K44gx5dbdGq0e50sfQsUtNRoc=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Very beautiful cathedral with an epic rooftoft & dome! The place is a hidden gem for people who enjoy Lisbon’s rich history.","time":1661501837,"translated":false},{"author_name":"G Roberts","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101249137387024726052/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QQRjmunJ03Mb779iIXmNw16r_Q6Bjxz5BvtiDDZw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Beautiful historical church, directly across the street from the Guerra Junqueiro Garden Park. Free and worth a quick visit to pray or see the beautiful marble work and frescos.","time":1662303165,"translated":false}]

column3: Landmark medieval fortified tower on tiny river island with rooftop terrace offering estuary views.
column11: [{"author_name":"Yana Popovych","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114873027202245746243/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbzik08dFZ7AjAXuWI8wqu2wP7g-Kn4IgfaeWMK=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Breathtaking place. Definitely worth to visit. I was impressed to see the castle in the water, and this small beach where you can take a photo in front of the castle. Might be too crowded.\nAlso, there is a nice park nearby, and many other sightseeing are very close","time":1651520029,"translated":false},{"author_name":"We3 Travels","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113133284248538367648/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R6OQ8tb1-WUEoIKmnDvYx4ezoLRdS2V-8FQ0II=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Such a beautiful tower. It's amazing how it's held up over the course of time and the stories it could tell. Beautiful day, not a lot of people. Nice that there is a large green space to relax and just take it in (not supposed to bring dogs, but some people do). Oh, and there is a bathroom near the road.","time":1651249001,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Joel Fornes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109393725817262214640/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TxH6GycEdmVQFXveFbtIanqd53wWaw89ri0g0tPQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Such a beautiful scenery. This stunning UNESCO World Heritage tower was once the port of embarkation for Portuguese explorers and a ceremonial gateway to the capital. These cloudy sunset made the place even more magical and special. Nevertheless, what fascinated me the most was the little bay with waves constantly splashing to our feet.","time":1648511279,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Coralie Pattenden","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117229625285925810802/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SLDEkseWHE-S2eddIVj6AXmL-LsBNyRfTqUXql=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Such a gorgeous tower on the sea. Lovely to visit inside as well and get great views. The ticket office is in the park and you need a ticket to go inside. Otherwise it is free to admire from the outside.\nSomeone was playing the violin outside which really added to the experience.","time":1645393422,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cheryl Evans","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107600817384462462332/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TmQ_yN27sNdWfqQ29fzponMKAt5WpElxZQR_MMAA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"This was a picturesque spot. We went in and took the steps up through the tower. You can’t go all the way to the top. They sent giant groups of people up the stairs. Once you reach the rooms there really isn’t much to see. There are so many people that you end up getting right back in line to go up more steps to another crowded room.  When we came out of that we rent into the bigger room. It was literally an empty room with a bunch of cannons. Not really to me worth the money for the ticket. But it was very beautiful outside. Tip: if you want to go in buy your ticket online and save yourself the wait at the ticket kiosk located in the garden.","time":1673414856,"translated":false}]

column2: Jardim das Francesinhas / Jardim Lisboa Antiga
column11: [{"author_name":"D N","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111456303416643573984/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RH7pyN9Ail-Oi7j1xeU1mWhN2WlypWRRJFcNNwYQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Beautiful park in Lisbon on evening new year eve","time":1672534574,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Paige A","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111122808280115915174/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RwbUggQFLfw3wtEcfu3uOJi7fBHh0jSOAmn4E=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"The view is *gorgeous*, the drinks are that of a typical bar/pub, but the service can be awkward. One time, I was sitting by myself and the women next to me moved my chair over to sit with them and the employees there told me to move the seat back and that I couldn’t sit with them. I said to them that it didn’t make sense to force a woman to sit alone at a bar…even if it changed the pairing up of the seats. There where three men seated together right next to us. Needless to say it was weirdly unwelcoming for a bar.\nThe people at the door and serving the drinks were pleasant. Again, the view is pretty.","time":1641250177,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Justus Kull Shwafati","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106895189298181377357/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SQGkBk1nOU_OHr2YF6d8-gJDVfj6RjvRKttzijpLI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Serra da Arrabida,  the beachs is beautiful , the ocean calm and clear but very cold.","time":1665049659,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mike Haynes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100315895210561538938/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZNmd_hYImA41McwjXmPyAjepSNW2ecHxbzadsk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Zero grass, but it's enclosed. At least there were a few dogs for Ginger to play with,","time":1650308947,"translated":false},{"author_name":"sylvain caillaud","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109989468051627519281/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TKFCc2rV0hnNE1lzWP1ciHOJhQvieHsfjmqzWdvA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Ladroes! They lied to us at the door pretending that for a 15e ticket you can consume up to 15 euros.. But in reality the ticket is just a value for a drink. So at the end, I advice you to order the most expensive drink on the menu. This is not honest and make this rooftop the most overrated in town.","time":1636845685,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Bryan Nagy","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114027859351860615806/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R2ASqhkjV6PZ9ErgsG8xpi-hCOutIp4vrdFOGk8PA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"What a find! We came here during a busy night and were lucky to snag two seats. I'm glad we did!

The wine selection was great- we had several glasses of white which paired wonderfully with the food we had.

The food was tapas style. I highly recommend the bread basket. It came with two custom butters, olives, and carrots. You could see the bread coming out of the oven and being sliced from where we sat. I wanted to take some home!

The rest of our tapas were very tasty. We had some tartar, seafood, and dessert.

The ambiance of the restaurant is wonderful. Romantic yet relaxed.

I highly recommend visiting if you can.","time":1653696223,"translated":false},{"author_name":"DemanDeSoleil","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101139281901499355119/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxa0aySXjX8ICkYW_5Q-wYnQuYpKcou-JL4BbusjQQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"My husband and I had a great experience at this place. Although we didn’t reserve a spot we were immediately seated at the bar. The interior design is magnificent(very modern as we like) staff were attentive and polite. They have a great selection of delicious Portuguese wine. The food menu is unique and certainly will impress you. The tuna ceviche and veal cheeks were just amazing! I highly recommend this place!","time":1653822323,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Güliz Coşan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117973501284044322272/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYlcKekJoM-XdA4u8cC-sV8mFDwWo54G-aG83rs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"We loved this place a lot!
We initially had our booking for another day but we switched to New Year’s Eve dinner and we are so glad that we spent out night here.

What a lovely service and ambiance. Everyone is super friendly. Food is amazing. The decoration feels super cozy but chic at the same time.

The menu was special for the night but I’m sure their regular menu is as good as what we had.","time":1672749533,"translated":false},{"author_name":"T. Sh.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103215551915662999381/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SOpZNpJ0Z3DwG-DUhn9ZTNSZB12OxzS3DO4Kpe6A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"We didn't have a reservation so we set on the bar, that was great. The guy in the bar was very nice and helped us to find the best wine for us. The food was very good, and the place bis well designed. The dishes we ordered weren't that unique, but it was served in a very sophisticated way","time":1654636414,"translated":false},{"author_name":"David DT","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106019956956134010405/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaBQsswTx3IwuNv_v3kKe2dnfQNwZewY8ot46H6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"This place is amazing. If you’re in Lisbon you NEED to dine here. The location is beautiful and the vibe is just perfect: it feels like you’re in a different time! My friends and I were attended by few waiters all very competent, cheerful and kind. We’ve been suggested amazing wines and we ate delicious food. Overall great experience from the moment we’ve stepped in till the moment we’ve left. I’m definitively going back.","time":1661763085,"translated":false}]

column3: Snug, homey choice with a rustic, waterfront patio offering classic Portuguese plates & wine.
column11:
[{"author_name":"G.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105229130190769876080/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RS2gRmKRHjUYpi9bBG9XKYJzM_uh3qKi4kEkDFBg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"It takes a ferry and a small walk along waters to get here, which was a small adventure. We reserved before arriving and asked for a nice seat, and yes they gave us such a great place. We sat for a while to see the sunset. The food was great! The view as well. It was getting slightly chilly when sunset, but yes if you’re near, you should try this place. The colours of the restaurant and the view are something you should experience. The sound of the waves, the sunset, delicious food, nice people, everything just heart warming.","time":1647396300,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Marie Hayden","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109532563155728848294/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q1tlu6UZN7b0Xhp_zMmSyVVWws7briZeRhAIVyEQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"We were so grateful to dine in this lovely coastal spot. This gem of a location was shared with us from the Lisbon episode of “Somebody Feed Phil”! It was absolutely packed when we arrived after navigating many downhill stairs. We at first we’re turned away as they simply had too many names on their list for those wanting a table. This is a wonderful problem to have…. Be proud of your amazing success. We opted for Olives and drink sitting on the waters edge. Then we met a lovely host who was charmed by a certain 85 year old who persistently asked if her name was on the list… he indulged her with a smile many times as he walked by calling out various names. Then he graciously added Lisa to his list!!! This was a wonderful gesture for these Canadians!! Next we feasted on so many delicious flavours! This was truly an epic experience fulfilled by your kindness and we thank you greatly!!!","time":1653335088,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Leonard Agustinus","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/118265442811095882952/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TgVyCZi_ges-BLakLUtDH1Htb5I4DKtK96ePZ-IA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"One of the best restaurants that we visited in Lisbon. We reserved weeks before, and try their most popular food, Monk fish with rice. Quality of ingredients are awesome, fresh and brought the best taste of the food. Ask them  outdoor area when you reserve, and you can get the best view, sound and food at one place. Must visit when you are in Lisbon","time":1673169320,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tracey Okada","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103700643813580327187/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TeOW-9QZ_7G4OKLpxdyOVWt_POi1G_bjZasC0_Mg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Everything was as expected - unique outdoor dining experience with a fantastic view and delicious food.

I have to admit - we came here after seeing it on Somebody Feed Phil and it did not disappoint.

We got the octopus salad, oysters, Pork Shoulder, and small sardines to start.
It was a memorable Lisbon experience, and a nice excuse to take the ferry","time":1649950719,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Christina Dimaggio","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101613983227323200658/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QIZVwdVS9g1tbZGd5wWm_WImVELL8ixYR9Tg9x7w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Friendly staff and great fish!

If you’re vegetarian or do not like fish - your options are more limited. If you love fish, this is the right spot! I’d recommend making a reservation for sure. We made ours via emailing the restaurant. Very simple process!","time":1660349222,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Cassandra Sousa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110935968201739381890/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QAGbNEYZZQ3WnP2bE9Jtb-aMepzF2fU9k2eT1hWQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"This is the kind of dining experience you will spend days thinking about afterward. Certainly a splurge, but worth every penny. We ordered a series of starters rather than the whole meal, each one more delicious and complex than the last. The chefs managed to pack an incredible amount of flavor into such tiny plates.

The manager received our reservation and made special note of my partner's severe food allergy. As we entered, he made a point of telling us which of the plates to avoid. He had prepared for our arrival! This meant so much to my partner, who often is nervous about eating in new restaurants for this very reason.

The manager and staff were so friendly and accommodating. We loved every minute of our experience and will certainly be back!","time":1670321629,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Siobhan Henderson","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104099028876157552471/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYy04rRc8pTiICluHQNBdX_Zge2mBdKobbwaVcG=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Best meal we had in Lisbon, amazing seafood and cocktails in such a cool space with a modern fit out. We didn’t have a reservation but took our chances and got a late sitting after being asked to come back 30 minutes later. Service was second to none and the staff were really attentive. Would definitely recommend a visit if you’re in Lisbon!","time":1666006619,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kelly Chan","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117130787705643968442/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QM8xSnYEKNatZoU78fxlNJBwr-Rt4qHKpga-gVqIo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Excellent experience and I highly recommend this restaurant. We went for 3 starters, 1 main and 2 desserts. It was all amazing, delicious, and very reasonably priced. I will return when I come back to Lisbon.","time":1673904315,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jorge Campos Lamas","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106951301733711901329/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T7TzVHbD4kJI9QGlIjUdlUyxjxpbsDmvKUXNXO=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Easy review:

Everything was so good. Try the Linguini (home fresh made with butter and vieiras) and the Camaroes with truffle pure. Amazing flavors and good service. The waitress was right with the food recommendations and dessert was also good.

I would say it is a place to try different things and not order one dish per person. Also, I would recommend it for special moments like celebrations unique days.

Price: I would say is ok based on the food quality but not affordable I guess.","time":1668335437,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Suitcase Monkey","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108271769521571727502/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q-TJ36FTmjMMqmAO2X1txyo-RheLnjiW-GIA2PQQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Excellent! You will definitely need to book a couple days in advance as they were turning everyone away. All courses were great, nice service and lovely setting around the bar for couples.","time":1666101908,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Linda Lo Castro","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105633005594807648790/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RJSzfS67ey1h0hw3umE8ZLObcymDMbMz42rCjfRRQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"What a fantastic experience. As others have said the smell of wood fire smoke hits you - but in a very pleasant way. Everything is really curated, from the decor to the beautiful hand-made crockery, and great service from people who really know their stuff.

The food was incredible- we had a mix of fish and meat - the dishes with rice we thought were particularly successful.

Cocktails were superb too.

If you want something special, I  would highly recommend it!","time":1665268027,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Ganime Betül AKIN","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109997459261268665716/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RCpskWkxjIK7aXIRgTwng14jp5wYI2emHT0LhaMAQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Upscale place with excellent service. The food  was very well presented but it tasted (to us)  a bit too rich at times. The meat was smoky, the potato mash was rich.  Attention was top-notch though. Every dish was explained in detail. Prices are on the high side but on par with the quality of service.","time":1655152816,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Koz Malka","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100807242513061386828/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxYMC0QI_Fwa-kKdX0HPyHzaMy3NdBAQu0pc6brL=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Michelin ⭐️ restaurant has a good mix of locals and international visitors. The menu’s are on wooden blocks with QR Codes.

The food is modern and old school fares. Try the rockfish and grilled octopus which are amazing.

The cocktail list isn’t great but what they have are amazing delicious. The Moscow mule and Old Fashioned are brilliant","time":1665943887,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sunna Lee","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115086189383160941667/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZvtC3E_hM1ehH07rU_uz8q2hXHm-z1C-8KYoZz=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":2,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Recommended by foodies.  Yet our experience was not that good. Beautiful room.   Great concept as we love smoked food.

The horse mackerel smelled too fishy as it arrived at the table and I love fishy fish.  I could not finish the dish.

I ordered pork neck because it was unique and if done right, it could be amazing but it tasted like regular ham.  The apple purée that came with it was gray.  Everyone knows you must use lime or lemon to prevent the browning of the fruit.  The flavors did not compliment either.  Sliced kohlrabi with cilantro was added.

It is hard to burn calories from gourmet meals.  But I do it because great meals are worth it.  This was not.

There are such great restaurants in Lisbon.  It is hard to compete.","time":1665093622,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mike Palafox","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108470311661147697830/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QkrvyH9OuPfQu4N0PoiJEfS1tSaQLrk5EzXEhH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A pleasant visit. As soon as you walk through the main the door a smokey whiff hits your senses. The chef of this place commands fire to perfection and every dish has been smoked or somehow transformed through a combination of smoke and fire.
Everything in this place is well thought and achieved. Great decor, check. Friendly staff, check.  Mouth watering menu, check. Strong local wine list, check. Amazing bread and butter, check.     I’m salivating just by remembering my visit and writing this review. A hidden gem in Lisbon for sure.","time":1660552137,"translated":false}]

column8: Tv. de Santa Quitéria 38 D, 1200-762 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Lisse Beau","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110717275484019824560/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QQNaiqbLunwx-8L3VYr6KZjqs6tymN8dlltugfLYQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"One of the most marvelous meals we had in Lisbon - the food was wonderful, with fresh seafood as well as grilled high quality steaks. The service was also on point and ambiance is really comfortable. A local recommended this place, and now it's one of my favorite places in Lisbon.","time":1676405598,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Charles Berg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116684937549924577726/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbxMzj9bsQELRvJ5DYj4baW4NTMqEJ6VKFz_Cu2=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"For God's sake! I don't even know where to start. We went as a family and the scenario the previous entrance with an employee eating monkeys from the nose and eating them. I took a deep breath and continued. The padron peppers were cold and too salty, the cuttlefish that is apparently a specialty was stiff like chewing gum. The sirloin steaks dried and ironed. Given this, the service was unfit and indifferent. Not to be repeated","time":1677875687,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Richard Mensik","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109761029407781109792/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbLMN7naeYStwfHUDuOOTw3Un40yFDpB_CITBam=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 weeks ago","text":"Excellent food and excellent experience. Spoke English, were great with a noisy toddler, awesome outside seating. What else can you ask for? Would 100 percent recommend","time":1678794711,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Pablo Aponte","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106517010916373163831/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QppJoLeiP6zZfOQ5WyVigIeGx1hBSFqWYaFB3msQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Incredible food and service. I order a shellfish soup and the octopus. The soup has an excellent taste and a bunch of pieces of shrimp. The octopus was perfectly cook, soft, not chewy, simply perfect. My wife has the same soup and curry lobster, which was served beautifully with a couple of copper pots. Finally we had a cheesecake which also was extraordinary. Overall, the experience was great and the flavors as I expected. I recommend this place fully.","time":1565599719,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rachael Sperling","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114791838698311744873/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QwktDDQYojSyQV6kfeBmJrVX42RUDZt-0uB793Zw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Lovely service, views and food. Sit on the patio on a sunny day and you'll have a quaint view of the city and the water.\nI enjoyed a perfect vinho verde from Muralhas and the clams “à bulhão pato.\" Order soft bread and toast - 100% needed to soak up the garlic, lemon and olive oil. The manager was incredibly friendly and kind.\nI will be back!","time":1644432518,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Michael Spelz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109709679137975965879/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QbrtF5kve7wUD51ZZ5A0Xtrvp-3ENYCYwGTp0I=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"By far the best haircut I’ve ever had in my life! Highly recommended!","time":1666985332,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Nathaniel","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102036380758549062162/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Q7zveNw6GhrlqyEbxsrjlie2UgAkj4fCJOQDL6=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"2 months ago","text":"Leo is a credit to his profession.  Perfect experience right at end of vacation to head home with.","time":1674045945,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Guadi Costa","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113902069889523803579/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZbh2pARxwIqS2ttgmCwHy4h7EBk-8OtCjs_PmK=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"My husband made an appointment the day before but was still made to wait 50 mins to get his haircut (which was a pretty average cut). No hot towels for the shave. €50 for the experience. Daylight robbery! Much better alternatives nearby.

Try Toni & Guy around the corner. Much nicer & cheaper experience.","time":1650990261,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mi Ka","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114392127970663581555/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbQi1eKUd4xLaigTDZAs34HxBDsVFcZre557mIJ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"I was lucky to get a cut without having booked. Alfonso didn‘t cut the hair basic, he makes art on your head. A just amazing barbershop and amazing guys!
I‘ll come again, when i‘m in lisboa.","time":1660423516,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Bernd Orttenburger","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103007957290863208372/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RubNh1Gp74QVah56aMAMBeAOfZhFb5f0BIrgl3xbI=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Exceptional professional haircuts. Very friendly barbers. Cool interior. Go there do get a classic barber hairstyle!","time":1558105341,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Daan Wolswijk","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/105352431711842973872/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RRr8TcQLiqhLROty09E6psoAftTkVw1RGSNojPMVE=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Bershka is a really nice brand and I love to buy their clothes. My experience in the store was mixed. I really loved the collection, but the staff was a bit off. In front of the fitting room where they give you the number plate according to how many thing you want to try on two of the staff members were just chatting, ignoring everyone. I also didn't like that the store displays clothing on mannequins that they don't sell. I saw a really cool shirt that I wanted to buy, but it's not part of any of their collections. Where is the need to put out clothing that you don't actually sell, it just disappoints?","time":1662497357,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Yousef A. Almubarak","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112285114726401693577/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Sa9I-RmsT3xus4nBBI1JsH9Uq8ChoyjyJAYEpyuZo=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba8","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"3 years ago","text":"Small and organized store but the collections are below average.","time":1579605664,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Victoria Zaretska","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107547468546649595058/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QTOEY_4WYqlKRYfmksgv7s_L1n9oytDv1hmnHh3Q=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"5 months ago","text":"Totally recommend if you wanna get an attitude from cashier for no particular reason.","time":1665687878,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Emma Lindberg","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103174772040989004281/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QyZw_OdK6qYjCYwJQhyW44D9cTyige4cuvQccZ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":1,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I bought a pair of boots at this store, and ordered them from the store too. After I wore them once, the zipper broke on the left foot, and I went to the store to ask if it was possible to return them and get a new pair. They told me to come back with the shoes and I would get a refund.\nMy complaint is not about the quality of the shoes, as this can happen with everything. My complaint regards the cashiers. I don't usually leave complaints, but my experience at this store was so horrible that I feel like I have to tell them that this was not okay. I went in to the store with the shoes (after going there twice to ask if it was anything they could fix, which means 2 cashiers saw the broken zipper before this incident) and when I told them I wanted to return them and by a new pair, they told me I couldn't. I explained the situation again, and that 2 cashiers had told me to just return the shoes. 2 of the cashiers rolled their eyes at me and spoke Portuguese clearly about me and how they disliked the situation. After 2 more cashiers showed up, they told me I had to walk around with the shoes in the store to prove that the zipper was broke.\nOf course the zipper didn't break this time, and I told them I would come back later because I had an appointment. In reality I just wanted to get out of there because I felt humiliated. 10 minutes after I left, the zipper broke and I went into the store again later to show them. The cashier wouldn't even speak a word to me and called for another person to deal with me. I ordered the new shoes and got my return. that is nice, of course, but still not okay to almost bully a costumer.","time":1637583660,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mohammad Habeeb","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116381941531098123833/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SbLKnG-KN-5ISL5tJuC4MULy3JkbdXlm52kWCJJw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"It is a good store where young people can shopping clothes. Very well organized, kind staff and reasonable prices.","time":1657719859,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Diego Preciado","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/103141035252474186435/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SX7GC_iHwGdNYyRcAG8Cc4u-XBo3HNc6wOMsByXw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Fine cuisine with lots of option to choose from. Love the plating but i love even more the flavor of the dishes. Truffle pasta not overwhelming at all  just perfect for dinner.  torpedo sauce to die for and all fresh fishes were delicious.
