not to crazy about desserts but overall 5 out of 5","time":1657406610,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Daria","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104539527001352025329/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaFtTUJ2M0ehriBsPBgcBWoxLVvTIMGg04elumQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Amazing experience! The most delicious meat I’ve tasted in ages (we ordered Goat Shoulder and Veal), all the sides were unbelievably good too! Great wine, great desert selection. Impeccable service and stunning interior. Can’t compare it to anything else, just WOW.
We thanked the chef probably 5 times and the dinner conversation was about how good the food was!","time":1643211155,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Patrick Ohearn Ph.D.","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100142908462387349487/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Tk9vs0pzdqO11NXy3YuutaYDT6Nh1yOOz0DdIsRw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Lovely outdoor restaurant in a semi-enclosed dining area just next to sidewalk on Ave. Liberdade.  Delicious food, good, attentive service, though pretty expensive. I’ve eaten here twice and 2 of the best meals I’ve had in Portugal. Come for a special occasion.","time":1656207124,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Hey Its GIEL","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110350103722613909754/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TVRHbU3f7hYxxvLEciRa4lv_zqER53IxwNXmuZm7w=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"For a Thursday night here in Lisbon…the bar was PACKED!!

We didn’t have a reservation (you can walk-in, but make a reservation if you can) so that last minute idea to go cost us an additional 30min wait time on top of the wait for our food.  Since we didn’t have a reservation for the restaurant, we were told the bar was the next best thing.  You can still order food at one of the many side tables around the bar.

There is certainly an ambiance that eludes to money + class here. 🤷🏽‍♀️ *shrugs* Honestly, I love it!  There are beautifully dressed people in expressive conversation in many languages with raised glasses clinging as toast to “the good life” fill the air. It took quite a while for someone to seat us, but the vibe was buzzing and the service was overall is pretty good.

We had the fish soup — divine✨
A vegetable pasta — terribly bland (not shown)
A wonderful Reserved Red wine 🍷🙌🏽
And their Dinosaur Dessert 🍨✨ (super sweet but very yummy)

If we didn’t have to wait as long and if the main dish (pasta) was better, this would have been a 5-star experience. Either way, I certainly plan to visit again!","time":1663924948,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jan Laenge","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116321162957226641808/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TN8d8DyY7G-NMn6eojjp6cbylguOACzwr4WKVr=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Excellent food, great ambiance and attentive service. You can find typical Portuguese dishes as well as a multitude of European classics.
The venue seems to be always booked out, so I recommend reserving in advance.","time":1651247576,"translated":false}]

column3: Trendy restaurant with outdoor tables, serving burgers & pizza, with DJs & dancing after dinner.
column8: R. Barata Salgueiro 28 A, 1250-044 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Jukka Hotta","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116564298874731488508/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Rdp1QdpvKRNwAgOTCSAveZ7lOYFBk_-km0RxMbBg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"The best burger that I have ever had in my life. During the dinner the only problem was that I felt I need a bigger stomach to be able to enjoy more. Yes, 38€ for a burger seemed a lot, but then again, if you want the ultimate you gotta be willing to pay the ultimate price. Staff great. Atmosphere great. Just perfect burger place. Highly recommended!!!","time":1664262980,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Cool Breeze","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101677411947741538631/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbXrz7VL8elP9qjCT3eneA-n9QMooLyV3Yh1JoH=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"A lovely restaurant with great ambiance. The Texas wings are a must try! The burgers are equally very good and tasty. The atmosphere is also very relaxed.","time":1653380287,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Sebastian S","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101939166407960697334/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5S0gg6DlN1HoJUsIWv5b4TSvqXb_jQtU_59lhw2DqY=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"I made some friends last night and we went to this wonderful place very late, but we’re kindly let in to have dinner. The atmosphere was excellent, the service very nice and perhaps I had the best tasting burger since years. Try the „guilty“ burger if you are here","time":1655810082,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Tim Costello","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113774389541904706576/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qkp59rI_a8KuLnyZZzFDULzw6axinHrTjAB0oCgg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"It's a fun atmosphere with a brilliant looking menu and the service was excellent! The food though feels like an afterthought - focaccia was great but the burger main (a cheese toastie bun) was...meh. Too much bread, unseasoned beef... it's fine, but when ya paying 25 euro for a burger, kinda left me wanting more flavour.","time":1672264674,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Kim Schulz","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/108322343105523461150/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QbrwVJI_rLu_xlzUBZSp_v0aJRXSh6i-qE-AGSD2A=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Went there a few nights for drinks. Our first bartender was fun, entertaining anf could make the drinks. The next day the bar tender was completely useless and couldn't even figure out do serve even simple drinks without getting help or doing it wrong. This would have been a 5 star review if we hand not experienced the second night.","time":1663282426,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"D L","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104082359782418235750/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T2Vw3DBILRbxkjKZdarQZPXl0VnF_Hr-vewNVwcQg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"11 months ago","text":"Unlike everyone else I did not order the steak. On a hot grilling stone . However I ordered their tentacle rice (in tomato soup). It was extraordinary and ornate with a generous amount of the seafood. it can be a bit chaotic for some, but you can feel what a small local restaurants vibe is like. So if you come be prepared to ditch your Ritz attitude!","time":1650008599,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Fulvio Guerra","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112020533539111990393/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QZXA9LYkVXWNB3gc7cIwwPMhAo_nSQHoUEGHJObw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"At first sight it might seem a really chaotic place where a peaceful dinner would be impossible but the sympathy of the owner and the superb quality of the dishes made us enjoy the night. I immediately felt like I was eating at home of one of my closest friend. Absolutely a must try.
No possibility to book table so the earlier you arrive the lesser you wait","time":1645736327,"translated":false},{"author_name":"C Montoro","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109366974812617831399/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5Qf8HDJJsG4zUVtkvqk4-GKiQeP6XS37xN9p5w8Ag0=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Definitely recommended ! Meat was delicious, for a very decent price. Only possible to pay with cash

You cannot book so need to queue once you arrive (on a positive note you can order some beers while waiting in the street). Some of the desserts are made in house.

⚠️Only 2 negative aspects:
- the space is very small, so could be a bit uncomfortable depending on the table you get
- watch out with the overpriced appetisers already preserved on the table (cheese, bread, coldcuts…). Will recommend to kindly reject them and focus on the meat !","time":1677447137,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alice Smith","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/102689645119742431521/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZTWTnZ5QVPwqXurwhZKCxRDWXMd7Jn08-_KHQ7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"We stumbled across this restaurant on the first night of our stay. We were told to wait 20 mins before a table was available. It was worth the wait. Typical Portuguese food at a very reasonable price. The place is small but great vibes, we quickly made friends with a group of locals also sat on our table and had the most fun of evenings!
Would recommend!","time":1654697330,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Antoine Ouellet","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/117534901801499129541/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5R3neEd9t6JLD_NLRJ_VbQ9VF9V_PzKkq-TY1MBJA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"We had an amazing experience. I would recommand the steak on the hot stone. The piece of meat was excellent. Note that they only accept cash, but there is an ATM right on the other side of the street. The restaurant was very busy and looks like it’s a very popular place for the locals.","time":1663448301,"translated":false}]

column3: This historical industrial complex houses an array of arty retailers & unique restaurants.
column8: R. Rodrigues de Faria 103, 1300-501 Lisboa, Portugal
column11: [{"author_name":"Imran Agha","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101074522841591257382/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxY9D-ixKZGlcAmfqx19yqJGgzy-WWR980dYnhL7=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Interesting, with good variety of foods. Nice to see good use of old buildings. Very poor cobbled surfaces so not ideal with a pushchair or wheelchair. Good spot to have something to eat and some drinks but not much else to see. Worth visiting if in the locality and after a bite to eat or a few drinks but not worth going out of your way to visit.","time":1664377369,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Diana Mendes","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114361982053932981264/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T5gustIt1UYiFNRFa7oQQqTLFCP9DrLfa_jUzQag=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Such a fun way to spend an afternoon! A former industrial space that's been overtaken by artists to turn it into a great place to eat and shop with delightful murals and shops. If you visit on Sunday, there's a sweet craft market too.","time":1659611917,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Eugeniu Lisnic","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106022777567762739980/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SxyT1oKb6aRKQGc2Unz14uMxTGuIBLby9p674sng=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Great place to come for a walk, for a snack, food or drinks. Also to buy some souvenirs or just for a coffee. They have a big amount of options for any taste. You can also cut your hair or get a tattoo here. They have parking that is 2€ for 2 hours, otherwise there’s many options with transport around. Everyone speak good English and the place is full of tourists that bring a great atmosphere here ☀️","time":1660233627,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dorian Didier","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104336222471633832385/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RK31y-xPCIXGhG8wzboO0Fci_VnlZbX3KlycehdA=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"A very nice setup. The bed bunk is well arranged, beds are isolated from each other, so you still have privacy although among other. The place has its own charm with a cool atmosphere. Breakfast is good. This place is definitely worth the low cost. Highly recommended. 😉😉","time":1661854190,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Aleksandra N","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/114536718004469501490/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5QVqPx4wCBq_02ROqcI1NMhyI4jiQisjkopF_pGEg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"4 months ago","text":"Cool hip place with a bunch of workshops, unconventional stores and eating options. Good for an evening with friends — first explore the factory converted into a loft-like business centre, then finish the evening at one of many cafe-bar places, each with theit own character. Imo everyone would find something to their liking here","time":1667998708,"translated":false}]

column3: Cozy Portuguese cafe with a warm vibe offering breakfast through dinner, plus coffee & local wines.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Thomas Scherfler","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109034423584164925412/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TwNMk1GKQDoAm4HRVil1fFCMKTGejUV0NKJjPspLU=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Nice little place with a huge food selection. Considering the love they put into preparing the food, the waiting times are not bad at all. It's not a place for a quick snack, and waiting a bit is worth every second. The staff is helpful and friendly and the food was fantastic...
And as a bonus, awesome coffee as well ..
Love the place.
PS: This place is celiac heaven. They provide a lot of gluten-free options and  it tastes awesome too.","time":1648127959,"translated":false},{"author_name":"A M","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113082132148058990726/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxZvVBnCOsasQQaJLP7Re0IouPiPhpoIulexDzJ8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"10 months ago","text":"Heard so many great things about this place. Finally went this morning, food was lovely, staff were so friendly, prices were great!! 3 coffees, 2 dishes, water and a juice all under €30. We were served quickly and the interior is lovely, bright and clean.

We will be back before we leave!","time":1653341190,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Epi . .","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/115320804691340974512/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RToQjKoRtt_xNUrhBiegekTyfEn35EZvh_EaCMJC8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Best breakfast spot in Lisbon hands down!! The breakfast was so fresh, tasty and the coffee was absolutely delicious! The staff were absolutely wonderful towards foreigners and very helpful when it came to local tips on what to do in Lisbon. The ambience of this place is relaxing and enjoyable. It's a very native thing to sit outside, enjoy your food and coffee and watch the world outside. If you're local to this area, you won't be disappointed in this breakfast spot! The only tidbit is to go early or be ready for a wait - seating is tight and somewhat limited!","time":1655751633,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Rebecca McBride","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/112763141446810537814/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaeOhpUqHHJMouLCrZ9pqiKOYM1sajtOqDiuhwV=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba3","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Very busy spot so had to wait for a table, but was worth the wait. Great selection of sweet and savoury dishes and hot drinks. Everything we got was delicious, fresh and colourful. The waiting staff were helpful and friendly. Will be back next time I'm in Lisbon.","time":1662823070,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Elisa Trejo","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/106905223962792748487/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5T6l2ZYXXW04Pzg4XefD7SAWfrHOacEjBYuutVmlzg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"I think the pictures don't make justice to the food sometimes. But what a Brunch, is a small comfy place where you will like to hang out even by yourself doing some work by yourself or with friends.
We order different things waffles, sandwich, pancakes, coffee. And omg you should be hungry for all the food they  give you.
Amazing experience! If you go let me know what you tried so i can add it on the list for the next visit","time":1644508596,"translated":false}]

column3: Stylish cocktail bar in the Tivoli Avenida Liberdade hotel serving sushi, oysters & Brazilian fare.
column11:
[{"author_name":"Karen Holland","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/107995250818699953157/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SiqFHwkVMuK05LSkMkEn0xrmv44nri49FMW0RbqQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Requested a reservation via email which took them a couple of days to respond but after that everything was great. The selection of dishes available on the were varied. We had the beetroot carpaccio to start with which just melted in your mouth and I then had the truffle linguine which was divine. Had the ice cream for dessert which was delicious. Definitely recommend this place for a late night dinner. Good selection of cocktails too.","time":1672969373,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Antoine","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/111519668180971352980/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5RPNaUEMEwQ9v_Dt4Yq3bN4Hi6psDFXaMWcbe_5GQ=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":3,"relative_time_description":"a month ago","text":"Good viewpoint, prices above average but that's understandable for such a place, and the cocktails were good.

The atmosphere is nice, but the evening we were here, clients were a bit of show-offs without manners, speaking loud and sending intent looks to women. It could have easily been perfect.

Most importantly, the service was not there: if you see a manager-looking lady with blond curly tied hair, run away, she's very condescending. They forgot our appetisers, forgot to come back to us after bringing the bill, and when we went to her to pay, she made the whole experience fall from a 5 stars to a 3 stars.","time":1675885799,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Alix Dufossé","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/101317453214359409367/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TElfqc5B5L3ilDLnXle991l6RZj1xYxwchG3YJopk=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba2","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"7 months ago","text":"Had an amazing dinner here. Our waiter recommended a great selection of dishes my favorite was the truffle eggs! You honestly can’t go wrong and they had amazing cocktails!","time":1660312795,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Dave Neto","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/109340268506419714916/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SoRIUKCWbpMYOieGmK_IdJkk8Bvh939UawDMu4gw=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"8 months ago","text":"Hands down the view takes the cake here.
The food as well as the service does compliment the view though.
If you want to go and eat on a budget then order starters and dessert (which is more than enough for two) and skip the main course.
However if you are planning to spoil your partner, go crazy, the food is crazy yum!","time":1659554401,"translated":false},{"author_name":"João Delgado","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100656594076266883902/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaLPiXNMoJoUuYUuxd5C-yMSBd0jqGOIUdK5o19=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a week ago","text":"Highly recommend Seen. It's an expensive place but you won't leave feeling like it wasn't money well spent. The staff are amazing, always looking after you, the food is really good and after dinner you'll find yourself sitting at the bar area, either around a tree that brings a special touch to the place or close to the sushi bar where you can see the amazing city views drinking cocktails.","time":1680005828,"translated":false}]

[{"author_name":"Caleb Carter","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/116092265388990668210/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxaaSg58CElEFJdRFu2su7jUwhKi5WkqNWKuiTxs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba6","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Nothing too fancy, but it was all done perfectly! Great food and a great view. I would return back here.

On top of this, the waitress was the best waitress that I have had for years. Her English wasn’t perfect (my Portuguese is terrible) but she was unencumbered by her capacity to care for us well. Her attentiveness was incredible. Give her a raise and keep her around as she treats customers extremely well.

Thanks!","time":1640883238,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Jonathan Paré","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/110492940147565918351/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5To0gCEZ358CGT86z75bUKs4zErRlON1qAnQVRIiGg=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba4","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"6 months ago","text":"Very nice restaurant, with a beautiful view on the port of lisbon. The food is VERY nice and spot on for the price. A very large choice of different meal and alcohol. Just on the side of the museum arte antiga, so you can plan a stop after the museum. A very nice way to restore a bit.","time":1663427185,"translated":false},{"author_name":"K P","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/113102138399481513569/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5SbbH8NCND7FsFpRLnG4fAm0rTWZalyCCJ67XDs=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":4,"relative_time_description":"9 months ago","text":"Food was okay. Had the burger and sweet potato fries.  The dip was amazing- a lot of garlic… so good !  Drinks were decent","time":1654973353,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Daphney F","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/100106217273545236778/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/ACB-R5TAuxUShnqcCCmZChbyVzVxuaY1kqPfxOpq102FFZ8=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"a year ago","text":"Great atmosphere with a view of the river. Miguel, the bartender, tailored the cocktails to our specific tastes. Try the Mexican Spicy and the Basil Chick. Both are delicious cocktails. We did not try the food there.
It is right next to the Museum of Ancient Art, so a perfect stop after a day at the museum.","time":1628105851,"translated":false},{"author_name":"Mark Hoffman","author_url":"https://www.google.com/maps/contrib/104742019489771987471/reviews","language":"en","original_language":"en","profile_photo_url":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a/AGNmyxbrLQ6VzygdsVEkWMBPg0FGa0uqn6IYaEQfxXxS=s128-c0x00000000-cc-rp-mo-ba5","rating":5,"relative_time_description":"3 months ago","text":"Went here because someone said the views were extraordinary. They did not disappoint. Drinks were good, staff friendly. Nice place.","time":1671092196,"translated":false}]
